<p>1a</p>
<p>1b</p>
<p>1b.1\] ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ dzA ta ka mA la/ bod skad du/ skyes pa'i rabs kyi rgyud/ bam po dang po/ bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal
<p>1b.2</p>ldan yon tan dam pas yongs bzung bkra shis pa/ /grags pa'i gzhir gyur ma smad shin tu yid du 'ong / /thub pa'i sku tshe snga ma'i spyod pa rmad byung rnams/ /bdag gi snyan dngags me tog
<p>1b.3</p>snyim pas gus pas mchod/ /grags pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa bzang po 'di rnams kyis/ /bde bar gshegs 'gyur lam rnams gang yin bstan par 'gyur/ /yid la dad pa
<p>1b.4</p>med pa rnams kyang dad par 'gyur/ /chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten mchog gi spyod pa dam pa phyogs tsam gyis/ /bdag gi snyan dngags mnyan
<p>1b.5</p>du rung bar bya ba'i phyir/ /lung dang gtsug lag rig par mi 'gal lam bdag gis/ /de ltar 'jig rten don gyur snyam nas 'di brtsams so/ /rang don brtson pas gzhan don brtson pa gang
<p>2a</p>
<p>2a.1</p>yin pa/ /yon tan bsgrub pa bzang po'i rjes su mthun ma gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen ces brjod pa ma nor gsal bar grags/ /mnyam med de dang chos dang dge 'dun spyi bos 'dud/ /bcom ldan
<p>2a.2</p>'das de sku tshe snga ma la yang / sems can thams cad la rgyu med par rab tu byams pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dang bas phyag 'tshal lo/ /de yang 'di skad thos so/ /
<p>2a.3</p>bdag cag gi bla ma dkon mchog gsum bla mar byed pa/ sgrub pa'i yon tan rnams kyis bla ma mgu bar byas pa/ yon tan gyi tshogs kyis bla mar gyur pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku tshe snga ma'i rtogs pa brjod pa
<p>2a.4</p>'di yongs su bsgrags pa rjes su thos te/ byang chub sems dpa' yid dam bcas pa khyad par can dang mthun par gyur pa/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyod pa la sogs pa shes rab kyis yongs su zin pas skyon med
<p>2a.5</p>cing snying rje'i rgyu mthun pa rnams kyis 'jig rten yongs su 'dzin pa na/ rang gi chos la mngon par dga' ba las gyur pa'i gtsang sbra dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa'i bram ze'i rigs chen po je mtho je mthor gyur pa zhig tu skye ba
<p>2b</p>
<p>2b.1</p>yongs su bzung bar gyur to/ /zhes grags so/ /de skyes pa'i las bya ba la sogs pas sbyangs pa rim pa bzhin du byas shing mngon par skyes pa ni/ rang bzhin gyis yid gzhungs pa dang / mgon skyabs kyi khyad par dang / shes pa ched cher 'dzin pa dang / 
<p>2b.2</p>le lo med pas ring po ma thogs par rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad dang / bdag gi rigs dang mi 'gal ba'i sgyu rtsal rnams la slob kyi slob dpon gyi go 'phang dam pa thob par gyur to/ /rig byed shes la de ni tshangs pa bzhin/ /rgyal po rnams kyis bkur bas rgyal
<p>2b.3</p>po bzhin/ /skye dgu rnams la brgya byin mngon sum bzhin/ /shes 'dod rnams la don spyod pha dang 'dra/ /de skal ba dang ldan zhing yon tan khyad par can du gyur pas/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa'i khyad par rnams rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /byang chub
<p>2b.4</p>sems dpa' de blo chos la goms par bsgoms pa dang / rab tu byung ba la 'dris par byas pas de la mngon par dga' bar ma gyur to/ /sngon gyi spyod pas de'i blo yongs su dag /'dod pa rnams la skyon mang mthong nas ni/ /khyim na gnas pa nad bzhin yongs
<p>2b.5</p>spangs nas/ /nags tshal gnas shing rab tu brgyan par gyur/ /de ni der yang chags med de yis su/ /shes rab yongs su sbyangs shing zhi ba yis/ /mi yi 'jig rten dam pa'i spyod bral ba/ /ngan par spyod la chags pa bzlog pa bzhin/ /de yi rang bzhin
<p>2b.6</p>byams pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ /rnam par brlan pa bzhin du sems mthun zhing / /phan tshun gnod pa med pa'i sems gyur nas/ /dka' thub can bzhin gcan gzan khro bo'ang spyod/ /spyod pa dag cing dbang po dul ba dang / /chog shes ldan zhing snying rje'i yon tan
<p>2b.7</p>gyis/ /'jig rten dag na skye bo ma 'dris pa'ang / /gzhan la de byams bzhin du de la byams/ /'dod pa chung la ngan g.yo mi shes shing / /rnyed dang grags dang bde la ma chags pas/ /de la lha rnams yid kyang mgu gyur nas/ /dang zhing gus la rab tu gzhol bar
<p>3a</p>
<p>3a.1</p>byed/ /de ni rab tu byung bar mis thos te/ /de yi yon tan rnams kyis sems drangs nas/ /gnyen dang yongs su bzung ba rnams spangs te/ /dgongs sgrub bzhin du de yi slob mar gyur/ /tshul khrims gtsang sbra dbang po dul ba dang / /dran pa ma
<p>3a.2</p>nyams rab tu dben pa dang / /byams la sogs dang yid ni ting 'dzin la/ /de ni slob ma rnams la ci nus ston/ /de nas bdag nyid chen po de re zhig cig na slob ma'i tshogs rnams ni phal cher yongs su rdzogs shing rgya cher gyur/ dge ba'i lam la ni rab tu bkod/ 
<p>3a.3</p>'jig rten pa rnams ni nges pa'i lam dam pa la btsud/ ngan song gi sgo ni bcad pa bzhin du byas/ bde 'gro'i lam ni lam po che bzhin du byas nas/ tshe 'di la bde ba spyad pa'i phyir de'i tshe rjes su mthun pa'i slob ma ma pham pa dang 'grogs te/ rnal 'byor dang mthun
<p>3a.4</p>pa'i gnas ri'i sman ljongs zhig tu gnas shing spyod do/ /de nas ri khrod de na ni/ /stag mo phru gu 'brangs pa zhig /phru gu 'brangs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis/ /spyod pa nyams par gyur pa mthong / /mig gnyis lta ba zhan par gyur/ /bkres pas lto ba rab tu
<p>3a.5</p>nyams/ /phru gu bdag gi bu yin kyang / /kha zas bzhin du lta bar gyur/ /ma la yid gcugs 'jigs med cing / /nu zho 'dod phyir lhags pa la/ /stag skad nyer nyer sgra 'byin cing / /gzhan gyi bu bzhin spang bar gyur/ /byang chub sems dpas de mthong
<p>3a.6</p>nas/ /brtan yang snying rje'i dbang gyur pas/ /sa g.yos pa yis ljon shing bzhin/ /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gdungs pas 'dar/ /bdag gi sdug bsngal chen pos kyang / /snying rje'i bdag nyid brtan pa gsal/ /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal chung ngus kyang / /'dar
<p>3a.7</p>bar gyur pa de rmad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtabs shing rings rings skad du/ smra ba'i tshig rang bzhin khyad par can gsal bar ston pa/ snying rje'i dbang gis tshig 'bru gsal bar slob ma la smras pa/ bu bu 'khor ba yon tan med la ltos/ /gcan
<p>3b</p>
<p>3b.1</p>gzan mo ni ltogs nas su/ /byams pa'i mtshams las 'das nas ni/ /rang gi bu yang za bar 'dod/ /kye ma ho bdag la byams pa 'di/ /ha cang ma 'os mi bzod do/ /gang phyir ma yis bdag gi bu/ /za bar 'dod pa ga la srid/ /gang phyir 'di 'dra'i las dag
<p>3b.2</p>kyang / /byed par rtsom pa de lta bu'i/ /bdag la byams pa'i dgra bo de/ /'phel bar byed pa su zhig yod/ /de bas na stag mo dag dang phru gu rnams ma rung bar ma gyur pa 'di bkres pa'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i rgyu ga shed na myur du tshol cig /bdag kyang 'di'i thub chod
<p>3b.3</p>'di las bzlog pa'i phyir 'bad do/ /des kyang de mnyan te de bzhin du bgyi'o byas nas/ de'i zas tshol ba la 'bad par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas slob ma de snyad btags te btang nas bsams pa/ bdag gi lus 'di tshang bar yod bzhin du/ /ci phyir gzhan
<p>3b.4</p>las sha ni btsal bar bya/ /des kyang rnyed dam mi rnyed gtol med la/ /bdag gi dgongs pa 'di yang mi 'grub srid/ /gnyis su na/ bdag med 'jig la snying po med pa'i lus/ /sdug bsngal drin med rtag tu mi gtsang ba'i/ /lus kyis gzhan la phan thogs
<p>3b.5</p>'gyur ba la/ /dga' bar mi 'gyur de ni mkhas ma yin/ /bdag gi bde la chags nas gzhan dag gi /sdug bsngal yal bar 'dor ba mthu med dam/ /gzhan dag sdug bsngal bdag la bde ba med/ /nus pa yod bzhin ci ste yal bar dor/ /nus pa yod
<p>3b.6</p>bzhin bdag gis yal bor na/ /gsod pa'i dgra yang sdug bsngal bying ba la/ /yal bar bor na sdig pa byas pa bzhin/ /bdag gi sems ni 'dam bu mes tshig bzhin/ /de bas lus kyis bsrung bar bya ba ni/ /g.yang sar lhung la thug pa'i srog yod pas/ /
<p>3b.7</p>phru gu bsad la stag mo bsrung ba dang / /stag mo las kyang de yi phru gu bsrung / /gzhan yang / 'jig rten phan brtson rnams la bstan pa dang / /brtson 'grus zhan pa spro ba bskyed pa dang / /gtong phod rnams ni dga' ba bskyed pa dang / /skye bo dam pa'i yid ni drang
<p>4a</p>
<p>4a.1</p>ba dang / /bdud kyi sde chen spa ni bkong ba dang / /sangs rgyas yon tan dga' ba dang ba dang / /bdag gi don brtson ngo tsha bskyed pa dang / /'jungs dang 'dod chen can yang ngo tsha bskyed/ /theg pa mchog la brten pa dad bskyed cing / /gtong bas
<p>4a.2</p>snyems pa ngo mtshar bskyed pa dang / /gtong la dga' ba rjes su yi rang rnams/ /mtho ris lam chen rnam par sbyang phyir ro/ /lus tsam gyis kyang gzhan la phan thogs par/ /nam zhig 'gyur zhes bdag gis gang bsams pa/ /smon lam la ni 'bras bu yod par bya/ /
<p>4a.3</p>byang chub mchog kyang rab tu nye bar bya/ /'gran phyir ma yin grags pa 'dod phyir min/ /mtho ris 'dod dang rgyal srid bsgrub phyir min/ /bdag gis bde ba mchog thob phyir min gyi/ /gzhan don bsgrub phyir bdag gis 'di brtsams so/ /de bas bdag ni 'di yis dus
<p>4a.4</p>gcig tu/ /'jig rten dag la sdug bsngal bde 'byung ba/ /gsal zhing bsgrub pa rtag tu nus gyur cig /nyi mas mun bsal snang byung nus bzhin no/ /mthong zhing thos sam rjes su dran kyang rung / /reg gam gtam du brjod par gyur kyang rung / /rnam pa kun du 'gro la
<p>4a.5</p>phan pa ni/ /bde dang ldan pa rtag tu byed gyur cig /de ltar gzhan don bsgrub phyir nges byas nas/ /srog dang bral yang rab tu dga' gyur te/ /brtan pa'i lha rnams ngo mtshar skye 'gyur bar/ /bdag gis lus ni de nas bor bar gyur/ /de nas stag mo des byang chub
<p>4a.6</p>sems dpas lus bor ba'i sgra de thos shing ngo mtshar skyes nas/ bdag gi phru gu bca' ba btang ste/ de nas mig gnyis kyis bltas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus srog dang bral ba mthong nas/ de ma thag tu nye bar 'ongs nas bza' bar brtsams so/ /de za
<p>4a.7</p>zhing 'dug pa dang / de'i 'og tu de'i slob ma des sha ma rnyed par slar 'ong ste/ mkhan po gang na bzhugs snyam nas bltas pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' der lus srog dang bral nas stag mo des za zhing 'dug pa mthong ba dang / des de'i spyod pa khyad par can de ngo mtshar che
<p>4b</p>
<p>4b.1</p>bar bzung nas/ mya ngan dang sdug bsngal gyi shugs btang ste/ de'i yon tan gyi gzhi la smon pa'i tshig tu smras pa bzhin du yid la bsam pa tshig tu smras pa/ e ma'o sdug bsngal can la snying re rje/ /bdag nyid che ba bdag gi bde ma chags/ /dam pa rnams kyi spyod pa
<p>4b.2</p>mchog tu byas/ /gzhan gyi dpal dang grags pa zil gyis mnan/ /e ma'o rab tu dpa' ba 'jigs pa med/ /yon tan byams mchog rnam par bstan/ /e ma'o yon tan chen po bdag gi lus/ /phyag gi gnas kyi khyad par can du byas/ /rang bzhin zhi ba sa gzhi
<p>4b.3</p>bzhin du brtan/ /e ma'o gzhan gyi sdug bsngal mi bzod pa/ /e ma'o dpa' bo phun sum tshogs pa 'dis/ /bdag gi skyon ni rab tu grags par gyur/ /mgon po 'dis ni mgon dang bcas byas pas/ /da ni 'gro ba mya ngan bya mi dgos/ /gzhan gyis pham du byas
<p>4b.4</p>pa'i bdud dag kyang / /da ni nges par shugs kyang nar zhes 'byin/ /yong ye skal ba chen po 'di sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa/ thugs rje shin tu rlabs che ba/ snying stobs dpag tu med pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i don ji lta bu nyid la phyag 'tshal
<p>4b.5</p>lo/ /zhes smras nas/ de nas de'i don de tshangs par spyod pa rnams la sbran no/ /de nas de yi spyod pas ngo mtshar gyur pa'i slob ma dang / /dri za gnod sbyin klu dang sum cu rtsa gsum bdag po rnams/ /phreng ba na bza' rgyan dang tsan+dan phye ma char phab pas/ /de yi
<p>4b.6</p>sku gdung rin chen mdzes pas sa gzhi khebs par byas/ /de lta bas na/ bcom ldan 'das de sku tshe snga ma la yang sems can thams cad la sgyu med par rab tu byams pa'i rang bzhin can sems can thams cad bdag gir gyur pa yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
<p>4b.7</p>'das la rab tu dad par bya'o/ /dad pa skyes pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dga' ba bskyed par bya'o/ /de lta bas na de ni bdag cag gis dad par bya ba'i gnas yin no/ /zhes de ltar yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ltar chos kyang bya dka' ba mang
<p>5a</p>
<p>5a.1</p>pos bsgrub pa yin pa'i phyir rim gro bskyed de chos mnyan par bya'o/ /de ltar snying rje ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i rgyu yin zhing ngo bo nyid khyad par can bsgrub pa yin pa'i phyir/ snying rje'i yon tan la yang bsngags pa brjod par bya'o/ /byang chub
<p>5a.2</p>sems dpa'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i rgyud las rtogs pa brjod pa dang po'o// //bcom ldan 'das des bya dka' ba brgya phrag mang pos/ bdag cag gi don du dam pa'i chos 'di yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir rim gro bskyed de chos mnyan par bya'o/ /de yang
<p>5a.3</p>'di skad thos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe/ dpag tu med pa'i dus nas goms par byas pas/ bsod nams kyi las bsags shing 'dris par byas pa de/ re zhig cig yul shi pi pa rnams kyi rgyal por gyur to/ /zhes
<p>5a.4</p>grags so/ /de byis pa nas rgan po la bsnyen bkur byed pa la dga' ba/ dul ba la rjes su dga' ba/ rje blon byams pa/ rang bzhin gyis yid gzhungs pa/ rig pa du ma rtogs pas blo rgya che ba/ spro ba dang / gsang tshig dang / gzi byin gyi mthu dang skal ba phun sum tshogs pas skye dgu
<p>5a.5</p>rnams bdag gi bu bzhin skyong bar gyur to/ /de la 'khor gsum rjes mthun yon tan tshogs/ /phan tshun 'gran pa bzhin du gnas par gyur/ /dngos po thams cad yongs su rdzogs gyur zhing / /'gal zhing 'khrug pas gtses pa med par gyur/ /ma dul
<p>5a.6</p>'chal pa rnams la 'phya 'gyur ba/ /blun po rnams ni rab tu phung byed pa/ /bdag nyid chung ngu rnams ni myos 'gyur gang / /dpal de de la ming ni don bzhin gyur/ /rang bzhin rgya che snying rje'i yon tan ldan/ /rgyal po de ni nor la dbang yod phyir/ /phongs pa rnams
<p>5a.7</p>ni 'dod pa'i don grub pas/ /ngo 'dzum mi gnag bzhin bzang mthong bas dga'/ /de nas rgyal po sbyin pa la dga' bas/ grong khyer gyi kho ra khor yug tu sbyin pa'i khang par nor dang / 'bru dang / yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa brtsigs su bcug nas/ 
<p>5b</p>
<p>5b.1</p>bdag gi bdag nyid che ba dang rjes su mthun pa/ re ba ci lta ba bzhin du skong ba/ gus pa dang bcas pas yid dga' bar byed pa/ dus bzhin du 'byor pas yid du 'ong ba'i sbyin pa'i char rdzogs ldan gyi dus kyi sprin bzhin du phab par gyur te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ 
<p>5b.2</p>btung ba 'dod pa rnams la ni btung ba/ mal cha dang / stan dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / byug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / gser dang / dngul la sogs pa 'dod pa rnams la de dag char bzhin du phab po/ /de nas rgyal po de'i sbyin pa rlabs po che de thos
<p>5b.3</p>nas/ phyogs tha dad pa'i yul na gnas pa'i mi rnams ya mtshan che zhing snying dga' bar gyur te yul der lhags so/ /mi yul kun tu yid kyis brtags na yang / /gzhan du bslang ba'i skabs ni ma rnyed nas/ /phongs pa rnams ni dga' bzhin der lhags pa/ /nags
<p>5b.4</p>tshal glang po mtsho chen ngang lhags bzhin/ /de nas rgyal po de skye bo slong ba thob tu re bas yid dga' bar gyur pa 'gron po'i chas su zhugs pas/ mi sdug par gyur pa rnams so so nas lhags pa dang / skye bo mdza' bshes byes nas 'ongs pa dag /mthong bar gyur na
<p>5b.5</p>dga' ba'i mig bgrad bzhin/ /slong ba'i tshig ni gtam snyan thos bzhin dga'/ /byin nas dga' ba slong ba las kyang lhag/ /sbyin pa las byung de yi grags pa'i dri/ /phongs pa'i tshig gi rlung gis bsgrags pa dag /rgyal po gzhan gyi dregs pa med byas
<p>5b.6</p>pas/ /spos kyi glang pos glang po gzhan gyi bzhin/ /de nas re zhig cig /rgyal po de sbyin gtong gi khang pa rnams nyul du song song ba dang / phongs pa rnams re ba skong ba'i slong ba'i skye bo 'du ba nyung ba mthong nas/ sbyin pa'i bsod nams mi 'phel bar 'gyur
<p>5b.7</p>bas mgu bar ma gyur to/ /de la brten nas phongs pa tshim par gyur/ /sbyin la dpa' ba de ni snying ma tshim/ /phongs pa rnams kyis slong ba'i tshad dag gis/ /de yi sbyin pa'i tshad la thub ma gyur/ /des bsams pa phongs pa rnams 'dzem pa med cing bag med
<p>6a</p>
<p>6a.1</p>par/ bdag gi lus slong ba yang yod na skyes bu dam pa ya rabs de dag re skyid/ ngas nyon mongs pas phongs pa rnams tshig rtsub pas bsdigs te bskrad pa bzhin du nor tsam la yang bag bskum ste slong mi phod par gyur to snyam mo/ /de nas
<p>6a.2</p>rgyal po'i sbyin pa rlabs po che/ /bdag gi lus la'ang mngon par ma chags par/ /sbyin par bya ba rnam rtog de rig nas/ /bud med khyo la gdung bzhin sa g.yos so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sa gzhi g.yos pas ri'i rgyal po ri rab rin po che'i 'od
<p>6a.3</p>gsal ba yang g.yos par gyur pa dang / 'di ci snyam du rtogs pa skyes so/ /rgyal po de'i rnam par rtog pa khyad par can de las sa g.yos par rig nas/ sems la ya mtshan che bar gyur nas bsams pa/ sbyin la rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis su/ /'di
<p>6a.4</p>ni rgyal pos gyi nar rnam brtags sam/ /bdag gis lus 'di nges par sbyin byas na/ /'on te snying nas 'bad de bsam pa yin/ /de bas na/ da 'di re zhig brtag par bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po de blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor te 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa
<p>6a.5</p>dang / phongs pa rnams la gar 'os 'os su gang ci 'dod ces bos te/ nor bu rin po che dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor gyi tshogs rnams ni byung ste/ dkor gyi bla ma rnams kyis spyan pa byas nas gos rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i snod rnams ni kha
<p>6a.6</p>phyes/ bzhon pa dul ba sna tshogs kyis drangs pa'i shing rta'i khyad par bzang po rnams ni bsogs/ skye bo phongs pa rnams ni so so nas lhags pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bram ze rgan po long ba cig gi gzugs su bsgyur nas/ rgyal po'i spyan sngar
<p>6a.7</p>'ongs par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po de'i snying rje dang byams pa bsgom pa'i lta ba brtan zhing gsal la zhi bas bsu ba bzhin 'khyud pa bzhin du bltas pa dang / rgyal po'i 'khor rnams kyis ci 'dod ces dris nas/ mi'i bdag bo dang nye bar 'ongs nas rgyal
<p>6b</p>
<p>6b.1</p>bar gyur cig tshig gis shis pa brjod de/ rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sa bdag dam pa khyod kyi spyan 'tshal phyir/ /rgan po ring nas mi mthong bzhin du mchis/ /pad+ma'i spyan mnga' spyan ni gcig pus kyang / /'jig rten bdag pos 'jig rten bgyi ba
<p>6b.2</p>'grub/ /byang chub sems dpas yid la bsams bzhin smon lam rab tu grub pas rab tu dga' zhing rab tu spro bar gyur te/ ci bram ze 'dis 'di bden par smras sam/ 'on te 'di lta bu'i rtog pa la goms pas/ bdag nyid kyis 'di ltar zin snyam du rtogs pa
<p>6b.3</p>skyes nas/ yid la mig slong ba'i tshig snyan pa nyan par 'dod de/ mig slong ba de la smras pa/ bram ze'i gtso bo nga la mig slong ba/ /su yis bstan nas khyod ni 'di ru 'ong / /mig ni rab tu gtang dka' zhes grags pa'i/ /srid pa su zhig nga la med par
<p>6b.4</p>'gyur/ /de nas bram ze'i cha lugs su bsgyur ba'i brgya byin des/ rgyal po de'i bsam pa rig nas smras pa/ brgya byin 'dra ba brgya byin gyis bstan nas/ /khyod la spyan slong slad du 'dir mchis so/ /de yi srid dang bdag gi re ba dag /spyan stsal bas ni
<p>6b.5</p>'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /de nas rgyal po des brgya byin smos pas/ lha'i mthus bram ze'i mig 'di/ gdon mi za bar cho ga 'dis mig dang ldan par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i tshig gsal bas de la 'di skad smras so/ /yid la
<p>6b.6</p>re ba gang gis 'dir 'ongs pa'i/ /bram ze khyod kyi re ba de ngas bskang / /nga yi mig ni ya gcig 'dod pa las/ /khyod la mig ni gnyis ka ngas sbyin gyis/ /des khyod ut+pal rgyas pa'i mig gis gdong brgyan nas/ /ci ste 'di nyid yin nam 'on te ma yin zhes/ /
<p>6b.7</p>rnam rtog yengs pa de 'di yin zhes ngo mtshar gyur/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas su 'gro bas mthong bar song / /de nas rgyal po de'i blon po rnams mig sbyin pa stsol bar rig nas brtab pa dang bcas pa'i shugs kyi skrag pas gdungs pa'i yid du gyur nas/ rgyal po la
<p>7a</p>
<p>7a.1</p>smras pa/ sbyin pa la dgyes ches na mi rigs pa dang gnod par 'gyur ba mi brtag par lha de ltar mi mdzad du gsol/ spyan stsal bar mi rigs so/ /bram ze 'di ni gcig pu'i phyir/ /bdag cag thams cad mi 'dor gsol/ /skye dgu
<p>7a.2</p>bde bar bskyed pa rnams/ /mya ngan zhugs kyis mi bsreg gsol/ /dpal chen skyed par byed pa'i nor rnams dang / /dpal dang ldan pa rin chen ba bzhon dang / /dul ba'i rta dang sbyar ba'i shing rta stsol/ /glang po dregs pas gzi ldan 'gying ba stsol/ /rkang gdub
<p>7a.3</p>'khrol ba'i sgra rnams grags pa yi/ /khang pa dus rnams kun tu bde ldan pa/ /ston ka'i sprin bas rab tu dkar ba stsol/ /'gro ba'i mig gcig nyid kyi spyan ma stsal/ /gzhan yang rgyal po re zhig dgongs su gsol/ /gzhan gyi mig gzhan la ji ltar sbyar
<p>7a.4</p>du rung / de ste 'di lha yi mthu ci lags na/ khyod kyi spyan la yang ltos ci 'tshal/ lha gzhan yang gzhan gyi 'byor pa dbang byed pa/ mig gis dbul la ci zhig bgyi/ /de bas dkor las stsal du gsol/ /lha gcig thub chod mi mdzad gsol/ /
<p>7a.5</p>de nas rgyal po des/ blon po rnams la byams pa'i tshig 'jam pos smras pa/ gang zhig sbyin zhes smras nas ni/ /mi sbyin pa yi blo bskyed pa/ /de ni 'dod pa'i zhags pa yis/ /bdag nyid slar ni 'ching bar byed/ /sbyin no zhes ni khas blangs nas/ /gang
<p>7a.6</p>zhig yid la gzhan sems pa/ /ser snas ma nges blo can de/ /de las sdig che gang zhig yod/ /sbyin no zhes ni khas blangs pas/ /phongs pa'i re ba brtan byas nas/ /bslu ba'i tshig ni rtsub po de'i/ /sbyin po'i bsab pa ci yang med/ /gang yang khyed
<p>7a.7</p>na re/ lha'i mthu nyid kyis 'di'i mig yod par ci'i phyir mi 'gyur zhes zer ba de yang nyon/ rgyu gcig gis ni 'grub pa yi/ /'bras bu gang yang yod ma yin/ /lha rnams kyis ni byas pa yang / /rgyu rkyen gzhan la ltos yod/ /de bas na ngas sbyin pa chen po
<p>7b</p>
<p>7b.1</p>byed pa la khyed kyis gegs byed par mi rigs so/ /de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha nor dang / 'bru dang / rin po che la sogs pa rnams stsal bar rigs kyi/ spyan ni stsal bar mi rigs so/ /zhes bdag cag gis sngar gsol ba lags te/ de bas na
<p>7b.2</p>bdag cag lha shul ma lags par gshegs su mi gsol lo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gang zhig slong ba de nyid sbyin par bya/ /mi 'dod pa ni byin yang dga' mi 'gyur/ /chus khyer ba la chu yis ci zhig bya/ /de bas slong ba'i don 'di 'di la sbyin/ /de nas
<p>7b.3</p>rgyal po'i blon po chen po rab tu yid gcugs shing 'dris pa gcig byams pa'i shugs kyi zhes btang ste/ rgyal po de la smras pa/ kye cung zhig gzhes shig /la las dka' thub ting 'dzin cho ga chen pos gang zhig thob 'gyur zhing / /gang la brten nas mchod
<p>7b.4</p>sbyin chen po mang pos grags dang mtho ris thob/ /brgya byin longs spyod la yang 'gran pa'i rgyal po'i rgyal srid thob pa de spangs nas/ /ci zhig mthong nas khyod kyis mig sbyin cho ga 'di ni su las lobs/ /mchod sbyin byas pas sum cu rtsa gsum nye/ /grags pas
<p>7b.5</p>kun tu rab tu gsal 'gyur zhing / /mi dbang gtsug gi 'od kyis rkang brgyan pa/ /ci zhig 'dod phyir mig ni sbyin par byed/ /de nas rgyal po des blon po rnams la byams pa dang bcas pa'i tshig gis smras pa/ da 'bad 'di nas sa kun thob phyir min/ /mtho
<p>7b.6</p>ris thar pa grags pa thob phyir min/ /slong ba 'di ni don med mi 'gyur zhing / /'jig rten bskyab phyir nga ni 'di ltar 'bad/ /de nas rgyal po des me tog ut+pal mthing ga'i 'dab ma ltar mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba'i mig ya gcig sman dpyad las byung ba bzhin
<p>7b.7</p>du dal bus ma snad par phyung ste rab tu dga' bzhin du mig slong ba la byin to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ci nas kyang mig de de'i mig tu gnas par gyur pa/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa des mthong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par byas so/ /de
<p>8a</p>
<p>8a.1</p>nas mig ya gcig phyes te/ slong ba po la bltas pa dang / rgyal po de snying rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ mig ya gcig kyang de la byin to/ /de nas rgyal po de yis mig byin nas/ /pad+ma med pa'i pad+ma'i mtsho 'dra gdong / /gzhan la med pas
<p>8a.2</p>rab tu dga' bar gyur/ /bram ze'ang mig dang ldan par 'khor gyis mthong / /rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang pho brang 'khor rnams kyang / /mya ngan mchi mas sa gzhi thams cad chag chag gdab/ rgyal po rdzogs pa'i byang chub blo brtan mthong nas ni/ /brgya byin de
<p>8a.3</p>yang ngo mtshar che zhing rab tu dga'/ /de nas brgya byin ngo mtshar chen pos sems rab tu dga' ba dang dang bar gyur nas 'di snyam du sems so/ /e ma'o brtan zhing snying stobs che/ /e ma'o sems can phan 'dogs pa/ /las 'di mngon sum gsal gyur kyang / /the
<p>8a.4</p>tshom za bar gyur pa 'dra/ /de lta bas na ngo mtshar che ba'i sems can 'di yun ring du 'di ltar nyon mongs su gzhug par mi rigs kyi/ thabs kyis 'di'i mig slar skye bar 'gyur bar bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po de'i rim gyis mig gi rma ni sos so/ /btsun
<p>8a.5</p>mo'i 'khor dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyi mya ngan srabs kyi song nas/ rab tu dben par 'dod pa'i phyir rdzing bu'i 'gram na me tog gi ljid kyis non pa'i shing bzang po stug po yod pa ser bu bsil zhing bde la dri zhim po'i ngad ldang ba/ bung ba mang pos sgra 'byin pa
<p>8a.6</p>zhig tu skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin mdun du 'ongs so/ /de nas rgyal pos 'di su yin zhes dris pa dang / smras pa/ nga ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin yin te khyod kyi drung du 'ongs so/ /gshegs pa legs so ci bzhed pa bka' stsal du
<p>8a.7</p>gsol/ zhes zhes dang bcas pas smras pa dang / rgyal po la yang smras pa/ rgyal po drang srong nga la ci 'dod pa'i mchog de slong cig /de nas rgyal po de sbyin pa la goms shing slong ba la ma goms pa'i phyir brtan pas 'dzum zhing ngo mtshar mi che zhing rlabs can du smras pa/ brgya byin bdag
<p>8b</p>
<p>8b.1</p>la nor mang zhing / /dmag tshogs che zhing mthu dang ldan/ /da ni long bar gyur pas bdag /'chi ba 'ba' zhig mngon par 'dod/ /gzhan yang slong ba rnams ni yid la re ba kun/ /yongs su bskongs pas rab tu dga' 'gyur zhing / /legs par lta ba'i
<p>8b.2</p>bzhin rnams mi mthong bas/ /de phyir dbang po bdag ni 'chi bar dga'/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa rnams 'di lta bu nyams su myong bar gyur gyis/ de snyam du ma sems shig /'on kyang khyod la ngas dri'o/ /slong ba rnams kyis 'di lta'i
<p>8b.3</p>gnas skabs gyur byas nas/ /da ni de la khyod kyi yid ni ci snyam sems/ /ci nas yid ni rab tu ches par 'gyur ba ru/ /de ni gsang ba med par rab tu smra bar gyis/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bdag ngom du zhugs pa de tsam du khyod la ci yid ches/ 'on kyang lha yi
<p>8b.4</p>dbang po gsan du gsol/ /de tshe nga ni de ltar slong rnams kyis/ /slong zhes nges par smra ba'i tshig rnams la/ /shis pa brjod pa bzhin du bdag dga' na/ /bdag gi mig ni ya gcig mthong bar shog /de nas rgyal po de'i bden pa'i byin rlabs kyi mthu dang bsod
<p>8b.5</p>nams spel ba'i khyad par gyis/ tshig de skad smras ma thag tu me tog ut+pal mthing ga'i dbus rin po che an da rnyil gyis spras pa 'dra ba'i mig ya gcig mthong bar gyur to/ /ya mtshan che ba'i mig des mthong bar gyur nas rgyal po de sems rab tu dga' bas/ yang
<p>8b.6</p>brgya byin la smras pa/ gang yang bdag la mig ya gcig slongs nas/ /de la bdag gis mig gcig dga' bzhin byin/ /dga' zhing spro la rtse gcig sems gyur na/ /ya gcig mig kyang bdag la yod par shog /de nas de skad smras ma thag tu rgyal po de'i
<p>8b.7</p>mig ya gcig kyang snga ma dang 'dra ba bzhin du yod par gyur to/ /de nas ri dang bcas pa'i sa chen g.yos/ /rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyang dus las 'das pa byung / /lha rnams kyis ni rnga bo che dag kyang / /zab cing snyan pa'i sgra chen sgrogs par gyur/ /phyogs rnams kun kyang
<p>9a</p>
<p>9a.1</p>dwangs shing gsal bar snang / /ston ka'i dus bzhin nyi ma gsal bar snang / /tsan+dan phye mas bsgos pa'i me tog rnams/ /nam mkha'i nang nas ldeng zhing bab par gyur/ /lha yi bu mo 'khor bcas lha rnams kyang / /ya mtshan che ba'i mig
<p>9a.2</p>bgrad der lhags gyur/ /ser bu yid du 'ong ba bde ba ldan/ /'gro ba rnams kyi yid kyi dga' bar gyur/ /'byung po mthu chen ngo mtshar gyur pa rnams/ /yid ni rab tu dga' bas khyab gyur nas/ /rgyal po'i spyod mchog bstod pa'i gzhi brjod pa/ /snyan pa'i tshig
<p>9a.3</p>rnams kun tu grags par gyur/ /e ma'o rlabs chen e ma'o snying rje che/ /'di yi sems ni ji ltar rnam dag ltos/ /e ma'o bdag gi bde la sems ma chags/ /brtan zhing dpa' mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+ma'i spyan ni dpal ldan slar rgyas pas/ /
<p>9a.4</p>khyod kyis 'gro ba mgon bcas bgyis pa legs/ /e ma'o bsod nams tshogs ni don yod pa/ /ring zhig lon nas khyod kyi byin gyis rgyal/ /de nas brgya byin gyis legs so legs so/ /zhes bya bas de mgu bar byas nas yang smras pa/ rgyal po khyod kyi bsam pa dag
<p>9a.5</p>pa ni/ /nga yis sngar nas mi shes ma yin te/ /rgyal po khyod kyi mig 'di gnyis/ /de ltar khyod la sbyin pas na/ /dpag tshad brgyar ni khor yug tu/ /brag ri rnams kyis bar bcad kyang / /khyod kyi mig ni 'di gnyis kyis/ /thogs pa med par mthong bar 'gyur/ /
<p>9a.6</p>zhes smras nas/ brgya byin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' blon po chen po rnams dang / rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams ya mtshan che zhing sems rab tu dga' bar gyur pa'i mig gis lta zhing / bram ze rnams kyis
<p>9a.7</p>kyang rgyal bar gyur cig /ces bya ba'i shis pa brjod pa'i tshig smra bas mngon par dga' bar byas te/ pho brang dam pa rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs btsugs pa/ mngon par mtho ba'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan par phyin nas/ 'khor gyi nang na 'dug ste dga' ba lta
<p>9b</p>
<p>9b.1</p>ba'i phyir lhags pa'i blon po la sogs pa bram ze dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi ya rabs rnams la de ltar bdag gis nyams su myong ba'i chos bshad de/ rab tu sbyin pa'i bsod nams las gyur pa'i/ /lha yi mthu ldan nga yi mig mthong nas/ /phongs pa rnams ni
<p>9b.2</p>nor gyis mgu byas la/ /'jig rten na ni su zhig bsgrim pa lhod/ /dpag tshad brgya ni tshun chad du/ /brag ri mang pos bar bcad kyang / /shin tu ring na gnas pa yang / /blta bar bya ba gsal bar mthong / /gang phyir mi yi mig ni 'dir byin nas/ /mi las 'das
<p>9b.3</p>pa'i lha mig bdag gis thob/ /gzhan la brtse zhing dul ba las byung ba'i/ /sbyin las gzhan pa'i mngon mtho'i thabs gang yod/ /shi pi pa rnams de ltar rig byas nas/ /sbyin dang spyad pas nor rnams don yod byos/ /'jig rten 'di dang gzhan la'ang 'di nyid
<p>9b.4</p>ni/ /grags pa che ba'i bde ba 'byung ba'i lam/ /'jig rten phan phyir byin pa gang yin pa/ /snying po med pa'i nor yang snying por spyod/ /sbyin pa byas na gter dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /ma sbyin na ni shin tu chud zos 'gyur/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das des bdag
<p>9b.5</p>cag gi phyir bya dka' ba mang pos dam pa'i chos 'di bsgrubs pa yin pas/ rim gro bskyed de chos mnyan par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid dang / snga ma bzhin du snying rje'i yon tan bsngags pa dang / tshe 'di nyid la bsod nams kyi 'bras bu mthong bar
<p>9b.6</p>'gyur ba la yang brjod par bya'o/ /de ltar rim gro bskyed de bsod nams bsags pa ni/ bdag gis mthu chen po thob par 'gyur ba'i me tog grags pa'i rgyun chags pa yid du 'ong ba tshe 'di nyid la bstan pa yin no/ /yul shi pi pa'i rgyal por skyes pa'i rabs te gnyis
<p>9b.7</p>pa'o// //sems rab tu dang ba las byung ba dang / snod khyad par can la sbyin pa byin pa ni rnam par smin pa che ba'i phyir chung zhes bya ba gang yang med do/ /de yang 'di skad thos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe/ yul ko sa la'i rgyal
<p>10a</p>
<p>10a.1</p>por gyur to zhes grags so/ /de yang spro ba dang gsang tshig dang mthu dang nus pa phun sum tshogs pa la sogs pa rgyal po'i yon tan rnams mchog tu gyur du zin kyang skal ba phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan bzang pos 'byor pa lhag par gyur to/ /
<p>10a.2</p>skal ba phun sum tshogs brgyan pas/ /de yi yon tan lhag par gsal/ /ston ka'i dpal ni gsal gyur pas/ /zla ba'i 'od zer gsal ba bzhin/ /des dgra dregs pa rnams kyang btang / /de la brten pa rnams la chags/ /khros dang byams pa'i rjes 'brang
<p>10a.3</p>dpal/ /rgyal po gzhan la de ltar gyur/ /de ni chos kyi bdag nyid gyur pas na/ /gzhan la gnod pa'i sems dug med par 'gyur/ /de yi dpal ni dgra la mi 'go bas/ /'bangs kyang de la glo ba nye bar gyur/ /de bdag gi tshe snga ma 'das pa rjes su dran par gyur to/ /
<p>10a.4</p>de rjes su dran par gyur pas rab tu skyo bar gyur nas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang phongs pa dang slong ba rnams la/ bde ba'i rgyu dang gzhir gyur pa'i sbyin pa khyad par can byin par gyur to/ /tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ngan pa ma yin pa dang / gso sbyong nges par gnas pa dag kyang dus
<p>10a.5</p>mtshams kyi nyin par yang dag par len to/ /rgyal po'i 'khor dang / bdag gi btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bsod nams kyi mthu bsgrags pa dang / 'jig rten pa rnams legs pa la bkod pa 'dod pas dang ba'i sems kyis don nges pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis yang
<p>10a.6</p>dang yang du smras so/ /bde bar gshegs la bkur sti byas pa chung ngu yang / /'bras bu 'byor pa chung ngu med ces sngon thos kyi/ /zan dron khengs pa rtsub mo lan tshwa med pa yi/ /'bras bu 'byor pa chen po 'di ltar gyur la ltos/ /shing rta sna tshogs rta dang glang po 'gying ba
<p>10a.7</p>dang / /bdag gi dmag tshogs chen po 'di dang sa chen 'di/ /nor mang dpal yang rjes chags btsun mo rgya chen ldan/ /zan dron changs cig 'bras bu grub pa bzang po ltos/ /blon po chen po rnams dang / bram ze rgan po rnams dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi stod rim rnams
<p>10b</p>
<p>10b.1</p>yid la ngo mtshar cher gyur kyang / rgyal po chen po ci la dgongs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis rtag tu gsungs zhes de la slar zhu ma nus so/ /de nas rgyal po de'i btsun mo gnang chen smra ba'i spobs pa thogs pa med pa cig ngo mtshar skyes nas/ gtam gleng ba'i skabs
<p>10b.2</p>su bab ste 'khor gyi nang du de la zhus pa/ mi yi bdag po nges par gsungs pa ni/ /thugs la dgongs pa dgyes pa zhal du byung / /khyod kyis de skad gsungs pas bdag gi sems/ /ngo mtshar che bas rab tu g.yengs par gyur/ /skye bo 'di yis de ni thos rung na/ /rgyal
<p>10b.3</p>po ci phyir gsungs pa bka' stsal gsol/ /gsang na de skad gar yang mi bsgrags te/ /de bas bdag gis gus pas zhu ba lags/ /de nas rgyal po de dga' zhing rab tu byams pa'i lta bas btsun mo la bltas te/ 'dzum pa'i bzhin mdangs dang ldan pas smras pa/ /
<p>10b.4</p>don dang rgyu mtshan ma phyes par/ /nga yis smras pa 'di thos nas/ /'di ni khyod nyid 'ba' zhig tu/ /ngo mtshar che gyur yid g.yos min/ /blon po chen po tshogs pa 'di dag thams cad kyang / /yid ni ngo mtshar chen pos rab tu g.yos par gyur/ /nga yi pho brang 'khor dang
<p>10b.5</p>btsun mor bcas pa yang / /gang phyir nga yis de skad smras pa mnyan par gyis/ /gnyid las sad pa bzhin du skye ba ngas dran pa/ /tshul dang ldan yang nor tsam gyis ni mtho ba la/ /las kyis mgu bar byas nas dman chas 'tsho ba yis/ /gla mi gcig tu grong khyer 'dir ni nga gyur to/ /
<p>10b.6</p>gzhan gyis brnyas shing ngal ba dman pa'i gla de yang / /skyabs su re zhing mi 'tshor dogs nas de la zhugs/ /dge slong bzhi sde bsod snyoms phyir lhags mthong bar gyur/ /dbang po dul zhing dge slong dpal gyi rjes 'brangs bzhin/ /'jam pa'i yid kyis de la phyag
<p>10b.7</p>'tshal nas/ /zan dron tsam cig bdag gis khyim du gus par byin/ /de yis myu gu tsam zhig byung ba 'di yin te/ /rgyal po gzhan gyi gtsug gis nga yi zhabs la gtugs/ /nga yis de la bsams nas ni/ /lha mo khyod la smras pa yin/ /bsod nams kyis ni
<p>11a</p>
<p>11a.1</p>ngoms mi myong / /dgra bcom mthong bas mi ngoms so/ /de nas lha mo dga' zhing ya mtshan che ba'i mig bgrad nas/ rgyal po la rab tu gus par blta zhing smras pa/ mngon par mtho ba'i khyad par 'di lta bu ni/ bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa lags
<p>11a.2</p>par gda'o/ /rgyal po chen po 'di ltar mdzad pa la gus pa ni/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du gyur pa'i slad du'o/ /de bas na 'di ltar dngos sdig mi mdzad pa dang / skye dgu rnams la pha bzhin du yongs su skyong ba legs par mdzad pa dang / bsod nams
<p>11a.3</p>kyi yon tan bsgrub pa la mngon par phyogs pas lags so/ /grags dang dpal dang sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pas 'bar/ /bka' lung gnyen po rgyal po gzhan gyi spyi bos nod/ /bser ma langs pas rlabs bskyod rgya mtsho'i gos gyon pa'i/ /chos kyi tshul bzhin sa chen
<p>11a.4</p>yun ring skyong bar 'gyur/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ lha mo de de ltar ga la zhig ma yin/ mtshan ma bzang pos mngon par mtshon pa legs pa'i lam/ /de nyid la ni bdag gis da dung bstan par bya/ /'jig rten pa ni sbyin pa'i 'bras bu thos nas ster/ /nga bdag
<p>11a.5</p>nyams su myong na ci phyir sbyin mi bya/ /de nas rgyal po des lha mo bzhin du dpal 'bar ba'i lha mo la rab tu byams pas bltas nas/ dpal phun sum tshogs pa la sems zhen pas yang smras pa/ skar ma'i nang na zla ba bzhin/ /bud med nang na rnam par mdzes/ /shin tu
<p>11a.6</p>yid 'ong 'byung ba'i las/ /dge ldan khyod kyis ci zhig byas/ /lha mos smras pa/ lha bdag gis kyang tshe snga ma cung zad cig bgyis pa rjes su dran no/ /de smros shig ces rgyal pos dris pa dang / smras pa/ byis pa'i tshe na myong ba rjes dran bzhin/ /bdag ni bran
<p>11a.7</p>mo byed pa'i tshe na zan changs cig /thub pa zag pa zad la gus par phul ba yis/ /de tshe gnyid kyis log pa 'dir ni sad pa bzhin/ /mi rje lhas mdzad dge ba de ni bdag gis dran/ /de yis bdag ni sa dang bcas pa'i mgon du gyur/ /zag pa zad la byas pa chung ba gang
<p>11b</p>
<p>11b.1</p>yang med/ /ji ltar thub pas bka' stsal bzhin du khyod kyis gsungs/ /de nas rgyal po des bsod nams kyi 'bras bu mthong bas/ bsod nams la gus pa bskyed par sems rab tu dad par gyur pa'i 'khor ya mtshan che la rtse gcig tu gyur par rig nas/ nges par
<p>11b.2</p>'di 'dra cung zad cig rjes su dran to/ /dge ba mi che bas kyang rnam smin rgya chen dpal 'di mthong nas su/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad pas bsod nams bya la mi 'bad su zhig yod/ /nor gyis chog par yod kyang ser sna'i mun pas gang zhig blo bsgribs nas/ /sbyin pas
<p>11b.3</p>grags pa thob par mi byed mi de [(]bltar [,]ltar [)]mi rung / /dbang med par ni gang zhig btang dgos de bzhin su la'ang phan mi thogs/ /nor de rigs par btang na gal te yon tan 'ga' zhig thob gyur na/ /yon tan rnams ni yod bzhin de la su zhig ser sna'i lam la brten/ /sbyin
<p>11b.4</p>pa las byung yon tan dga' ba la sogs sna tshogs grags dang ldan/ /sbyin pa zhes bya gter chen rjes 'gro rkun po la sogs thun mong min/ /sbyin pa 'dod dang ser sna'i skyon gyis rdul can sems ni sbyong bar byed/ /sbyin pas 'khor ba'i lam bgrod ngal ba med pa bzhon pa bde
<p>11b.5</p>ba yin/ /sbyin pas bde ba mang po 'grub cing grogs po bzang po'i mchog yin no/ /'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa'am bka' lung yon tan nam/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pho brang gnas sam gzugs bzang yon tan nam/ /gang zhig 'dod pa de dag thams cad sbyin pas
<p>11b.6</p>thob par 'gyur/ /de ltar nges don gtan la phab na sbyin pa sus mi byed/ /sbyin pas nor gyi snying po len par gsungs/ /sbyin pa dbang phyug rnams kyi rgyu zhes gsungs/ /sbyin pa dpal ldan skye bo mchog gi tshul/ /shes rab chung ngus rdul tsam sbyin mi nus/ /de nas
<p>11b.7</p>'khor de dag gis rgyal po de'i tshig bzung ba la rab tu dga' zhing gus par byas nas/ sbyin pa la sogs pa'i yon tan bsgrub pa la mngon du phyogs par gyur to/ /de bas na sems rab tu dang ba las byung ba dang / snod khyad par can la sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa che ba'i phyir/ 
<p>12a</p>
<p>12a.1</p>sbyin pa chung zhes bya ba gang yang med do/ /de bas na sems rab tu dang bas bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la sbyin pa byin na/ bdag kyang de lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa'am de bas kyang khyad par du 'phags pa thob par 'gyur ba ring
<p>12a.2</p>por mi thogs so snyam du bsams te/ dga' ba bskyed par bya'o zan dron changs cig byin pa'i skyes pa'i rabs te gsum pa'o// //bam po gnyis pa/ skyes bu dam pa rnams ni bdag brlag par 'gyur ba la mi 'dzem par sbyin pa byed na/ bde bar 'dug pas
<p>12a.3</p>lta su zhig sbyin par mi byed/ de yang 'di skad thos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe/ skal ba khyad par can dang ldan pa yon tan spro ba phun sum tshogs pas nor phun sum tshogs pa dang ni ldan/ spyod tshul mi mthun pa med pa'i ngang tshul can
<p>12a.4</p>yin pas/ 'jig rten pa rnams kyis bkur sti bya ba'i gnas su ni gyur/ cho rigs btsun pa dang ni ldan/ rig pa sgyu rtsal gyi khyad par rnam pa du ma khong du chud pas/ blo rab tu dri ma med par ni gyur/ yon tan che bas rgyal pos ni bkur stir byas/ rab tu sbyin pa'i ngang tshul
<p>12a.5</p>can yin pas/ 'byor pa rnams ni 'jig rten pa rnams dang thun mong du spyod pa'i tshong dpon zhig tu skyes so/ /zhes grags so/ /phongs pa rnams ni dga' 'gyur bas/ /phan tshun kun tu bsgrags pa ni/ /de ming sbyin la dpa' ba zhes/ /phyogs bcu kun tu khyab par gyur/ /
<p>12a.6</p>sbyin nam mi sbyin snyam pa'i rnam rtog pa/ /yid la sems pa phongs pa rnams la med/ /de yi sbyin pa'i mthu chen grags par gyur/ /phongs pa rnams ni yid ches spobs shing slong / /des ni bdag gi bde phyir nor mi sbed/ /'dren pa dang ni chags pas zil gnon min/ /
<p>12a.7</p>des ni phongs pa'i sdug bsngal bzod mi nus/ /de bas med ces smra ba spas par 'gyur/ /de nas re zhig cig sems dpa' chen po de zas kyi dus la babs pa'i tshe/ khrus byas byug spos kyis byugs pa dang / g.yos mkhan mkhas pas g.yos pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / 
<p>12b</p>
<p>12b.1</p>btung ba dang / ro dang 'jam pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa sna tshogs bshams pa dang / rang sangs rgyas nyon mongs pa'i bud shing thams cad bsregs pa bsod nams kyi tshogs rnams 'phel bar 'dod pa cig de'i khyim du bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'ongs so/ /'ongs nas
<p>12b.2</p>kyang de'i sgo khang na bsdad de/ dogs med mi g.yo brtan zhing zhi ba yi/ /mig gis sa la gnya' shing gang du blta/ /rab tu zhi bar gyur cing de na bsdad/ /de lag pad+ma'i mchog ni lhung bzed thogs/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa phun sum
<p>12b.3</p>tshogs pa la mi bzod pas de la gegs bya ba'i phyir/ rang sangs rgyas de dang bar sgo gnyis kyi bar na sems can dmyal ba chen po'i nang na me chen po 'bar ba/ zabs su mi 'gred du yod pa rab tu zab pa/ mthong na rab tu 'jigs pa/ 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra bsgrags pa/ 
<p>12b.4</p>skye bo mang po rnam par g.yo bas gang ba cig mngon par sprul te/ de nas byang chub sems dpas rang sangs rgyas bsod snyoms la gshegs par mthong nas/ chung ma la bdag nyid kyis 'phags pa la bsod snyoms phul ces smras so/ /des de ltar mnyan nas de bzhin du
<p>12b.5</p>bgyi'o zhes smras nas/ bza' ba dang bca' ba bzang po khyer te song song ba las/ sems can dmyal ba'i gnas mthong ba dang / 'jigs shing skrag nas mig rig rig por gyur te/ sgo drung nas slar log pa dang / 'di ci nyes byang chub sems dpas dris pa dang / de
<p>12b.6</p>skrag pas skad 'gags nas de la smra yang de'u ma nus te smras so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ e ma ho/ 'phags pa 'di bdag gi khyim nas bsod snyoms ma bzhes par slar bzhud na ga la rung bsams nas des smras pa la ma nyan par/ rings
<p>12b.7</p>rings ltar bza' ba dang / bca' ba bzang po bdag nyid kyis khyer te/ mthu chen po de la bsod snyoms 'bul ba'i phyir/ sgo khang gi drung du phyin pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i gnas chen po rab tu 'jigs pa de mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas 'di ci zhig yin snyam du rnam par
<p>13a</p>
<p>13a.1</p>rtogs pa skyes pa dang / bdud sdig can khang pa'i ngos kyi rtsig pa'i nang nas byung ste/ lha'i lus ya mtshan che bar mngon sum du bstan nas bar snang la gnas te/ phan par 'dod pa bzhin du gsal bar smras pa/ kye khyim bdag sems can dmyal
<p>13a.2</p>gnas chen po 'di ni/ ngom grog chen po zhes bya ba yin no/ /phongs pas bsngags pa'i tshig gis bslus nas ni/ /sbyin la zhugs pa gang gis nor chud gsan/ /de dag lo ni stong phrag du mar yang / /'di na gnas 'gyur dbyung ba rab tu dka'/ /nor ni 'khor gsum byang bar
<p>13a.3</p>rgyu yin te/ /de med byas na su yis chos ma brlag /nor chud gsan pas chos ni brlags gyur na/ /ci phyir sems can dmyal bar gnas mi 'gyur/ /sbyin pa'i phyir ni chos kyi rtsar gyur pa'i/ /nor ni khyod kyis chud gsan sdig byas pas/ /dmyal ba'i gshed po mi
<p>13a.4</p>bzad 'bar ba'i lces/ /de phyir khyod ni za bar 'dir 'ongs so/ /de bas blo ni sbyin las bzlog na legs/ /'on te 'phral du ltung bar khyod mi 'gyur/ /snying rjer ngu zhing 'gre ldog byed pa yi/ /gtong ba 'di dang lhan cig khyod ma 'grogs/ /sbyin pa tshul min mi byed
<p>13a.5</p>len pa po'i/ /skye bo rnams ni lha yul 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de bas mtho ris lam bsgrib btang nas ni/ /sbyin la brtson pa bzlog par gnas par gyis/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ 'di skad zer ba'i bdag nyid ngan pa 'di ni/ bdag gis sbyin
<p>13a.6</p>pa byed pa la nges par gegs byed pa yin no snyam nas/ bdag gis snying stobs kyi khur ma bor te/ brtan par byas nas/ tshig 'jam po'i rgyun ma chad par de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag cag 'dra la phan par dgongs nas ni/ /khyod kyis 'phags pa'i lam 'di
<p>13a.7</p>rnams bstan pa/ /gzhan la phan 'dogs mkhas pa'i spyod pa can/ /lha rnams kyis ni de ltar bgyi ba'i rigs/ /nyes pa 'byung ba'i sngon nam 'og tu yang / /zhi ba'i lam der 'chi ba rab tu rigs/ /nad la cho ga spyad pa nongs pa yis/ /tshabs cher gyur la dpyad kyis phan mi
<p>13b</p>
<p>13b.1</p>thogs/ /sbyin la zhugs pa bdag gis sdug bsngal 'di/ /dpyad kyis rlon pa rab tu mi 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis phan par bstan pa'ang mi nyan par/ /bdag gi sems ni sbyin las slar mi ldog /sbyin pa sdig pa 'gyur zhes gang smras shing / /nor yang chos kyi rgyu yin
<p>13b.2</p>zhes bgyi ba/ /sbyin pa ma gtogs chos lam gzhan yod pa/ /des ni gter sbas chos kyi rgyur 'gyur ba/ /'on te rkun po 'ong nas phrog gyur tam/ /'dod pas khyer te mi snang 'gyur ba'am/ /me yis tshig na bsod nams thob 'gyur bar/ /mi yi blos ni rtogs
<p>13b.3</p>par mi nus so/ /nor sbyin pas ni dmyal bar 'gro ba dang / /len pa lha yul 'gro zhes bya ba yang / /khyod kyis sbyin las bzlog par byas mod kyi/ /de yis bdag ni sbyin la brtson par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi tshig de gzhan du ma gyur cig /bdag la slong ba de dag mtho ris
<p>13b.4</p>dang / /'jig rten phan phyir bdag ni sbyin pa byed/ /bdag ni bde ba bsgrub phyir 'di mi byed/ /de nas yang bdud phan par 'dod pa bzhin brtan par bya ba'i phyir lag pa brkyang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ 'di ni nga yis phan pa'am brdzun smras pa/ /legs
<p>13b.5</p>par rtogs la gang du bde bar song / /bde dang ldan pas gus byas bde bar gyis/ /yang na 'gyod bzhin nga ni dran par byos/ /byang chub sems dpas grogs po khyod bzod pa mdzod cig ces smras nas/ phongs pa rnams kyis bag phab spobs te slong ba la/ /sbyin pa'i dus
<p>13b.6</p>su brnyas te ma byin dga' ba bas/ /mi bzad me lce 'bar ba'i sems can dmyal ba der/ /me lce 'bar bas phog nas spyi gtsug ltung yang rung / /de skad smras nas byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi skal ba'i mthu la brten nas sbyin pa la nyes dmigs med par yang shes te/ 
<p>13b.7</p>bu smad dang g.yog 'khor 'gro mi ster ba rnams bor te/ blo la the tsom med cing sbyin pa byed par 'dod pa skyes te/ dmyal ba'i nang nas phar song ngo / /de nas de yi bsod nams mthu yis der/ /'dam rdza ba med par 'dam las skyes pa byung / /ze'u 'bru dkar po
<p>14a</p>
<p>14a.1</p>so yi phreng ba dag /bdud la 'phya ba bzhin du dgod par gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi bsod nams khyad par can las byung ba'i pad+ma'i stegs bu las song ste/ rang sangs rgyas kyi drung du phyin nas sems rab tu dang zhing dga' bas de la
<p>14a.2</p>bsod snyoms phul lo/ /de yi yid ni rab tu dang bya'i phyir/ /de nas dge slong de ni mkha' la lding / /des ni de na char 'babs 'bar bar byed/ /glog dang bcas pa'i sprin gyi dpal bzhin mdzes/ /bdud ni yid la bsam pa ma grub nas/ /yi chad nas ni mdangs kyang
<p>14a.3</p>nyams par gyur/ /de la phyogs te lta yang ma nus nas/ /dmyal ba dang bcas de na mi snang gyur/ /de ci'i phyir bshad ce na/ de ltar skyes bu dam pa rnams ni bdag brlag par 'gyur ba la yang mi 'dzem par sbyin pa byed na/ bde bar 'dug pa lta su zhig sbyin par mi byed/ 
<p>14a.4</p>de bas na snying stobs can ni bsdigs kyang mi rigs pa byed du gzhug mi nus so/ /zhes kyang bshad par bya'o/ /tshong dpon gyi skyes pa'i rabs te bzhi pa'o// //skyes bu dam pa rnams ni 'byor pa zad du dogs nas/ sbyin pa byed pa la zhum par mi 'gyur ro/ /
<p>14a.5</p>de yang 'di skad thos te/ byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba dang / tshul khrims dang / cho rigs dang / dul ba dang / mang du thos pa dang / shes rab dang / dregs pa med pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ni ldan/ 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pas ni nor sbyin po dang 'dra/ 
<p>14a.6</p>glo bur pa thams cad la sbyin pa byed pas sbyin pa'i 'byor pa ni rgyun mi 'chad/ 'jig rten la phan pa'i don byed pa'i phyir sbyin pa po'i gtso bo tshong dpon zhig tu gyur to/ /zhes grags so/ /ser sna la sogs pa'i nyes pas zil gyis mi gnon pa'i phyir/ ming yang zil
<p>14a.7</p>gyis mi gnon pa zhes btags so/ /'dod pa'i don phyir the tsom med gyur pas/ /dga' ba skye ba'i khyad par rgyur gyur pa/ /phongs pa rnams kyis de ni mthong ba bzhin/ /des kyang phongs pa rnams ni mthong na dga'/ /slong bas slong zhes nges par bslongs pa la/ des
<p>14b</p>
<p>14b.1</p>ni med ces bya bar mi 'gyur te/ /de yi sems ni nor la chags pa'i skabs/ /snying rje chen pos rab tu med par byas/ /phongs pa rnams kyis de yi khyim nas ni/ /nor gyi snying po phyung na rab tu dga'/ /rgyu rkyen med par myur du chud za ba'i/ /nor ni shin tu mi bzad nor
<p>14b.2</p>mi rigs/ /'jig rten dag na nor ni phal cher yang / /chags pa'i gzhi dang ngan 'gro'i grogs su 'gyur/ /de yi nor ni bdag dang gzhan dag gi /'byor pa thob pas don dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de nas sems dpa' chen po des/ kun tu slong ba rnams ji ltar 'dod pa
<p>14b.3</p>bzhin du nyon ma mongs par gus pa khyad par can gyis brgyan cing / nor sbyin pa rlabs po ches rab tu tshim par byas pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis sbyin pa rlabs po che de thos nas/ yid la ya mtshan che bar gyur te 'di sbyin pa la brtan nam mi brtan nyams bskyed
<p>14b.4</p>pa dang / 'di'i nor zad kyis dogs pas ser sna byed du gzhug pa'i phyir/ nyin re zhing rim gyis 'bras bu dang nor dang / rin po che dang / yo byad kyi rnam pa de dang de dag mi snang bar byas so/ /sems dpa' chen po de ni sbyin pa la mos pas/ chu yi thigs pa nyi mas phog pa
<p>14b.5</p>bzhin/ /de yi nor ni ci tsam zad gyur pa/ /de tsam gyis ni sbyin pa chen po yi/ /me yis tshig pa bzhin du khyim nas 'byin/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sems dpa' chen po de'i nor thams cad zad par gyur kyang / sbyin pa la rab tu gzhol bar gyur pa rig
<p>14b.6</p>nas blo la shin tu ngo mtshar bar gyur te/ de'i nor gces pa thams cad nub cig mi snang bar byas nas/ thag pa zhig dang zor ba zhig bzhag go/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas nang par nam langs nas dus bzhin du langs te bltas pa na/ bdag gi khyim gyi nor dang / 'bru dang / 
<p>14b.7</p>yo byad dang / mi rnams ni med la sgra ca co yang med la sdug bsngal ba ltar 'dug cing / srin pos phung bar byas pa bzhin du bltas na nyams mi dga' bar gyur pa mthong nas/ 'di ci nyes snyam du rtogs pa skyes te/ kun tu nyul nyul ba dang / thag pa bsdogs pa zhig dang / 
<p>15a</p>
<p>15a.1</p>zor ba zhig de na 'dug pa mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ gal te 'ga' zhig gis slong ba'i tshig smra ma phod de/ bdag gi zho shas 'tsho bas bdag gi khyim du spobs pa de lta bu bstan na ni bdag gi nor legs par spyad pa nyid du gyur to/ /de ste
<p>15a.2</p>bdag skal ba chung ba'i skyon gyis mthong bar gyur pa ma bzod nas sus kyang ma spyad par med par gyur na ni ma rung bar gyur to snyam mo/ /nor rnams ngo bo mi rtag par/ /bdag gis snga nas shes zin na/ /phongs pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyis/ /bdag gi yid ni 'dir
<p>15a.3</p>bsregs so/ /sbyin dang bkur stis yun ring bde byas pa/ /bdag gi khyim ni nor dang bral mthong nas/ /mtsho skams drung du skom pa lhags pa bzhin/ /bdag gi phongs pa de dag ji ltar 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis brtan pa la brtan pas
<p>15a.4</p>zhum pa dang spro ba'i blo zhi bar ma gyur to/ /de'i gnas skabs na yang slong ba la ma goms pa ngo shes kyang gzhan la slong ma phod pa dang / slong ba de ni de ltar dka' ba lta zhig snyam nas/ des slong mi rnams la de bas kyang rjes su brtse bar gyur to/ /de nas bdag nyid chen po
<p>15a.5</p>des slong mi rnams la 'ongs pa legs so/ /zhes bya ba tsam la ltos nas/ bdag nyid kyis thag pa bsdogs pa de dang zor ba gnyis blangs te/ nyin re bzhin rtswa btsongs pa'i rin rnyed pa tsam gyis skye bo phongs pa rnams slong ba la mgu bar byas so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po
<p>15a.6</p>brgya byin gyis de rab tu dbul bar gyur kyang de ltar zhum pa med cing sbyin pa la rab tu gzhol bar mthong nas ya mtshan che zhing gus par gyur te/ lha'i lus mngon sum du bstan nas bar snang la gnas te/ sbyin pa las bzlog pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen po la smras pa/ khyim
<p>15a.7</p>bdag byams kyis 'gyod pa'i gnas skabs 'di lta bur/ /sbyin pa drags pas khyod kyis myong ba ni/ /rkun pos ma khyer chu dang mes ma tshig /rgyal po rnams kyis nor yang ma 'phrogs so/ /de bas khyod la phan phyir nga yis smra/ /sbyin la zhugs pa'i chags pa
<p>15b</p>
<p>15b.1</p>btang bar gyis/ /'di ltar gyur kyang gal te ma sbyin na/ /sngon gyi 'byor pa bzang po thob par 'gyur/ /chung ngu god kyang rtag tu spyad na ni/ /yun ring spyad na mig sman zad la ltos/ /bsags na grog mkhar mthon por gyur la ltos/ /dar bar 'dod pas bsdam par byas
<p>15b.2</p>na legs/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir brgya byin la smras pa/ spyan stong mnga' ba rab tu phongs gyur kyang / /'phags pas ma rabs chos bya rab tu dka'/ /gang zhig thob phyir ser sna'i sems byung ba/ /brgya byin nor de bdag la
<p>15b.3</p>med kyang rung / /slong ba'i sdug bsngal shi dang 'dra ba yi/ /gnyen po'i lam du bgrod par 'dod pa la/ /de yis phongs pa ya rabs gzi byin can/ /su zhig med ces zer ba'i ser bas brdeg /slong bas gdungs nas ngo zung gnag gyur pas/ /phongs pa rnams
<p>15b.4</p>ni mgu bar mi 'gyur ba'i/ /nor ram rin chen lha yi rgyal srid kyang / /de lta bu dag bdag ni sogs sam ci/ /gang zhig ser sna'i skyon ni 'phel 'gyur zhing / /gtong ba'i sems kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ba/ /bdag lta bu yis de ni btang ba'i rigs/ /yongs su
<p>15b.5</p>bzung bar snyad btags phongs pa yis/ /glog ni 'gyu ba bzhin du mi brtan nor/ /kun dang thun mong phongs pa du ma'i rgyu/ /bde ba 'byung ba'i rgyu ni sbyin pa yin/ /ya rabs su zhig ser sna'i lam la brten/ /brgya byin khyod kyis bdag la gnyen po bstan/ /phan
<p>15b.6</p>pa smras pas bdag la brtse bar bgyis/ /sbyin pas yid ni dga' la goms par gyur/ /de bas lam min su zhig dga' bar 'gyur/ /khyod kyi thugs ni khro bar gyur pa yis/ /lam du 'jug par bgyi ba mi rigs so/ /ngo bo nyid ni mi mthun phyogs kyi lam/ /bgrod
<p>15b.7</p>dka' bzhugs pa sla ba ma yin no/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyim bdag 'byor pa phun sum tshogs shing bang mdzod yongs su gang ba dang / /zhing gi so nam legs par byed cing rlabs che rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa dang / /dbang phyug dbang du gyur pa la/ /rim pa 'di 'jig rten na dar bar 'gyur
<p>16a</p>
<p>16a.1</p>gyis/ gnas skabs 'di lta bu mi rung ngo ltos shig /bdag gis blo yis lcogs shing ma yengs pa 'am/ /grags pa'i rjes mthun rigs dang mthun pa 'am/ /las kyi yon tan gyi ni 'byor thob nas/ /nyi ma bzhin du 'gran zla zil mnan te/ /skye bo
<p>16a.2</p>rnams ni zhor la grogs btsal nas/ /mdza' bor bcas pa'i gnyen rnams mgu byas te/ /rgyal po las kyang bkur sti thob gyur nas/ /mngon par chags bzhin dpal gyis 'khyud gyur na/ /de nas sbyin pa'am bde ba'i rim pa la/ /rab tu zhugs nas skye bos 'phyas gdab
<p>16a.3</p>med/ /'dab gshog ma rdzogs mkha' la 'phur 'dod bzhin/ /sbyin pa 'ba' zhig 'dod pas brlag par 'gyur/ /de bas sdom zhing mi g.yeng gnas bcas la/ /sbyin pa thong la re zhig nor sogs shig /'byor pa med par gang zhig mi sbyin pa/ /de la ma rabs gyur pa ci zhig
<p>16a.4</p>yod/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod de ltar ha cang dus ma che bar thong zhig /gzhan gyi don pas gang zhig bdag don cher 'dzin pa/ /des kyang 'byor pa khyad du bsad nas sbyin dgos so/ /gang dag chags pa spangs nas sbyin par dga' 'gyur ba/ /
<p>16a.5</p>'byor pa chen po yis kyang dga' ba de mi myong / /'byor pa 'ba' zhig gis kyang mtho ris thob mi 'gyur/ /sbyin pa yis ni grags pa snyan pa thob par 'gyur/ /ser sna la sogs skyon gyis zil gyis gnon mi 'gyur/ /de bas 'byor pa de phyir sbyin pa sus mi byed/ /gang
<p>16a.6</p>zhig skye shis nyen pa'i 'jig rten skyong 'dod pa'i/ /snying rje'i dbang gis bdag kyang rab tu gtong byed cing / /gzhan sdug bsngal bas bdag gis bde ba mi myong bas/ /de bas dpal ldan khyod kyi nor yang ci zhig bya/ /lha'i dbang po gzhan yang / nor rnams phun sum
<p>16a.7</p>tshogs pa bzhin/ /tshe yang gnas pa mi brtan te/ /de bas slong mi mthong na ni/ /phun sum tshogs la mi lta'o/ /shing rta gcig gis gang du sa la lam drangs pa/ /de bzhin gzhan dang gzhan yang lam der brtul te 'dong / /de ltar thog ma'i lam ni bde ba 'di
<p>16b</p>
<p>16b.1</p>bor nas/ /yang dag ma yin lam du 'jug pa bdag mi dga'/ /gal te bdag ni phyis kyang nor dang ldan gyur na/ /slong mi rnams kyi sems ni nges par mgu par bya/ /brgya byin bdag ni sbyin las ldog par mi byed cing / /'di ltar gyur kyang ci 'byor pa ni sbyin par bya/ /
<p>16b.2</p>de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin yid rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ legs so legs so zhes bya bas mgu bar byas te rab tu gus shing byams pa'i lta bas bltas nas smras pa/ skye bo rnams ni grags dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba'i las/ /mi bzad ngan
<p>16b.3</p>pa rnams kyis 'byor pa thob par 'dod/ /bdag gi bde la chags pa'i nyes dmigs mang mthong nas/ /shin tu g.yeng ba'i sems kyis chags pa rab tu 'jug /khyod kyis nor ni zad par 'gyur ba'ang ma bsams shig /bdag gi bde nyams nga yis bslus pa'ang ma
<p>16b.4</p>bsams par/ /gzhan gyi nor bsgrub pa la sems ni brtan gyur pas/ /bdag nyid phun sum tshogs par rab tu che bar bstan/ /e ma'o rlabs chen khyad par 'phags pa gsal ba yis/ /snying gi ser sna'i mun pa rab tu bsal bar gyur/ /nor ni med par gyur kyang de
<p>16b.5</p>la chags pa yis/ /rab tu sbyin las zhum pa'i skyon du yongs ma gyur/ /gzhan sdug pa yis sdug la ngo mtshar mi che ste/ /snying rje'i dbang gis khyod ni 'jig rten phan par 'dod/ /gangs kyi ri bo rlung gis bskyod par ma nus bzhin/ /rab tu sbyin las bdag gis
<p>16b.6</p>bskyod par mi nus so/ /grags pa kun tu bsgrags phyir yongs su brtags pa 'dis/ /khyod kyi nor 'di rnams ni bdag gis sbas par gyur/ /de ltar ma byas na ni nor bu bzang po yang / /nor bu de ni grags dang rin chen mi rtogs so/ /de bas slong mi rnams la
<p>16b.7</p>sbyin pa'i char phob la/ /sprin chen gyis ni mtsho rnams gang ba bzhin du byos/ /ngas ni rjes su bzung bas nor rnams zad mi 'gyur/ /bdag gis gtses pa 'di yang khyod kyis bzod par byos/ /zhes bya bas de mgu bar byas nas/ brgya byin gyis de'i nor gyi rnam pa
<p>17a</p>
<p>17a.1</p>de dag slar byin te/ bzod par byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi bdog pa zad du dogs pa'am/ 'byor pa la chags pa'i phyir sbyin pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do/ /tshong dpon zil gyis mi gnon pa'i skyes
<p>17a.2</p>pa'i rabs te lnga pa'o// //sems dpa' chen po rnams ni dud 'gror gyur kyang sbyin pa ci nus byed pa yod na/ mir gyur pa rnams lta su zhig sbyin pa mi byed/ de yang 'di skad thos te/ dgon pa'i gnas ldum bu dang / rtswa dang shing ljon pa yid du 'ong ba yod pa/ 
<p>17a.3</p>me tog dang 'bras bur ldan pa dang / chu gtsang ma bai DUr+ya mthing ga dang 'dra ba/ 'bab pa'i mtshos mtha' bskor ba/ sa gzhi ne'u gsing sngon po 'jam pa dang ldan pa/ skye bo dka' thub can dag gnas pa cig na/ byang chub sems dpa' ri bong zhig tu gyur te gnas so zhes
<p>17a.4</p>grags so/ /de ni lus bzang snying stobs che ba dang / /stobs kyang che zhing gzi mdangs che bas na/ /gcan gzan ngan pas glags lta bag mi tsha/ /ri dwags rgyal po'i tshul gyis de na gnas/ /bdag gis pags pa a dzin gyon/ /bdag gi spu yis shun phrags byas/ /
<p>17a.5</p>rtswa yi myu gus sems mgu zhing / /thub pa bzhin du de na mdzes/ /de yi lus dang ngag yid la/ /byams pas yongs su bskor ba yi/ /ri dwags slob ma bder gnas shing / /bdag nyid ngan pa spangs par gyur/ /de'i yon tan khyad par can gyis byams pa dang gus
<p>17a.6</p>pa bskyed pas sems rab tu chags pa'i grogs gsum yod pa ni/ sram dang / ce spyang dang / spre'u rnams so/ /de dag kyang phan tshun gnyen 'dun 'brel ba bzhin du gcig la gcig byams shing chags par gyur/ gcig la gcig spobs shing bkur sti byed pas rab tu
<p>17a.7</p>mdza' bar gyur pa'i grogs po bzhin du dga' zhing de na gnas te/ dud 'gro'i rang bzhin la ni de mi phyogs/ /srog chags rnams la snying rje che ba dang / /brkam pa med pa dang / rku ba mi dran pa dang / chos dang mthun pa'i 'tsho ba la gnas pa dang / rnam par shes pa
<p>17b</p>
<p>17b.1</p>gsal bas dul ba dang / sdom pa spyod pa brtan pa'i phyir/ lha rnams kyang ya mtshan du gyur to/ /bde dang mthun zhing yon tan mi mthun tshul/ /yon tan mthun zhing bde dang mi mthun tshul/ /mi yang yon tan phyogs la brten na ni/ /rnam par mdzes pa dud 'gro smos
<p>17b.2</p>ci dgos/ /ri bong gzugs can mkhas te de rnams kyi/ /gzhan la snying rje che ba'i bla mar gyur/ /yon tan rjes 'gro rang bzhin phun sum tshogs/ /de rnams grags pa lha yul du yang grags/ /de nas re zhig cig bdag nyid chen po des phyi dro'i dus su grogs de rnams
<p>17b.3</p>chos nyan pa'i phyir lhags te/ rab tu gus pas bkur sti byas pa dang / zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs su nye ba nyi ma dang thag ring ba rnam par dkar zhing mdzes pa/ dngul gyi me long lung med pa 'dra ba ngos cig cung zad sngo ba shar ba la bltas nas grogs rnams
<p>17b.4</p>la smras pa/ dkyil 'khor cung zad ma rdzogs pa/ /bzang po 'di la dgongs pa bzhin/ /dge ba rnams la gso sbyong gis/ /spro ba zla ba 'di ston to/ /de bas na nges par sang ni tshes bco lnga ste/ khyed rnams kyang gso sbyong dang sdom pa la
<p>17b.5</p>brtson zhing / rigs par rnyed pa'i kha zas kyi dus su lhags pa'i glo bur pa byung na mgron gyis la srog gzung bar bya bar rigs so/ /khyed rnams ltos shig /'du ba gang yod mtha' ni bral bar 'gyur/ /dar ba yod na de yang rgud pa'i mtha'/ /tshe yang glog bzhin
<p>17b.6</p>'gyur zhing mi brtan no/ /de phyir bag yod pa la brtan par gyis/ /de bas sbyin pa tshul khrims brgyan pa yi/ /bsod nams dag ni khyed cag spel bar gyis/ /kye ho ngan 'gro'i nang na 'khod pa'i tshe/ /'jig rten rnams la bsod nams rten gyi mchog /skar
<p>17b.7</p>ma rnams kyi dpal ni zil mnan nas/ /gzi mdangs yon tan gyis ni zla ba mdzes/ /'od zer can rnams nyi mas zil mnan nas/ /mdzes par gang 'gyur de ni bsod nams mthu/ /sa yi dbang gyur rnams kyi bsod nams mthus/ /rgyal po rnams dang blon po dregs
<p>18a</p>
<p>18a.1</p>pa rnams/ /dregs pa kun spangs rta mchog tshul dag gis/ /dga' ba bzhin du bka' lung nyan par byed/ /so tshis bya ba'i don la 'bad gyur kyang / /bsod nams mi ldan dpal min rjes su 'brang / /bsod nams che bas de ni bskrad pa bzhin/ /
<p>18a.2</p>de dang mi mthun drung du khros bzhin 'gro/ /sdug bsngal gzhir gyur gtam ngan rjes 'brang bas/ /sdig pa'i las lam de las slar log la/ /de las bsod nams spyad pa dpal ldan pa/ /bde ba rab byung bsgrub la blo byos shig /de dag gis de bzhin bgyi'o zer nas
<p>18a.3</p>rjes su bstan pa mnyan te phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas/ rang rang gi gnas su song ngo / /grogs de dag song nas/ ring po ma lon par bdag nyid chen po des bsams pa/ mgron cig byung na de dag gis/ /cir yang rung bas mgron byar yod/ /bdag gis
<p>18a.4</p>ci yang sbyin du med/ /bdag gis so rtses bcad pa yi/ /rtswa yi myu gu kha bo ni/ /mgron la sbyin du yang mi rung / /mi nus pa ni yong ye smad/ /de bas ci yang mi nus pa/ /bdag ni gson yang ci la phan/ /bdag ni mgron cig byung gyur na/ /dga' zhing mya ngan skye
<p>18a.5</p>bar 'gyur snyam mo/ /da mgron byar rung ba snying po med pa'i lus 'di gar bor na/ 'ga' zhig la phan thogs par 'gyur snyam du bsams pa dang / bdag nyid chen po des dran pa rnyed pa/ e ma'o/ dbang bdag la yod cing rnyed sla ba bdag gi lus po 'di nyid mgron
<p>18a.6</p>rnams la sbyin du rung ba'i nor kha na ma tho ba med pa bdag la yod bzhin du ci'i phyir mya ngan byed/ bdag gis mgron byar rung ba 'di rnyed kyis/ /snying khyod da ni mi dga' ma byed cig /bdag gis da ni mgron rnams spobs pa la/ /rdzogs par yod pa'i lus 'dis bkur
<p>18a.7</p>sti bya'o snyam du nges par bsams nas/ sems dpa' chen po de rnyed pa'i mchog rnyed pa bzhin du dga' bar gyur cing de na 'dug go/ /de yi snying la rnam rtog pa/ /khyad par can ni skyes gyur pas/ /mthu dang rab tu dang ba dag /lha rnams la ni bstan par gyur/ /de nas
<p>18b</p>
<p>18b.1</p>sa gzhi ri dang bcas pa g.yos pa ni/ /rgya mtsho 'khrug pa'i gos gyon dga' ba bzhin/ /mkha' las lha yi rnga sgra rgyas par grag /phyogs kyang rab tu dang ba'i gos gyon gsal/ /sprin kyang glog dang ldan pa 'brug gi sgra/ /rgyun chags dal bus sgrogs shing dgod pa
<p>18b.2</p>bzhin/ /phan tshun bdas pas rdul rnams lhags pa yi/ /me tog rgyun chags rnams kyis de la 'thor/ /ser bu dal bur ldang ba'i rlung gis kyang / /ljon shing sna tshogs me tog dri zhim rdul/ /rab tu 'khrigs pa srab mo'i gos bkram bzhin/ /rab tu dga' bas de
<p>18b.3</p>la mchod byed 'dra/ /de'i rnam par rtog pa rmad du byung ba de la rab tu dga' zhing yid la ngo mtshar skyes pa'i lha rnams kyis kun tu bsgrags pa lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis thos nas/ yid la ya mtshan dang ngo mtshar che bar gyur nas/ de'i bsam pa nyams bskyed pa'i phyir/ 
<p>18b.4</p>phyir nyin nyi ma phyed kyi dus na nyi zer gyi 'od kyis ni rab tu gsal bar gyur/ phyogs thams cad kyi smig rgyu 'khrigs pa'i gos ni gyon/ nyi ma tsha ba'i 'od kyis ni mgo g.yogs/ mig gis bltar yang mi bzod par gyur pa'i tshe na/ nags tshal chen po rnams kyi grib ma nyi
<p>18b.5</p>zer gyis bsgribs pa lta bur gyur/ tsha ba'i sbrang bu rnams kyi sgra ni cher grag /bya rnams lding zhing rgyu ba'i rgyun ni chad/ mgron po rnams ni tsha bas gdung zhing ngal bar gyur pas na/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i gzugs su bsgyur nas lam nor ba 'dra bar
<p>18b.6</p>byas nas/ bkres pa dang skom pa dang ngal bas gdungs shing mgrin pa 'gag pa bzhin du de dang nye sa cig tu sgra phyung ste ngus shing bos pa/ grogs dang bral ba gcig pur gyur/ /nags tshal stug po'i nang du 'khyams/ /bkres shing ngal bas bdag lus dub/ /
<p>18b.7</p>dge sems kyis ni bskyab par rigs/ /bdag ni lam dang lam min mi shes pas/ /gcig pu phyogs slar gar 'gro gtol yang med/ /dgon pa 'di na tsha zhing skom pas gdungs/ /ma 'jigs sgra yis su zhig bdag tshim byed/ /de nas skyes bu chen po des
<p>19a</p>
<p>19a.1</p>snying rje rje skad zer ba'i sgra de thos nas snying 'dar bar gyur te rings rings ltar mgyogs su song ste/ phyogs der phyin pa dang / mgron po lam nor te nyam thag pa de mthong nas nye bar lhags te/ gus pa dang bcas pas dbugs phyung zhing smras pa/ bdag
<p>19a.2</p>ni dgon par 'khyams snyam du/ /khyod kyi bsams pa de thong shig /bdag gi slob ma 'khod bzhin du/ /bdag cag gang phyir nye bar 'khod/ /de bas de ring bdag cag gis/ /bkur sti bya ba yongs bzung zhing / /zhi ba yongs su bzung nas su/ /song ni ji ltar
<p>19a.3</p>'dod par song / /de nas cang mi zer bas mgron du bos pa khas blangs pa/ sram gyis rig nas/ dga' bas rtab rtab por gyur zhing mgyogs par song ste/ nya mo bdun khyer te 'ongs nas smras pa/ nya pa rnams kyis brjed nas bor ba'am/ sdangs te brgal nas
<p>19a.4</p>thang la 'dres pa dag /mi dga' gnyid kyis log pa'i nya bdun po/ /bdag gis rnyed pa 'di dag zo la 'dug /de nas ce spyang yang ci snyed pa'i zas dag khyer te 'ongs nas phyag byas te gus par smras pa/ skyin gor gcig dang zho ni rdze'u gang zhig /la la cig gis
<p>19a.5</p>bor ba rnyed pa 'di/ /bdag la phan pa'i phyir ni der bsnams la/ /yon tan gnas khyod nags tshal 'dir bzhugs shig /ces smras nas yid dga' bzhin du de la byin no/ /de nas spre'us shing thog a mra'i 'bras bu rab tu smin pa 'jam po ldong ros kyi phye mas kha bsgyur
<p>19a.6</p>ba 'dra ba ser ba rtsa ba dmar ba'i snye ma dag khyer te 'ongs nas thal mo sbyar te de la smras pa/ a mra smin dang yid du 'ong ba'i chu/ /grib ma bsil ba dam pa rnams dang 'grogs/ /bdag la mchis kyi tshangs pa rig pa'i mchog/ /
<p>19a.7</p>'di dag bsnams nas khyed ni 'dir bzhugs shig /de nas ri bong gis zhe sa dang bcas pas de'i drung du 'ongs te gus par lta zhing / bdag gi lus kyis mgron du byed pa ni/ /nags kyi ri bong la ni ci yang med/ /mung+ga dang ni til dang 'bras kyang med/ /bdag gi lus ni me la bsreg pa 'di/ /
<p>19b</p>
<p>19b.1</p>bsnams la de ring dka' thub nags na bzhugs/ /gang gi don grub nor ni ci yod pa/ /phongs pa 'ong na da ni de la 'bul/ /bdag la lus las lhag pa'i nor yang med/ /de bas bdag gi nor phyir 'di khyer cig /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ bdag cag lta
<p>19b.2</p>bus gzhan dag gi /srog kyang gcod par mi byed na/ /de ltar rab tu byams bstan pa/ /khyed lta bu la smos ci dgos/ /ri bong gis smras pa/ bram ze chos la 'di lta bu'i snying rje nye bar gnas pa ni rigs kyi/ de bas na bdag la phan pa'i thabs 'ga' zhig gud
<p>19b.3</p>nas btsal te 'ong gi de'i bar du bdag la phan pa'i slad du re zhig 'di na bzhugs shig /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de'i bsam pa shes nas/ me'i phung po gser btso ma'i mdog 'dra ba cung zad 'bar ba me stag rnam par 'phro ba du ba med pa zhig mngon par sprul
<p>19b.4</p>lo/ /de nas ri bong gis phyogs kun tu bltas pa dang me'i phung po de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang yid dga' nas/ brgya byin la smras pa/ bdag la phan pa'i thabs 'di bdag gis rnyed de/ de bas na bdag gis lus longs spyod du byas pas phan gdags
<p>19b.5</p>pa'i bsam pas 'bras bu dang bcas pa bdag la mdzad par rigs so/ /bram ze chen po gzigs su gsol/ /sbyin par bya dang sbyin 'dod gzhol sems dang / /khyod lta bu yi mgron dang ldan gyur pa/ /'di lta bu ni rnyed pa rab tu dka'/ /de la brten nas bdag
<p>19b.6</p>ni don yod 'gyur/ /ces mgron la dga' ba'i phyir gus shing rim gro bskyed de/ de la 'di skad smras so/ /de nas de ni me 'bar de nang du/ /nor 'dod pa dag gter ni mthong ba bzhin/ /rab tu dga' bas me yi nang du zhugs/ /pad+ma rgyas pa'i chu nang ngang pa
<p>19b.7</p>bzhin/ /lha rnams kyi bdag pos de mthong nas/ yid la ngo mtshar skyes te/ bdag nyid kyi lus su gnas nas/ lha'i me tog char bzhin du 'bab pa dang bcas pa'i tshig rnar snyan cing yid du 'ong bas mngon par bstod de/ bdag nyid kyi lag pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra
<p>20a</p>
<p>20a.1</p>ba/ dpal phun sum tshogs pa/ sor gdub kyi rgyan bzang pos brgyan pa gnyis kyis de blangs nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris na gnas pa'i lha khyed rnams ltos shig /skyes bu chen po'i lus rab tu ya mtshan che ba 'di la rjes su yi rang
<p>20a.2</p>bar gyis shig /mgron la byams pas de ring ma chags par/ e ma'o/ 'di yis ci ltar lus btang ba/ /sems can mi brtan rnams kyis dman ma yang / /de ltar the tshom med par gtong mi nus/ /'di lta'i rigs dang de dag 'gal ba yi/ /gtong
<p>20a.3</p>ba rgya chen sems kyang gsal ba 'di/ /lha mi bsod nams mi byed pa rnams la/ /dpe bstan bzhin du 'di ni rnam par gsal/ /e ma'o yon tan goms byas pa/ /'di yi blo la bsgos pa dang / /e ma'o dam pa'i spyod gzhol ba/ /spyod pa rgya chen 'di yis bstan/ /
<p>20a.4</p>de nas brgya byin gyis de'i las khyad par can brtan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten la phan par bsams nas/ khang bzangs mchog rnam par rgyal ba dang / lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang gi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ri bong gi gzugs brnyan gyis brgyan
<p>20a.5</p>te bzhag go/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang po la/ /ding song du yang ri bong gzugs/ /me long dkyil na gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /rab tu mngon par mdzes par snang / /de dag phyin chad 'jig rten pas/ /ku mu ta yi kha 'byed pa/ /mtshan mo'i mtshan ma zla ba la/ /
<p>20a.6</p>ri bong mtshan ma can zhes grags/ /de bas na de ltar sems dpa' chen po dud 'gror gyur pa rnams kyang ci nus par sbyin pa byed pa mthong na mir gyur pa su zhig sbyin pa mi byed/ de bzhin du dud 'gror gyur pa rnams yon tan la dga' na/ dam pa rnams kyis
<p>20a.7</p>mchod par gyur pa'i phyir/ yon tan la gus par bya'o/ /zhes kyang bshad par bya'o/ /ri bong du skyes pa'i rabs te drug pa'o// //dka' thub kyi nags tshal na gnas pa rnams la yang gtong ba dang dpa' ba gnyis rgyan du gyur na/ khyim na gnas
<p>20b</p>
<p>20b.1</p>pa rnams la smos ci dgos/ de yang 'di skad thos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir 'khor ba na gnas pa'i tshe/ spyod pa dang yon tan rnam par dag pas mngon par mtshon pa/ sa'i steng na rgyan du gyur pa/ 
<p>20b.2</p>zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa nam mkha' la shar ba bzhin du bram ze'i rigs cig tu skyes par gyur to/ /zhes grags so/ /de bzhin du thos pa dang / dran pa las byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du skyes pa'i las la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams ni byas/ rig byed yan
<p>20b.3</p>lag dang bcas pa ni bslab/ mkhas pa'i grags pas ni mi'i 'jig rten ma lus par khyab par byas/ sbyin pa po yon tan la dga' ba rnams kyis gsol ba btab ste/ phul ba rnams blangs pas 'byor pa'i phyir/ nor rab tu phun sum tshogs par gyur to/ /
<p>20b.4</p>gnyen dang mdza' bshes brtan dang phongs rnams dang / /mgron dang bla mar bkur sti bya ba rnams/ /'byor pa des ni rab tu tshim byas nas/ /yul du sprin gyi char chen bab pa bzhin/ /mkhas pa'i phyir ni de yi grags pa de/ /gtong ba dang ni dpa' bas lhag gyur pas/ /
<p>20b.5</p>ston ka'i zla ba rnam par dag pa dang / /yongs su rdzogs pas lhag par gsal ba bzhin/ /de nas bdag nyid chen po de khyim na gnas pa bya ba ngan pas brel ba'i nyes pas glags pa/ bag med pa'i gnas su gyur pa/ nor sgrub cing bsrung ba'i zhar gyis rnam par dkrugs pa/ 
<p>20b.6</p>nye bar zhi ba dang 'gal ba/ sdug bsngal mang po'i mda'i 'ben du gyur pa/ so tshis kyi las bsgrub pa mtha' yas pas dub par gyur pa/ chog mi shes pas bde ba myong ba chung bar rig nas/ rab tu byung ba ni de'i nyes pa med cing bde ba la chos bsgrub pa dang rjes su
<p>20b.7</p>mthun pa/ thar pa'i chos brtsams pa'i gnas su gyur par mthong bas nyon ma mongs par rnyed pa'i nor phun sum tshogs pa 'jig rten gyis bkur sti byas pa/ yid du 'ong ba de dag kyang rtswa bzhin spangs nas/ rab tu byung ba dka' thub can gyi chos 'dul ba dang / sdom pa
<p>21a</p>
<p>21a.1</p>la rab tu 'bad par gyur to/ /sems dpa' chen po de rab tu byung bar gyur kyang / grags pa che ba dang / sngon shes pa rjes su dran pa dang / srid pa'i yon tan dang rab tu zhi bas mtshon pa'i phyir legs par 'dod pa'i skye bo rnams de'i yon tan
<p>21a.2</p>mang pos yid mgu bas de'i phyi bzhin du 'du zhing 'ong bar gyur to/ /de'i skye bo khyim pa'i 'du 'dzis rab tu dben pa'i bde ba med par byed pa/ 'khrug pa dang g.yeng ba dang bar chad du gyur pa de la mi dga' nas sems rab tu dben pa la dga' ba'i phyir/ ku ru zhes bya ba'i
<p>21a.3</p>gling lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'i nang na 'dug pa/ rgya mtsho'i rlabs rlung gis bskyod pa/ an da rnyil gyi bcag 'phro ltar sngo ba 'thor bas mtha' ma bskor ba/ sa gzhi bye ma skya bos khebs pa/ shing ljon pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa me tog dang / 'bras bu dang 'dab mas brgyan pa
<p>21a.4</p>rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/ chu gtsang ma btung du rung ba yod pa cig tu gnas nas/ dka' thub la gnas shing dpal dang ldan par byas so/ /lus bzang de ni dka' thub kyis/ /rid par gyur cing de na mdzes/ /mkha' la zla ba tshes pa bzhin/ /gzi
<p>21a.5</p>mdangs che ba'ang mkha' la snang / /spyod dang dbang po rab tu zhi zhing dul/ /brtul zhugs sdom la nges byas nags tshal gnas/ /blo yi mthu chung rnams kyis thub pa zhes/ /bya dang ri dwags rnams kyang de la 'khor/ /de nas bdag nyid chen po de dka' thub kyi nags
<p>21a.6</p>tshal na gnas kyang sbyin pa la rab tu goms pas glo bur pa rnams dus su 'ong na rtsa ba dang 'bras bu ji snyed pa dang / chu gtsang ma dang 'dir 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis shis pa brjod pa/ yid du 'ong ba skye bo dka' thub can rnams kyis mchod par byed do/ /
<p>21a.7</p>glo bur du lhags pa rnams la mgron byas pa'i lhag ma rnams nags tshal nas byung ba 'tsho ba'i phyir za zhing gnas so/ /de'i dka' thub mchog tu gyur pa'i grags pa 'phros pas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sems mgu bar gyur nas/ sems dpa' chen po de nyams
<p>21b</p>
<p>21b.1</p>brtan nam mi brtan nyams bskyed pa'i phyir/ dgon pa'i gnas de na rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu dka' thub can rnams kyis bzar rung ba thams cad mthar gyis mi snang bar byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang yid bsam gtan la zhugs pa dang / chog shes pa la goms
<p>21b.2</p>pa dang / kha zas la zhen pa med pa dang / lus la ma chags pa'i phyir de dag mi snang bar gyur pa'i rgyu yid la mi byed do/ /des shing gi lo ma gzhon nu rnams btsos te des kha zas kyi dgos pa byas nas zhen pa med cing zas khyad par can mi tshol bar blo bde bar byas te der
<p>21b.3</p>gnas so/ /chog shes nges pa'i bdag nyid can/ /'tsho ba gang na'ang btsal mi dka'/ /rtswa dang lo ma chu yi gnas/ /gang na'ang med pa ma yin no/ /de de ltar gnas pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin nyid yid la ngo mtshar che bar gyur nas/ /yon tan rab tu brtan pa
<p>21b.4</p>de dag brtag pa'i phyir nags tshal dgon pa de na shing ljon pa dang ldum bu thams cad dpyid kyi rlung gis btab pa bzhin du lo ma thams cad med par byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' des lo ma lhags shing rnyings pa cung zad yod pa rnams btus te chu'i nang du btsos pa
<p>21b.5</p>de dag za zhing mi dga' ba med par der bsam gtan gyi bde bas yid tshim par byas te/ bdud rtsi'i dam pa bzhin du gnas so/ /mang du thos pa snyems pa med/ /'byor pa rnams ni ser sna med/ /nags tshal gnas rnams chog shes pas/ /yon tan rgyan gyi mchog
<p>21b.6</p>yin no/ /de nas de'i chog shes brtan pa ngo mtshar du gyur pa des/ brgya byin ngo mtshar cher gyur nas bos pa bzhin du/ sems dpa' chen po de dro la babs pa'i tshe/ me la sbyin sreg bya ba ni zin/ bzlas brjod ni rdzogs nas/ skye bo glo bur du 'ongs pa lta ba'i phyir
<p>21b.7</p>phyogs su bltas pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i gzugs su bsgyur nas glo bur du 'ongs pa 'dra bar mdun du 'ongs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' yid rab tu dga' nas/ de'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'dir 'ongs pa legs so/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
<p>22a</p>
<p>22a.1</p>tshig snyan par brjod nas/ zas kyi dus la babs pa bstan nas mgron du bos so/ /des kyang mi smra bas khas blangs pa bdag nyid chen po des shes nas/ sbyin pa 'dod pas mig bgrad bzhin ni 'dzum pas mdzes/ /yid 'ong rnar snyan tshig gis
<p>22a.2</p>dga' bar byas nas ni/ /dka' bas rnyed de btsos pa de dag thams cad kyang / /de la byin nas bdag nyid dga' bas tshim par gyur/ /de de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi gnas su zhugs nas dga' zhing mgu ba nyid kyis nyin mtshan gnas so/ /de nas brgya byin de phyi de
<p>22a.3</p>gnyis dang / nyi ma gsum la yang de bzhin du brtul zhugs kyis de'i mdun du 'ongs so/ /de'ang rab tu dga' nas de bzhin du de la mchod pa byas so/ /sbyin par 'dod pa'i dge ba rnams/ /snying rje goms pa las skyes pas/ /sdug bsngal srog la babs na yang / /
<p>22a.4</p>dman zhing zhum par yongs mi 'gyur/ /de nas brgya byin sems la ngo mtshar che bar gyur nas/ 'di ni dka' thub che bas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po'i dpal thob par bya ba yang 'dod pa tsam gyis 'grub par rig nas dogs pa dang 'jigs pa skyes nas/ bdag
<p>22a.5</p>gi lus lha'i cha lugs ngo mtshar che bar bzang po dang ldan pa mngon par bstan nas/ de la dka' thub kyi dgos pa dris so/ /gnyen dang mdza' bshes mchi mas 'ju ba dang / /bde ba'i rgyur gyur yongs su bzung bor nas/ /bsam pa'i lcags kyu gang du dmigs nas ni/ /
<p>22a.6</p>dka' thub sdug bsngal 'di la gnas par gyur/ /bde ba 'byor pa'i longs spyod yongs bor zhing / /gnyen bshes rnams kyang mya ngan bslongs nas su/ /rgyu rkyen chung ngu dag gis brten pa rnams/ /bde dang 'gal ba'i dka' thub nags mi 'gro/ /gang gi yon
<p>22a.7</p>tan thos nas khyod lta bu'i/ /blo yang de ltar dbang du byas pa de/ /bdag la gal te smra bar bya rung na/ /de bas bdag gi rtog pa bsal bar rigs/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gang gi phyir bdag ltar 'bad pa grogs po khyod nyon cig /yang dang yang du
<p>22b</p>
<p>22b.1</p>skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang / /rgas dang rgud dang na ba'i sdug bsngal dang / /'chi bar gyur snyam sems pa'i 'jig rten rnams/ /bskyab pa'i phyir na bdag ni de ltar gnas/ /de nas brgya byin gyis bsams pa/ 'di ni bdag gi dpal 'dod pa ma yin no snyam nas
<p>22b.2</p>dbugs phyin te/ legs par smras pa des dga' bar gyur te/ de'i tshig de rigs so/ /zhes bya bas dga' ba bskyed de/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchog sbyin par byas so/ /'dir khyod kyis dka' thub can dang mthun pa'i tshig legs par smras pa'i phyir 'ongs
<p>22b.3</p>bas/ khyod la mchog sbyin gyi gang 'dod pa de slongs shig /de nas byang chub sems dpas srid pa'i bde ba la ma chags pa dang / slong ba nyid sdug bsngal du rig cing chog shes pa la goms pas/ brgya byin la smras pa/ rjes su phan par byed pa'i mchog /
<p>22b.4</p>gal te bdag la sbyin 'dod na/ /lha yi mchog la dam pa 'di/ /bdag gis da ni bslong bar bya'o/ /chung ma yid du 'ong dang bu dang dbang byed dang / /mngon par 'dod pa'i nor rnams rgya chen thob gyur kyang / /gang gis yid gdungs rnams kyang chog mi shes pa yi/ /brkam
<p>22b.5</p>pa'i rlung de bdag gi snying la med par byos/ /de nas de'i chog shes pa la gzhol ba la legs par smras pas bsal bar byas pa des/ brgya byin yid rab tu dang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya bas bstod de/ yang mchog sbyin pas 'dun
<p>22b.6</p>par byas so/ /'dir yang skye bo dka' thub pa dang mthun pa'i tshig khyod kyis legs par smras pa la dga' bas/ skyes lan dang 'dra bar mchog gzhan la yang sbyin par bya'o/ /da nas byang chub sems dpas mchog slong ba la snyad btags te/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba
<p>22b.7</p>thob dka' ba nyid de la bstan pa'i phyir yang de la chos bshad do/ /yon tan mchog ni brgya byin khyod/ /nga la gal te mchog sbyin na/ /lha yi dbang po dam pa'i mchog /de bas gzhan yang 'di bslang ngo / /sems can gang gis zil non dgra bo bzhin/ /nor
<p>23a</p>
<p>23a.1</p>yang nyams shing mdog bzang grags pa dang / /bde ba las kyang nyams par gyur pa yi/ /zhe sdang med de bdag la ring du byos/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de thos nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te/ legs so zhes bya bas de la gus pas bstod de/ yang
<p>23a.2</p>smras pa/ rab tu byung la grags pa de/ /rjes su chags bzhin bstan par 'os/ /de bas legs par smras pa yi/ /mchog de bdag la bzhes su gsol/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa dang mi mthun pa'i phyir/ mchog 'dod pa la snyad btags nas
<p>23a.3</p>sems can nyon mongs pa can dang 'grogs pa smad pa'i phyir 'di skad smras so/ /byis pa rnams ni nam yang mi thos shing / /mthong bar mi 'gyur nams kyang mi smra zhing / /de dang 'grogs par skyo ba'i sdug bsngal yang / /mi myong mchog ni bdag gis khyod la slong / /brgya byin
