<p>23a.4</p>gyis smras pa/ phongs par gyur la khyad par du/ /dam pas phan btags ma yin na/ /phongs pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir/ /byis pa tha ma yin par 'dod/ /byis pa 'di dag khyad par du/ /snying rje'i gnas su gyur pa ni/ /ci phyir snying rje can yin yang / /mthong ba
<p>23a.5</p>tsam du khyod mi 'dod/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grogs po khyod mi nus mod 'di la ltos shig /ji ltar byas kyang byis pa la/ /phan gdags par ni mi nus te/ /bdag cag lta bu ji ltar na/ /de la phan par brtson mi byed/ /de lta bas na
<p>23a.6</p>'di dag phan gdags par bya ba'i snod ma yin par zung shig /'di dag tshul min pa yang tshul bzhin byed/ /gzhan yang 'di la rab tu sbyor bar 'dod/ /'dul dang drang po'i rim dang mi mthun par/ /phan par bstan kyang rab tu 'khrug par 'gyur/ /mkhas pa'i nga rgyal gti mug
<p>23a.7</p>mes bsregs shing / /phan par smra la'ang khro bas rtsub 'gyur ba/ /'dul dang brtson 'grus chung bas gzu lums can/ /de la ji ltar phan btags rung ba smos/ /lha'i gtso bo de lta bas na/ snying rje chen por gyur pa yang / /byis pa rjes su mi rung ba/ /mthong
<p>23b</p>
<p>23b.1</p>ba tsam du'ang mi 'dod do/ /brgya byin gyis de thos nas/ legs so legs so zhes de la bstod de legs par smras pas sems rab tu dad par gyur nas/ yang smras pa/ legs par smras pa rin chen la/ /rin ni ci yang yod ma yin/ /dga' bas me tog snyim
<p>23b.2</p>bkang nas/ /'dir yang khyod la mchog sbyin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas skyes bu dam pa gnas skabs thams cad du bde ba bstan pa'i phyir/ brgya byin la smras pa/ brtan pa mthong zhing brtan pa thos pa dang / de dag nyid dang brgya byin bdag 'grogs gyur/ /
<p>23b.3</p>de dang smra zhing spobs pa'i bde ldan gyur/ /lha yi dam pa mchog de bdag la stsol/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ khyod ni brtan pa la rab tu dga' na/ de smros shig /brtan pas khyod la ci zhig byas/ /'od srungs de yi rgyu smros shig /brtan pa mthong bar 'dod pa yi/ /
<p>23b.4</p>gang phyir mi brtan bzhin du 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas skyes bu dam pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir smras pa/ bdag gang gi phyir brtan pa 'ba' zhig mthong bar 'dod pa de grogs po khyod nyon cig /yon tan lam du bdag nyid 'gro bar byed/ /gzhan yang
<p>23b.5</p>lam de nyid du 'dzud par byed/ /rtsub mo'i tshig kyang mi bzod bskyed mi 'gyur/ /de yi tshig ni phan par ldan pa yin/ /g.yo sgyu med pa'i 'dul bas rtag tu brgyan/ /de ltar phan pa dag kyang bstan par nus/ /de ltar bdag blo yon tan dga' ba la/ /yon tan
<p>23b.6</p>dga' phyir rab tu gzhol bar gyur/ /de nas de la brgya byin gyis/ legs so 'di ni legs so zhes bstod do/ /sems rab tu dang bar gyur nas/ yang mchog sbyin par byas so/ /chog shes pa la goms gyur pas/ /khyod kyis kun tu bzlog gyur kyang / /bdag
<p>23b.7</p>la phan btags blo yis su/ /mchog ni blang bar bya ba'i rigs/ /gus dang phan pa'i bsam pa dang / /mthu yang ci yod thams cad kyis/ /mchog ni sbyin par byas pa la/ /ma blangs pa ni sdug bsngal che/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas de rab tu phan 'dogs par
<p>24a</p>
<p>24a.1</p>'dod pa rtogs nas de dag la dga' ba dang phan par 'dod pas sbyin pa la rab tu dga' ba de la brtan pa'i phyir smras pa/ khyod kyi kha zas zad pa'i nyes pa spangs/ /yid kyang sbyin la dga' dang mthun gyur zhing / /slong mi rnams ni tshul khrims rnam dag
<p>24a.2</p>brgyan/ /'di dag bdag la yod gyur mchog slong ngo / /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'dir yang khyod ni legs par smras pa rin po che'i 'byung khungs su gyur to/ /gzhan yang khyod kyis gang blangs pa/ /de dag thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /legs par smras pa 'di la
<p>24a.3</p>yang / /khyod la mchog ni sbyin par bya/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ lha rnams kun gyi mchog tu gyur pa khyod/ /bdag la phan 'dogs rgyur gyur mchog sbyin na/ /gsal bar bdag drung slan chad mi 'byon pa'i/ /mchog 'di lha min 'joms pa khyod la bslong / /
<p>24a.4</p>de nas brgya byin ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ /mi bzod pa bzhin du de la smras pa/ khyod re zhig ltos shig dang / bzlas brjod brtul zhugs mchog sbyin dka' thub spyad pa yis/ /skye bo 'di dag kho bo'i rjes su mthun 'dod na/ /kho bo mchog sbyin 'dod phyir 'di ltar 'ongs pa la/ 
<p>24a.5</p>khyod ni de ltar mthong bar mi 'dod ci yi phyir/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di la bdag gis khyod mnyes par bgyi yis/ lha'i dbang po khyod ma bkyon cig /'di mi srun pa'i tshul kyang ma lags/ ma gus par bgyid pa yang ma lags/ khyod dang 'phrad par
<p>24a.6</p>mi 'tshal ba yang ma lags na/ lha yi gzugs mchog rmad du byung ba mthong ba dang / /gzi brjid gsal zhing mdangs dang ldan pa mthong gyur na/ /khyod ni rab tu dang zhing zhi bar gyur pa yang / /bdag gi dka' thub nyams par 'gyur du dogs lags mod/ /de nas brgya
<p>24a.7</p>byin gyis de la phyag 'tshal te bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas nam langs pa dang / lha'i bza' ba dang btung ba brgya byin gyis sbyar ba rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas brgya phrag du ma brgya byin gyis spyan drangs pa rnams dang / lha'i bu gzhon nu bshos 'dren
<p>24b</p>
<p>24b.1</p>par chas shing bsdogs pa du ma tsam lhags pa/ byang chub sems dpas mthong bar gyur to/ /bza' ba dang ni btung ba sbyar ba de dag gis/ /drang srong chen po de dag mchod par byas pa dang / /thub pa de ni dga' ba chen po thob par gyur/ /skye bo dka' thub can dang
<p>24b.2</p>mthun pa'i tshul dag dang / /bsam gtan tshad med sdom dang zhi ba'i gnas/ /de bas na de ltar dka' thub kyi nags tshal na gnas pa rnams la yang gtong phod pa dang dpa' bas rgyan du gyur na/ khyim na gnas pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bas na mi rnams
<p>24b.3</p>kyi gtong phod pas bdag brgyan par bya'o/ /zhes sbyin bdag gzengs bstod pa'i phyir de ltar bcom ldan 'das de sku tshe snga ma la yang legs par gsungs pa khyad par can rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin na/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na lta smos kyang ci dgos
<p>24b.4</p>zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid bstan pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /a gas+t+ya'i skyes pa'i rabs te bdun pa'o// //bam po gsum pa/ snying rje chen po gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gyis gdung ba rnams ni bdag gi bde ba la mi lta ste/ de yang 'di skad
<p>24b.5</p>thos so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dag gi che ba nyid kyis snying rje dang ldan zhing / 'gro ba yongs su bskyab pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can/ sbyin pa dang dul ba dang sdom pa dang / nges pa la sogs pa 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa dang / mthun pa'i yon tan khyad par can mngon par
<p>24b.6</p>'phel ba/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i yid du gyur pa/ byams pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur to/ /zhes grags so/ /skye dgu rnams ni bde dang sdug bsngal gang / /rgyal po de yang de dag de bzhin gyur/ /de bas de ni skye dgu bsrung la mkhas/ /
<p>24b.7</p>mtshon cha dang ni gtsug lag rnams la goms/ /mi yi bdag po'i bka' khrims spyi bos mnos/ /de yi mtshon cha rgyan dang 'dra bar gyur/ /'jig rten phan byung bstan bcos tshul rnams kyi/ /gtsug lag dag kyang rnam par gsal bar snang / /tshar gcad pa dang phan gdags byas
<p>25a</p>
<p>25a.1</p>pa la/ /chos dang 'gal ba de ni yongs mi byed/ /tshul la mkhas shing phan par sems pa'i phyir/ /skye dgu rnams la rtog mkhas pha dang 'dra/ /de de ltar chos kyis skye dgu rnams skyong ba na/ bden pa dang gtong ba dang / shes rab la sogs pa
<p>25a.2</p>gzhan la phan pa yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir khyad par can gyur pa la rlabs che ba'i rim pas byang chub kyi tshogs bsags shing mngon par dar ba las/ re zhig cig nyes pa 'ga' zhig byung ba'i phyir gnod sbyin gzhan gsod pa la mkhas pa mdangs 'phrog pa la dga' ba lnga
<p>25a.3</p>sde cig /gnod sbyin gyi bdag pos rang gi yul nas spyugs pa yul der lhags so/ /de'i yul na gnod pa thams cad med pa dang rtag tu dga' ba sna tshogs yod pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa mchog dang ldan pas rtag tu mi rnams rab tu dga' mgu zhing dar ba mthong nas/ de
<p>25a.4</p>dag yul de na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog 'dod par gyur to/ /de dag rab tu bsgrims nas ni/ /rang gi las la 'jug byas kyang / /de na gnas pa rnams kyi mdangs/ /'phrog par bya bar mi nus so/ /rgyal po de'i mthu khyad par che bas na/ /bdag gi yin pa'i
<p>25a.5</p>blo ni gar bzhag pa/ /de nyid de yi srung ma mchog yin pas/ /de dag gis ni mdangs 'phrog nus ma gyur/ /de ltar rab tu 'bad kyang yul de na gnas pa'i mi gang gi mdangs 'phrog par ma nus pa de'i tshe/ de dag gcig la gcig bltas nas/ grogs po dag 'di ci zhig
<p>25a.6</p>yin snyam du sems par gyur to/ /bdag cag mthu la gnod par nus pa yi/ /rig sngags dka' thub dngos grub khyad par yang / /de dag la ni yod pa ma yin na/ /'on kyang de ring bdag cag thams cad kyi/ /ming ni don dang mthun par ma gyur to/ /de nas gnod sbyin dag
<p>25a.7</p>bram ze'i gzugs su bsgyur te song song ba dang / grib shing sngon po cig gi drung na nags na rgyu ba'i ba glang gi rdzi'u cig lham dang bcas par 'dug cing / nags tshal gyi shing gi me tog lo ma dang bcas pa'i phreng ba ni thogs/ dbyug pa dang dgra sta ni g.yas rol du bzhag /gcig
<p>25b</p>
<p>25b.1</p>pus srad bu ni 'khal/ spyugs glu ni len cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ de'i drung du lhags te smras pa/ kye ba glang rdzi'u 'di lta bu'i dgon pa dben pa 'gro ba med pa na gcig pur ji ltar mi 'jigs/ des de dag la bltas nas su la 'jigs zhes smras so/ /gnod
<p>25b.2</p>sbyin rnams kyis smras pa/ srin po rnams dang 'dre rnams rang bzhin gyis gtum zhing ma rungs pa yin par khyod kyis sngon ma thos sam/ rig sngags dka' thub bde legs ldan pa dag /grogs kyis bskor ba'i nang na 'dug gyur zhing / /dpa' la 'jigs pa med pa'i
<p>25b.3</p>mi dag kyang / gang las thar bar 'gyur ba rab dka' ba/ /nags tshal rab tu dben zhing zab pa la/ /'jigs pa'i sa na grogs kyang yong med par/ /mi yi sha dang tshil dag za ba yi/ /srin po de dag ci phyir khyod mi skrag /de skad ces smras pa dang / ba glang rdzi'u
<p>25b.4</p>des dgod nas smras pa/ bde legs chen pos 'gro ba 'di/ /yongs su bskyang bar gyur pa na/ /lha yi dbang po dag gis kyang / /'di dag gtse bar mi nus na/ /sha za rnams kyis ga la nus/ /de bas nags na khyim bzhin du/ /mtshan mo dag kyang nyin par bzhin/ /
<p>25b.5</p>gcig pu'ang grogs kyi nang 'dug 'dra/ /bdag ni 'jigs pa med par 'dug /de nas gnod sbyin de dag ngo mtshar cher gyur nas/ de la zil gyis gnon pa bzhin du ched cher byas nas smras pa/ kye bzang po khyod kyi bde legs kyi bye brag de ci 'dra ba zhig re zhig smros
<p>25b.6</p>shig /de dgod cing de dag la smras pa/ bdag cag gi bde legs kyi bye brag rmad du byung ba ci 'dra ba nyon cig /gser gyi ri bo'i brag ltar yangs pa'i brang / /ston ka'i zla ba dri med mdzes pa'i zhal/ /dpung pa gser gyi sdong po lta bur rgyas/ /mi dbang khyu mchog
<p>25b.7</p>spyan 'dra rnam par gnon/ /bdag cag gi bde legs kyi khyad par ni 'di'o zhes smras nas/ ngo mtshar che zhing khro ba dang bcas pas gnod sbyin de dag la bltas te yang smras pa/ e ma ho 'di ngo mtshar che'o/ /mi dbang thub chen 'di ltar grags pa yang / /khyed
<p>26a</p>
<p>26a.1</p>kyi rna lam ci ltar ma grags kye/ /'on te thos kyang shin tu rmad byung bas/ /khyed cag yid mi ches phyir ma bzung ngam/ /khyed cag gang nas lhags pa'i yul de yi/ /mi rnams yon tan tshol la mi mkhas sam/ /ched cher mi 'dzin skal ba med pa'i
<p>26a.2</p>phyir/ /mi dbang grags pas rnam par spangs su dogs/ /de bas na yul de lta bu mtha' 'khob nas 'dir lhags pa ni/ khyed cag la skal ba cung zad cig yod do/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis smras pa/ bzang po de'i yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams la mi ma yin pa rnams kyis
<p>26a.3</p>gnod pa byed mi nus pa rgyal po de'i mthu de lta bu ci las gyur/ ba glang rdzi'us smras pa/ nged kyi rgyal po chen po'i mthu 'di lta bu 'di ni rang gi che ba nyid kyis thob pa'o/ /bram ze dag ltos shig /de'i dpung byams pa'i ru mtshon khro bo'i dpung ni cho ga tsam/ /de ni mi khro tshig rtsub mi
<p>26a.4</p>smra sa yang legs par bsrung / /de yi bka' khrims chos yin rgyu med nor yang dam pa mchod/ /de ltar rmad du byung yang ngan pa'i chos nyid dregs pa med/ /kho bo cag gi rje 'di ni de lta bu la sogs pa'i yon tan mang po dang ldan te/ de bas yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams la gnod
<p>26a.5</p>par mi nus so/ /de lta bas na kho bos khyed la ci snyed cig smra bar mi nus kyis/ mi'i bdag po'i yon tan thos par 'dod na khyed grong khyer de nyid du 'dong bar rigs so/ /khyed der song dang skye bo rnams rang rang gi chos la dga' bas ya rabs kyi tshul la gnas pa dang rtag tu bde zhing
<p>26a.6</p>lo legs pas rab tu dga' ba phun sum tshogs shin tu lugs bzang la mi 'phya ba dang / skye bo glo bur du lhags pa rnams la khyad par du byams pa dang / mi'i bdag po'i yon tan snying la dran pa dang / de'i grags pa'i gzhi bstod pa dang bkra shis pa dang bde legs bzhin du rab tu
<p>26a.7</p>dga' zhing goms par byed pa dag mthong na rgyal po'i yon tan rgya cher shes par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar yon tan mang po brjod pas de mthong bar 'dod pa la nges par de'i yon tan mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /de nas gnod sbyin de dag rang gi mthus ma tshugs pas rgyal po de la sems
<p>26b</p>
<p>26b.1</p>mi bzod pa dang bcas pas yon tan snying nas brjod cing tshig rigs pa dang / bden par smras pa des kyang sems 'jam por ma gyur to/ /dman pa rnams ni phal cher yang / /mi bzod pas ni yid gdungs pas/ /dngos po gang la de grags pa/ /de yis lhag par
<p>26b.2</p>gdungs par gyur/ /rgyal po de sbyin pa la dga' bar shes nas/ de la gnod pa byed par 'dod pa'i gnod sbyin de dag gis rgyal po de mthong nas mthong ba'i tshe/ bza' ba slongs so/ /de nas rgyal po de rab tu dga' nas de'i las su bskos pa'i mi rnams la kha zas zhim po
<p>26b.3</p>bram ze rnams la myur du byin cig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas bram ze la dgos pa'i kha zas rnams khyer te 'ongs na yang / gnod sbyin de dag na re kha zas de lta bu bdag cag mi bza'o zhes smras nas/ stag gzig rtsa sngon po mi 'dod pa bzhin du len du ma btub bo/ /de
<p>26b.4</p>rgyal po des thos nas/ de dag gi drung du song ste/ 'o na khyed cag rnams kha zas ci lta bu 'dod de 'dra ba btsal lo/ /zhes smras so/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis smras pa/ mi sha shin tu dron po dang / /mi yi khrag ni dron mo dag /brtul zhugs ma nyams pad+ma'i spyan/ /gnod
<p>26b.5</p>sbyin rnams kyi bza' btung lags/ /zhes smras nas/ rang gi lus kha nas mche ba gtsigs pa/ mig dmar zhing ser la g.yo zhing mi sdug pa dang / sna leb cing mi sdug pa dang / skra dang kha spu me 'bar ba ltar ser ba dang / lus char sprin ltar gnag cing mi sdug pa 'jigs pa
<p>26b.6</p>bstan pa de dag mthong nas/ rgyal po des bsams pa/ 'di dag ni sha za yin te mi ma yin no/ /de bas na bdag cag gi bza' ba dang btung ba ma 'dod do snyam du nges par gyur to/ /de nas mi'i dbang po de snying rje can yin pas/ bsam pa dag pas de dag la snying rje de bas
<p>26b.7</p>yang ches gyur snying la snying rje 'ba' zhig sems/ gnod sbyin de dag la mya ngan byed cing don 'di lta bu nges par bsam mo/ /snying rje can la 'di lta bu'i/ /bza' dang bca' ba rab tu dkon/ /nyin re zhing yang de btsal ba/ /de las sdug bsngal che ba med/ /snying rje med
<p>27a</p>
<p>27a.1</p>cing mi nus na'ang / /'bad pa don ni med par 'gyur/ /nus na'ang phan byed goms pa la/ /de bas dka' ba ci zhig yod/ /snying rje med cing yid ni ma zhi ba/ /de lta bu yi kha zas za ba rnams/ /tshe 'di dang ni pha rol rang don bsreg /'di dag
<p>27a.2</p>sdug bsngal nam zhig med par 'gyur/ /da 'di dag gi kha zas sbyar bas nyin zhag 'ga' tsam yang gzhan gsod pa la zhugs pa 'di las ci ltar bzlog par bya/ phongs te slong du 'ongs pa rnams kyi gdong / /re ba bzlog pas ngo 'dzum gnag gyur pa/ /bu yug rlung gis pad+ma
<p>27a.3</p>rnying pa bzhin/ /mi dga' byas pas nams kyang bdag mi dran/ /gdon mi za bar bdag lus rgyas pa 'di/ /khrag dang bcas pa'i sha rnams sbyin bar bya/ /phongs pa 'ongs na de ni rigs pa snyam/ /de las gzhan pa bdag gis gang du btsal/ /bdag rang shi ba'i sha
<p>27a.4</p>rnams drod med la/ /khrag rnams 'ang de la yod pa ma yin no/ /bru ba tsha bas sems ni gdungs pa la/ /de yis legs par mgu bar 'gyur ma yin/ /gson po'i sha yang bdag gis ji ltar btsal bar bya/ /'di dag bdag gi thad du 'ongs nas bkres pa la/ /skom
<p>27a.5</p>pas mig dang gdong gi mdongs nyams shing / /bslong dang re ba'i 'bras bu med pas yid/ /sdug bsngal bzhin du slar dong na yang ci zhig bya/ /de bas na 'di ni dus la bab kyis/ rtag tu na zhing gdug pa'i rma dang 'dra/ /nad kyi 'byung khungs ngan pa'i lus 'di la/ /
<p>27a.6</p>dgos pa khyad par can du spyad pa yis/ /bcos pa'i sdug bsngal shin tu bzod par bya/ /de ltar nges par byas nas rgyal po rab tu dga' bar gyur pas/ mig rtsa dang gdong gi mdangs bzang pos rang gi lus bstan nas/ gnod sbyin de dag la smras pa/ bdag gi sha
<p>27a.7</p>ni khrag dang bcas pa 'di/ /'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir bzung ste/ /gal te de ring mgron du byar rung na/ /de ni bdag gis mngon par thob par 'gyur/ /de nas gnod sbyin de dag rgyal po de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa shes bzhin du ngo mtshar rab tu che bas yid ma ches nas/ 
<p>27b</p>
<p>27b.1</p>rgyal po la smras pa/ phongs pas bdag gi sdug bsngal dag /slong zhing dman pas bstan pa lags/ /de las sbyin pa po nyid kyis/ /dus la bab pa mkhyen par mdzod/ /de nas rgyal po des bsams pa da ni 'di dag dga' 'dod do snyam nas/ snying rab tu dga' ste/ 
<p>27b.2</p>rtsa dbral ba'i phyir sman pa rnams bos shig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas rgyal po de'i blon po rnams rgyal po'i sha dang khrag rnams sbyin par stsol bar rig nas/ rtab rtab por gyur to/ /mi bzod cing sems 'khrugs nas byams pa'i dbang gis don 'di lta bu cung zad
<p>27b.3</p>cig gsal bar smras so/ /lha sbyin pa la dgyes ches pas 'bangs glo ba nye ba rnams la phan pa dang / gnod par 'gyur ba mi gzigs pa mi rigs so/ /lhas 'di dag ni mi mkhyen pa yang ma lags te/ /'di ltar skye dgu rnams la gnod pa gang dang gang / /de dang de dag
<p>27b.4</p>gnod sbyin rnams la dga'/ /gzhan la gnod pas 'tsho zhing dga' ba skye/ /'di dag rigs dang rang bzhin de lta lags/ /rgyal srid dpal 'di 'jig rten phan pa'i phyir/ /bde la ma chags lha yis bzung bar mdzod/ /de bas bdag gi sha sbyin gsol ba yi/ /log
<p>27b.5</p>pa'i lam du yi dam bcas pa mthong / /skyes bu dpa' bo khyod kyi mthus bskyabs pa'i/ /'jig rten gdon mi za bar 'di mi bzod/ /phung bar byed la mkhas pa 'di dag ni/ /tshul gyis tshul min skye dgu phung bar 'dod/ /mchod sbyin tshe na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'ang / /
<p>27b.6</p>tshil dang zhag la sogs pa bsregs pas mgu/ /khyod kyi zhal zas phun sum tshogs pa dag /gus par sbyin yang 'di dag 'dod mi 'gyur/ /lha'i thugs ni bdag cag lta bu'i skye bos bcos pa ma lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'di ni bdag cag gi don du gces pa'i slad
<p>27b.7</p>du bdag cag 'di ltar ko long gsol bar gyur to/ /gnod sbyin lnga po 'di rnams kyi don du 'bangs thams cad mgon ma mchis par bgyi'am/ lha 'di lta bu'i chos gang gi lam lags/ gzhan yang 'di ltar bdag cag la mi byams pa ci las gyur/ rje'i ched du 'tshal ba
<p>28a</p>
<p>28a.1</p>la sha dang khrag yongs su rdzogs par mchis pa 'di dag sngon bdag cag gang gis sbas te ma phul na lha nyid kyis stsal bar bzhed/ de nas rgyal po des blon po de dag la smras pa/ yod bzhin du ni med ces su/ /nged cag lta bus ci ltar smra/ /brtul te gsal
<p>28a.2</p>bar slong ba la/ /mi sbyin zhes kyang ci skad smra/ /chos kyi bka' khrims thog mar 'gro ba dag /gal te ngan pa'i lam du bdag song na/ /nga yi spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa yi/ /nga yi 'bangs rnams gnas skabs ci ltar 'gyur/ /'di yang skye dgu rnams kyi don gyi
<p>28a.3</p>phyir/ /ngas ni lus la snying po dbyung bar bya/ /nga yi sems ni ser snas phrogs gyur na/ /skye bo'i don la dge ba'i gzi ci 'dra/ /khyed kyis nga la gus pa dang bcas par byams pa dang bag phab ste gang smras pa/ 'di ltar bdag cag la ni mi byams pa ni ci las gyur/ sha
<p>28a.4</p>dang khrag bdag cag la yongs su rdzogs par mchis bzhin du/ lha nyid kyis stsal bar bzhed ces zer ba de yang khyed la bshad do/ /nga khyed la mi 'byor zhing mi byams pa yang ma yin la/ ma byin du dogs pa yang med mod kyis/ rim gyis nor ni nyung ngur gyur pa'am/ /
<p>28a.5</p>skal ba chung bas zad par gyur na ni/ /mdza' bo rnams la slong ba mdzes par gyur/ /nor ldan dbul la slong ba yongs mi mdzes/ /skye bo phongs pa rnams kyi phyir bskyed pa'i/ /lus ni sha rgyas shin tu mtho ba dang / /nga bdag nyid la chen po yod bzhin du/ /khyod la
<p>28a.6</p>slong ba legs pa ma yin no/ /mi shes gzhan gyi gnod pa'ang mi bzod na/ /khyod kyi gnod pa bdag gis ga la bzod/ /'di dag khyod la mi slong nga la slong / /de bas nga bdag sha ni sbyin par bya/ /de bas na nga la rab tu byams pas chos kyi gegs la 'dzem pa med pa
<p>28a.7</p>'di thong shig /nga'i don du khyod kyis spyod pa 'di lta bu bya ba mi rigs so/ /'di ni re zhig dpyad dgos te/ bza' ba la sogs bdog bzhin du/ /sbyin pa 'gog pa ji ltar 'gyur/ /legs sam gal te ma legs na/ /de ltar byed pa ci 'drar 'gyur/ /de
<p>28b</p>
<p>28b.1</p>ltar 'dir bsam pa de lta bu de thong la/ nga'i grogs rjes su mthun par byas na rigs pas dpyad par bya'o/ /lam log par 'gro ba las bzlog pa'i yid can du byas la rjes su yi rang ba dang mthun par 'di la khyed kyis byas na bzang gi de ltar mi brtan par bya ba mi rigs so/ /
<p>28b.2</p>ci'i phyir zhe na/ nor ni gcig pus spyad pa ma yin la/ /slong ba'ang nyin re rtag tu 'ong ma yin/ /slong ba 'di lta bu dang 'phrad pa ni/ /lha dag mnyes par byas kyang mi 'grub na/ /slong ba 'di lta bu'ang 'ong 'gyur zhing / /lus kyang chud za mi bde'i gnas gyur la/ /the tshom
<p>28b.3</p>za na'ang rgya cher mi 'grub na/ /'dzum zhing zhum pa med pa'i mchog yin no/ /de ltar rgyal po des rang gi 'khor rnams la khyed kyis de ltar nga la brgal bar mi rigs so/ /zhes tshig 'jam pos bsgos nas/ sman pa rnams bos te rang gi lus la rtsa lnga dbral te/ gnod sbyin
<p>28b.4</p>de rnams la smras pa/ nga yi lus 'di khyer nas su/ /chos kyi grogs kyang bya ba dang / /nga yang rab tu dga' gyur par/ /khyod kyis nga ni bya bar rigs/ /de dag gis de ltar bgyi'o zhes smras nas/ rgyal po'i khrag tsan+dan dmar po'i khu ba 'dra ba snyim pa zed de btung bar chas so/ /
<p>28b.5</p>rgyal po de'i lus gser mdog 'dra ba la/ /mtshan mo spyod pa rnams ni khrag 'thung ba/ /ri rab lhun po'i ri la dbyar dus kyi/ /char sprin stug pos nye bar bskor ba bzhin/ /dga' ba mchog ldan bstan dang ldan pa dang / /lus kyi yon tan ldan pas rgyal po de/ /lus kyang
<p>28b.6</p>ma nyams sems kyang brgyal ba med/ /khrag gi rgyun yang zad pa yod ma gyur/ /gnod sbyin de dag skom gyis gdung ba zhi nas da ni 'dis 'tshal to zhes rgyal po la smras so/ /sdug bsngal mang po 'byung ba'i gnas kyi lus/ /rtag tu byas pa mi gzo yin yang rgyal po de/ /
<p>28b.7</p>slong ba dag la sbyin ba'i don grub pas/ /rab tu dga' dang rjes mthun bzung bar gyur/ /de nas rgyal po de rab tu dga' bas bskul bas mig dang bzhin gyi mdangs lhag par gsal bar gyur nas/ ut+pa la mthing ga'i 'dab ma ltar mdog sngo ba'i ral gri rnon po rdo rje rin po ches spras
<p>29a</p>
<p>29a.1</p>pa'i 'od kyis mdzes pa blang ste/ bdag gi sha bcad cing de dag la byin no/ /byin la dga' bas yang dang yang / /skabs ni med par byas pa na/ /bcad pa'i sdug bsngal de yid la/ /dmigs par byed ni ma nus so/ /ral gri rnon pos bcad
<p>29a.2</p>pas drangs pa yi/ /dga' bas phyir yang ring du bsregs pa bzhin/ /de yi sdug bsngal skyo zhing ngal ba ltar/ /yid la 'jug par byed pa chung bar 'gyur/ /rang gi sha yis gnod sbyin de dag ni/ /tshim par byas pas de ni de bzhin dga'/ /de dag sems ni khro ba'i
<p>29a.3</p>rang bzhin yang / /de ltar byas nas 'jam zhing nges par gyur/ /chos la dga' zhing snying rje'i dbang gyur te/ /gzhan gyi don du bdag lus gces btang bas/ /zhe sdang me yis bsregs pa'i yid rnams kyang / /rab tu dang zhing mdog kyang gsal bar byas/ /de nas
<p>29a.4</p>gnod sbyin de dag rgyal po des rang gi sha gcod pa la 'bad cing sha bcad pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bzhin mdangs ma gyur pa dang / mi g.yo ba de bzhin du bzhugs pa mthong nas/ rab tu dga' zhing ngo mtshar che bar gyur to/ /e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad byung 'di dag ci/ /bden
<p>29a.5</p>nam brdzun zhes dpyod cing dga' ba skyes/ /brgya la mi bzod zhi nas yid kyang dang / /de la bstod cing phyag kyang 'tshal bar gyur/ /lha nyid kyi sku'o brgyal bar mdzad pa btang du gsol/ bdag kyang tshim par bgyis lags so/ /skye bo slong ba yid dga' bar bgyid pa
<p>29a.6</p>shin tu rmad du byung ba khyod kyi spyod pa 'di ngo mtshar gyis btang du gsol/ zhes rgyal po la gus pa dang bcas/ phyag 'tshal ba dang bcas pas rab tu dga' zhing gdong mchi ma can gyis bltas nas yang smras pa/ gus pa'i dbang gis skye bos khyod kyi grags pa sgrogs pa
<p>29a.7</p>thog tu bab/ /dpal yang pad+ma'i nags tshal btang ste khyed la brten pa thog tu bab/ /brgya byin mgon du gyur kyang khyod kyi mthus bskyabs sa yi lha mo 'di/ /mtho ris kyis mthong smon par nges te gal te mi smon bslus su zad/ /mang du smos kyang mi dgos te/ skye bo
<p>29b</p>
<p>29b.1</p>'di lta bus mngon par bzung ba'i mi'i 'jig rten 'di dag ni skal pa dang ldan pa'o/ /khyod lta bu'o brgyal bar bgyis pa 'dis ni bdag cag bsregs kyi 'gran zla ma mchis so/ /de ltar gyur pa las kyang skye bo khyod lta bu la brten nas bdag cag thar bar nus nges so/ /
<p>29b.2</p>bdag cag gis nongs pa bgyis pa gsol ba'i slad du zhu bar 'tshal lo/ /bde ba brnyes par gyur pa dang / /rgyal po'i dpal yang bor nas ni/ /'di lta bu yi spyod pa yis/ /rmad du byung ba'i gnas ci bzhed/ /thams cad sa yi bdag po'am/ /nor gyis phyug
<p>29b.3</p>pa'am dbang po'am/ /tshangs pa'am rnam par grol ba dag /dka' thub 'di yis bzhed lags sam/ /'di lta bu yi rtsol phod pas/ /bzhed pa'i don ni mi ring ste/ /gal te bdag cag thos rung na/ /bdag cag la ni bka' stsal rigs/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ 
<p>29b.4</p>ci'i phyir ngas 'di ltar byed pa nyon cig /rnyed par dka' la 'jig par sla ba dang / /chog pa'i bde med rab tu zhi med pa'i/ /srid pa'i longs spyod bde ba nga mi 'dod/ /lha dbang dpal yang 'dod pa ma yin na/ /de las gzhan pa smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ /bdag
<p>29b.5</p>gis sdug bsngal zad pa tsam gyi phyir/ /nga yi yid ni mgu bar 'gyur ma yin/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad nad kyis nyen pa yi/ /lus can mgon med 'di rnams ngas bltas na/ /bsod nams 'dis ni thams cad gzigs pa yi/ /go 'phang thob cing skyon gyi dgra btul nas/ /
<p>29b.6</p>rga dang na dang 'chi ba'i rlabs 'khrugs pa'i/ /srid pa'i mtsho las skye bo 'don par 'dod/ /de nas gnod sbyin de dag rab tu dang zhing ba spu langs nas/ rgyal po la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ 'di lta bu'i rtsol ba khyad par can gyi las 'di ni rigs te/ de bas na khyod lta bu'i dgos pa
<p>29b.7</p>grub pa ni/ ring por mi thogs so snyam du yid la nges par bsams pas gsol ba btab pa/ khyod kyi bsam pa 'di kun ni/ /'jig rten phan pa'i phyir lags kyang / /bdag cag rang la phan 'tshal bas/ /de tshe bdag cag dgongs su gsol/ /ma 'tshal bas
<p>30a</p>
<p>30a.1</p>na bdag cag gis/ /bdag gi don yang ma mthong bas/ /de ltar khyod ni 'o brgyal ba/ /de yang bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ /khyod kyi bka' yang bdag cag la/ /rjes su bzung ba'i rgyur gyur pa/ /blon po dag la bgyi ba bzhin/ /'dzem pa med
<p>30a.2</p>par stsal ba rigs/ /de nas rgyal po des de dag sems rab tu zhi zhing 'jam par gyur pa rig nas smras pa/ 'di ni nga la phan pa yin gyi gnod pa ma yin pas mi bzod du dogs pa ma bskyed cig /gzhan yang / chos kyi lam la 'di ltar grogs byed pa/ /byang chub thob nas rjed
<p>30a.3</p>par ga la 'gyur/ /rnam par thar pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi las/ /khyed cag nyid la thog mar bgo bar bya/ /nga ni de la dga' bar shes byas nas/ /srog gcod khyed kyis dug bzhin spang bar byos/ /gzhan nor chung ma dag la chags pa dang / /brdzun du smra dang chang gi sdig
<p>30a.4</p>pa spongs/ /de nas gnod sbyin de dag gis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes de la mnyan nas/ de la bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /sems dpa' chen po des bdag gi sha dang khrag nges par sbyin par byas pa de nyid kyi tshe/ sa ni rnam pa mang por g.yos
<p>30a.5</p>par gyur to/ /gser gyi ri bo rnam par 'gul bar gyur/ /de na gnas pa'i bya rnams sgra yang 'byin/ /shing rnams 'gul bas me tog lhags par gyur/ /de dag rdzis bskyod mkha' la sprin ltar chags/ /la la bla res bres shing bya brgyus bzhin/ /kha cig tu ni phreng
<p>30a.6</p>ba brgyus pa bzhin/ /mi yi bdag po khor yug mnyam par lhags/ /rgya mtsho chen po shin tu g.yo ba'i rlabs/ /rang bzhin las ni lhag pa'i shugs dang sgras/ /'gro ba brtul ba'i lus ni gzi mdangs can/ /sa yi bdag po'i bzlog pa bzhin du byung / /de
<p>30a.7</p>nas lha yi dbang pos 'di ci zhes/ /brtags par gyur nas de yi rgyu rtog cing / /rgyal po nyes par dogs te rab myur bar/ /rgyal po'i pho brang mya ngan 'khrugs par 'ongs/ /sa yi bdag po de ltar gyur na yang / /gzi mdangs gsal bas lhag par ya mtshan skyes/ /
<p>30b</p>
<p>30b.1</p>thad du 'ongs nas snyan pa'i tshig rnams kyis/ /dang zhing dga' bas de yi spyod pa bstod/ /e ma ho/ /skye bo dam pa'i cho rigs bzang / /e ma ho/ /yon tan bsgoms pas rgya re che/ /e ma ho/ gzhan la phan pas blo re bde/ /sa 'di khyod la gtad pa mgon dang
<p>30b.2</p>bcas/ /zhes bstod nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha dang mi'i sman gyi khyad par gyi rma gsar pa sos par byed nus pa rnams kyis/ de'i lus sngon bzhin du sdug bsngal med par byas nas/ rgyal po des kyang mthun pa dang gus pa dang yo byad kyis slar mchod par byas te/ 
<p>30b.3</p>nyid kyi gnas su slar song ngo / /de ltar na snying rje chen po rnams ni gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal zhing / bdag gi bde ba la mi lta ba yin na/ nor tsam la chags nas gtong mi phod pa lta su zhig yod ces/ skye bo sbyin pa byed pa dag la gzengs bstod pa dang / 
<p>30b.4</p>snying rje'i yon tan bsngags pa dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba bstan pa dang / bsti stang du byas te chos nyan pa la yang brjod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lnga po 'di dag ni mang du byed byed pa'o/ /zhes gsungs pa de yang 'di la dgongs te/ de'i te
<p>30b.5</p>gnod sbyin lnga por gyur pa de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar zhal gyis bzhes pa de bzhin du chos kyi bdud rtsi byin pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i stobs su skyes pa'i rabs te brgyad pa'o// //byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni sems
<p>30b.6</p>can phal pa rnams kyis rjes su yi rang ba tsam yang lags par mi nus na kun tu spyad pa lta ga la nus/ de yang 'di skad thos te/ dbang po thul ba goms par gyur pa dang / dpa' ba dang / tshul dang dul ba phun sum tshogs pas rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal thob pa/ rgan
<p>30b.7</p>pa la bsnyen bkur nges par byas pas rig byed gsum dang brtag pa'i don gyi de kho na nyid khong du chud pa rang gi 'khor rang gi chos dang las la 'bad pa/ yid de'i rgyu med pas ma gyur zhig bde bar 'tsho ba snying nye ba rnams kyis bka' khrims bzang po bsgrags pa/ so tshis byas
<p>31a</p>
<p>31a.1</p>pa legs par 'byor pa/ yul shi bi pa rnams kyi rgyal po kun tu rgyal ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo / /yon tan ldan pas mi yi bdag po'i dpal/ /rigs ldan chung ma bzhin du snying nye ba/ /ri phug seng ges bsrungs pa'i ri dwags bzhin/ /sa yi
<p>31a.2</p>bdag po gzhan rnams glags mi lta/ /dka' thub rnams dang rigs dang sgyu rtsal la/ /nang gi 'khor gyis goms par byas pa rnams/ /'ongs nas rim gro lhag par che bar 'gyur/ /bkur sti byas pa gtso bo yin par snang / /dar rgyal srid thob ma thag tu de'i bu
<p>31a.3</p>thams cad sgrol zhes bya ba yon tan mang po rab tu grags pa cig rgyal tshab tu gyur te/ de'i tshe rgyal tshab de bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid yin no/ /gzhon yang rgan pa'i nye bar zhi la dga'/ /gzi brjid che yang bzod cing des pa'i ngang / /mkhas par gyur kyang shes pa'i
<p>31a.4</p>nga rgyal med/ /dpal dang ldan zhing 'byor yang dregs pa med/ /de yi grags pas 'jig rten gsum khyab pas/ /phyogs rnams rab tu rgya chen mthong gyur kyang / /gzhan gyi grags pa cung zad yod pa rnams/ /'phro ba'i skabs kyang med pa bzhin du 'gyur/ /skye bo
<p>31a.5</p>rnams kyi sdug bsngal dpag med pa/ /de yis ma bzod snying rje'i gzhu dag dang / /sbyin pa'i mda' rnams char bzhin 'bebs pa yis/ /de dang lhan cig g.yul chen 'gyed pa 'dra/ /de nyin re bzhin slong ba lhags pa rnams la bslongs pa bas kyang lhag par nyon ma
<p>31a.6</p>mongs par nar gtong zhing tshig 'jam po dang gus pa dang yid du 'ong bas rab tu tshim par byed par gyur to/ /dus mtshams kyi nyi ma dag la yang gso sbyong nges par gnas pa dang / rab tu zhi bas brgyan te/ mgo khrus byas te gos dkar po bgos nas glang po che'i mchog
<p>31a.7</p>gangs ri 'dra ba/ dregs pa dngul gyis gdong brgyan pa/ mtshan nyid dang / dul ba dang / mgyogs pa dang / snying stobs che ba phun sum tshogs pa/ grags pa bzhon par 'os pa'i spos kyi glang po che mchog zhon nas/ grong khyer gyi kho ra khor yug na bdag gis sbyin
<p>31b</p>
<p>31b.1</p>pa btang ba'i khang pa skye bo phongs pa rnams kyi rdzing bu dang 'dra ba bshams te bzhag pa rnams nyul du song ngo / /dga' ba'i khyad par 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur te/ phongs pa rnams la sbyin 'dod pa'i/ /dga' ba gang dag skye ba ni/ /khyim na gnas pa'i longs spyod la/ /
<p>31b.2</p>de tsam du ni dga' ba med/ /de nas re zhig cig de de ltar sbyin pa la rab tu dga' ba'i slong mo pa rnams kyis kun tu bsgrags pa thos nas/ de'i tshe nyi 'og gi rgyal po gzhan cig gis bsams pa/ 'di ni sbyin pa la dga' ba'i dbang du gyur pas bslu bar nus so snyam nas/ 
<p>31b.3</p>glang po che'i mchog song ba'i phyir der bram ze cig btang ngo / /de nas thams cad sgrol rang gis sbyin btang gi khang pa nyul zhing rab tu dga' bas bzhin gyi mdangs bzang po dang ldan pa la/ bram ze de dag gis rgyal ba dang shis pa brjod nas lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng ste bstod nas mdun du
<p>31b.4</p>sdod pa dang / /des glang po che'i mchog de bzung nas zhe sa dang bcas pas ci bzhed gsungs shig ces ci'i phyir lhags pa dris so/ /bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod ni sbyin la dga' ba dang / /khyod kyi glang po chen po 'di/ /'gros bzang 'gying zhing 'gro ba yi/ /yon tan
<p>31b.5</p>'tshal phyir bdag cag mchis/ /ti se'i gangs dang 'dra ba yi/ /glang chen 'di ni stsal ba yis/ /'jig rten 'di dag ya mtshan gyis/ /'di ni rab tu dga' bar mdzod/ /ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' snying dga' bas kun tu rgyas par gyur nas/ 
<p>31b.6</p>yun ring mo zhig nas gdod slong mo pa'i skye bo rlabs cher slong phod pa mthong bar gyur to snyam du bsam mo/ /bram ze 'di dag la ni glang po che'i rgyal po 'di lta bu ni cang mi dgos kyi/ gdon mi za bar 'di ni brkam pa dang / phrag dog gi skyon gyis bdag la yid dkrugs pa'i
<p>31b.7</p>rgyal po 'dod chen cig gis sbyar te btang ngo snyam du nges so/ /grags dang chos la'ang ma bltas par/ /nga la phan bzhin gang byed pa/ /rgyal po de yi bsams pa dag /re thag chad par mi bya'o/ /de ltar nges par byas nas/ bdag nyid chen po de glang po che'i mchog de
<p>32a</p>
<p>32a.1</p>las myur du babs te bzhes su gsol zhes byas nas gser gyi ril ba gtad de/ de dag gi mdun na 'dug go/ /nor bsgrub ngor ni chos lam mi mthun pa'i/ /rgyal po gtsug lag dag la mkhas gyur kyang / /chos la dga' bas de nas glang chen byin/ /
<p>32a.2</p>tshul dang dga' bas de ni g.yos ma gyur/ /glang chen gser gyi dra bas mdzes par legs brgyan pa/ /ston ka'i sprin tshogs glog 'gyu 'dra ba de byin nas/ /mi yi bdag po'i sras de rab tu dga' bar gyur/ /tshul gyi phyogs la dga' ba'i grong khyer pa rnams 'khrug /de nas
<p>32a.3</p>glang po che'i rgyal po de byin pa thos nas yul shi bi pa'i bram ze rgan po dang blon po bka' la gtogs pa dang / dmag mi dang grong khyer gyi gtso bo rnams ca co'i sgra phyung nas/ rgyal po kun tu rgyal gyi drung du lhags nas/ rtab rtab por gyur nas mi bzod cing sdangs te zhes btang nas ko
<p>32a.4</p>long du smras pa/ lha rgyal srid kyi dpal 'di ltar mchog tu gyur pa yal bar dor ba ni ci lags/ lha nyid kyi rgyal srid 'di ltar nyams par gyur pa bzod par mdzad pa mi rigs so/ /rgyal pos rings rings skad du 'di ci nyes zhes smras pa dang / yang smras pa/ ci lha
<p>32a.5</p>mi mkhyen tam/ gang gi 'gram pa bud pa sgra sgrogs pa/ /dngul gyi dri zhim rlung gis reg ba yi/ /gzhan gyi glang po myos shing dregs pa rnams/ /stsal ba'i sdug bsngal med par zil gnon pa/ /gang gi gzi yis khyod kyi dgra bo rnams/ /mthu stobs mnan zhing
<p>32a.6</p>drags pa med byas pa/ /thams cad sgrol gyis glang po de byin bas/ /khyod kyi rgyal ba gzugs can gzhan yul song / /ba dan gser dang gos dang bza' ba dag /rgyal pos bram ze rnams la sbyin par 'os/ /gang la dpal dang rgyal ba nges yod pa'i/ /glang chen btang ba
<p>32a.7</p>sbyin pa dpa' ches so/ /tshul dang 'gal ba'i lam du song ba 'dis/ /rgyal po'i dpal ni ji ltar 'gro zhes 'gyur/ /'di ni yal bar dor ba khyod la gnod/ /khyod kyi dgra ni mdun na dga' bar byed/ /de skad thos nas rgyal po bu la byams pas de dag nyid la cung zad cig mi
<p>32b</p>
<p>32b.1</p>dga' bar gyur nas/ dgos pa'i dbang gis mi dga' bzhin du de ltar bya'o smras nas/ yul shi bi pa'i mi rnams la yid bzhos te smras pa/ thams cad sgrol 'di sbyin pa la zhugs shing / /tshul gyi rim pa la mi lta ba ngas shes te/ rgyal srid la dbang byed du bcug pa ni de
<p>32b.2</p>ltar spang bar bya ba mi rigs mod/ 'dis kyang rang gi glang po che byin zin pas/ skyugs pa dang 'dra bar bor ba lta bu cig slar 'phrog /'on kyang 'di ci nas sbyin pa la tshod shes par bya yis khyed de ltar 'khrug par ma byed cig /shi bi pa rnams kyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po
<p>32b.3</p>thams cad sgrol 'di ni don de lta bu dag la gtams pa tsam gyis dam bca' bzlog tu btub pa ma lags so/ /kun tu rgyal bas smras pa/ 'o na de la ngas gzhan ci zhig bya/ /nyes pa spyod la gang zhig rab dga' zhing / /yon tan brtan la skyon du bzung ngam ci/ /glang po de yi
<p>32b.4</p>phyir ni bdag gi bu/ /bsad dam 'on te bzung ngam ci zhig bya/ /de bas na khyed rnams 'di la rngam zhing 'khrug par ma byed cig /ngas thams cad sgrol la 'di lta bu dag byed du mi 'jug go/ /de nas yul shi bi pa rnams khros nas rgyal po la smras pa/ mi yi bdag po khyod kyi
<p>32b.5</p>sras 'di la/ /bsad dam bcing ngam brdeg par su zhig 'tshal/ /chos la zhen pa snying rje'i bdag nyid pas/ /'dis ni rgyal srid bzung ba yongs mi nus/ /'khor gsum brten zhing gzi brjid che ba la/ /grags pa thob pa seng ge'i khri la 'os/ /tshul la mi lta
<p>32b.6</p>chos la rab dga' bas/ /'di ni dka' thub nags na gnas par 'os/ /sa yi bdag po rnams kyi tshul nyes skyon/ /de la brten pa rnams la 'byung mod kyi/ /'on kyang de dag bcos su rung ma mchis/ /sa bdag gtso bo nyams na bcos mi rung / /'di la mang du gsol
<p>32b.7</p>yang ci 'tshal te/ /khyod kyi srid nyams mi bzod shi bi pa/ /'di rnams kyis ni 'di ltar nges par bcad/ /mi rje'i sras 'di bka' thub 'phel ba'i phyir/ /thub pas bstan pa'i ri bo 'bang kar btang / /tshul ma yin par nyams su dogs shing phan par dga' ba'i skye bo de
<p>33a</p>
<p>33a.1</p>dag gis ngo bzlog ma phod par smras pa dang / de nas rgyal po de bu dang bral ba'i sems gdungs bas ngo tsha ba bzhin du/ mgo smad de nyam nga nga ltar shugs nar se byung nas/ byams shing spobs pa dang / yid gcugs pa'i dbang gis yul shi bi
<p>33a.2</p>pa rnams la smras pa/ khyed de ltar 'di la gal gyis 'chu na re zhig nyin zhag gcig tsam cig spro srings shig dang / sang nang par khyed kyis bsams pa bzhin du thams cad sgrol byed du bcug go/ /yul shi bi pa rnams kyis de ltar bgyi'o zhes smras nas/ bsgo ba nyan pa dang / 
<p>33a.3</p>rgyal po des gsol ka ba la khyod song la 'di ltar gyur pa thams cad sgrol la sbron cig ces bka' stsal to/ /des kyang de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes mnyan nas/ mya ngan gyi mchi mas gdong khebs shing / thams cad sgrol rang gi khang pa na 'dug pa de'i drung du song ste/ mya ngan gyi sdug
<p>33a.4</p>bsngal gyis shugs kyi skad phyung ste ngus nas/ de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad sgrol gyis rtab rtab ltar/ e ma rgyal po thugs bde'am zhes dris pa dang / mi dga' bas tshig mi gsal bar de la rgyal po thugs bde zhes smras so/ /'o na ci'i phyir de ltar
<p>33a.5</p>mi brtan par gyur zhes thams cad sgrol gyis yang yang dris pas/ gsol ka ba mchi mas brnangs shing skad 'jor la dbugs kyis brnangs pa'i tshig mi gsal bas/ gcom chung ngus smras pa/ shi bi pa rnams mi srun pa/ /'khrugs par gyur nas rgyal po'i bka'/ /'jam
<p>33a.6</p>por stsal yang mi nyan par/ /rgyal po khyod ni yul nas 'byin/ /thams cad sgrol gyis smras pa/ yul shi bi pa rnams ci'i phyir 'khrugs nas nga skrad/ 'dul dang 'gal ba'i lam mi 'gro/ /bag med pa la nga mi dga'/ /nyes par byas pa ma mthong na/ /shi bi pa rnams ci phyir
<p>33a.7</p>'khrug /gsol ka pas smras pa/ ha cang rlabs ches pas len no/ /khyod ni chags pa med la dga' bar gyur/ /slong ba rnams kyi yid ni chags la dga'/ /glang po'i rgyal po khyod kyis byin pa'i phyir/ /shi bi pa rnams 'khrugs nas bstan pa nyams/ /de bas rang gi
<p>33b</p>
<p>33b.1</p>chos bor te/ /khyod la tsham tshom med par ni/ /gang du spyugs kyang mi dang pas/ /lam der khyod kyang song zhes zer/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse ba la goms pa shas che ba dang / gzhung lugs skye bo slong ba rnams la byams pa dang / rang gi bstan pa phun sum tshogs
<p>33b.2</p>pa'i phyir smras pa/ yul shi bi pa rnams ni mi brtan pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/ ngas rang bzhin mi shes pa ltar byed mod/ 'jig rten don du nga yi lus 'dzin na/ /phyi rol nor lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ /rang gi mig dang mgo yang ngas sbyin na/ /phyi rol nor sbyin smos
<p>33b.3</p>kyang ci zhig dgos/ /slong ba rnams kyi slong ba'i tshig rnams la/ /rang gi lus kyang gtong bar sems pa la/ /skrag par byas nas mi sbyin sems snyam pa/ /byis pa rang gi rang bzhin ston pa zad/ /shi bi pa rnams thams cad kyis/ /nga ni bsad dam spyugs kyang rung / /mi
<p>33b.4</p>sbyin pa ni ngas mi byed/ /dka' thub tshal du 'gro zad mod/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mos gtam ngan de thos nas bzhin 'gyur ba la/ yul shi bi pa rnams kyis 'dir ji ltar nges par byas pa khyod kyis thos sam/ nga las khyod kyis ci thob dang / /gang yang khyod kyi pha ma
<p>33b.5</p>yi/ /nor rnams cung zad ci yod pa/ /de dag khyod kyis gter du sbos/ /ma dris smras pa/ lha 'di dag gar gter du sba bar bgyi/ thams cad sgrol gyis smras pa/ rtag par tshul khrims ldan pa la/ /sbyin pa bkur stis brgyan pa sbyin/ /nor rnams de ltar gter bcug
<p>33b.6</p>pa/ /rjes su 'gro zhing phrog tu med/ /gyos sgyug gnyis kyang dga' bar byos/ /chos la gcig tu bag yod byos/ /nga med mya ngan ma byed cig /ma dris de thos nas snying rab tu gdungs nas/ khyim thab mi dga' ba spang ba'i phyir mya ngan dang mi dga' ba btang ste smras pa/ rgyal
<p>33b.7</p>po chen po nyag gcig pu/ /nags su gshegs pa'i chos ma mchis/ /rgyal rigs gang du gshegs pa der/ /bdag kyang de bas mchi bar 'tshal/ /khyod spangs nas ni yongs bskor te/ /gnas kyang bdag nyid nges par mchi/ /dul ba khyed gang gson pa der/ /'chi
<p>34a</p>
<p>34a.1</p>ba'i sdug bsngal med par 'gyur/ /lha bdag ni nags na gnas pa mi bde bar ma mthong lags so/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi srun mi med shing dang chu mang bskyed/ /bya rnams sna tshogs sgra 'byin ri dwags mang / /ne'u gseng sngon po yid 'ong bai DUr 'dra/ /skyed
<p>34a.2</p>mos tshal bas dka' thub nags tshal dgyes/ /lha gzhan yang / nags tshal lcug ma'i khrod dag na/ /gzhon nu 'di gnyis phreng ba yis/ /brgyan cing brtse ba gzigs na ni/ /rgyal srid dag kyang dgos mi 'gyur/ /dus kyi dbang gis gyur pa yi/ /nags tshal mdzes
<p>34a.3</p>pa gsar pa dang / /sman ljongs 'bab chur bcas pa yi/ /nags tshal dag na dgyes par 'gyur/ /dga' bas 'tshal ba'i bya rnams ni/ /sna tshogs sgra 'byin sil snyan bzhin/ /'dod chags bde ba'i slob dpon gyis/ /bstan pa'i rma bya gar yang bgyid/ /bung
<p>34a.4</p>ba'i na chung glu len pa/ /rab tu snyan cing ma smad pa/ /nags tshal dag na glu gar gyis/ /khyod kyi thugs ni dgyes par bgyid/ /nags tshal dag na mtshan mo zla 'od ni/ /ras dkar bzang pos g.yogs pa'i rdo leb dang / /me tog shing gi dri zhim bsgos pa yi/ /nags
<p>34a.5</p>tshal ser bu'i bsil yab g.yob par bgyid/ /'bab chu'i na chung gor mas bskyod pa yi/ /chab sgra snyan pa lhang lhang sgra sgrogs pa/ rgyan gyi sgra rnams sil khrol mchis pa bzhin/ /khyod kyi thugs ni rab tu dgyes par bgyid/ /de de ltar btsun mo gnang chen gyis yid
<p>34a.6</p>bzhos pa dang / nags su 'gro ba la sems spro bar gyur nas/ skye bo slong mo pa rnams la bltas te/ sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa la zhugs so/ /de nas thams cad sgrol de ltar btang bar gyur pa thos nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang na ngud mo'i sgra chen po byung bar gyur to/ /skye bo slong
<p>34a.7</p>mo pa rnams kyang mya ngan gyis gdungs pa'i shugs kyis brgyal ba bzhin du gyur zhing / smyo bla can du gyur pa bzhin du smre sngags rnam pa mang po 'don par gyur to/ /'bras bu zhim po yod pa'i grib shing dag /bcad pa'i phyir ni sta re gzas pa rnams/ /'dzin pa'i sa ni ngo mtshar
<p>34b</p>
<p>34b.1</p>ma gyur pa/ /'di ni sems dpa' med par gsal bar mngon/ /chu gtsang zhim po bsil bas gang ba yi/ /rdzing bu 'dra ba dag kyang mi 'gog na/ /'jig rten skyong rnams ming ni don med gyur/ /grags pas zad dam gal te gud du song / /gang na rgyal po thams cad sgrol/ /
<p>34b.2</p>rang gi srid las phyung bas na/ /kye ma'o chos min gnyid ma log /chos ni gnyid log yang na shi/ /bdag cag phongs pa slong mo pa/ /nyes pa cung zad med pa la/ /srog la rgol ba mi srun pa/ /de las phung byed mkhas pa med/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas nor bu
<p>34b.3</p>rin po che dang / gser dngul gyis gang ba'i mdzod 'bum phrag du ma dang / nor dang 'bru mang por ldan pa'i bang mdzod rnams dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / theg pa dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang yo byad la sogs thams cad phongs pa rnams la ji ltar rigs pa
<p>34b.4</p>byin te/ pha ma mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal gyis brtan pa zil gyis gnon pa'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ bu dang chung mar bcas te shing rta'i mchog la zhon nas/ bsod nams kyi nyin bar gyi sgra bzhin du skye bo mang po cho nge 'don pa'i sgra sgrogs shing / grong khyer chen po mchog
<p>34b.5</p>gi nang nas phyir byung ste/ /rjes su chags pa'i dbang gis rjes su 'brang ba'i skye bo mya ngan gyis gdungs pa'i mchi ma la gdong g.yogs pa rnams nan gyis slar bzlog ste bkye nas/ bdag nyid kyis srab skyogs bzung ste/ ri bo 'bang ka la gal ba der song ngo / /grong khyer gyi
<p>34b.6</p>mchog gi nye kor ba skyed mos tshal bzang po yid du 'ong ba dang ra ba 'das nas kyang / yid la 'khrugs pa med pa mthar gyis grib shing nyung zhing skye bo mang po 'du ba'i rgyun chad pa/ ri dwags mang po rgyu ba/ phyogs gsal bar snang ba/ tshad pas byi'u tsa tsa'i sgra grag pa'i
<p>34b.7</p>dgon pa cig tu phyin to/ /de nas bram ze 'khyams pa dag cig gis de la shing rta 'dren pa'i rta bslangs so/ /dpag tshad du ma'i lam du de lus pa/ /bu smad bcas shing grogs ni med gyur kyang / /sbyin la dga' bas phyi rjes mi lta bar/ /bram ze rnams la rta bzhi byin
<p>35a</p>
<p>35a.1</p>par gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis shing rta drangs par brtsams nas legs par chas pa dang / gnod sbyin gzhon nu bzhi ri dwags dmar po'i gzugs su bsgyur nas rta bzang po rab tu dul ba bzhin du bdag nyid kyi shing rta'i gnya' shing gnya'
<p>35a.2</p>bar thogs par gyur to/ /de mthong ba dang ma dris dga' zhing ngo mtshar du gyur pas mig bgrad pa la byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gang na 'di ltar glo bur 'ongs pa la/ /byams pa'i rtsa zug ri dwags mchog 'khod nags/ /dka' thub can gyi nags bcas bkur ba
<p>35a.3</p>yi/ /mthu chen khyad par 'phags pa 'di la ltos/ /ma dris smras pa/ dam pa rnams kyi yon tan dang / /rab tu goms kyang mi 'dra bas/ /bdag gis bsams na mthu chen 'di/ /rgyal po khyod kyi lags pa snyam/ /mtsho yi nang na skar ma'i gzugs brnyan rnams/ /
<p>35a.4</p>ku mud rgyas pa lhag par mdzes gyur pa/ /zla ba'i 'od zer ltad mo lta ba bzhin/ /'dir mchis pa rnams rgyur gyur lags pa snyam/ /'di ltar de dang de dag phan tshun rjes su mthun pas gcig la gcig snyan par smra zhing lam du zhugs te dong ba las/ bram ze cig byung nas byang
<p>35a.5</p>chub sems dpa' la shing rta bslangs so/ /slong la dga' bas snyan gyur pa/ /bdag gis nor la ma chags des/ /shing rta byin pas bram ze de/ /re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid dga' bzhin du/ bdag dang bu smad shing rta
<p>35a.6</p>las babs te/ shing rta'i mchog bram ze la byin nas/ gzhon nu dra ba can pang du thogs te rkang pas lam du zhugs so/ /ma dri yang yid la mi dga' ba med par gzhon nu ma kr-iSh+Na 'dzin pang du thogs te de dang 'grogs te song ngo / /ljon pa'i shing rnams 'bras bu bzang po yi/ /
<p>35a.7</p>rtse mo btud nas mgron du gnyer ba bzhin/ /bsod nams mthu yis mngon du lta byed cing / /slob ma dul ba phyag kyang 'tshal ba 'dra/ /gang du chu 'dod gyur pa de dag tu/ /ngang pa'i dpung mgos pad+ma bskyod pa yi/ /ze ba lhags pas ser po gsal gyur pa'i/ /mtsho rnams
<p>35b</p>
<p>35b.1</p>de la rab tu byung bar gyur/ /sprin rnams kyis kyang bla re bzang po bres/ /ser bu bde ba'i dri zhim ngad kyang ldang / /ngal ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba mi bzod pas/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis de yi lam yang bstungs/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi nang du 'gro ba
<p>35b.2</p>bzhin du chos la dga' ba'i bde ba rjes su myong zhing / /lam gyis dub pa'i sdug bsngal ma myong bar bu smad dang bcas te phyin nas/ 'bang ka'i ri mthong bar gyur te/ de na yang me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo mas brgyan pa'i shing ljon pa snum snum ltar 'dug pa du mas
<p>35b.3</p>gang ba/ bya mang po 'dod pas myos shing / dga' ba'i sgra 'byin cing / rma bya mang po gar byed pas mdzes par gyur pa/ ri dwags kyi rigs du ma rgyu ba mtsho chu sngon po gtsang mas ched du bskor ba ltar 'dug pa/ me tog gi dris bsgos pa'i ser bu'i ngad ldang ba'i dka' thub kyi
<p>35b.4</p>nags tshal du/ nags tshal na rgyu ba rnams kyis lam mtshon te zhugs pa dang / de yang brgya byin gyis bka' stsal te/ las sna tshogs byed pa nyid kyis byas pa/ shing lo'i khang pa mthong na yid du 'ong ba/ dus thams cad du bde ba de lta bu zhig na gnas bcas te 'dug go/ /nags
<p>35b.5</p>tshal de na chung ma 'dug pas bkur sti byas/ /bdag gis byis pa'i snyan ngag ma bsgrib snyan pa nyan/ /skyed mos tshal na 'dug bzhin rgyal srid bsam pa med/ /lo phyed lhag tsam de ni dka' thub spyod par gyur/ /de nas rgyal po'i btsun mos rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu tshol du song ba'i
<p>35b.6</p>'og tu byis pa gnyis skyong ba'i phyir rgyal po bu dang gnas bsrung zhing 'dug pa na/ bram ze lam gyi rdul gyis rkang pa dang byin pa rtsub rtsub ltar 'dug pa/ shin tu ngal ba bzhin mdog dang mig rtsa nyams pa/ ril ba spyi blugs dbyug pa la btags pa phrag par thogs pa/ 
<p>35b.7</p>chung mas g.yog khrid la shog cig par ched cher sbran pa cig phyogs der 'ongs par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' yun ring mo cig nas slong mo ba 'ongs pa mthong nas yid rab tu dang bas mig dang bzhin gyi mdangs rab tu gsal bar gyur nas bsus te 'ongs pa
<p>36a</p>
<p>36a.1</p>legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshig snyan pa brjod de/ dka' thub kyi nags kyi nang du bzhag nas/ glo bur du 'ongs pa la bkur sti byas te/ ci'i phyir 'ongs pa dris so/ /de nas bram ze de chung ma la byams pas brten pa dang ngo tsha ba bor zhing slong ba 'ba'
<p>36a.2</p>zhig tu chas pas don 'di ltar smras so/ /gang na snang zhing mnyam pa'i lam yod pas/ /'jig rten 'di dag der dong nyam ngar min/ /'gro ba 'di ni phal cher ser snas bsgribs/ /bdag gis gzhan du slong ba'i tshig mi phyin/ /sbyin la dpa' ba'i grags dang dpal dag
<p>36a.3</p>gis/ /mthar byung ma lus khyod kyis mthar phyin pas/ /de phyir bdag ni slong mo bgyid par gyur/ /de bas sras gnyis bdag la g.yog tu stsol/ /de skad smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa la dga' bas goms par byas shing / slar
<p>36a.4</p>bzlog pa ni ma bslabs pas/ /rab tu sdug pa'i bu gnyis kyang / /tsham tshom med par sbyin zhes smras/ /bde legs su gyur cig /da 'di na mchis te ci bgyis zhes bram zes smras pa/ bu gnyis kyis sbyin pa'i gtam thos nas skrag pas mig rig rig por gyur pa la / 
<p>36a.5</p>byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i shugs kyis snying gdungs par gyur te smras pa/ /khyod la 'di gnyis ngas byin na/ /'di gnyis ma ni nags tshal du/ /rtsa ba 'bras bu tshol du song / /de yang de ring 'dir 'ong gis/ /'dir yang zhag gcig ngal sos
<p>36a.6</p>la/ /de dang 'phrad nas gtam byas pa/ /rgyan gyis brgyan cing phreng ba can/ /nga yi bu gnyis sang khrid cig /bram zes smras pa/ khyod 'di la dus kyi 'tshub 'di thong cig /bud med rnams ni mi drang bas/ /ming ni g.yo can zhes su btags/ /khyod kyi sbyin la gegs
<p>36a.7</p>byed kyis/ /de bas bdag ni 'dug mi 'dod/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sbyin pa'i gegs su 'gyur du ma dogs shig /de ni nga yi chos spyod pa'i grogs yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'di la khyod ci dgar zad mod/ gzhan yang bram ze chen po/ rab tu gzhon zhing
<p>36b</p>
<p>36b.1</p>byis pa gnyis/ /g.yog gi bya ba mi mkhas pas/ /'di gnyis khyod kyi bran byed kyang / /ji lta bur na mgu bar 'gyur/ /shi bi'i rgyal po nga yi yab/ /'di gnyis 'di ltar gyur mthong nas/ /'di gnyis bslu ba'i nor dag ni/ /ci 'dod khyod la nges par ster/ /de bas
<p>36b.2</p>de yi yul du ni/ /'di gnyis khrid na legs par 'gyur/ /de ltar byas na nor chen dang / /chos rnams dang yang ldan par 'gyur/ /bram zes smras pa/ bdag ni rgyal po sbrul gdug pa dang 'dra ba'i drung du mi dga' ba skyes 'tshal te mchi ba'i rngo mi thogs so/ /rgyal pos
<p>36b.3</p>bdag gi 'di gnyis 'phrog /yang na chad pas gcod kyang srid/ /de bas 'di gnyis bram ze chen mo yi/ /g.yog tu bdag gis khrid de mchi/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas don yongs su ma rdzogs par 'o na ci dgar zad ces smras nas/ bu gnyis la chags pa dang bcas par
<p>36b.4</p>g.yog legs par byos shig ces gdams nas len du gzhug pa'i phyir/ bram ze'i lag pa brkyang pa las/ ril ba spyi blugs gtad do/ /de yis bsgrims pa'i mthu dag gis/ /ril ba las ni chu byung nas/ /mig ni pad+ma'i 'dab 'dra las/ /ma bsgrim par yang
<p>36b.5</p>mchi ma byung / /de nas bram ze de brkam pas ha cang yang dga' ches nas/ rtabs pa dang bcas pa'i yid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i bu 'phrog par rings nas shis par brjod pa'i tshig mdor smras pa/ tshig drag po rtsub mos phyir byung zhes smras nas/ gzhon nu
<p>36b.6</p>gnyis dka' thub kyi nags nas phyir phyung ngo / /de nas gzhon nu gnyis pha ma dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis snying gdungs pas/ pha la phyag 'tshal nas/ mig mchi mas gang bzhin du smras pa/ yab gcig yum yang slad rol byung / /khyod kyis bdag cag gtong
<p>36b.7</p>bar bzhed/ /ma dang ma 'jal bar du gzhes/ /de nas bdag cag khyod kyis stsol/ /de nas bram ze des bsams pa/ 'di gnyis kyi ma yang de ring tshur 'ong la/ 'di yang bu la byams pas/ 'gyod pa skye yang srid do snyam nas/ pad+ma'i bam po bcings pa bzhin du
<p>37a</p>
<p>37a.1</p>de gnyis kyi lag pa lcug mas bcings pa dang / de gnyis gcig la gcig 'khri zhing / /pha la bzhin slar phyogs te/ lta ba rab tu gzhon pa'i gzhon nu gzhon sha can gnyis bsdigs shing khrid do/ /de nas gzhon nu ma kr-iSh+Na 'dzin sdug bsngal dang po
<p>37a.2</p>myong ba des skad phyung ste ngu zhing pha la smras pa/ pha gcig bdag la bram ze 'dis/ /brtse ba med par lcug mas bkyigs/ /bram ze chos dang ldan zhes gda'/ /'di ni bram ze ma lags nges/ /gnod sbyin bram zer bsgyur nas ni/ /nges par za ba'i phyir khrid do/ /sha
<p>37a.3</p>zas bdag cag khrid gyur na/ /yab kyis ci phyir yal bar bor/ /de nas gzhon nu dra ba can gyis smre sngags 'don cing smras pa/ bram zes bdag la brdeg pa yi/ /de tsam sdug bsngal mi che yi/ /de ring yum dang ma 'jal ba/ /de yis bdag snying gas pa
<p>37a.4</p>bzhin/ /dka' thub nags tshal stong pa na/ /yum ni yun ring nges par bshum/ /nyon mongs bu yi sdug bsngal gyis/ /byi'u phrug bsad pa'i ma ma bzhin/ /bdag cag phyir ni nags tshal nas/ /rtsa ba shing thog mang po rnams/ /bsnams te byon nas gnas
<p>37a.5</p>stong 'dir/ /gzigs nas yum ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /yab gcig chibs rta 'di rnams dang / /glang chen shing rta gang mchis las/ /phyed tsam yum la phul na ni/ /de yi thugs ngal chung yang srid/ /'phrin gyis yum la phyag 'tshal zhing / /thugs ngal mdzad
<p>37a.6</p>las bzlog tu gsol/ /yab gcig khyod dang yum de yi/ /zhal ni mthong ba rab tu dka'/ /kr-iSh+Na tshur shog bdag cag 'dong / /bram ze'i bran g.yog 'dod pa la/ /yab kyis bdag cag byin zin gyis/ /bdag cag gson yang ci zhig rung / /de nas byang
<p>37a.7</p>chub sems dpas bus smre sngags bton pa snying rje rje skad zer ba de'i blo rab tu bskyed kyang byin zin pas da 'gyod kyang ci phan snyam nas/ mya ngan gyi me bzlog dka' bas/ snying brtse ste dug langs nas brgyal ba bzhin du sems blong blong por gyur nas de nyid du 'dug go/ /
<p>37b</p>
<p>37b.1</p>ser bu bsil ba'i rlung yab kyis 'du shes slar rnyed pa dang / sgra ci yang mi grag cing bu mi 'khor ba'i gnas mthong nas/ mgrin pa dbugs kyis brnangs bzhin du rang la rang gis smras pa/ nga yi snying bu gces pa la/ /'dzem dogs med par mngon sum du/ /mtshon
<p>37b.2</p>gyis 'debs pa ci ltar na/ /bram ze ngan pa ngo mi tsha/ /lham yang med par rkang gis dong / /rab tu gzhon pas ngal mi bzod/ /ji ltar lam du zhugs te dong / /ji ltar de yi bran g.yog byed/ /lam du ngal zhing dub pa la/ /su zhig de ring ngal bsor 'jug /
<p>37b.3</p>bkres skom sdug bsngal nyen pa gnyis/ /slong pa'i gnas kyang su zhig yod/ /bdag ni brtan par byed 'dod kyang / /'di lta bu ni sdug bsngal na/ /nga'i bu bde bar skyes pa gnyis/ /gnas skabs ji ltar 'gyur zhing 'khong / /kye ma 'o bu dang bral ba yi/ /sdug
<p>37b.4</p>bsngal mes ni bdag sems bsregs/ /dam pa rnams ni chos dran nas/ /su zhig rjes su 'gyod pa byed/ /de nas ma dris mi dga' ba byung ba'i ltas ngan pa rnams kyis yid mi dga' bar gyur bzhin du rtsa ba dang 'bras bu khyer te rab tu myur bar 'ong bar 'dod kyang gcan
<p>37b.5</p>gzan khro bo rnams kyis lam chod pas rings shig lon nas dka' thub kyi gnas su phyin nas bsur 'ong ran pa'i sa dang / rtsed mo rtse ba'i sa na yang bu gnyis mi snang ba dang / rab tu mi dga' ba'i dbang du gyur to/ /ltas ngan byung nas dogs pa skyes par gyur/ /de nas bu
<p>37b.6</p>btsal phyir ni mig kyang blta/ /yang dang yang bos bu gnyis len med pas/ /mya ngan gdung nas smre sngags 'don par gyur/ /byis pa smra ba'i sgra grag nags tshal 'di/ /sngon ni bdag la mang po tshogs bzhin snang / /de gnyis mi snang de gnyis de ring ni/ /bdag la
<p>37b.7</p>'brog dgon bzhin du skyabs med snang / /kye ma gzhon nu de gnyis ci nyes kye/ /rtse rtse ngal nas gnyid kyis log gyur tam/ /nags tshal 'thug por brlag gam 'on te nyal/ /bdag 'ong phyis pas ma mgu mchis gyur tam/ /byis par gyur pas gang zhig gab
<p>38a</p>
<p>38a.1</p>cing 'khod/ /gal te bsad pa mthong na 'khrugs nas ni/ /bya 'di kun kyang ci ste sgra mi 'byin/ /'bab chu drag po rlabs chen 'khrug pa yi/ /chu yis gal te de gnyis khyer gyur tam/ /'on kyang da ni bdag gis log par rtog pa 'di ltar ma gyur cig rgyal po yab sras bde legs su gyur
<p>38a.2</p>cig /ltas ngan mtshan ma ngan pa ston pa yang / bdag gi lus la smin par gyur cig /bdag gi snying 'di yang ltas ngan/ dga' ba ni bzlog /mi dga' ba'i mun pas ni khebs nas gas pa bzhin du gyur tam ci/ 
<p>38a.3</p>bdag gi lus kyang lhu tshigs bral snyam byed/ phyogs rnams kyang 'khrug pa snyam byed/ nags tshal 'di yang dpal nyams shing g.yo ba snyam byed par gyur to/ /de nas dka' thub kyi nags kyi nang nas 'ongs nas rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnams phyogs gcig tu bzhag ste/ 
<p>38a.4</p>zhe sa dang bcas pas khyim thab la byis pa gnyis gar song dris so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas/ ma ni bu la byams pas stobs chung ba dang / mi dga' ba'i tshig brjod par dka' bar shes nas/ de la cung zad kyang smra ma nus so/ /dga' bar bya rigs skye bo
<p>38a.5</p>la/ /mi dga' smra ba'i mi dag gis/ /ched kar yid ni gdungs bya ba/ /snying rje can gyis rab tu dka'/ /de nas ma dris bsams pa/ 'di 'di ltar mya ngan gyis gdungs nas cang mi smra ba dang sbyar na bdag gi bu gnyis gdon mi za bar ma rung bar gyur to snyam
<p>38a.6</p>nas/ dka' thub kyi nags kun tu sems kyis brtags na bu gnyis mi snang bas mchi mas brnangs nas yang smras pa/ byis pa gnyis kyang yong mi snang / /khyod kyang bdag la cang mi gsung / /mi dgar gyur pa mi gsungs pas/ /kyi hud bdag ni bsad
<p>38a.7</p>kyis med/ /de skad ces smras nas/ mya ngan gyi mes snying bsregs pas lcug ma rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du 'gyel to/ /de 'gyel ma thag tu byang chub sems dpas blangs nas rtswa'i stan la bzhag ste/ chu grang mo btab nas slar sos pa dang / dbugs phyung
<p>38b</p>
<p>38b.1</p>pa'i phyir smras pa/ byams pa'i yid kyis mi bzod la/ /brtan po med du dogs pas na/ /ma dri khyod la nga yis ni/ /sdug bsngal myur du ma smras so/ /rgas shing dbul ba'i sdug bsngal gyis/ /nyen pa'i bram ze nga can byung / /de la nga yis bu gnyis byin/ /
<p>38b.2</p>mya ngan ma byed spro bsrings la/ /bu la ma sems nga la ltos/ /bu yi mya ngan gdungs snying la/ /mtshon gyis 'debs pa bzhin ma byed/ /bslangs par gyur na srog dag kyang / /mi sbyin par ni ji ltar nus/ /de bas nga yi sbyin pa la/ /bzang mos rjes su
<p>38b.3</p>yi rang byos/ /ma dris de thos nas bu shor dogs te snying brtse ba la/ bu gnyis gson pa'i gtam thos nas mya ngan chung ngur gyur nas/ khyim thab mya ngan bsad ba'i phyir/ mchi ma phyis te/ ya mtshan che bar bltas nas khyim thab la smras pa/ mang du gsol
<p>38b.4</p>yang ci 'tshal te ngo mtshar che'o/ /'di ltar khyod kyi thugs la ni/ /'dzum pa'i skabs kyang ma rnyed pa/ /lha yi sems kyang nges par ni/ /ya mtshan che ba'i dbang du gyur/ /khyod kyi grags pa'i tshig bsdeb sgra grag pa/ /lha yi rnga chen brdungs pa'i sgra rnams
<p>38b.5</p>kyi/ /brag cha'i sgra yis phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /tshig 'bru gsal bas nam mkha' khyab par gyur/ /sa gzhi ri yi nu ma g.yo ba can/ /'dod chags langs pa bzhin du rab tu g.yos/ /gser gyi me tog rnams kyang mkha' la lhags/ /glog 'gyu'i
<p>38b.6</p>'od kyis nam mkha' gsal gyur bzhin/ /de bas thugs ngan ma mdzad par/ /stsal bas thugs ni dgyes par mdzod/ /'jig rten rnams la btung chu bzhin/ /slan chad kyang ni sbyin bdag mdzod/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sa gzhi g.yos pas/ ri'i
<p>38b.7</p>rgyal po ri rab 'gul ba dang / 'di ci yin zhes rtog pa skyes pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba ya mtshan skyes pas mig bgrad pa rnams la sa g.yos pa'i rgyu thams cad sgrol gyi sbyin pa yin par rtogs nas sems rab tu dga' bar gyur te/ de'i mtshan mo nam langs pa dang / 
<p>39a</p>
<p>39a.1</p>brgya byin gyis bram ze'i gzugs su bsgyur nas slong mo spyod pa 'dra ba byas te/ thams cad sgrol gyi drung du 'ongs so/ /byang chub sems dpas glo bur du byung ba la bkur sti byas nas/ ci 'dod ces skabs phyes pa dang / de la chung ma bslangs so/ /
<p>39a.2</p>mtsho chen dag la chu ni mi zad bzhin/ /dam pa rnams la sbyin pa'i chos mi zad/ /de bas lha 'dra khyod la 'phags ma slong / /btsun mo 'di ni bdag la stsal bar rigs/ /byang chub sems dpa' yid mi dga' ba med pa nyid du de bzhin du bya'o zhes sbyin par byas so/ /
<p>39a.3</p>de nas lag pa g.yon pas ma dri bzung / /lag pa g.yas pas ril ba spyi blugs bzung nas ni/ /de yi lag g.yas rtse la chu sbreng nas/ /'dod lha'i sems ni mya ngan me yis tshig /de yi rang bzhin phan sems shes nas ni/ /sems kyang ma 'khrug ngus kyang ma ngus te/ /
<p>39a.4</p>sngon med sdug bsngal khur gyis non gyur nas/ /de la mig tshugs lta zhing bris bzhin 'dug /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de mthong nas snying la ngo mtshar rab dang ldan par gyur te/ sems dpa' chen po de la bstod nas smras pa/ ya rabs ma rabs chos gnyis ni/ /e ma
<p>39a.5</p>khyad par re che ste/ /bdag nyid ma sbyangs pa rnams ni/ /sus kyang yid ches mi nus so/ /'dod chags bral bar ma gyur pas/ /bud med rab tu sdug pa dag /de ltar ma chags sbyin byed pa/ /'di 'dra'i rlabs chen su la yong / /khyod kyi yon tan chags pa'i gtam
<p>39a.6</p>dag gis/ /khyod kyi grags pa phyogs su bsgrags pa des/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyis gzhan 'od zil mnan bzhin/ /gzhan gyi dpal grags zil gyis non par gyur/ /khyod kyi spyod pa mi las 'das/ /'di la gnod sbyin dri za dang / /ltos 'go sum cu rtsa gsum pa/ /brgya
<p>39a.7</p>byin bcas pa yi rang 'gyur/ /brgya byin gyis de skad smras te/ bdag gi lus 'od gsal bar 'dug pa bstan nas/ bdag ni brgya byin lags so zhes sbran te/ byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ zla ba btang ste zla 'od rnams/ /gzhan du 'gro bar mi rigs kyi/ /khyod
<p>39b</p>
<p>39b.1</p>kyi btsun mo ma dri 'di/ /khyod bdag nyid la bdag 'bul lo/ /brtan pa rnams ni bslangs na ster/ /seng ge'i chung ma ce spyang la/ /byin yang de yis ci zhig bya/ /de ni seng ge nyid la 'os/ /mthon po rnams dang dman pa la/ /rgyal po'i myu gu 'dra bar sems/ /de bas
<p>39b.2</p>de yi spyod pa des/ /'jig rten rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /de bas bu dang bral bar ma sems shig /rgyal srid nyams pa'i mya ngan ma byed cig /khyod kyi yab ni tshad byug gnyis dang 'grogs/ /khyod kyi mgon byas yul na rgyal srid byed/ /de skad ces smras nas/ 
<p>39b.3</p>brgya byin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /brgya byin gyi mthus bram ze des kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i bu gnyis yul shi bir khrid de song ngo / /de nas yul shi bi pa rnams dang / yul shi bi pa'i rgyal po kun tu rgyal bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni shin
<p>39b.4</p>tu bya dka' ba thos nas snying brlan par gyur te/ bram ze las byang chub sems dpa'i bu gnyis bslus nas/ thams cad sgrol mgu bar byas te bsus nas rgyal srid byed du bcug go/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni shin tu rmad du byung ba yin no/ /de la
<p>39b.5</p>phyogs pa'i sems can khyad bar can rnams la brnyas pa'am gnod par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa dang / bkur sti byed de dam pa'i chos nyan pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /thams cad sgrol du skyes pa'i rabs te dgu pa'o// //
<p>39b.6</p>bam po bzhi pa/ bsam pa dge ba rnams ni sdig pa byed du gzhug par bslur mi tshugs te/ de bas na bsam pa dge ba bya ba la 'bad par bya'o/ /de yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar rang gi bsod nams kyi mthu thob pa/ rgyal phran thams cad phyag 'tshal ba/ bdag
<p>39b.7</p>dang gzhan gyi 'khor la sogs pa'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bas 'tshe ba med pa/ gdugs zla med pa/ bgo skal gyi rim pas thob pa'i sa skyong zhing 'dug go zhes grags so/ /dbang po'i dgra thul de ni sa yi mgon/ /'bras bu smin pa spyad la ma chags shing / /dngos po kun
<p>40a</p>
<p>40a.1</p>gyis 'gro la phan byed pa/ /thub pa bzhin du chos don gcig pur byed/ /skye dgu rnams ni gtso bo'i rjes spyod par/ /'jig rten rang bzhin de yis shes gyur nas/ /skye dgu rnams ni dge la gzud par byed/ /khyad par du ni chos la spyod par gyur/ /nor
<p>40a.2</p>yang sbyin zhing tshul khrims spyod pa mnos/ /bzod pa brtan cing 'gro ba'i don yang spyod/ /'gro la phan sems mthong na zhi ba snang / /gzugs can chos bzhin de ni rnam par mdzes/ /de nas re zhig cig de'i mthus de'i yul bskyabs kyang ma phan te/ sems can rnams kyi las
<p>40a.3</p>kyi nyes pa dang / lha'i bu char 'bebs pa'i las su bskos pa rnams bag med par gyur pa'i dbang gis kha cig tu than pa byung bas 'khrug cing gnod par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po des bsams pa 'di ni bdag cag skye dgu rnams kyis chos legs par ma spyad pas lan gyis ma rung
<p>40a.4</p>par gyur to/ /zhes blo nges par gyur to/ /skye dgu rnams la phan pa'i bsam pa che ba dang / de'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pas chos kyi de kho na nyid la bslab par gyur pa mdun na 'don pa'i gtso bo bram ze rgan po rnams dang blon po rnams la de ci ltar thar pa'i thabs dris so/ /de nas
<p>40a.5</p>de dag gis mchod sbyin gyi cho ga rig byed las byung ba/ srog chags du ma gsod pa 'jigs 'jigs skad zer ba byas na/ char legs par 'bab par 'gyur bar bsams nas cho ga de de la gsol to/ /rgyal po des mchod sbyin las byung ba'i cho ga srog chags gsod pa'i rgyus
<p>40a.6</p>shes nas/ snying rje'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir de dag gi tshig yid la 'bab par ma gyur te/ 'dul ba'i 'khor rjes su mthun par de dag la ngo bzlog phod pa'i tshig rtsub mo ma smras par skabs gzhan dag gis de dag gi gtam de khyad du bsad do/ /de nas yang rgyal po de la
<p>40a.7</p>chos kyi gtam bya ba'i skabs rnyed nas/ de'i bsam pa zab cing brtag dka' ba ma shes nas mchod sbyin bya ba'i gros 'debs so/ /rgyal pos bgyi bar nges pa gang lags pa/ /sa gzhi thob dang yongs su skyong ba ste/ /de dag khyed ni dus las 'da' mi mdzad/ /de dag
<p>40b</p>
<p>40b.1</p>go rims chos dang bde ba bzhin/ /'khor gsum brten la mkhas par gyur pa dang / /'bangs la phan phyir gnam ru bsnams pa ste/ /mchod sbyin cho ga mtho ris them skas la/ /ji ltar khyod thugs bag med dbang du gyur/ /khyod kyi bka' ni rgyal po gzhan rnams kyis/ /
<p>40b.2</p>'di ni dngos grub mngon du grub yin zhes/ /'bangs dang 'dra bar rab tu gus nod na/ /mchod sbyin dag gis grags 'bar legs pa dag /da ni khyod kyis mdzad pa'i dus la bab/ /sbyin pa mdzad cing sdom la gnas pa yis/ /rtag par khyod ni dbang bskur lags gyur kyang / /
<p>40b.3</p>'on kyang rig byed grags pa'i mchod sbyin gyis/ /lha yi bu lon bral bar mdzad par rigs/ /mchod sbyin legs par bgyis pas lha mnyes na/ /char pa 'bab pas 'byung po mgu bar bgyid/ /de bas 'bangs dang bdag la phan pa'i phyir/ /grags par gyur pa'i mchod
<p>40b.4</p>sbyin cho ga mdzod/ /des bsams pa/ kye ma'o gzhan gyi dring la 'jog cing / /blo chung la dpyod pa mi nus pa'i chos tsam la dga' zhing / dad pa skye ba'i 'gro ba 'di dag ni shin tu ma legs par bstan to/ /gang yang / 'jig rten dag na gang la skyabs btsal ba/ /de dag bsad
<p>40b.5</p>pas chos su 'gyur ba ni/ /de yis bstan pa'i skye bo lam ngan song / /ngan song mi bde dogs pa'i nang na 'khod/ /phyugs rnams bsad pas chos 'gyur zhing / /lha yi 'jig rten skye ba dang / /lha yang mnyes par 'gyur ba dag /ci lta bur na 'thad par 'gyur/ /phyugs
<p>40b.6</p>rnams bsad pa'i sngags kyi mthus/ /mtho ris 'gro phyir de bas de bsad na/ /chos su 'gyur zhes zer ba de yang brdzun/ /gzhan gyis byas pa pha rol su zhig thob/ /legs par spyod las yid ni ma bzlog cig /dge ba'i las la nges par ma byas pa'i/ /phyugs rnams
<p>40b.7</p>mchod sbyin dag la bsad gyur kyang / /bdag byas gzhi med ji ltar mtho ris skye/ /mchod sbyin la bsad mtho ris 'gro na ni/ /bram ze bdag nyid phyugs su bsgyur la rag /gang phyir tshul 'di gang na'ang mi snang bas/ /de phyir de dag tshig ni su zhig nyan/ /mtshungs med
<p>41a</p>
<p>41a.1</p>mthu bsung ro gang gzi ldan pa'i/ /bdud rtsi'i zas mchog lha mos phul ba dag /bor nas phyugs bsad sha khrag la sogs pas/ /lha rnams mgu bar gyur pa ga la srid/ /rgyal po des da ni 'di 'di ltar bya dgos so snyam du bsams nas/ mchod
<p>41a.2</p>sbyin byed pa la mos par 'dra bar byas te/ de dag gi tshig mnyan nas/ de dag la smras pa/ khyed cag 'di ltar bdag la phan par sems pa ni/ bdag mgon dang bcas shing phan 'dogs pa dang ldan par gyur to/ /de bas na bdag ni mi stong gi mchod sbyin byed 'dod kyis/ 
<p>41a.3</p>ji skad du bskos pa'i blon po rnams de'i yo byad sbyor du chug shig /bkod sa rtsig tu rung ba'i sa phyogs dang / de dang mthun pa'i tshes grangs dang / byed pa dang yud tsam dang / rgyu skar dang sbyor ba yang rtogs shig /de nas de'i mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ 'dod pa'i don grub
<p>41a.4</p>par bgyid pa'i slad du/ rgyal po chen po re zhig khrus mdzod cig dang mchod sbyin cig bgyis lags na/ bdag cag rnams kyis bkod pa brtsam mo/ /cig char mi stong bzung na khyod kyi 'bangs rnams gdon mi za bar yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze rnams kyis kyang de
<p>41a.5</p>mad do zhes smras so/ /rgyal po des de dag la smras pa/ khyed 'bangs 'khrug par gyur du ma dogs shig dang / bdag gis ci nas kyang yid 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po des grong khyer gyi mi rnams bsdus nas smras pa/ ngas ni mi stong gi mchod
<p>41a.6</p>sbyin byed 'dod na nyes pa med par mi 'dod bzhin du su yang phyugs su byar ngas mi nus kyi/ de bas na de ring phan chad khyed cag las gang dang gang tshul dang bka' khrims las 'gal bar byed cing / nga'i bka' gcog pa de dang de dag nga'i rtog chen gyi mi bag med pa'i gnyid kyis ma
<p>41a.7</p>lo gcig /dri ma med par brtag par bya'o/ /rang gi rigs la gnod pa dang yul la gnod par byed pa dag yod na/ ngas phyugs kyi gor bzung bar khyed kyis shes par gyis shig /de nas de dag gi nang nas gtso bo rnams kyis thal mo sbyar nas de la smras pa/ khyod kyi spyod pa
<p>41b</p>
<p>41b.1</p>thams cad 'bangs la phan par gzhol/ /mi rje lhas mdzad de la brgal ba ga la srid/ /khyed kyi spyod la tshangs pa rjes su yi rang ngo / /khyod ni legs par tshad ma'i nang nas tshad ma mchog /lha gcig dgyes pa gang lags pa/ /bdag cag kun kyang de la dgyes/ /'o
<p>41b.2</p>skol dgyes shing smon pa las/ /dgyes par gud na gzhan ma mchis/ /de ltar grong khyer gyi 'bangs rnams kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan pa dang / rgyal po des blon po thugs ches pa rnams skye bo mang bos mthong bar gyur pa'i yo lang chen po dang bcas par ljongs dang grong khyer rnams
<p>41b.3</p>su sdig pa byed pa'i mi rnams 'dzin du bkye'o/ /kho ra khor yug tu yang nyin re zhing 'di skad bsgos so/ /brtan zhing gtsang ma'i tshul khrims nor ldan mi mchog la/ /rgyal po mi 'jigs sbyin pas mi 'jigs sbyin par mdzad/ /'bangs la phan phyir tshul min byed pa'i mi rnams ni/ /
<p>41b.4</p>phyugs su bsgyur ba stong gis mchod sbyin mdzad par bzhed/ /de bas de ring phyin chad gang zhig tshul min rjes spyod cing / /rgyal po'i bka' lung sa skyong blon pos bkur dang 'gal byed pa/ /de ni rang gi las kyi mchod sbyin phyugs su byas gyur nas/ /mchod sdong lus btags
<p>41b.5</p>grim shing skams pa skye bos mthong bar 'gyur/ /de nas yul de na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis mchod sbyin gyi phyugs su bya ba'i phyir/ rgyal pos tshul bzhin mi byed pa'i mi tshol du 'jug pa dang / nyin re bzhin 'jigs 'jigs skad bsgo ba de thos pa dang / rgyal po'i mi rnams
<p>41b.6</p>kyis sdig byed pa'i mi rnams bzung ba'i phyir/ thams cad du tshol zhing 'ong bar mthong nas/ tshul ma yin par byed pa la dga' ba ni btang / tshul khrims dang sdom pa dang yang dag par blangs pa la ni 'bad/ dgrar 'dzin pa las ni phyir phyogs/ gcig la gcig dga'
<p>41b.7</p>ba dang mgu bar ni byed/ 'thab pa dang rtsod pa ni rab tu zhi/ bla ma'i man ngag nyan cing rjes su mthun par ni byed/ bgo bsha' byed pa la bag tsha ba ni med/ glo bur du 'ongs pa la mgron byed pa la ni dga' zhing dul ba dang / gus par bya ba la ni 'bad par gyur te/ rdzogs
<p>42a</p>
<p>42a.1</p>ldan gyi dus bzhin du gyur to/ /shi bas 'jigs shing 'jig rten pha rol sems/ /rigs kyi nga rgyal grags pa bsrung ba dang / /bsam pa dag cing ngo tsha shes pa yis/ /skye bo rang gi tshul khrims dri med brgyan/ /ji lta ji ltar skye bo chos 'bad pa/ /de lta
<p>42a.2</p>de ltar srung ma khyad par du/ /tshul bzhin mi byed skye bo tshol bar gyur/ /des ni chos las su yang g.yos ma gyur/ /rang gi yul ni de ltar thos gyur nas/ /rgyal po dga' ba'i khyad par brgyan pa ni/ /dga' ba'i gtam snyan rgya cher bsgrags pa yis/ /blon po mgu bar byas nas
<p>42a.3</p>bka' stsal pa/ /nga ni 'bangs rnams bsrung bar rab tu sems/ /de rnams kun kyang da ni sbyin gnas gyur/ /nga ni mchod sbyin byed 'dod ces bsams nas/ /mchod sbyin phyir ni nor rdzas bsags pa 'di/ /gang zhig bde ba bskyed pa'i nor gang 'dod/ /nga yi drung nas 'di
<p>42a.4</p>dag ci bder khyer/ /'di ltar nga yi yul ni dben spyod pa'i/ /dbul ba ci nas yul na med par 'gyur/ /'bangs rnams bsrung bar sems par nga 'dug cing / /grogs ldan yo byad phun sum tshogs bzhin du/ /skye bo phongs byed nga ni mi bzod pa/ /nga yi sems ni yang yang
<p>42a.5</p>bsregs pa bzhin/ /de nas rgyal po de'i blon po rnams legs so snyam nas de'i tshig mnyan te/ /grong dang ljongs dang grong khyer thams cad dang lam gyi ngal bso ba'i sa phyogs thams cad du sbyin btang gi khang pa brtsigs nas/ rgyal pos ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du/ 
<p>42a.6</p>nyin re zhing phongs pa rnams ci 'dod pa'i nor gyis mgu bar byas so/ /de nas skye bo de dag dbul bor te/ /sa bdag las ni mthun par nor thob nas/ /rnam mang gos dar rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/ /dga' ston bzhin du bzang pos brgyan par gyur/ /phongs pa rab tu dga'
<p>42a.7</p>nas bstod pa'i tshig /rgyal po'i grags pa phyogs su rgyas gyur pa/ /mtsho las pad+ma'i ge sar phye ma dang / /rlabs kyis bskyod de kun tu khyab pa bzhin/ /de ltar rgyal po'i tshul bzang yon tan gzhis/ /skye bo ma lus legs par spyod gyur pas/ /dge ba chen
<p>42b</p>
<p>42b.1</p>pos gnod pa rnams kyi mthu/ /zil gyis mnan nas chags med zad par gyur/ /dus tshigs rnams kyang dus la mthun par bde/ /rgyal po de bzhin chos la gzhol bar gyur/ /sa gzhi 'bru rnams sna tshogs skye bar gyur/ /chu bzhi chu gtsang sngon po pad+mar bcas/ /
<p>42b.2</p>'gro ba nad chen dag gis mi 'debs gyur/ /sman rnams yon tan rab tu che bar gyur/ /dus tshigs dbang gis ser bu'i ngad kyang ldang / /gza' rnams lam ni bzang por rgyu bar gyur/ /gzhan gyi dmag gi 'jigs pa med par gyur/ /phan tshun gnod dang dmag gi 'jigs
<p>42b.3</p>pa med/ /skye bo nges par chos spyod dul gyur pas/ /rdzogs ldan dus bzhin phun sum tshogs par gyur/ /de nas rgyal pos de ltar chos kyi mchod sbyin byas pa dang / /skye bo phongs pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal dang / gnod pa rnams ni rab tu zhi bar gyur/ sa gzhi ni skye bo rab
<p>42b.4</p>tu dga' ba mang pos gang zhing mngon par mtho ba nyams dga' bar ni snang / 'jig rten pa rnams ni rgyal po'i shis pa brjod pa 'ba' zhig kha ton du byed/ rgyal po'i grags pas ni thams cad du rgyas par gyur pa dang / blon po'i gtso bo cig yid rab tu dga' bar gyur nas rgyal po
<p>42b.5</p>la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma yi/ /dgos pa rtag tu gzigs pas na/ /dbang phyug rnams kyi blo dag ni/ /gong nas gong du dpyod par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba 'di ni legs par smras pa legs so/ /'di ltar lha'i zhal snga nas phyugs 'gum pa'i
<p>42b.6</p>skyon ma mchis par/ chos kyi mchod sbyin gyis 'bangs rnams 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa gnyis ka la phan par bgyis so/ gnod pa dang dbul ba'i sdug bsngal yang rab tu zhi bar gyur te/ mang du gsol yang ci 'tshal te/ 'bangs de dag ni skal ba dang ldan pa lags
<p>42b.7</p>so/ /zla ba bzhin du sku la dri med 'od gsal zhing / /dbang bskur sdom pas rang bzhin mdzes pa'i spyod pa yongs ma zhum/ /spyi bo gdugs dang 'dra ba'i dbu mdzes bskyil ba de bzhin gnas/ /khyod kyi gtong bas brgya byin grags pa rmad byung zil gyis non/ /'jig rten mchod sbyin
<p>43a</p>
<p>43a.1</p>phal cher gsod cing smad/ /'bras bu 'tshal bas mchod sbyin ma lags kyi/ /khyod kyi mchod sbyin grags pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /tshul khrims skyon med yid du 'ong dang mthun/ /gang rnams skyob pa khyod bzhugs pa'i/ /skye dgu de rnams skal dang ldan/ /
<p>43a.2</p>bu rnams la yang pha dag ni/ /nges par de ltar skyob mi 'gyur/ /gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ sbyin zhes bya ba nor yang ster ba'i skye bo de yi dbang du gyur/ /tshul khrims bsrung ba'ang 'jig rten bde la phyogs shing mtho ris 'dod la chags/ /gzhan gyi don bsgrub phyir ni de gnyis
<p>43a.3</p>de bzhin spyod pa gang lags pa/ /mkhas pa ma lags sems stobs mi ldan pa la de dag yod ma mchis/ /de lta bas na bsam pa dge ba rnams ni/ sdig pa byed du gzhug par bslur mi tshugs pas bsam pa dag par bya ba la 'bad par bya'o/ /de bas 'bangs la phan brtson pa/ /
<p>43a.4</p>legs dang grags dang bde ba thob/ /de bas rgyal po'i tshul de las/ /'gal bar bya ba yongs mi rigs/ /de bzhin du rgyal po'i gdams ngag la yang brjod par bya'o/ /chos la goms par byas pa ni/ skye dgu rnams longs spyod che bar 'gyur bas na/ longs spyod che bar
<p>43a.5</p>'dod pas chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o zhes de ltar yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /mngon par mtho ba ni sbyin pa dang dul ba dang sdom pa la gnas pas thob par 'gyur gyi/ phyugs bsad pas ni nam yang mngon par mtho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas na de 'dod pas sbyin pa la sogs pa
<p>43a.6</p>la gus bar 'bad par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de ni sku tshe snga ma la yang 'jig rten gyi don spyod pa la thugs gzhol ba yin no/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa la yang brjod par bya'o/ /mchod sbyin gyi skyes pa'i rabs te bcu pa'o/ /sdom la/ 
<p>43a.7</p>stag mo shi bi kos la bdag /tshong dpon gnyis dang ri bong dang / /a gas+t+ya dang sha sbyin dang / /thams cad sgrol dang mchod sbyin byed/ /bcu tshan dang po'o// //bdag nyid chen po rnams ni rgud par gyur tam/ dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par gyur kyang rung
<p>43b</p>
<p>43b.1</p>ste/ sems can rnams la snying brtse ba lhod par mi 'gyur/ de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' yun ring po nas bsod nams spyod pa la rab tu goms shing sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / sdom pa dang / snying rje la 'dris par gyur pa/ gzhan la phan par spyod pa khyad
<p>43b.2</p>par can la nges par byed pa de re zhig lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin du gyur to zhes grags so/ /lha dbang dpal ni de la brten byas pas/ /gzi byin chen pos lhag par mdzes gyur pa/ /yang thog rdo thal gsar du bskus pa la/ /zla ba'i 'od zer phog pas gsal ba bzhin/ /
<p>43b.3</p>gang phyir lha ma yin rnams tsham tshom med par ni/ /phyogs kyi glang chen mche ba lto bas zed 'ong ba/ /skal ba che bas bde ba thob pa'i dpal de ni/ /de snying dregs pa'i dri ma can du byed par gyur/ /de lha'i yul dang mi'i yul legs par bskyangs pa las gyur pa'i grags pa
<p>43b.4</p>phun sum tshogs pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi mthas klas pa rmad du byung ba'i dpal de lha ma yin rnams kyis ma bzod nas/ glang po che dang shing rta dang / rta dang rkang thang gi dmag bshams te ches pa rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar snang ba/ sgra 'jigs 'jigs skad sgrogs pas/ 
<p>43b.5</p>rgya mtsho 'khrug par byed pa/ mtshon cha dang go cha dri ma med pa bgos pas 'bar 'bar ltar 'dug pa/ mig gis mi bzod pa'i dpung gi tshogs chen po dang bcas te/ de la dmag rgol du lhags so/ /chos kyi bdag nyid yin yang de la gzhan bsngo ba/ /rol pa'i gegs gyur
<p>43b.6</p>yid 'byung 'gro ba 'jigs par gyur/ /gzi brjid can gyis tshul bzhin bya ba rigs pas na/ /snying ni dmag drangs g.yengs la mngon par phyogs par gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po des/ gser gyi shing rta dam pa rta bzang
<p>43b.7</p>po stong dang sbyar ba/ gos bzang po 'os pas brgyan pa'i ba dan mdzes pa phyar ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od gsal bar snang ba/ lus 'bar ba rgyan gdags pa'i go rims nges par byas pa/ ngos gnyis mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs 'bar bas mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i gos dkar po
<p>44a</p>
<p>44a.1</p>can gyi steng na 'dug nas/ rta dang glang po che dang / shing rta dang rkang thang rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha'i dmag gi dpung chen pos yongs su bskor nas/ lha ma yin gyi dmag gi dpung tshogs de rgya mtsho'i 'gram du thug par bsus so/ /de nas der ni g.yul
