<p>44a.2</p>bsres pas/ /sdar ma rnams ni skrag par byed/ /phan tshun mtshon 'debs phye mar lhags/ /go cha rnams ni ral bar gyur/ /nga ni 'di na 'dug bzhin du/ /mthong bzhin thar pa ga la 'gyur/ /thob shig 'di ni med zin to/ /de ltar phan tshun dmyal 'drar gyur/ /de nas
<p>44a.3</p>mtshon cha 'khrug pa yi/ /sgra chen g.yul ni bsres pa dang / /rnga brdungs sgra ni grag pa yis/ /nam mkha'i ngos ni ral ba bzhin/ /brag ltar 'jigs pa'i glang chen dag /phan tshun 'thab mo 'gyed pa yi/ /rdul gyi dri ni mi bzod pa/ /dus mtha'i rlung gis g.yos pa
<p>44a.4</p>bzhin/ /glog ltar 'gyu ba'i ba dan can/ /shing rta'i sgra chen grag pa ni/ /phyogs rnams kun tu khyab gyur pa/ /sprin chen glo bur langs pa bzhin/ /phan tshun mda' rnams 'phangs pa yis/ /lha dang lha min dpa' bo yi/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan go cha dang / /cod pan
<p>44a.5</p>dag ni 'gyel bar gyur/ /de nas lha min mda' 'phangs bsdad pa dang / /lha dbang dpung ni 'jigs pas byer bar gyur/ /dgra yi dpung ni shing rtas rnam bcil nas/ /lha dbang gcig pu g.yul ngor 'then par gyur/ /de nas lha ma yin gyi dpung rab tu dga' bas shin
<p>44a.6</p>tu nga rgyal bar gyur te/ ca co'i sgra chen po seng ge'i sgra bzhin sgrogs pa mthong ba dang / lha'i dbang po'i kha lo sgyur ba ma ta lis bdag cag gi dpung bros par gyur pa mthong nas/ da ni slar log pa'i dus la bab po snyam nas lha'i dbang po'i shing rta slar bzlog go /de nas
<p>44a.7</p>lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shing shal ma li la nam mkha' lding gi tshang bcas pa cig shing rta drangs pa'i gnya' shing gi rtse mos phog par gyur pa'i steng du bab pa mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu sems snying rje la dmigs pas kha lo sgyur ba ma ta li la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
<p>44b</p>
<p>44b.1</p>shal ma li yi shing la bya tshang dag /bcas pa'i nang na byi'u phrug ma tshar ba/ /'khod pa 'di ni shing rta'i gnya' shing gis/ /phog nas mi lhung bar ni shing rta drangs/ /ma ta lis smras pa/ 'phags pa lha ma yin gyi dmag 'di dag da rung slar mi ldog go/ /brgya byin gyis
<p>44b.2</p>smras pa/ 'o na 'di ci nyes nam mkha' lding gi tshang 'di dag las legs par zungs shig /ma ta lis smras pa/ shing rta 'di ni slad du ldog na 'dod/ /bya rnams la ni rab tu phan gyur na/ /lha rnams la ni gnas nas skabs rnyed pa'i/ /dgra yi dmag tshogs 'di dag mngon
<p>44b.3</p>phyogs mchis/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin snying rje'i dbang gis rang gi lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par can/ snying stobs kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir smras pa/ sems can 'jigs pas nyen pa 'di bsad phyir/ /smod pa'i gtam ngan phog cing gsod pa bas/ /lha
<p>44b.4</p>min mtshon gyis phog ste shi yang sla/ /de bas shing rta slad du bzlog par byos/ /de nas ma ta lis de ltar bgyi'o zhes mnyan nas/ de'i shing rta rta stong dang ldan pa slar ldog go/ /dgra rnams kyis ni de yi mthu mthong zhing / /shing rta g.yul ngor slar log mthong ba dang / /char
<p>44b.5</p>sprin nag po rlung gis gtor ba bzhin/ /skrag nas rtab bzhin rab tu mgyogs par byed/ /bdag gi dmag tshogs pham yang slar log cing / /dgra yi dmag tshogs lam ni bkag ste 'then/ /gcig pur gyur kyang rab tu dpa' srid pas/ /dgra rnams dregs pa spa
<p>44b.6</p>ni bkong bar gyur/ /lha min dpung de pham par gyur mthong nas/ /lha dbang dpung yang de nas slar log gyur/ /lha yi dgra rnams 'jigs nas byer gyur pa/ /de nas slar log phod pa yongs ma gyur/ /lha rnams dga' zhing ngo yang mtshar bzhin du/ /lha yi dbang
<p>44b.7</p>po la ni phyag kyang byed/ /rgyal ba'i dpal gyis rab mdzes mdangs gsal zhing / /sras rnams dga' ba'i mkhar gyi nang du song / /de ltar de nyid de'i g.yul las rnam par rgyal bar gyur to/ /de bas na gsung rab las kyang / ngan pa rnams ni snying rje med par sdig pa
<p>45a</p>
<p>45a.1</p>spyod/ /blo 'bring rnams ni phongs na snying rjer bcas shing spyod/ /skye bo dge ba rnams ni srog dang bral gyur kyang / /rgya mtsho'i dus bzhin rang gi tshul dang 'gal mi byed/ /de ltar lha'i rgyal srid dang srog kyang bor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yun ring
<p>45a.2</p>po nas sems can rnams yongs su bskyangs pas na/ /shes rab can gyis de dag la/ 'dir ngan sems bskyed pa'ang mi rigs na/ gnod par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de bas na 'phags pa rnams kyis ni srog chags rnams la snying rje dang ldan par bya ba rigs so/ /
<p>45a.3</p>de lta bas na chos spyod pa rnams ni chos nyid srung bar byed do zhes gsungs pa dang yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa dang / rim gro bskyed de chos mnyan pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /brgya byin gyi skyes pa'i rabs te bcu gcig pa'o// //
<p>45a.4</p>skyes bu dam pa rnams ni bdag ngo tsha ba nyid kyis spyod tshul gyi dus las mi 'da'o/ /de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' bram ze'i rigs chen po rus dang spyod pa ma smad pa/ rang gi chos la spyod pa'i sgra grag pa dang 'dul ba dang spyod tshul bzang po cig tu skye ba yongs su bzung bar
<p>45a.5</p>gyur to zhes grags so/ /de go rims bzhin du skyes nas khrus bya ba dang / skra mtshams dbye ba dang / btsas pa'i cho ga bya ba la sogs pa yongs su sbyangs nas/ rig byed bslab pa'i phyir/ bla ma thos pa dang rigs btsun pa dang / spyod tshul phun sum tshogs pa cig la bcar
<p>45a.6</p>te gnas par gyur to/ /des ni thos pa slob cing 'dzin gsal dang / /rang rigs grags dang gus dang dul ba dang / /lang tshos che yang zhi zhing chos bzang bas/ /de la bla ma byams shing dga' bar gyur/ /yon tan dbang du byed pa'i sngags/ /rtag tu ma nyams mthu dang
<p>45a.7</p>ldan/ /zhe sdang 'khrugs pa dbang byed na/ /tha mal sems lta smos ci dgos/ /de nas de'i mkhan po dang slob ma thams cad kyi ngang tshul brtag pa'i phyir/ bsang ba'i dus dag tu bdag nyid dbul ba'i sdug bsngal rtag tu bsgrags so/ /dbul ba 'bras bu re ba med/ /
<p>45b</p>
<p>45b.1</p>bdag gi mi la smra med cing / /dga' ston tshe yang dga' mi myong / /kyi hud sbyin pa'i gtam yang zhan/ /sma dbab gnas gyur nyon mongs ngal ba'i rgyu/ /bde ba yongs spangs shin tu mi brjid pa/ /nyams nyes bzhin du rtag tu mya ngan byed/ /nor med gyur pa shin tu 'jigs
<p>45b.2</p>su rung / /de nas nga'i slob ma de dag rta bzang po la lcag gis bskul ba bzhin du/ bla ma la byams pas mi dga' bar gyur to/ /bsod snyoms rab tu bzang zhing shin tu mang du byung ngo / /des de dag la smras pa/ bsod snyoms kyi zas kyis su'i dbul phongs pa yang phyed
<p>45b.3</p>par mi 'gyur gyi/ khyed cag nyon mongs par byed pa 'di thong shig /nga nyon mongs pa mi bzod na/ khyod kyis nor bsgrub pa la 'bad par bya ba 'di ni rigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bkres skom zan dang chu yi phyir/ /sngags bcas sman gyis nad sos 'gyur/ /rgyun gnas
<p>45b.4</p>nor gyis dbul por 'gyur/ /thabs kyis nor btsal dbul ba 'dor/ /slob ma rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag skal ba chung bas 'di tsam las lhag par rngo mi thogs na ci ltar bgyi/ gzhan yang / mkhan po nor yang bsod snyoms bzhin/ /gal te rnyed par gyur na ni/ /
<p>45b.5</p>khyod kyis dbul ba'i sdug bsngal 'di/ /de ltar bdag cag ga la bzod/ /bram ze rnams kyis nor bsgrub tu/ /blang ba'i thabs ni rab tu chung / /skye bo 'di yang sbyin mi phod/ /de bas thabs med bdag cag phung / /mkhan pos smras pa/ bram ze rnams la ni nor
<p>45b.6</p>bsgrub pa'i thabs gtsug lag las byung ba gzhan dag kyang yod na/ bdag ni rgas pas mthu med par gyur te de sgrub mi nus so/ /slob ma rnams kyis smras pa/ slob dpon bdag cag ni ma rgas pas mthu nyams par ma gyur na/ gal te gtsug lag las byung ba'i thabs de
<p>45b.7</p>dag bdag cag gis bsgrub tu rung bar dgongs na gsungs shig dang / bdag cag la chos 'chad pa'i drin lan blan par bgyi'o/ /mkhan pos smras pa/ gzhon yang snying la rtsol mi phod pa rnams kyis ni 'di lta bu'i nor bsgrub par dka' mod kyi/ 'on kyang de ltar khyed
<p>46a</p>
<p>46a.1</p>kyis dus kyis 'tshun na legs kyis nyon cig nor bsgrub pa'i rim pa gcig yod pa de yang gang zhe na/ bram ze rgud tshe rku ba chos su 'chad/ /'jig rten na yang nor med rgud pa'i mchog /de bas gzhan nor ma mthong blang bar gyis/ /'di dag kun kyang bram ze'i nor
<p>46a.2</p>yin no/ /mngon sum du ni nor 'phrog nus gyur kyang / /bdag gi grags pas bsrung bar bya dgos so/ /khyed cag lta bus 'di ltar byar mi rung / /de bas de ltar ma mthong bsgrub par bya/ /de ltar des bsdam pa glod pa dang / slob ma de dag gis de'i tshig de mi rigs kyang / 
<p>46a.3</p>rigs pa bzhin du de ltar bgyi'o zhes mnyan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig ni ma gtogs so/ /de la rang bzhin dge bas na/ /de la rjes su yi mi rang / /de dag gis ni ma brtags par/ /byar rung bzhin du khas blangs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni ngo tsha bas
<p>46a.4</p>mgo smad de cung zad cig shugs nar zhes phyung nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /de nas de dag gi mkhan po des byang chub sems dpa' de cho ga bstan pa de la dga' bar yang ma gyur/ slar ldog par yang ma gyur pa mthong nas/ sems dpa' chen po de la yon tan zhig yod par bsams nas/ 
<p>46a.5</p>'dis ci stsol mi phod dam/ nga la mi byams sam/ 'on kyang chos kyi 'du shes kyis rkun po byed du mi btub bam snyam nas de'i rang bzhin brtag pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ kye bram ze chen po/ /bram ze 'di rnams nga rgud mi bzod pas/ /mi rnams dpa' bo'i
<p>46a.6</p>lam la brten par gyur/ /khyod ni spro ba med cing blun par mngon/ /nga rgud pas ni nges par ma gdungs so/ /nga yi sdug bsngal rgya cher rab bsgrags shing / /tshig tu smras pas ma bcabs bstan gyur kyang / /khyod ni ji ltar mi bsgrim brten gyur na/ /de ltar tha mal bzhin du gnas
<p>46a.7</p>par gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas gus pa dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te/ mkhan po la smras pa/ sdig pa zhi bar gyur cig /bdag ni mi byams shing snying sra ba'i phyir bla ma'i sdug bsngal gyis ma gdungs te/ 'di ltar ma mchis pa ma lags kyis/ mkhan pos bstan pa'i
<p>46b</p>
<p>46b.1</p>rim pa 'di mi srid pa'i phyir 'di ltar mchis so/ /sus kyang ma mthong bar sdig pa spyad du rung ba ni gang yang ma mchis so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dben pa ni mi srid pa'i slad du'o/ /sdig pa'i las rnams byed pa na/ /'jig rten na ni dben pa med/ /mi snang ba yi 'byung po rnams/ /mi
<p>46b.2</p>rnams la ni lta bar byed/ /lha yi spyan ni phye ba yis/ /thub pa bdag nyid sbyangs pa rnams/ /de yis ma mthong dben snyam nas/ /byis pa sdig pa spyod la 'jug /bdag gis gang na'ang bstod pa ni/ /cung zad mchis par ma mthong ngo / /gang na gzhan dag mi snang ba/ /de ni
<p>46b.3</p>bdag gis stong ma lags/ /nyes byas gzhan gyis mthong ba dang / /gang yang bdag gis mthong ba dag /bdag gis mthong ba gang yin pa/ /de ni legs par mthong ba yin/ /bdag gi dgos pas yid ni g.yengs gyur phyir/ /pha rol spyod pas gzhan gyis mi mthong srid/ /
<p>46b.4</p>bdag ni chags pas rtse gcig yid gyur phyir/ /sdig pa byed pa nges par rigs par gyur/ /de yi slad du bdag ni de ltar mchis par ma gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas mkhan po'i yid dga' bar rig nas/ yang smras pa/ khyod ni de ltar nor gyi phyir zhugs par/ /bdag
<p>46b.5</p>gi tshig la nges par mi 'dzin to/ /skyon dang yon tan bye brag shes gyur pa/ /su zhig nor phyir yon tan chung gson byed/ /lha dbang phyir yang ngo tsha bor nas ni/ /yid la chos dang 'gal bar byed pa las/ /gyo mo'i snod thogs gos ngan gon nas ni/ /dgra yi khyim na 'byor pa bslong
<p>46b.6</p>yang sla/ de nas de'i mkhan po snying rab tu dga' zhing ya mtshan du gyur nas stan las langs te/ de la lag pas 'khyud nas smras pa/ bu legs so legs so bram ze chen po legs so/ /khyod kyi shes rab rab tu zhi bas brgyan pa 'di la don de rigs so/ /byis pa rnams ni
<p>46b.7</p>mtshan ma cung zad la/ /brten nas rang gi chos lam 'dor par byed/ /dka' thub thob dang shes pa'i nor ldan pa/ /dge ba rnams ni phongs kyang mi 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis rang rigs dri med brgyan pa 'di/ /ston zla shar bas nam mkha' brgyan pa bzhin/ /khyod kyi thos pa rnams
<p>47a</p>
<p>47a.1</p>ni don dang ldan/ /nga yis 'bad pa'i nor yang legs par 'byung / /de bas na skyes bu dam pa rnams ni/ /de ltar bdag ngo tsha ba nyid kyi spyod yul gyis dus las 'da' bar mi byed do/ /de bzhin du 'phags pa rnams kyis kyang ngo tsha shes pa'i stobs dang
<p>47a.2</p>ldan par bya ba'i rigs so/ /de bzhin du 'phags pa nyan thos rnams ni ngo tsha shes pa'i 'obs kyis bskor bas mi dge ba rab tu spong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa ngo tshe shes pa'i bsngags pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dang 'jig rten la dbang byed pa'i mdo sde dag la yang
<p>47a.3</p>sbyar bar bya'o/ /bram zer skyes pa'i rabs te bcu gnyis pa'o// //skyes bu dam pa rnams ni bdag rang sran thub pas brtan pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi bzad pas gdungs kyang lam ngan par 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' bden pa dang
<p>47a.4</p>gtong ba dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / shes rab la sogs pa'i yon tan khyad par can rnams kyis 'jig rten la phan par brtson pa de/ re zhig cig yul shi bi pa rnams kyi rgyal por gyur to/ /zhes grags so/ /chos dang 'dul ba las mngon sum du gyur pa bzhin skye dgu rnams la
<p>47a.5</p>pha dang 'dra bar phan 'dogs nus par gyur to/ /nyes pa spyod las rnam par bzlog pa dang / /yon tan 'phel ba rab tu dgongs pa'i phyir/ /rgyal po des ni pha yis bu dag bzhin/ /'jig rten gnyis kar mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur/ /nang gi mi dang phyi mi 'dra bar snyoms/ /de
<p>47a.6</p>yi bka' khrims chos dang rjes su mthun/ /skye bo'i chos min lam ni bsgribs nas su/ /mtho ris lam ni them skas rim pa bzhin/ /'jig rten phan pa chos ldan de mthong nas/ /mi rnams skyong ba chos rnams 'ba' zhig spyod/ /rnam pa kun tu chos kyi lam la dga'/ /gzhan
<p>47a.7</p>gyi chos la gnod byas yongs mi bzod/ /rgyal po chen po de'i blon po chen po'i bu mo zhig dpal mo gzugs dang ldan pa bzhin/ dga' ba mngon sum gyur pa bzhin/ lha'i bu mo bzhin gzugs dang gzi mdangs mchog dang ldan pa/ blta na sdug pa/ bud med rin po che rab tu bkur
<p>47b</p>
<p>47b.1</p>ba zhig yod par gyur to/ /'dod chags ma bral bas ni de yi lus/ /ji srid mthong bar gyur pa de srid du/ /de yi gzugs dang yon tan rnams la chags/ /de yi lta ba bzlog par yong mi nus/ /de bas na gnyen rnams kyis kyang / de'i ming myos byed ma zhes btags so/ /
<p>47b.2</p>de nas de'i phas rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha khyed kyi yul du bud med rin po che zhig byung bar gyur na/ phyag tu bzhes sam mi bzhes pa lha nyid mkhyen to zhes gsol to/ /de nas rgyal po des bud med kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas pa'i bram ze rnams la 'di ci la 'os pa yin
<p>47b.3</p>nam ma yin khyed kyis ltos shig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas bu mo de'i phas bram ze de dag rang gi khyim du phyin nas myos byed ma la/ bzang mo khyod rang gis bram ze rnams la kha zas drangs shig ces smras pa dang / bu mo des de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes mnyan nas/ bram ze rnams la go rims
<p>47b.4</p>bzhin du kha zas drangs so/ /de nas bram ze de dag de'i gdong du mig mi 'dzums par lta/ 'dod chags kyis ni brten pa nyams par gyur/ /mig dang yid la dbang yang med par gyur/ /'dod pas myos nas 'du shes nyams par gyur/ /gang gi tshe brtan cing mi g.yo bar
<p>47b.5</p>'khod par yang gnas ma nus par gyur pa de'i tshe/ kha zas bza' ba lta ga la nus te/ de nas khyim bdag des rang gi bu mo de dag gi mig lam du mi snang bar byas te/ bdag nyid kyis bram ze rnams la kha zas byin te slar gyis so/ /de nas de dag gis bsams pa/ 'di ni
<p>47b.6</p>bcos ma'i gzugs yin no/ /bu mo 'di'i gzugs byad ni yid 'phrog par byed pa zhig go /'di ni rgyal pos gzigs par bya ba yang mi rigs na/ btsun mo 'bul du lta ga la rung / 'di byad bzhin bzang ches pas gdon mi za bar rgyal po de sems myos nas chos dang srid
<p>47b.7</p>kyi don bsgrub pa la g.yel bar 'gyur zhing / rgyal po'i don bsgrub rgyu dus las yol bas 'bangs rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i lam chad de 'dis phung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ni mthong bar gyur pa tsam gyis kyang / /drang song rnams la'ang dngos grub gegs gyur na/ /
<p>48a</p>
<p>48a.1</p>'dod chags can gyi mig la lang tshor ldan/ /rgyal po bde bar gnas pa smos ci dgos/ /de bas na da ni dus la bab po snyam nas/ skabs cig tu rgyal po'i spyan sngar song ste/ rgyal po chen po bu mo de bdag gis mthong ste/ de'i byad gzugs ni rab tu bzang
<p>48a.2</p>la mtshan ngan te/ /dpal dang mi ldan pa zhig lags pas/ rgyal pos gzigs su mi rung na/ /khab tu bgyid lta ga la rung / /smad pa'i bud med khyim ni gnyis kar yang / /grags pa dang ni 'byor pa med par byed/ /mtshan mo'i zla ba sprin rum nub pa ni/ /gnam sa'i bye
<p>48a.3</p>brag mdzes pa med pa bzhin/ /rgyal pos de'i don thos nas bu mo de mtshan ngan zhes grags pas/ nga'i rigs dang mthun pa ma yin no snyam nas de la chags pa med par gyur to/ /rgyal pos mi bzhed par shes nas/ khyim bdag de'i bu mo de rgyal po de nyid kyi blon po cig la
<p>48a.4</p>byin no/ /de nas re zhig cig rgyal po de mthar gyis rang gi grong khyer na me tog ku mu ta'i dga' ston bzang po byung ba la lta bar 'dod nas shing rta mchog la zhon te grong khyer gyi lam po che srang dang tshong khang thams cad phyag dar byas shing chag chag gdab pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
<p>48a.5</p>mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ sa'i steng thog dag me tog sil mas bkram pa glu gar dang bzhad gad dang / rtsed mo dang sil snyan sgrogs pa/ me tog dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / phreng ba dang / khrus dang / byug spos kyi
<p>48a.6</p>bsung zhim po'i ngad ldang ba/ tshong zong bzang ba rnam pa mang po bkram pa/ grong khyer gyi mi dar zhing dga' la chas rab tu bzang ba rnams kyis gang ba'i grong khyer mchog gi nang nas song song ba las/ blon po de'i khyim dang nye ba cig tu phyin pa dang / de nas myos byed mas bsams pa/ 
<p>48a.7</p>bdag ni rgyal po 'dis mtshan ngan zhes btags nas spongs so snyam ste/ snying na bzhin du rgyal po la lta 'dod pa 'dra bar byas nas lus byad mdzes par bstan nas/ sprin gyi steng na glog 'gyu ba bzhin du/ yang thog gi steng na rab tu gsal bar snang bar byas te 'dug go /da
<p>48b</p>
<p>48b.1</p>bdag lta bu mtshan ngan pa mthong na/ 'di'i dran pa rnam par g.yo ba/ bdag rang gis 'dzin nus sam mi nus lta'o snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po des grong khyer mchog brgyan pa la bltas pa las/ bu mo de mig snga na 'dug pa mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po des/ pho brang steng
<p>48b.2</p>du na chung bzang mo yi/ /lus bzang ches pa tshim par mthong gyur cing / /chos lam rjes su dga' bas ma 'phyar la/ /dbang po dul bar byed la brtson gyur cing / /brten pa'i yon tan che la ngo tsha shes/ /gzhan gyi bud med lta la ma smos kyang / /'dod chags langs
<p>48b.3</p>shing ya mtshan cher gyur nas/ /bud med de la mig gis ring zhig bltas/ /'di ci ku mu ta yin nam/ /'on te khyim 'di'i lha yin nam/ /lha 'am lha min chung ma yin/ /'di ni mi lus ma yin no/ /snyam nas/ /rgyal pos de ltar dpyod dpyod nas de la bltas pas tshim
<p>48b.4</p>par ma gyur bzhin du/ shing rta de phyogs de nas thal byung du byed pa dang yid la mi 'bab par gyur te/ de nas rgyal po de snying stor ba bzhin du de la sems rtse gcig tu gyur zhing bdag gi gnas su phyin pa dang / /'dod chags kyis brten pa med par gyur pa dang / kha lo sgyur
<p>48b.5</p>ba rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba la gsang ste smras pa/ phyi ra dkar pos bskor ba yi/ /khyim de su'i yin khyod shes sam/ /sprin dkar steng na glog bzhin du/ /de na mdzes pa su zhig yin/ kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha nyid kyi blon po a b+hi pa ra ka zhes bgyi ba zhig
<p>48b.6</p>mchis te/ khyim de ni de'i lags so/ /bu mo de yang de nyid kyi mchis 'brang lags te/ ki rI ta bAt+pa zhes bgyi ba'i bu mo myos byed ma zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /rgyal po des de skad ces thos nas/ gzhan gyi chung ma yin no snyam ste re thag chad nas sems khong du chud nas
<p>48b.7</p>mig rtsa dang mdangs nyams shing shugs nar gyis phyung nas/ de la sems chags pa bzhin du dal bus bdag rang la smras pa/ e ma'o 'di ming 'di ltar btags pa ni/ /don dang rjes su mthun zhing tshig kyang snyan/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs dkar myos byed ma zhes pa/ /'di
<p>49a</p>
<p>49a.1</p>ltar bdag ni myos pa bzhin du byed/ /de ni bzhed par bdag 'dod na/ /sems kyis mthong ba bzhin du gyur/ /bdag gi sems ni de la gnas/ /sems ni de yi dbang du gyur/ /gzhan gyi chung ma yin pa la/ /bdag kyang de ltar mi brten par/ /de ni myos
<p>49a.2</p>te ngo tsha dang / /bral ba bzhin du gnyid dang bral/ /de yi lus bzang chas shing 'greng dang ldan pa la/ /chags pas rtse gcig yid du gyur zhing 'dug pa'i tshe/ /don sgrub go rims sbron pa'i chab tshod sgra grags pa'i/ /chab tshod de ni nga yi sems la zhe sdang ldang / /de ltar rgyal po de
<p>49a.3</p>'dod pas myos pa'i mthu brten pa ni nyams/ /bdag rang gis brnag ste bor yang mdangs ni ser skyar gyur cing lus kyang sha bri srab mor gyur/ sems khong du chud cing shugs nar gyis phyung ba la/ glal ba yang dang yang du ni byung / 'dod chags kyis myos par gyur pa'i rnam pa ni
<p>49a.4</p>rab tu mngon par gyur to/ /brtan pa chen pos brnags shing bsgrims byas kyang / /rgyal po de yi yid ni gyur pa de/ /sems khong chud pa'i mig dang bzhin mdangs dang / /sha bri srab mor gyur pas rab tu mngon par gyur/ /de nas blon po a b+hi pa ra ka brda dang mtshan ma la mkhas
<p>49a.5</p>pa des/ rgyal po de de ltar gyur par shes nas snying nye bas rgyal po ma rung bar gyur du dogs pa dang / 'dod chags kyang mthu che bar shes nas rgyal po la zhus te/ nang du mchis par gnang ba dang / dben par gsang ste gsol pa/ da nang bdag ni lha mchod bgyis pa'i tshe/ /gnod
<p>49a.6</p>sbyin zhig gis mngon sum mchis nas su/ /myos byed ma la rgyal po'i thugs chags pa/ /khyod kyis mi shes sam zhes bdag la mchis/ /de skad smras nas mod la mi snang gyur/ /bdag ni rtog pa skyes nas 'dir mchis lags/ /de ltar med na lha gcig 'di lta bu/ /ci yi
<p>49a.7</p>slad du bdag la bka' mi stsal/ /de bas na lha bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bu mo 'di phyag tu bzhes par rigs so/ /de nas rgyal po de ltas kyis bskul bas ngo tsha ste/ mgo smad nas 'dod chags kyi dbang du gyur kyang / chos la sems rab tu goms pa'i phyir brten pa
<p>49b</p>
<p>49b.1</p>nyams par mi 'dod pa'i tshig rab tu gsal bas de la smras pa/ de ni mi rigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams nyams gyur bdag kyang mi 'chi min/ /bdag gi sdig 'di'ang gzhan gyis shes par 'gyur/ /de dang bral bas 'gyod par 'gyur ba'i mes/ /khyod kyi
<p>49b.2</p>sems kyang rtswa bzhin bsreg par 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol gnyis ka la/ /bdag cag gnyis la de ltar gnod pa'i las/ /gang phyir mi mkhas bsten par byed gyur pa/ /de phyir mkhas pas bsten par yong mi byed/ /a b+hi pa ra kas smras pa/ lha chos dang
<p>49b.3</p>'gal bar dogs pa mi mdzad du gsol/ /sbyin pa bgyid pa'i grogs bgyid pas/ /khyod la bsod nams nyid du 'gyur/ /de ni bdag las ma bzhes na/ /sbyin la gegs pas chos min 'gyur/ /lha las bka' mchid ngan pa'i skabs kyang ma mthong ngo / /de ci'i
<p>49b.4</p>slad du zhe na/ 'o skol gnyis las ma gtogs pa/ /gzhan ni su zhig 'di shes 'gyur/ /de bas mi yis khrel gyur pa'i/ /thugs la dgongs pa ma mdzad cig /de ltar bgyis na bdag la phan yon btags par 'gyur gyi gnod par ni mi 'gyur ro/ /rje yi don du spyad pas
<p>49b.5</p>mgu ba yis/ /sems la khyab par gyur na ga la gnod/ /de bas thugs la bzhes pa don bcas mdzod/ /bdag la gnod par dogs pa khyod ma mdzad/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ sdig pa zhi bar gyur cig /nga la rab tu byams pa'i phyir/ /khyod kyis de ni ma brtags
<p>49b.6</p>so/ /'di ltar sbyin pa thams cad du/ /chos bsgrub pa yi grogs ma yin/ /rab tu byams pas nga yi phyir/ /srog kyang phangs par mi lta bar/ /gnyen pas lhag pa de lta bu'i/ /grogs po'i chung ma grogs mo yin/ /de bas na de lta bu byed du bcug pa mi rigs so/ /gang
<p>49b.7</p>yang 'di gzhan sus kyang shes par mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer ba de yang / 'di ci sdig tu mi 'gyur ram/ ma mthong bar ni sdig pa byas pa dag /dug zos bzhin du bde bar ci ltar 'gyur/ /lha dang rnal 'byor can gyi mig dag ni/ /rnam dag mig gis mi mthong mi srid do/ /
<p>50a</p>
<p>50a.1</p>gzhan yang / de ni khyod la mi phangs zhe'am/ /de ni btang ma thag tu yang / /sdug bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhes/ /su zhig de la yid ches 'gyur/ /a b+hi pa ra kas smras pa/ bdag ni bu smad bcas pa 'bangs/ /khyod ni bdag gi rje dang lha/ /de bas bran mo 'di
<p>50a.2</p>lta la/ /chos dang 'gal ba ci zhig mchis/ /'di bdag la phongs zhes bgyi ba de yang / phangs na phangs su bas mod/ /'di ni bdag la phangs pa lags mod kyi/ /de yi slad du 'di ni khyod la 'bul/ /phangs pa byin na tshe rabs phyi ma la/ /rab tu dga' zhing phangs pa thob par
<p>50a.3</p>'gyur/ /lha de bas na 'di bzhes su gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de ltar byar mi rung gis/ de skad ma zer cig /ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos spyod pa las dpal ni thob gyur na/ /de nyid la yang gnod par byed pa bas/ /bdag ni mtshon cha rnon pos btab pa'am/ /me stag 'phro ba'i
<p>50a.4</p>me nang zhugs kyang sla/ /a b+hi pa ra kas smras pa/ gal te 'di gzhan gyi phyir 'brang lags pa'i slad du/ lha mi bzhes na yang 'di skye bo thams cad kyi btud du rung ba smad 'tshong ma'i tshul 'dzin du 'tshal lo/ /de bas lha 'di bzhes su gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod myos sam
<p>50a.5</p>ci/ skyon med chung ma bor na ni/ /nga yi chad pas bcad ta re/ /smad pa'i gnas su khyod gyur na/ /'di dang pha rol bsreg par 'gyur/ /de bas na byar mi rung ba la/ yus ma che bar rigs pa la dga' bar gyis shig /a b+hi pa ra kas smras pa/ khyod la bde bas bdag yid bder
<p>50a.6</p>gyur na/ /gal te chos dang 'gal bar gyur kyang rung / /skye bos smad cing bde ba nyams kyang rung / /de dag thams cad lto bas bzod par gyis/ /sa bdag chen po 'jig rten 'di na ni/ /khyod las lhag pa'i mgron mchog gzhan ma mthong / /bdag gi bsod nams 'phel phyir myos
<p>50a.7</p>byed ma/ /dus tshigs mchod pa'i yon bzhin bzhes su gsol/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ nga la rab tu byams pa'i phyir/ /bdag la phan pa dang gnod par gyur pa la yang mi lta bar khyod 'di ltar 'bad pa ni nga'i don du spyod pa yin pas/ /de'i phyir yang khyod lhag par yal bar dor du
<p>50b</p>
<p>50b.1</p>mi rung ngo / /'jig rten pas smad pa la yang 'dzem pa med par bya ba'i mi rigs so/ /ltos shig /'jig rten smod pas 'dzem pa med pa dang / /chos dang phyi ma'i 'bras bu mi lta bar/ /gang yin de la skye bo yid mi ches/ /lha dang dpal gyis rab tu spang bar 'gyur/ /de bas na ngas khyod la'ang
<p>50b.2</p>smra'o/ /srog gi phyir ni chos dang ni/ /'gal bar gyur la dga' mi byed/ /nyes pa cher 'gyur gdon mi za/ /legs 'byung chung la dogs dang bcas/ /gzhan yang / dam pa rnams ni pha rol smod la sogs/ /sdug bsngal byas na bdag nyid bde mi 'grub/ /de bas nga ni ci la'ang
<p>50b.3</p>mi gnod par/ /chos la gnas nas bdag gi don grub po/ /a b+hi pa ra kas smras pa/ rje'i don du gus pa'i 'bangs kyis spyad pa 'di la bdag cag la chos ma lags pa'i skabs ci zhig mchis/ 'di bdag gis phul ba lhas ba zhes pa la yang nongs pa ci mchis/ de'i slad du yul
<p>50b.4</p>shi bi pa'i ljongs kyi mi dang bcas pas kyang 'di la chos ma lags pa'i snyad gdags su ci zhig mchis/ de lta bas na lha 'di bzhes su gsol/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod ni nga'i don spyad pa la rab tu gzhol bar nges mod kyi/ 'di la 'o cag gnyis dang / yul shi bi pa'i ljongs
<p>50b.5</p>kyi mi dang bcas pa'i nang na su chos shes pa'i mchog yin pa 'di ni dpyad dgos so/ /de nas a b+hi pa ra kas gus pa dang bcas pas rgyal po la smras pa/ rgan pa bsnyen bkur bya ba byas pa dang / /thos pa mang zhing blo yang rno ba dang / /'khor gsum don gyi mchog nyid rig pa ni/ /lha
<p>50b.6</p>gcig khyod dang bdag po che la mchis/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de bas na 'di la nga bslu bar mi rigs so/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten pa la phan pa dang gnod pa ni rgyal po rnams kyi spyod pa la rag lus te/ de bas 'bangs rnams snying nye bsams nas su/ /gtam snyan 'byung ba'i lam gyi
<p>50b.7</p>mchog dga'/ /khyu mchog 'gro ba drang ngam g.yo ba bzhin/ /rjes su 'gro ba rnams ni dogs med cing / /'khrul pa med par rjes su 'brang ba bzhin/ /'bangs kyang de bzhin rgyal po'i rjes su 'brangs/ /gzhan yang khyod ltos shig /nga bdag rang yang srung ba ni/ /gang tshe nus
<p>51a</p>
<p>51a.1</p>par ma gyur pa/ /de tshe nga yis bsrung 'dod pa'i/ /skye bo rnams ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /de ltar 'bangs la phan par lta ba dang / /bdag gi chos dang grags pa dri med la/ /bltas nas sems kyi dbang du nga mi 'gro/ /khyu mchog bzhin du nga ni 'bangs kyi mgon/ /
<p>51a.2</p>de nas blon po a b+hi pa ra kas/ rgyal po sran tshugs par de mgu nas/ rgyal po la phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar te smras pa/ gang rnams bsrung ba'i rgyal po khyod bzhugs pa'i/ /e ma ho 'bangs rnams skal ba phun sum tshogs/ /chos la bgyis shing bde la ma chags pa/ /de
<p>51a.3</p>lta bu ni dka' thub nags na'ang dkon/ /rgyal po chen po chen po'i sgra/ /'di ni rgyal po khyod la mdzes/ /yon tan med la yon tan brjod/ /smad cing rtsub pa'i tshig tu gyur/ /rgya mtshor rin chen 'byung gnas bzhin/ /yon tan 'byung gnas khyed lags pas/ /khyed ni de ltar zhi gyur
<p>51a.4</p>pa/ /de la ngo mtshar cher mi 'dzin/ /de ltar skyes bu dam pa rnams ni bdag rang sran thub pas bstan pa dang chos kyi 'du shes rab tu goms par byas pa'i phyir/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pas gdungs kyang lam ngan par 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas na sran thub par bya ba dang / 
<p>51a.5</p>chos la goms par bya ba la brtson par bya'o/ /myos byed ma'i skyes pa'i rabs te bcu gsum pa'o// //bam po lnga pa/ chos la gnas na bden pa'i tshig tsam gyis kyang ma rungs par gyur pa las thar bar 'gyur na/ de'i 'bras bu lta smos kyang ci dgos/ /de bas na
<p>51a.6</p>chos kyi rjes su 'jug par bya'o/ /de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' chen po blo rab tu rno ba gru'i kha lo sgyur ba cig tu gyur to/ /zhes grags so/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang bzhin gyis shes rab rno bas gtsug lag khyad par can gang dang gang slob par 'dod pa dang / 
<p>51a.7</p>sgyu rtsal khyad par can gang dang gang slob par 'dod pa de dang de dag la shes rab rno zhing skye bo gzhan pas lhag par gyur to/ /bdag nyid chen po de ltar skar ma rgyu ba la mkhas pas/ phyogs kyi bye brag la blo ma rmongs shing nar ma dang / glo bur du 'byung ba'i ltas shes la/ mtshan ma la
<p>51b</p>
<p>51b.1</p>mkhas shing dus dang dus ma yin pa'i go rims la mkhas pas nya dang chu'i kha dog dang sa'i bye brag dang bya dang ri dwags la sogs pa'i mtshan mas kyang rgya mtsho'i phyogs ni legs par rtogs/ dran pa dang ldan zhing le lo dang gnyid ni chung / grang ba dang tsha ba dang char 'bab pa la sogs pa'i sdug
<p>51b.2</p>bsngal ni ci mi snyam/ bag che la brten pa dang ni ldan/ drang ba dang bzlog pa la sogs pa la mkhas pa'i phyir/ tshong pa rnams 'dod pa'i yul du phyin par byed pa cig tu gyur to/ /des 'gro ba'i don rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ ming yang legs pa'i pha rol tu phyin par byed
<p>51b.3</p>pa zhes bya'o/ /de gnas pa'i ming yang legs par pha rol phyin pa zhes sngon grags so/ /ding song ni su pA ra ka ra zhes bya'o/ /de rab tu bkra shis pa phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir/ rgas pa rnams kyang rgya mtshor 'dong ba'i tshong pa don 'grub par 'dod pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa
<p>51b.4</p>dang bkur sti cher byed de gru bo che'i nang du 'jug par byed do/ /de nas re zhig cig yul b+ha ru ka ts+tsha nas tshong pa gser gling du 'dong ba don grub par 'dod pa cig yul legs par pha rol tu phyin par lhags nas/ sems dpa' chen po de gru bo che de'i nang du gzhag pa'i phyir gsol ba btab
<p>51b.5</p>po/ /des de dag la smras pa/ rgas pa'i dbang gis lta ba nyams gyur zhing / /gzhon sha chung bas dran pa rab tu nyams/ /bdag gi lus kyi bya ba'ang nyam chung na/ /bdag la grogs byar re ba ga la srid/ /tshong pa rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod kyi lus ni gnas skabs ci 'dra ba
<p>51b.6</p>bdag cag gis 'tshal te/ khyod la drag shul spyad pa'i mthu ma mchis lags kyis kyang / bdag cag ni khyod la phrin las bgyi bar mi gsol gyi/ gzhan du na/ khyed kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma la brten pa'i/ /mthu yis gru ni bkra shis ldan gyur na/ /mtsho yi nang nas rab tu bgrod
<p>51b.7</p>dka' yang / /bde bar thar 'gyur slad du bdag cag mchis/ /de nas bdag nyid chen po des de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir rgas pas lus shig shig por gyur du zin kyang gru bo che'i nang du zhugs so/ /de gru nang du zhugs pa dang / tshong pa de dag thams cad kyis bsams pa/ /da ni
<p>52a</p>
<p>52a.1</p>gdon mi za bar bdag cag rnams don gyi mchog grub par 'gyur ro snyam nas sems rab tu dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas mthar gyis rgya mtsho chen por nya'i rigs rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par rgyu ba/ chu rlabs kyi sgra chen po grag pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i chu rlabs mang po
<p>52a.2</p>gnyer ba/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang sa'i kha dog gi khyad par mang pos mdog bsgyur ba/ lbu ba sbreng bas me tog gi phreng ba bzhin du mdzes par byas pa/ lha ma yin dang klu mchog rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa/ gting dpag dka' ba chu tshad med pa'i nang du zhugs so/ /de nas
<p>52a.3</p>an+da rnyil gyi 'od ltar sngo/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyis gnam sngon bzhu ba bzhin/ /kho ra khor yug chu 'gram bltar mi snang / /gting dpag dka' ba'i mtsho 'jing nang du zhugs/ /de nas de dag der phyin pa dang phyi dro'i dus su nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ni chung ngur gyur/ glo bur du ltas ngan chen po
<p>52a.4</p>rab tu 'jigs su rung ba cig byung ba dang / /rlabs ni rnam par 'khrugs shing lbu ba 'thor/ /drag po'i rlung gis bskyod pas 'jigs sgra 'byin/ /chu kun tha mal 'dug las rab tu g.yos/ /rgya mtsho de ma thag tu 'khrugs par gyur/ /ltas ngan glo bur langs pa'i rlung gis bskyod/ /
<p>52a.5</p>rlabs chen 'jigs su rung ba'i shugs kyis dkrugs/ /dus mtha'i rlung gis ri g.yos sa gzhi bzhin/ /rgya mtsho'i 'jing ni rab tu 'khrugs par gyur/ /glog phreng rgyu ba'i 'od 'bar lce g.yo ba/ /sbrul nag mgo mang bzhin du mdog sngo ba'i/ /sprin gyis nyi ma'i lam yang
<p>52a.6</p>bsgribs par gyur/ /'brug sgra 'jigs su rung ba rgyun mar grags/ /sprin chen 'thug pos 'od kyi dra ba sgrib/ /nyi ma mthang gyis nub tu nye la gyur/ /nyi ma nub pa'i skabs ni rnyed pa dang / /mun pa'ang rim gyis gnag tu nye bar gyur/ /char rgyun mda' yis rlabs la phog
<p>52a.7</p>pa dang / /rgya mtsho'i 'jing ni gnam du brgal ba 'dra/ /gru yang 'jig pa bzhin du rab tu g.yos/ /de dag snying la 'jigs pa skyed par byed/ /de dag skrag cing spa bkong mi smra zhum/ /brten po dag ni thar pa'i thabs la 'bad/ /kha cig yi dam lha la gsol ba 'debs/ /
<p>52b</p>
<p>52b.1</p>sems stobs yon tan bsam ba rnam par ston/ /de nas tshong pa de dag rlung dang chu'i shugs kyis brdas pa'i gru bo che g.yengs nas nyin zhag du mar chu'i 'gram ma mthong zhing / rgya mtsho'i mtshan ma ji ltar 'dod pa yang ma mthong la/ rgya mtsho'i mtshan ma sngar ma mthong ba sha stag mthong bas/ 
<p>52b.2</p>ci'i phyir sems mi dga' la/ 'jigs shing bag tsha bas/ ci bya gtol med par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' legs par pha rol phyin pas/ de dag spro bsring ba'i phyir smras pa/ rgya mtsho'i nang na zhugs pa rnams la ltas ngan glo bur du byung bas 'khrugs shing / 
<p>52b.3</p>nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'di lta bu ngo mtshar mi che khyed cag bag tsha bar ma byed cig /zhum pa phangs las thar la mi phan gyis/ /de bas mya ngan gdung bar ma byed cig /dgos pa'i don sgrub mkhas la brten byas nas/ /rab tu dka' ba'ang sla bas thar par 'gyur/ /de bas
<p>52b.4</p>'jigs shing mi dga' ma byed par/ /ji ltar bya ba'i thabs kyis dgos pa bsgrub/ /mkhas pas gzi brjid brtan pas gzengs bstod nas/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub pa lag na yod/ /de ltar bdag nyid chen po des tshong pa de dag sems brtan par byas pa dang / rgya mtsho'i
<p>52b.5</p>'gram mthong du re nas/ rgya mtsho la bltas nas mi'i gzugs 'dra ba dang dngul gyi ya lad gyon pa cig chu'i nang du yang bying steng du yang 'byung ba mthong ngo / /de dag gi byad gzugs dang mtshan ma legs par brtags nas ya mtshan cher gyur te/ legs par pha rol phyin pa la smras pa/ 
<p>52b.6</p>rgya mtsho 'di'i nang na sngon ma mthong ba'i mtshan ma dag cig snang ste/ de dag ni lha ma yin gyi dmag mi bzhin du dngul gyi go cha bgos/ mig mi sdug la sna yang spu gri 'dra bar snang / /steng du bying zhing rgyal ba'i zhor la ni/ /rgya mtsho'i chu la rtsed mo byed pa su zhig lags/ legs
<p>52b.7</p>par pha rol tu phyin pas smras pa/ 'di dag ni mi ma yin gyi nya mi 'dra ba snang ba dag yin gyis/ 'di dag gis ma 'jigs shig /'on kyang / bdag cag yul ni gnyis ka las/ /de las rab tu ring bar gyur/ /rgya mtsho de ni spu gri'i phreng / /de las bzlog la 'bad par bgyis/ /
<p>53a</p>
<p>53a.1</p>chu yang drag tu 'bab pa dang / /nub phyogs nas langs pa'i rlung drag pos gru rab tu mgyogs par song bas tshong pa de dag gis slar bzlog ma nus so/ /de nas chus khyer ba las mthar gyis dngul gyi mdog 'dra ba'i chu dkar po lbu ba mang po 'khrigs pa'i rgya mtsho
<p>53a.2</p>gzhan cig mthong nas ya mtshan cher gyur te/ legs par pha rol tu phyin pa la smras pa/ chu rnams rang gi lbu bas g.yogs pa bzhin/ /rgya mtsho chen pos gos dkar gyon pa bzhin/ /zla ba'i 'od zer zhu ba 'bab pa bzhin/ /ngang pa bzhin du bab pa 'di ci lags/ /legs
<p>53a.3</p>par pha rol tu phyin pas smras pa/ rab tu ring du chus khyer bas shin tu dka'o/ /'o ma'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/ /'di ni zho phreng rgya mtsho yin/ /gal te bzlog par nus na ni/ /'di las thar te 'gror mi rung / /tshong pa rnams kyis smras pa/ gru bo che rab tu mgyogs pa dang rlung yang drag
<p>53a.4</p>tu langs pas gru dal bus btang ba yang mi nus na/ slar log pa ga la nus/ de nas rgya mtsho de yang 'das pa dang / yang rgya mtsho gzhan cig rlabs kyi phreng ba rab tu 'khrugs pa gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ chu'i mdog me 'bar ba 'dra ba mthong nas/ tshong pa de dag ya mtshan dang ngo
<p>53a.5</p>mtshar cher gyur te/ legs par pha rol tu phyin pa la dris pa/ nyi ma 'char ka'i kha dog 'dra ba la/ /sngon po ma yin chu rlabs gnam du rgal/ /me chen rab tu 'bar ba 'dra ba yi/ /mtsho 'di'i ming ni 'di ltar ci phyir gyur/ /legs par pha rol tu phyin pas smras pa/ 'di
<p>53a.6</p>ltar snang ba'i rgya mtsho 'di/ /me yi phreng ba zhes grags te/ /de bas 'di las bzlog nus na/ /khyed la rab tu legs par 'ong / /de ltar bdag nyid chen po de'i ming tsam zhig bstan nas rgyang ring du bltas pas chu'i kha dog gyur pa'i gtan tshigs ni ma bstan to/ /de nas tshong pa de
<p>53a.7</p>dag rgya mtsho de las kyang thal ba dang / yang rgya mtsho gzhan chu'i kha dog rin po che sbur len dang / an da rnyil gyi mdog kyang 'dra la/ rtswa ku sha smin pa'i kha dog kyang 'dra ba mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ legs par pha rol tu phyin pa la dris pa/ ku sha smin pa'i 'dab
<p>53b</p>
<p>53b.1</p>ma 'dra ba'i mdog /drag tu langs pa'i rlung gis bskyod pa'i rlabs/ /lbu ba bkram pa me tog bcas pa bzhin/ /'di ltar gda' ba rgya mtsho gang zhig lags/ /legs par pha rol tu phyin pas smras pa/ kye ded dpon dag slar bzlog pa'i phyir 'bad pa gyis shig /'di las
<p>53b.2</p>'das na mi rung ngo / /ku sha'i phreng can rgya mtsho 'di/ /glang po lcags kyu med pa bzhin/ /bzod par dka' ba'i chu 'bab pa/ /bdag cag dga' ba 'phrog par byed/ /de nas tshong pa de dag gis rab tu 'bad kyang gru bo che de bzlog par ma nus nas/ rgya mtsho de las kyang thal te/ 
<p>53b.3</p>chu'i mdog sngon po smyug ma'i mdog dang / bai DUr+ya'i mdog 'dra ba'i rgya mtsho gzhan zhig mthong nas/ legs par pha rol tu phyin pa la smras pa/ rin chen mar gad mdog ltar sngo ba'i chu/ /ne'u gsing sngon po mdzes pa bzhin du 'bab/ /ku mu ta dang 'dra ba'i lbu bas brgyan/ /
<p>53b.4</p>de ltar gda' ba'i rgya mtsho 'di gang lags/ /de nas bdag nyid chen po des tshong pa de dag sdug bsngal bar gyur pa des sems gdungs nas mi dga' zhing shugs ring du nar gyis phyung ste dal bus smras pa/ da ni rab tu pha rol thal/ /'di las bzlog pa rab tu dka'/ /'jig rten tha mar
<p>53b.5</p>byed pa bzhin/ /rgya mtsho 'di ni 'dam bu'i phreng / /tshong pa de dag gis de skad thos nas mi dga' zhing sems ni zhum lus kyi tshigs ni shig shig por gyur/ shugs nar gyis 'byin pa tsam la brten cing de nyid du mchis so zhes 'khod do/ /rgya mtsho de las kyang thal nas phyi dro'i dus las
<p>53b.6</p>bab cing nyi ma'i 'od zer je chung je chung du gyur te/ nyi ma yang mtsho'i nang du nub par gyur ba 'dra ba la/ rgya mtsho yang bla 'og bzlog pa 'dra zhing rgya mtsho'i chu sgra yang ser ba drag po 'bab pa dang / smyug ma'i tshal mes tshig ste tog yar gyis 'gengs pa dang 'dra bar sgra che zhing rab tu 'jigs par byed
<p>53b.7</p>pa thos par gyur to/ /de thos nas kyang rab tu skrag cing snying 'dar bzhin du la 'ur du langs nas phyogs kun du bltas nas/ chu'i 'jing chen po de g.yang sa gcong rang gi nang du 'bab pa 'dra ba mthong ngo / /de lta bu mthong nas rab tu blong blong por gyur te/ legs par pha rol tu phyin pa'i
<p>54a</p>
<p>54a.1</p>drung du lhags nas smras pa/ bdag cag rna ba gas shing snying yang 'jigs pas dkrugs pa bzhin du gyur/ /chu yi bdag po khros pa 'dra ba'i sgra 'di rgyang ring nas kyang grag /chu 'di thams cad gcong rong 'jigs pa'i nang du mdun na 'bab pa 'dra/ /rgya
<p>54a.2</p>mtsho 'di 'dra ci lags khyod kyang 'di la ci ltar bgyi ba dgongs/ /de nas bdag nyid chen po de rtab rtab por gyur nas/ e ma ho mtshar byas mtshar byas zhes smras te/ rgya mtsho la bltas nas smras pa/ gang du phyin nas slar mi ldog /'chi bdag khar ni sngon song bzhin/ /bdag cag ma
<p>54a.3</p>rungs gyur gyis med/ /rgya mtsho'i glong de 'di yin no/ /tshod pa de rnams kyis de skad thos nas/ bdag cag ni rgya mtsho'i glong gi khar song ngo snyam nas gson du re ba med cing shi bas 'jigs pas sems blong blong por gyur te/ kha cig skad phyung ngus par gyur to/ kha cig smre sngags 'don zhing
<p>54a.4</p>'bod/ /kha cig ci yang byed ma nus/ /kha cig skrag nas sems kyang stor/ /phangs par gyur pa'i yid kyis rab bskul nas/ /kha cig lha dbang gus pas phyag kyang 'tshal/ /kha cig nyi ma drag po tha skar dang / /nor lha rgya mtsho nyid la skyabs su 'dong / /la la gsang sngags bzlas brjod
<p>54a.5</p>byed/ /gzhan dag lha mo nyid la phyag 'tshal gyur/ /legs par pha rol phyin la kha cig gis/ /drung du 'ongs nas bskor nas smre sngags 'don/ /phongs par gyur la 'jigs pa med byed pa/ /gzhan la phan 'dogs yon tan bsags pa yi/ /khyod kyi mthu chen khyad par can de ni/ /
<p>54a.6</p>da ni sbyar ba'i dus la bab cing mchis/ /bdag cag mgon med phongs nas skyabs su mchi/ /de bas brtan pos bskyab par thugs la dgongs/ /rgya mtsho 'di ni khros bzhin bdag cag rnams/ /rgya mtsho'i glong gis cig char ril mid bgyid/ /skye bo chab kyi nang du 'gum pa 'di/ /
<p>54a.7</p>khyod kyis yal bar dor ba mi srid do/ /rgya mtsho 'dis kyang khyod kyi bka' mi gcog /de bas 'khrugs par gyur pa 'di las bzlog /de nas bdag nyid chen po de snying rje chen pos sems gdungs nas/ tshong pa de dag spro bsring ba'i phyir smras pa/ 'di la yang bdag la bcos su yod
<p>54b</p>
<p>54b.1</p>pa'i thabs 'ga' zhig yod par mthong ste/ de la re zhig snying rjes sbyar bar bya/ /de'i phyir khyed cag re zhig spro srings shig ces smras pa dang / de nas tshong pa de dag gis 'di la'ang bcos su yod do zer ro snyam nas re thag ma chad de/ bsam pa brtan po brtas par gyur nas/ 
<p>54b.2</p>de la yid rton cing kha rog ste sdod cing 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' legs par pha rol tu phyin pas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga gru bo che la btsugs te/ lus thams cad kyis btud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la
<p>54b.3</p>phyag byas nas/ tshong pa de dag la smras pa/ tshong pa khyed rnams dang / rgya mtsho dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha khyad par can rnams gson cig /bdag ni shed bye tshun chad du/ /nam yang ched du bsams nas su/ /srog chags rnams ni nam du yang / /bsad par bdag
<p>54b.4</p>ni yang mi dran/ /bden pa'i tshig ni 'di dag dang / /bdag gi bsod nams mthu dag gis/ /rgya mtsho'i glong du ma song bar/ /gru 'di bde bar slar log cig /de nas bdag nyid chen po des bden pa'i byin rlabs kyi mthu dang / bsod nams kyi mthus rlung de chu'i shugs
<p>54b.5</p>dang bcas pas slar log pa dang / gru de yang slar log par gyur to/ /gru de de ltar slar log par mthong nas/ tshong pa de dag rab tu ya mtshan che zhing yid rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ legs par pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal zhing zhe sa bskyed de/ gru slar log go slar
<p>54b.6</p>log go zhes smras so/ /de nas bdag nyid chen po des tshong pa rnams la smras pa/ ba dan myur du tshug cig ces bsgo ba dang / de'i las su bskos pa de dag rab tu dga' zhing stobs dang spro ba bskyed de bsgo ba bzhin du byas so/ /de nas skye bo dga' ba'i sgra 'byin pa/ /ba
<p>54b.7</p>dan dkar po phyar ba'i 'dab ma mdzes/ /rgya mtsho'i nang na 'jug pa gru mdzes pa/ /sprin med mkha' la ngang mo mdzes pa bzhin/ /gru de de ltar slar log ste/ chu dang rlung mthun par bab cing langs pas gzhal med khang mdzes pa'i tshul du rang dgar ni 'gro/ nam srod du nye ba'i
<p>55a</p>
<p>55a.1</p>mtshams kyi dus ni khad kyis sngo zhing phyogs rnams mun nag gi bla res khebs shing skar ma'i rgyan gyis brgyan par snang / nam srod kyi dus la bab pa dang / legs par pha rol tu phyin pas tshong pa de dag la smras pa/ kye ded dpon dag 'dam bu'i phreng ba tshun chad kyi
<p>55a.2</p>rgya mtsho las bye ma dang / rdo ba ci mthong ba rnams long la grus ci theg pa gru'i nang du rdzongs shig /de ltar byas na gru 'di ljid kyis non pas ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /bye ma dang rdo ba 'di dag kyang bkra shis par bkur ba sha stag yin pas khyod gdon mi za bar rnyed pa grub par gyur to/ /legs
<p>55a.3</p>par pha rol tu phyin pa la yid dga' zhing gus par gyur pa'i lha rnams kyis bstan pa'i gling rnams las de dag gis bye ma dang rdo ba yin snyam pa'i blos/ bai DUr+ya la sogs pa'i rin po che rnams blangs nas gru bo che'i nang du brdzongs so/ /de nyid kyi mtshan mo la gru de yul b+ha ru kats+tshar
<p>55a.4</p>phyin to/ /de nas nang par dngul dang / an da rnyil dang / be+e DUr+ya dang / gser gyis gru bkang ste/ de dag bdag yul chu 'gram phyin gyur nas/ /rab dga' byams pas de la mchod pa byas/ /de bas na de ltar chos la gnas pa la bden pa'i tshig tsam gyis kyang ma rungs par
<p>55a.5</p>gyur pa las thar bar gyur na/ de'i 'bras bu lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de bas chos kyi rjes su 'jug par bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten na de ltar bde ba thob par 'gyur bas na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa'i yon tan bsngags pa la yang brjod par bya'o/ /
<p>55a.6</p>legs par pha rol tu phyin par skyes pa'i rabs te bcu bzhi pa'o// //tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams ni tshe 'di nyid la yang dge ba'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur na/ tshe rabs gzhan la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de bas na tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la 'bad par bya'o/ /
<p>55a.7</p>de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' re zhig cig mtsho mi che ba me tog ka la ha ra dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ut+pal rnams kyis chu bzang po brgyan pa ngang pa dang / bya ka ran da ka dang / ngur pa khyo shug tu 'grogs pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/ chu
<p>55b</p>
<p>55b.1</p>'gram na shing ljon pa dang me tog mang po yod pa cig na nya'i rgyal po zhig tu gyur to zhes grags so/ /tshe rabs mang por gzhan gyi don spyad pa la goms par byas pas/ de na gnas pa'i tshe yang gzhan la phan pa dang bde ba byed pa 'ba' zhig tu gyur to/ /dge dang mi dge'i las
<p>55b.2</p>rnams goms byas na/ /mi rnams la ni 'dris pa nyid du gyur/ /de lta bu dag ched du ma bsgrims kyang / /tshe rabs gzhan la rmi lam bzhin du spyod/ /sems dpa' chen po des nya de rnams la bdag gi bu sdug pa rnams la byams pa bzhin du/ sbyin pa dang tshig 'jam po dang don
<p>55b.3</p>spyod pa la sogs pa'i rim pas rab tu phan 'dogs par gyur to/ /phan tshun gnod par byed las rab tu bzlog /gcig la gcig ni byams pa rab tu bskyed/ /thabs la mkhas shing rigs pas de dag la/ /nya yi chos tshul rab tu brjod par bya/ /de yis de dag legs par
<p>55b.4</p>bskyangs pas na/ /nya rigs de dag rab tu dar bar gyur/ /mi yi bdag po tshul bzhin spyod pa yis/ /'bangs rnams bskyangs pas gnod pa med pa bzhin/ /de nas re zhig cig sems can rnams skal ba med par gyur pa dang / char 'bebs pa'i lha'i bu rnams bag med
<p>55b.5</p>par gyur pas char legs par ma bab par gyur to/ /de ltar char legs par ma bab pa dang / mtsho me tog rgyas pa pad+ma dkar po dang ldan pa'i chu gtsang mas sngon bzhin du gang bar ma gyur to/ /de nas rim gyis dpyid kyi dus la bab pa dang / ngal zhing le lo'i dbang gis bul
<p>55b.6</p>bar gyur pa 'dra ba'i nyi ma'i 'od zer rno zhing tsha bas sa gzhi mngon par gdungs shing 'bar bar gyur pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rlung skam pa'i dbang gis bsil ba 'dod pas nyin re zhing 'thungs pa bzhin du mtsho de lteng ka bzhin du gyur to/ /dpyid kyi dus su nyi ma 'bar ba dang / /'bar ba'i
<p>55b.7</p>rjes 'brang rlung ni drag po dang / /rims nad gdungs 'dra'i sa gzhi tsha ba yis/ /khros pa bzhin du chu ni bskams par byas/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas nya mang po de rnams la khwa da rnams kyis glags lta bar gyur na/ chu 'gram na rgyu ba'i bya rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci
<p>56a</p>
<p>56a.1</p>dgos te/ dpa' bskum zhing mi dga' ba'i dbang du ni gyur/ cung zad 'gul nus pa rnams la bltas nas/ snying rje bzhin du bsams pa/ kyi hud kye ma nya 'di rnams ni ma rungs par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/ chu yang nyin re bri bar gyur/ /tshe zad
<p>56a.2</p>pa dang 'dren pa bzhin/ /char bzhin 'du bar 'gyur ba yang / /da rung rab tu dka' ba 'dra/ /bros te 'gro ba'i lam yang med/ /gzhan du khyer ba'ang su yang med/ /bdag cag brlag par dga' ba yi/ /ded kyi dgra yang de ring byung / /chu yi lhag ma 'di bskams na/ /gdon
<p>56a.3</p>mi za bar g.yo bzhin yang / /bdag gis mngon sum mthong bzhin du/ /dgra rnams kyis ni zos yang dag /de la 'di ci ltar byas na rung snyam du bdag nyid chen po des rnam par brtags nas/ bden pa'i byin rlabs 'ba' zhig gis phongs pa rnams la phan 'dogs par
<p>56a.4</p>mthong ngo / /snying rjes kyang sems gdungs pas shugs nar gyis phyung ste/ gnam du bltas nas smras pa/ rab tu phongs par gyur nas bdag gis ni/ /bsam bzhin srog chags bsad pa mi dran te/ /bden pa 'di yis lha yi rgyal po rnams/ /char pa 'bab cing mtsho ni
<p>56a.5</p>gang bar shog /de nas bdag nyid chen po des bsod nams bsags pa'i yon tan dang / bden pa'i byin rlabs kyi mthu dang / de la dga' bar gyur pa'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyi mthus dus ma yin pa'i sprin chus gang ba'i gzugs can rnams sgra snyan pa zab mo ni sgrogs/ 
<p>56a.6</p>glog 'gyu bas ni brgyan sprin mgo sngon po rgya che ba rab tu 'phro ba ni kha glal ba bzhin sprin gyi rtse mo phan tshun du 'dus pa ni lag pas 'khyud pa 'dra bar sprin nag po rnams byung bar gyur to/ /nag po'i sprin rnams ri bo'i grib ma bzhin/ /phyogs kyi tha gru'i tshad ni 'jal ba bzhin/ /sprin mgo nag pos
<p>56a.7</p>mun nag spel ba bzhin/ /me long nang bzhin nam mkha'i dkyil na mdzes/ /rma bya rab dga' ze ba sbrel ba rnams/ /glu gar mdzes pas rab tu bstod pa bzhin/ /sprin tshogs de dag dpa' bo dgod pa bzhin/ /rgyun chags zab mo'i sgra 'dzin rnam par mdzes/ /de yis char pa mu tig
<p>56b</p>
<p>56b.1</p>gtor ba bzhin/ /chu rgyun 'bab pas rdul rnams rab zhi zhing / /char sprin langs pa'i rlung gis rnam bskyod pas/ /sa gzhi dri zhim ngad kyis khyab par gyur/ /dpyid kyi dus la bab pas rnam spel kyang / /nyi ma'i 'od zer snang ba med par gyur/ /lbu ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pas bskor ba yi/ /
<p>56b.2</p>chu rnams shong bu dma' bar 'bab par gyur/ /'brug gi rnga sgras rab tu dga' gyur nas/ /glog phreng 'gyu ba bro gar byed pa bzhin/ /yang dang yang du gser 'od gsal ba yi/ /'od zer 'phro bas phyogs rnams khyab par gyur/ /de nas char pa'i rgyun mdog skya bo kun tu khyab par bab par
<p>56b.3</p>gyur pas mtsho gang bar gyur te/ char gyi rgyun bab ma thag tu khwa da la sogs pa bya mang po rnams ni byer/ nya mang po rnams gson du re ba'i bsam pa grub cing rab tu dga' bar gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' snying rab tu dga' bar gyur kyang char chad du dogs nas char sprin la smras
<p>56b.4</p>pa/ char sprin 'brug sgra zab cing brtan par sgrogs/ khwa da rab tu dga' ba med par mdzod/ /glog rgyun 'bar ba 'gyu ba'i 'od zer can/ /char pa'i rgyun rnams rin chen 'dra bar phob/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshig de thos nas/ yid la ya mtshan rab tu che bar gyur te/ de'i
<p>56b.5</p>drung du mngon sum du 'ongs nas mgu bar gyur te smras pa/ char sprin 'brug sgra snyan pa rab sgrogs shing / /bum pa bsdus pa bzhin du gang bab pa/ /'di ni nya dbang mthu chen khyod nyid kyi/ /bden pa khyad par can gyi mthu yin te/ /'jig rten don la brtson par gyur pa yis/ /skyes
<p>56b.6</p>bu khyod lta bu yi spyod pa la/ /ngan sgrogs bya ba bdag gis gang byas pa/ /bdag gis bag med 'khrul pa mtshar cig byas/ /skyes bu dam pa'i grogs ni bdag gis bgyis/ /de ring slan chad de ltar khyod ma dgongs/ /yul phyogs 'di yang khyod kyi yon tan gzhi/ /slan chad
<p>56b.7</p>'di ltar phongs par yang mi 'gyur/ /de ltar tshig snyan pas mgu bar byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /mtsho de yang chus gang zhing rab tu 'byor par gyur to/ /de ltar na tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams ni tshe 'di nyid la yang dge ba'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur na/ tshe rabs gzhan
<p>57a</p>
<p>57a.1</p>lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de bas na tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la 'bad par bya'o/ /nya ru skyes pa'i rabs te bco lnga pa'o// //bden pa'i tshig bsgoms na mes kyang 'da' bar byed mi nus so/ /de bas na bden pa'i tshig la brtson par bya'o/ /de yang 'di
<p>57a.2</p>ltar byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa'i gnas cig na/ bya sreg pa'i phru gu zhig tu gyur to zhes grags so/ /de yang sgo nga'i sbubs nas byung nas zhag grangs mang po ni ma lon/ spu gsar pa ni ma skyes/ rab tu rid pas yan lag dang nying lag gi phyogs rnams ni gsal bar mngon/ 
<p>57a.3</p>pha ma gnyis kyis rtswa dang ldum bu stug po'i nang du tshang bcas pa'i nang na phru gu mang po spun dang lhan cig tu 'khod do/ /de lta bu'i gnas skabs na yang chos kyi 'du shes ma nyams pa'i phyir/ pha ma gnyis kyis zas rnyed pa srog chags khyer te 'ongs pa ni zar mi btub cing rtswa'i sa bon dang shing n+ya gro
<p>57a.4</p>d+ha'i 'bras bu khyer te 'ongs pa de 'ba' zhig zos te/ pha ma gnyis kyis kyang de 'ba' zhig gis gsos so/ /de kha zas rtsub cing chung ba des/ lus rgyas par ma gyur 'dab gshog kyang ma rdzogs so/ /bya sreg pa'i phru gu gzhan rnams kha zas ci 'ongs pa zos pas mthu che zhing 'dab gshog
<p>57a.5</p>rnams kyang rgyas par gyur to/ /'di ni chos nyid yin te/ 'di ltar/ chos dang chos min mi 'dzem zhing / /thams cad za ba bde bar gnas/ /chos dang ldan pa'i tshul 'dod na/ /cho ga'i zas za bzhin du 'dug /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ngo tsha mi shes pa ni bde bar 'tsho'o/ /zhes tshigs
<p>57a.6</p>su bcad pa gnyis gsungs te/ de yang 'phags pa gnas brtan pa'i gzhung las 'byung ba/ brkam zhing bya rog ltar dpa' ba/ /ngo tsha med pa legs par 'tsho/ /brnab cing spyi rtol che ba yi/ /'tsho ba shin tu nyon mongs ldan/ /rtag tu skyon med tshol ba dang / /zhum zhing bag
<p>57a.7</p>dang bcas pa dang / /'tsho ba skyon med blta ba dang / /ngo tsha shes pas 'tsho mi bde/ /de dag gi gnas skabs dang mi ring ba cig na nags tshal chen po mes tshig ste/ 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra ni 'ur 'ur zer/ dud pa'i tshogs ni 'khyil/ me lce g.yo ba 'khrigs shing me stag ni rnam
<p>57b</p>
<p>57b.1</p>bar 'phro/ nags tshal na rgyu bar byed pa rnams ni skrag par byed pa/ nags tshal stug po rnams ni 'jig par byad pa cig byung bar gyur to/ /de ni rlung gis bskyod pas rnam par 'phro/ /me lce 'khrug pa'i lag pa gar mdzes byed/ /dud pas 'khrigs pa'i sgra ni bsdigs pa bzhin/ /
<p>57b.2</p>sgra dang bcas pa de dag 'jigs pa bskyed/ /drag po'i rlung gis bskyod pas rab tu g.yo/ /nags kyi rtswa rnams 'jigs pas nyen pa 'dra/ /me de rngam pa bzhin du mngon par 'ongs/ /me stag 'phro ba mang pos khyab par bsreg /bya tshogs mang po skrag nas rab tu byer/ /ri dwags
<p>57b.3</p>'jigs pas rgyu zhing kun tu bros/ /dud pa'i nang nas me sgra drag po grag /de yis skrag nas nags tshal du ba 'dra/ /me de rlung drag pos bdas pas gnod pa bzhin du rtswa mthug po la me mched pas de dag gi tshang dang nye bar 'ongs so/ /de nas sreg pa'i phru gu de rnams 'jigs shing
<p>57b.4</p>skrag pas 'khrug pa'i sgra mi snyan pa 'byin cing gcig la gcig mi lta bar rtab bzhin du 'phur te song ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' ni nyam chung bas 'dab gshog ma rdzogs par 'phur bar ma stsal to/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bdag gi mthu stobs shes pas ma 'khrugs pa nyid du
<p>57b.5</p>me de btsan thabs su 'ongs pa 'dra ba la tshig 'jam pos smras pa/ bdag gi rkang pa'i ming don med cing 'dab ma med/ /bdag gi pha ma gnyis kyang khyod la skrag nas bros/ /khyod la mgron byar rung ba 'di na ci yang med/ /de bas me khyod 'di nas slar ni ldog par rigs/ /sems
<p>57b.6</p>dpa' chen po des bden pa yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig gis de skad smras pa dang / rtswa rnams tshang tshing skam po 'dab chags la/ /me de rlung gis rab tu sbar gyur kyang / /'bab chu klung chen 'brub dang 'phrad pa bzhin/ /de yi tshig thos de ma thag tu zhi/ /deng song dus na gangs ri'i
<p>57b.7</p>khrod nas sa phyogs der/ /dgon pa'i me lce rlung gis bskyod de rgod pa yang / /mgo mang sbrul ni sngags kyis btab ste bzlog pa bzhin/ /me lce g.yo ba dal zhing zhi bar 'gyur zhes grags/ /de ci'i phyir bstan zhe na/ smras pa/ rgya mtsho'i dus shugs rab tu g.yo ba'i gdengs
<p>58a</p>
<p>58a.1</p>can dang / /bdag la phan 'dod thub dbang bstan pa'i bslab pa bzhin/ /bden pa'i bdag nyid can gyis gang dag bsgo ba ni/ /mes kyang mi 'da' de bas bden pa mi btang ngo / /de ltar bden pa yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig ni mes kyang 'da' bar mi nus
<p>58a.2</p>te/ de bas na bden pa'i tshig la brtson par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa la yang brjod par bya'o/ /bya sreg pa'i phru gur skyes pa'i rabs te bcu drug pa'o// //chang 'thung ba ni nyes pa du ma 'byung zhing / shin tu ma rungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ 
<p>58a.3</p>dge ba rnams ni gzhan dag kyang 'di las zlog par byed na bdag nyid lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i blo can/ gzhan la phan zhing bde bar byed pa la dga' ba/ sbyin pa dang dul ba dang zhi ba la sogs pas bsod
<p>58a.4</p>nams 'phel ba nyams su len pa ste/ de re zhig cig lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin du gyur to zhes grags so/ /de lha'i longs spyod kyi bde ba rnams phun sum tshogs kyang snying rje'i dbang du gyur pas 'jig rten gyi don bya ba la brtson pa lhod par ma gyur to/ /'jig rten yongs kyi phal cher
<p>58a.5</p>dpal ldan na/ /chang gis myos bzhin bdag gi don yang 'dor/ /bag yod rnams ni gzhan gyi don la yang / /lha dbang dpal dang ldan yang des mi myos/ /sdug bsngal mang pos gdungs pa'i sems can la/ /gnyen bshes sdug pa rnams la byams pa bzhin/ /brtan
<p>58a.6</p>zhing dpal gyi rang bzhin shes pas na/ /de ni gzhan gyi don spyod yod mi brjed/ /de nas re zhig cig bdag nyid chen po des mi'i 'jig rten nyul ba'i tshe/ /snying brtse ba dang byams shing mthu che ba'i mig gis mthong ba ni/ thams cad kyi mdza' bo zhes bya ba'i rgyal po cig mi dge ba'i bshes
<p>58a.7</p>gnyen la brten pa'i skyon gyis blon po dang 'bangs su bcas par chang 'thung ba la dga' bar gyur te/ de la skyon du mi lta bar gyur pa la chang 'thung ba yang skyon che bar mthong nas/ bdag nyid chen po de snying rje chen pos mi dga' bar gyur te bsams pa/ kye ma ho/ 'jig rten 'di dag ni rab tu
<p>58b</p>
<p>58b.1</p>ma rungs par gyur cing 'khod do snyam nas/ 'thung na thog mar rab tu zhim/ /skyon du lta ba rmongs par gyur/ /legs par 'gyur ba med par byas/ /log pa'i lam ni bzang po bzhin/ /de la 'dir ni ji ltar byas na rung snyam pa dang / slar thabs yod do snyam nas/ gtso bor gyur pa rnam
<p>58b.2</p>pa gang spyod par/ /skye bo rnams kyang de yi rjes su 'jug /de bas 'dir ni rgyal po nyid bcas na/ /'jig rten dag na dge sdig de las 'byung / /de ltar rnam par nges par byas nas/ sems dpa' chen po de gser btso ma'i mdog ltar yid du 'ong ba skra'i thor tshugs cung zad rtsub pa 'khyil ba
<p>58b.3</p>can shing gi shun lpags dang ri dwags a dzi na'i pags pa gyon pa tshangs pa'am/ lus gzi byin ldan pa cig tu mngon par sprul nas/ chang gis gang ba'i bum pa ha cang mi che ba zhig ni lag pa g.yon na thogs te 'ongs pa/ de nas thams cad kyi mdza' bo rgyal po'i 'khor gyi nang du 'dus te/ 
<p>58b.4</p>chang dang sbrang chang dang bu ram shing gi chang dang / chang bcos ma dang rgun chang gi gtam gyi gnas skabs gleng ba'i tshe/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la byung ste 'dug par gyur to/ /da nas skye bo de dag ngo mtshar che zhing rab tu gus pas langs te thal mo sbyar nas rim gro bskyed pa dang / char sprin
<p>58b.5</p>'brug sgra zab mo'i sgra 'byin pa bzhin du gsang bstod de smras pa/ me tog phreng ba mgul na bkod/ /mgrin pa man chad rab tu gang / /bum pa rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi/ /bum pa 'di ni su nyo 'dod/ /me tog phreng bas gdu bur btags pa bzhin/ /bum pa'i kha rgyan 'dam
<p>58b.6</p>bus brgyan pa dag /rlung gis bskyod pas rab tu g.yo ba yi/ /bum pa 'di ni rin gyis su nyo 'dod/ /de nas rgyal po de ya mtshan dang ngo mtshar che bar gyur te/ rab tu gus pas lta zhing thal mo sbyar nas smras pa/ gzi chen nyi ma 'bar 'dra mdzes pa zla ba bzhin/ /khyod kyi sku mdzes
<p>58b.7</p>thub pa 'ga' zhig lags par gda'/ /de bas 'jig rten kun gyis 'tshal bar gsung pa'i rigs/ /khyod kyi yon tan mtshar cig mchis pa bdag cag re/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ nga ni su yin phyis kyang shes 'gyur gyis/ /khyed cag 'jig rten gzhan la mi 'jigs shing / /
<p>59a</p>
<p>59a.1</p>tshe 'di la yang brlag par mi 'jigs na/ /bum pa 'di ni nga las nyo bar gyis/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ e ma ho/ /khyod kyis tshong zong btsong ba 'di ni sngon ma byung ba zhig go/ /'jig rten na ni tshong zong rnams/ /gang la yod kyang yon tan brjod/ /nyes pa'i
<p>59a.2</p>skyon ni bcas pa yin/ /tshong zong btsong bo de ltar grags/ /brdzun du smras pas 'jigs pa rnams/ /khyod lta bu yi tshul 'dzin te/ /dge ba rnams ni bden pa dang / /phongs par gyur kyang mi gtong na/ /bum pa 'di ni ci yis bkang / /khe spogs chen po ci yod na/ /khyod lta
<p>59a.3</p>bus yang bdag la tshong / /bdag nyid chen po des smros shig /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po gson cig /'di ni chu dang zho dang dar ba'am mu tig chu yis gang ba min/ /ge sar dri zhim khu ba'i chang dang mar gyis gang ba yang ma yin la/ /ku mu ta dang sprin med zla
<p>59a.4</p>'od 'dra ba'i 'o mas gang ba min/ /sdig pa'i rang bzhin can gyis gang ba'i bum pa de yi yon tan nyon/ /gang zhig 'thungs na ra ro song nas gom pa dbang med 'dor zhing 'gro/ /yul phyogs ma 'dris par yang 'khyams shing rdeg 'chos dran pa nyams par 'gyur/ /bza' dang mi bza'
<p>59a.5</p>dpyad pa med par de dag bzar gyur pa/ /de dang de yis gang ba'i bum pa tha shal 'di nyos shig /gang gis bdag gi sems la dbang med blo nyams rnam par 'khyams/ /phyugs dang 'dra bar blun zhing dgra bos 'phyas kyang byed par 'gyur/ /gang gis mdun sar gar byed 'gyur zhing
<p>59a.6</p>brang gis 'khar rnga brdungs/ /dge ba med pa'i bum pa'i chang 'di khyed kyis nyo bar rigs/ /'thungs na gang gis bdag gi ngo tsha 'os pa 'dor/ /gos dang bral zhing gcer bur byung yang ngo tsha med/ /grong khyer skye bo mang po'i lam du yid rton 'gro/ /bum pa 'di ni btsong bar 'os te
<p>59a.7</p>de blugs so/ /gang 'thungs na ni skyugs pa'i zas kyis gos 'gyur zhing / /khyi yis kha yang dogs pa med par bldag par 'gyur/ /dran pa med par lam po che na nyal bar 'gyur/ /btsong na 'grim pa de ni bum pa 'dir blugs so/ /gang zhig 'thungs nas myos te dbang med par/ /
<p>59b</p>
<p>59b.1</p>pha ma dag kyang shi la 'ching bar byed/ /nor gyi bdag po dag kyang khyad du gsod/ /phan brlags de ni bum pa 'dir blugs so/ /gang zhig 'thungs na myos pas dran brlags te/ /'bri sna an d+ha dag kyang dme byung nas/ /dbyug chen thogs te phan tshun tha mal phyung / /myos 'gyur de
<p>59b.2</p>ni bum pa 'dir blugs so/ /gang la chags na dpal gyi gzhir gyur rigs/ /je mtho je mthor 'gyur ba'ang brlag par 'gyur/ /nor gyi dbyig ldan rigs kyang phung bar 'gyur/ /btsong rgyu de ni bum pa 'di na 'dug /glo bur ngu zhing 'dug la dgod cing ma nges smra/ /gdon gyis
<p>59b.3</p>zin pa bzhin du mig ni mchi mas gang / /smad cing brnyas par 'gyur ba'i gnas su nges 'gyur ba/ /blo nyams 'gyur ba 'di ni bum pa 'di na yod/ /rgas par gyur kyang gang gis sems nyams shing / /bdag la phan par 'dod pa'i lam du mi 'jug na/ /ma brtags mang du
<p>59b.4</p>smra bar nges 'gyur la/ /btsong rgyu de ni bum pa 'di na yod/ /gang gi nyes pas sngon gyi lha rnams myos/ /lha yi rgyal po'i dpal ni nyams byas nas/ /skyabs 'dod phyir ni rgya mtsho'i nang na gab/ /de yis gang ba'i bum pa 'di nyos shig /mi bden pa yang bden pa bzhin du
<p>59b.5</p>ngo mthon smra/ /mi bya ba yang bya ba bzhin du dga' bzhin byed/ /gang gi lan gyis yod med phyin ci log tu shes/ /de ni smad pa'i lus bzhin bum pa 'di na 'dug /myos 'gyur rig sngags sdug bsngal rgyur 'gyur ba/ /sdig pa'i ma mo byung ngan mngon sum bzhin/ /rtsod
<p>59b.6</p>pa'i lam dang tha dad ma yin pa/ /snying gi mun pa mi bzad de myos shig /gang gis blo ni rab tu nyams gyur nas/ /pha ma nyes pa med pa'ang gsod 'gyur zhing / /bde la ma chags dka' thub can yang gsod/ /btsong ba'i mchog 'di rgyal la phul bas bzhes/ /mi yi bdag
<p>59b.7</p>po chang ni 'di 'dra yang / /'jig rten na ni lha zhes rab tu grags/ /yon tan la ni gang dag mi dga' ba/ /de dag chang 'di nyos la 'bad par gyis/ /gang zhig bsten na ngan pa spyod par 'gyur/ /rab tu 'jigs pas sems can dmyal bar ltung / /dud 'gro'i gnas dang
<p>60a</p>
<p>60a.1</p>yi dwags dbul gyur pa/ /mthong bar 'dod pa de ni su zhig yod/ /chang de nyung ngu 'thungs kyang rnam par smin pa ni/ /mi yi gnas su skyes kyang tshul khrims lta ba nyams/ /gang gis phyogs kyang mnar me 'bar bas bsreg par 'gro/ /yi dwags yul dang dud
<p>60a.2</p>'gro dman par gnas par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur zhing gtam ngan mngon sum 'byung / /ngo tsha med cing blo gros dri ma can du 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'thungs na yon tan de dang de nyams pa/ /de bas rgyal po khyod kyis chang 'thung ga la rigs/ /de nas rgyal po des snying la
<p>60a.3</p>bab pa'i tshig rnams chang 'thung ba'i nyes pa khong du chud par byas pa dang / chang 'thung ba la ma chags shing zhen pa med par gyur nas/ brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /byams pa'i pha ma'am 'dul bas mnyes byas bla ma bzhin/ /tshul dang tshul min mkhas pa'i thub pas smras
<p>60a.4</p>pa bzhin/ /khyod kyis bdag la phan phyir legs par gdams pa de/ /spyod pas nyams su blang ste tshul bzhin mnyes par bgyi'o/ /legs par smras pa'i lan du mchod pa 'di khyod kyis bdag las bzhes par rigs so/ /yul gru bzang po lnga yang khyod la 'bul/ /bran brgya po dang bzhon pa lnga brgya
<p>60a.5</p>'bul/ /rta mchog sbyar ba'i shing rta 'di bcu bzhes/ /bdag gi bla ma phan pa ston par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang bdag gis gang dang gang bgyi ba 'dir spring zhing slan chad kyang bdag la spyan ras kyis stsal par gsol/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ yul gru mchog la sogs pa'ang nga mi 'dod/ /lha
<p>60a.6</p>dbang nga yin rgyal pos shes par byos/ /phan par smras la mchod par bya ba ni/ /bsgo ba'i tshig bzhin nyams su len pa yin/ /grags dang dpal gyi lam ni 'di yin te/ /tshe rabs gzhan la bde ba de yang thob/ /de bas chang la chags pa rab spongs la/ /chos la gnas pa
<p>60a.7</p>nga yi yul la brten/ /de skad smras nas brgya byin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /rgyal po de yang blon po dang 'bangs su bcas pa chang mi 'thung bar gyur to/ /de ltar na chang 'thung ba ni nyes pa du ma 'byung zhing shin tu ma rungs par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ dge ba rnams ni gzhan dag kyang 'di
<p>60b</p>
<p>60b.1</p>las zlog par byed na/ bdag nyid lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bcom ldan 'das de tshe rabs snga ma la yang 'jig rten la phan pa 'ba' zhig mdzad pa'o zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa la yang brjod par bya'o/ /bum pa'i skyes pa'i rabs te bcu bdun pa'o// //
<p>60b.2</p>bam po drug pa/ khyim na gnas pa ni tshul khrims kyi gnyen por 'gyur zhing gnod pa'i phyir bdag la phan par 'dod pa rnams khyim na gnas pa yongs su gtong ngo / /de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' re zhig cig rgyal rigs phyug po'i rigs 'tsho ba'i tshul dang spyod pa phun sum tshogs
<p>60b.3</p>pa/ cho rigs mthon po la dga' ba rnams kyis gnyen bya bar gsol ba btab pa/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi re ba'i gnas su gyur pa/ bang mdzod rnams na gnyen bshes dang thun mong du spyod pa/ phongs shing slong ba rnams ni mngon par 'khor ba/ lag bzo ba rnams kyi
<p>60b.4</p>'tsho ba'i gnas su gyur pa/ dpal gyi gzhir gyur pa dang / rgyal pos bkur sti bya zhing phan btags par gyur pa/ 'jig rten pas mngon par bkur ba'i khyim cig tu skyes par gyur to zhes grags so/ /de rim gyis nar son par gyur pa dang / 'jig rten pas bsngags pa'i
<p>60b.5</p>rig pa'i gnas rnams ni bslab pa dang sgyu rtsal gyi thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la ni blo gsal bar gyur/ lus byad bzang po skye bo'i mig tu sdug pa dang / chos dang mi 'gal bar 'jig rten gyi tshul la mkhas pas 'jig rten pa rnams kyis nang mi bzhin du snying la chags par gyur to/ /nang
<p>60b.6</p>mi rnams ni nang mi zhes/ /lhag par dga' bar 'gyur ba med/ /phyi mi rnams kyang phyi mi zhes/ /nang mi dag las gzhan du min/ /skyon dang yon tan las brtags nas/ /nang mi'am yang na phyi mi'ang rung / /'jig rten na ni bkur sti dang / /smad par bya ba'i gnas su gyur/ /
<p>60b.7</p>sems dpa' chen po de sngon rab tu byung ba la goms par byas pas/ /khyim na gnas pa tshol ba'i sdug bsngal dang / chos dang 'gal bar rab tu shes gyur cing / /dka' thub nags tshal bde 'byung gnas rig nas/ /khyim gyi bde la yid ni chags ma gyur/ /de pha ma gnyis
<p>61a</p>
<p>61a.1</p>tshe 'das pas snying mi dga' bar gyur to/ /khyim gyi rdzas dang dbyig brgya stong du ma yod pa de yang gnyen bshes dang dge sbyong dang bram ze dang phongs pa rnams la ci ltar rigs par byin nas rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /de rim gyis grong dang ljongs dang pho brang 'khor du rgyu zhing song song
<p>61a.2</p>ba las grong khyer cig tu brten te/ nags tshal gyi gnas cig tu gnas par gyur to/ /de bsam gtan gyi yon tan la goms pas tshul bcos pa ma yin par dbang po rang bzhin gyis dang ba dang ma khengs pa dang rnyed pa la re ba'i brkam pa dang zhum pa med pa dang / dul zhing gzi brjid che ba
<p>61a.3</p>dang / ci ltar rigs par 'jam por smras shing gsal ba dang chos dang chos ma yin pa rab tu 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang / rna ba dang snying tshim par byed pa'i tshig la mkhas pa yin par mngon par smra ba dang / rab tu byung ba'i spyod tshul bzang po dang ya rabs rnams dga' ba'i spyod pas
<p>61a.4</p>de na yang rab tu grags par gyur to/ /skye bo rtog dpyod can rnams kyis kyang / de'i cho rigs btsun pa las rab tu byung bar shes nas/ de nas 'jig rten pa rnams kyis bkur sti cher byas par gyur to/ /rigs dang gzugs kyi yon tan las/ /yon tan rab tu brjid par 'gyur/ /
<p>61a.5</p>sa gzhi rab tu bzang po la/ /zla ba'i 'od zer shar ba bzhin/ /de nas der 'ongs par de'i pha'i mdza' bos shes nas de'i drung du 'ong ste/ yon tan brjod cing gus par nad dris nas de la bdag pha'i mdza' bo yin par shes par byas te/ gtam gyi gleng bslang nas 'jam pos smras
<p>61a.6</p>pa/ na tshod 'di tsam las cho rigs la yang mi lta bar 'di ltar rab tu byung ba ni/ btsun pa khyed kyis mi brtan pa bzhin du byas so/ /khyim na 'dug gam dgon par song yang rung / /legs par bsgrubs pas chos ni brnyes gyur na/ /khyim bzang dpal dang ldan pa bor nas ni/ /ci phyir
<p>61a.7</p>khyod blo dgon par dga' bar gyur/ /gzhan gyi dring la ltos shing slong mo spyod/ /ngan pa bzhin du skye bo rnams kyis smad/ /ngan pa'i gos gyon gnyen bshes rnams dang bral/ /bas mtha'i sa na lus ni bskyur te bor/ /dbul po'i lus ni nye bar blangs pa bzhin/ /khyod kyi gnas
<p>61b</p>
<p>61b.1</p>skabs 'di la bltas na ni/ /dgra yi mig kyang mchi mas gang 'gyur na/ /mya ngan dbang du ji ltar ma gyur kyang / /de bas khyod kyi pha yi khyim du 'dong / /thos pa'i don ni khyod kyis yod par byos/ /bu mchog khyod kyis der ni gnas bcas nas/ /chos dang yid la bsam pa
<p>61b.2</p>grub par gyis/ /'jig rten na yang 'di skad du grags te/ gzhan gyi las byed pa dag kyang / /bdag gi khyim na re gnas bde/ /'byor pa'i dpal ni 'byor gyur pa/ /bde ba thob pa smos ci dgos/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dben pa la gnas pa'i bde ba'i bdud rtsi
<p>61b.3</p>'di la blo goms par byas pa dang / snying de la gzhol bar gyur pa/ khyim na gnas pa dang nags tshal na gnas pa'i bye brag shes par gyur pa/ ltos 'grangs zin pa la kha zas kyi gtam zer ba yid du mi 'ong ba bzhin du 'dod pa la bstabs pa yid du mi 'ong bar gyur nas smras pa/ 
<p>61b.4</p>khyod kyis tshig 'di smras pa yi/ /smras pa nyes pa chung mod kyi/ /btson ra 'dra ba'i khyim la ni/ /nam yang bde bar ma sems shig /phyug gam yang na dbul yang rung / /khyim na gnas pa nad du che/ /gcig ni bsrung bas nyon mongs la/ /gnyis pa tshol bas sha thang
<p>61b.5</p>ngo / /phyug gam yang na dbul yang rung / /gang na bde ba med gyur pa/ /de la dga' ba rmongs pa ni/ /sdig pa'i 'bras bu smin pa nyid/ /khyim na gnas pas kyang chos 'di mnyes par byar rung ngo / /zhes zer ba de yang khyim yang chos kyi gnyen po dang 'dom pa dang / las
<p>61b.6</p>su bya ba mang ches pas rab tu dka'o/ /khyod ltos shig /khyim gyi so nam byas na ni/ /brdzun du mi smra mi rung zhing / /pha rol nyes pa byed pa la/ /nan tur mi byar mi rung ngo / /de lta bas na skye bo 'di dag khyim gyi bde ba la snying chags nas/ de bsgrub ba la 'bad pa ni/ gal
<p>61b.7</p>te chos spyad khyim gyi so nam 'chor/ /khyim la chags na chos kyang ga la 'grub/ /chos kyi lam ni rab tu zhi ba yin/ /khyim gyi don ni drag shul can gyis 'grub/ /de bas chos dang 'gal ba'i skyon yod phyir/ /bdag la phan 'dod su zhig khyim na gnas/ /chos ni bde la chags pa
<p>62a</p>
<p>62a.1</p>spong ba yin/ /bde ba bsgrub pa'ang nges pa yod ma yin/ /gdon mi za bar grags pa med par 'gyur/ /yid la gdung ba skye zhing ngan 'gror ltung / /de bas chos dang 'gal ba bde ba'i thabs/ /tshul la mkhas pa rnams ni mi bsgrub po/ /gzhan yang
<p>62a.2</p>khyim na gnas pa bde'o zhes bya ba 'di yang yid ches par bya ba yin par bdag gis ma mthong ngo / /bsgrub cing bsrung la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal des/ /bcing zhing bsad pa'i sdug bsngal gzhir gyur pa/ /rgyal po dag kyang 'byor pas chog mi shes/ /char chu 'bab pas
<p>62a.3</p>rgya mtsho mi gang bzhin/ /yongs su rtogs pa'i dbang du ma gyur na/ /'di la ci ltar nam zhig gang la bde/ /rmongs pas 'dod chags nye bar spyod pa yang / /rma g.ya' 'phrugs pa'i bde ba bzhin du zad/ /gzhan yang phal cher ni 'di lta bu yin no/ /khyim ni 'byor na phal
<p>62a.4</p>cher rgyags par 'gyur/ /rigs btsun nga rgyal che zhing stobs kyis bsnyems/ /sdug bsngal khro zhing rgud na zhum par 'gyur/ /des na nam zhig rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /de bas na 'dir btsun pa khyod la gdams ngag tu bya ba ni/ dregs dang nga rgyal gti mug sbrul gyi tshang / /
<p>62a.5</p>rab tu zhi la dga' ba'i bde 'jigs pa/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad mang po'i gnas gyur khyim/ /khung dang 'dra bas su zhig gnas par byed/ /skye bo chog shes rnams kyi khyim/ /rab tu bde ba dben pa'i tshal/ /ji ltar sems ni dga' 'gyur ba/ /de 'dra lha yi
<p>62a.6</p>yul na'ang med/ /de bas tshal na ngan pa'i gos gyon te/ /gzhan gyi dring la 'jog cing 'tsho yang rung / /bdag la phan 'dod dug can mi bza' bzhin/ /chos min 'dres pa'i bde ba mi 'dod do/ /de ltar des yid du 'ong ba'i tshig gis pha'i mdza' bo de yid ches par
<p>62a.7</p>byas pa dang / sems dpa' chen po de la rab tu gus shing bkur sti'i bya ba khyad par can gyis rab tu mgu bar byas so/ /de lta bas na khyim na gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang rab tu zhi ba'i gnyen po la gnod pa yin pas/ bdag la phan par 'dod pa rnams yongs su gtong ngo / /
<p>62b</p>
<p>62b.1</p>rab tu dben pa'i ro myong na 'dod pa las slar log go zhes rab tu dben pa'i gtam bya ba la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /rgyal rigs phyug por skyes pa'i rabs te bco brgyad pa'o// //rab tu dben pa bde ba'i ro myang ba rnams ni/ 'dod pa las 'phyas kyi gnas dang / gnod
<p>62b.2</p>pa lta bur mi mthun par sems so/ /de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' re zhig cig /bram ze'i rigs chen po yon tan gyi grags pa rgyas pa 'phyas su byas pa'i skyon med pa zhig tu skyes par gyur to zhes grags so/ /de la yang nu bo drug yod pa yang / de'i gzugs
<p>62b.3</p>dang yon tan mthun pa/ byams shing gus pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba dag dang sring mo gcig dang bdun 'khod pa las/ de ni rig byed yan lag dang bcas pa/ nye ba'i rig byed dang bcas pa ni lobs/ mkhas pa'i grags pa ni thob/ skye bo rnams kyis
<p>62b.4</p>ni bkur sti byas/ pha ma gnyis la lha bzhin du rab tu gus par bsnyen bkur byas/ nu bo de rnams la slob dpon dang pha bzhin du rig pa slob cing / tshul dang 'dul ba la mkhas par byas nas khyim na gnas so/ /de yun ring zhig na pha ma gnyis dus byas pa'i mya ngan
<p>62b.5</p>gyis gdungs pa las pha ma gnyis kyi shid byas zin nas/ mya ngan byed pa'i nyin zhag 'das pa dang / nu bo rnams la smras pa/ yun ring lhan cig 'khod 'dod kyang / /'chi bas so sor bral gyur zhing / /mya ngan chen pos gdungs gyur pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten 'di na nges/ /
<p>62b.6</p>bdag ni khyim na chags bzhin du/ /'chi ba'i dgra yis de'u re bsad/ /de bas phan pa'i lam bzang po'i/ /bdag ni rab tu byung bar 'dod/ /de bas na khyed rnams kyis shes par gyis shig /bram ze'i khyim na chos kyi lam gyis rnyed pa'i longs spyod tsam yod de/ des
<p>62b.7</p>'tsho ba 'byor gyis de bas na khyed rnams phan tshun byams pa dang / bkur sti ni byed/ tshul khrims dang gtsang sbra spyod pa la ni 'bad/ rig byed slob pa la ni 'grus/ gnyen bshes dang slong ba rnams ni re thag mi gcod/ chos la ni gzhol bar byos la khyim na legs par
<p>63a</p>
<p>63a.1</p>'khod cig /'dul ba la ni rtag tu 'bad/ /kha thon slob pa dag la 'grus/ /sbyin pa legs par rab sbyin zhing / /khyim gyi dka' thub spyad par gyis/ /de ltar byas na khyed la grags pa 'phel/ /chos dang srid dang bde ba'ang 'phel/ /'jig
<p>63a.2</p>rten phyi ma la yang bde bar 'gyur/ /de bas bag yod khyim na gnas par gyis/ /de nas de'i nu bo rnams kyis de rab tu byung zhes zer ba thos nas bral du dogs pa'i mya ngan gyis sems gdungs te/ mya ngan gyi mchi mas gdong khebs bzhin du phyag 'tshal te/ de la 'di skad
<p>63a.3</p>ces smras so/ /bdag cag pha ma dang bral ba'i mya ngan gyi zug rngu'i rma ma sos par sdug bsngal gzhan gyis mnan te/ khyod kyis 'dir rma dkrugs par mi rigs so/ /pha ma'i mya ngan zug rngu da rung du/ /bdag cag yid la rma ni ma sos bzhin/ /de bas brtan pa'i blo can
<p>63a.4</p>'di btang legs/ /bdag cag rma ni 'jig par ma mdzad cig /'on te khyim na gnas pa mi bzhed la/ /nags tshal gnas pa bde ba'i lam dag na/ /bdag cag mgon med khyim du bor nas su/ /ci phyir gcig pu nags su bzhugs par dgyes/ /de bas na khyod gang du
<p>63a.5</p>bzhud pa der bdag cag kyang mchis te/ bdag cag kyang rab tu byung ngo zhes smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ dben par gnas la ma goms shing / /'dod la chags pa'i rjes 'brang ba'i/ /skye bo phal cher rab byung la/ /g.yang sar lhung ba bzhin du lta/ /
<p>63a.6</p>de bas na khyim du gnas pa dang / nags tshal na gnas pa'i bye brag shes bzhin du rab tu byung ba la gnas par bdag cag gi ched du ma smras so/ /de ltar khyod rab tu byung bar 'dod na/ yu bu cag rab tu byung bar 'dod kyis 'dod do/ /de nas bu bdun po de dag dang / sring mo
<p>63a.7</p>dang brgyad char gyis khyim gyi longs spyod chen po bzang po dang / mdza' bo dang / nang mi dang nye du'i 'khor gdong mchi mas gang ba rnams bor te dka' thub nags su rab tu byung ngo / /de dag gi grogs po cig dang / bran pho dang bran mo snying nye ba cig kyang de'i phyi bzhin du rab tu byung ngo / /
<p>63b</p>
<p>63b.1</p>de dag dgon pa'i nags tshal chen po cig na mtsho chen po me tog pad+ma mang po kha bye bas mdzes pa ni 'bar ba bzhin/ me tog ku mu ta mang po kha 'bus pa bkod pa bzhin/ bung ba mang po ni ti ri ri chu gtsang sngon pos ni gang ba cig gi 'gram du brten nas/ shing lo'i spyil po rab tu gtsang
<p>63b.2</p>zhing yid du 'ong ba grib shing gis bsgribs pa/ so so so sor bar mi nye bar byas pa rnams su brtul zhugs dang sdom pa la rab tu 'bad cing yid bsam gtan la sbyor bas gnas par gyur to/ /zhag lnga lnga zhing byang chub sems dpa'i drung du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'du'o/ /byang chub
<p>63b.3</p>sems dpa' de yang de dag la bsam gtan gyi man ngag la 'jug pa 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs ston pa/ skyo zhing yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba/ rab tu dben pa dang chog shes pa'i bsngags pa mang du 'byung la/ tshul 'chos pa dang / gcam skyu dang le lo la sogs pa'i skyon
<p>63b.4</p>la smod pa/ nye bar zhi ba dang rab tu dad pa'i lam du gyur pa'i chos kyi gtam de dang de dag zer ro/ /de dag gi bran mo de yang rab tu gus shing snying nye bas de bzhin du g.yog byed do/ /des mtsho de'i nang nas pad+ma'i rtsa ba bton te/ pad+ma'i lo ma chen po la mtsho 'gram du gtsang
<p>63b.5</p>bar cha mnyam par bkod nas/ tog brdung ba'i sgras dus bstan te slar song ngo / /de nas drang srong de dag bzlas brjod dang sbyin sreg gi cho ga byas zin pa dang / rgan rims kyis re re nas song ste/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba char bgos te bzhag pa de las go rims bzhin du re re nas blangs
<p>63b.6</p>nas/ rang rang gi shing lo'i spyil por cho ga bzhin du zos te/ bsam gtan la brtson pa'i blos gnas so/ /de dag de ltar 'khod pa na/ chos nyan pa'i dus ma gtogs par gcig la gcig ltar mi 'dod do/ /de dag de ltar tshul khrims dang spyod tshul de lta bu dang
<p>63b.7</p>rab tu dben pa la dga' ba dang bsam gtan la gzhol bas grags pa cher gyur to/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de thos nas/ de brtag pa'i phyir der song ngo / /des kyang de dag bsam gtan la mngon par phyogs pa dang / bya ba ngan pa dang ma 'brel zhing gdung ba med
<p>64a</p>
<p>64a.1</p>la/ rab tu zhi ba la mngon par dga' zhing 'khod par mthong nas/ yon tan rab tu brtan pa yod par re zhig de brtag pa la yid gzhol bar gyur to/ /rtsol ba med par bas mtha' nas/ /zhi la rab tu gzhol zhing 'khod/ /dge ba rnams ni yon tan
<p>64a.2</p>la/ /re ba snying la 'jog par byed/ /de nas pad+ma'i rtsa ba glang po che'i phru gu'i mche ba ltar dkar la 'jam pa rnams bton te bkrus nas pad+ma'i lo ma sngon po rin po che mar gad 'dra ba gtsang ma/ pad+ma'i me tog gi 'dab ma dang ze ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa la cha mnyam par bkod nas/ 
<p>64a.3</p>tog brdungs pa'i sgras drang srong de dag la dus bstan te bran mo de slar song ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' brtag pa'i phyir lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i cha dang po de mi snang bar byas so/ /sdug bsngal 'byung bar gyur pa dang / /bde ba med par gyur kyang rung / /dga'
