<p>64a.4</p>ba rnams kyi brtan pa'i rgyu/ /rnam par 'phro ba bzhin du mthong / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' song song nas cha dang po'i gnas de na pad+ma'i rtsa ba ni med/ pad+ma'i lo ma ni rgyan 'khrugs shing 'dug pa mthong nas/ bdag gi pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i skal ba cig gis khyer ro snyam ste/ 
<p>64a.5</p>sems 'khrug pa dang khong khro ba med par de nas slar log nas shing gi spyil por zhugs te/ bsam gtan gyi cho ga tshul bzhin du brtsam mo/ /drang srong gzhan rnams snying mi dga' bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir don ma smras so/ /de'i nu bo gzhan gyi snying lam na/ 'dis rang
<p>64a.6</p>gi skal ba nges par blangs ba 'dra snyam nas/ rang rang gi pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i skal ba blangs nas/ rang rang gi lo ma'i spyil por cho ga bzhin zos te bsam gtan byed cing 'khod do/ /de bzhin du zhag gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang zhag lnga pa'i bar du yang de'i pad+ma'i rtsa
<p>64a.7</p>ba'i skal ba brgya byin gyis mi snang bar byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa med cing rab tu zhi bar gyur to/ /dam pa rnams ni sems dkrugs pas/ /tshe zad nas ni shi yang sla/ /de bas mkhas pas srog phyir yang / /
<p>64b</p>
<p>64b.1</p>yid ni 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyi dro'i dus la bab ste/ drang srong de dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i shing lo'i spyil por go rims bzhin du lhags pa dang / de'i lus ni rab tu ring 'gram pa dang mig ni kong / bzhin gyi mdangs rnams ni ngan/ 
<p>64b.2</p>skad kyi gdangs ni chung / nyams dmas kyang brtan pa dang rab tu zhi ba'i yon tan zla ba tshes pa mthong na dga' ba 'dra ba mthong ba dang / nye bar brten nas zhes bskyed de rtabs pa bzhin du 'di ci nongs zhes rid par gyur pa'i rgyu de la dris so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas de dag la
<p>64b.3</p>de'i don ci ltar 'gyur ba smras so/ /de nas dka' thub can de dag 'di snyam du 'di lta bu'i chos ma yin pa mi srid do snyam nas/ de nyam thag pas kyang mi dga' bar gyur te/ mtshar byas so zhes gcig la gcig smras nas ngo tsha zhing mgo smad de 'khod do/ /shes pa
<p>64b.4</p>'jug pa'i yul yang brgya byin gyi mthus bsgribs pas/ 'di ci las gyur pa yang nges par ma gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i nu bo 'og mas rang gi yid la gcags med pa/ bdag nyid gtsang bar bstan pa'i phyir/ mna' khyad par can bor ba/ bram ze
<p>64b.5</p>khyod kyi rtsa ba sus khyer ba/ /'byor pa'i mtshan mas brgyan pa'i khyim dag dang / /chung ma yid du 'ong ba rnyed pa dang / /bu dang tsha bo rnams dang ldan par shog /de'i 'og mas smras pa/ bram ze khyod kyi rtsa ba sus khyer ba/ /phreng ba do shal tsan+dan gos bzang dang / /
<p>64b.6</p>bu yis reg pa'i rgyan rnams thogs pa yi/ /'dod pa mi zad pa la spyod par shog /yang gcig gis smras pa/ khyod kyi rtsa ba gang gis khyer ba de/ /zhing rmos pa las nor dang 'bru rnyed cing / /bu dang smra bas rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /tshe la'ang mi lta khyim na
<p>64b.7</p>dga' bar 'gyur/ /yang gcig gis smras pa/ khyod kyi rtsa ba brkam pas gang khyer ba/ /rgyal po bran bzhin dul bar spyod pa yi/ /gtsug tor btud pas rab tu phyag byas shing / /rgyal po'i tshul gyis ma lus sa skyong gyur/ /yang gcig gis smras pa/ 
<p>65a</p>
<p>65a.1</p>khyod lta bu yi rtsa ba gang khyer ba/ /de ni rgyal po'i mdun na 'don gyur te/ /sngags la sogs pas bde legs byed gyur cig /de bzhin rgyal pos bkur sti bya bar shog /yang gcig gis smras pa/ rtsa ba 'dod cing yon tan mi 'dod pa/ /rig byed
<p>65a.2</p>legs par lobs nas ston par byed/ /dka' thub can du re ba chen po yis/ /yul mi kun gyis de la mchod par shog /grogs pos smras pa/ khyod lta bu yi rtsa ba la chags gang / /yul gru dam pa 'byor pa bzhi brgya tsam/ /rgyal po dag las thob nas spyod gyur cing / /
<p>65a.3</p>'dod chags ma bral bar ni shi bar gyur/ /bran gyis smras pa/ rtsa ba'i phyir ni bdag don chud gson pa/ /grogs po'i nang na de ni grong dpon gyur/ /rgyal po'i chad pa dag gis mi gcod par/ /bud med glu gar dag gis dga' bar gyur/ /sring mos smras pa/ khyod lta
<p>65a.4</p>bu yi rtsa ba gang khyer ba/ /de ni rgyal po'i btsun mor gyur nas su/ /gzugs dang dpal gyi gzi byin 'bar 'gyur zhing / /btsun mo dam pa stong gi mchog tu gyur/ /bran mos smras pa/ gang gis rtsa ba mthong la chos ma mthong / /de ni gcig pu dge ba rnams dang bral/ /
<p>65a.5</p>bkur sti byas nas myos par gyur nas su/ /kha zas zhim po dag la dga' bar gyur/ /de nas nags tshal de na 'khod pa'i gnod sbyin dang / glang po che dang / spre'u dag cig der chos nyan du lhags pas gtam de thos nas/ rab tu ngo tsha zhing mi dga' bar gyur te/ /de nas
<p>65a.6</p>gnod sbyin gyis bdag gtsang mar bstan pa'i phyir/ de dag gi mdun du mna' bor ba/ khyed kyi rtsa ba'i phyir ni gang 'khrul ba/ /gtsug lag khang chen dag ni brgyan par gyur/ /bkru bshal stor khung dag gi zhig ral 'chos/ /nyi ma'i 'od kyis snang bar byed par 'gyur/ /glang
<p>65a.7</p>po ches smras pa/ thub mchog khyod kyi rtsa ba gang brkus pa/ /de ni zhags pa dam pa drug brgyas 'chings/ /lcags kyu rnon pos dkrugs pa'i rma nad bzhin/ /nags tshal nyams dga' bor nas grong 'dab song / /spre 'us smras pa/ khyod kyi rtsa ba brkam pas gang brkus
<p>65b</p>
<p>65b.1</p>pa/ /de ni me tog phreng can zha nye thogs/ /dbyug pas brdeg cing sbrul gyi khar gtong zhing / /se ral khar bcings khyim na gnas par shog /de nas byang chub sems dpas de dag thams cad la/ 'jam zhing dul ba dang bzod pa dang zab pa ston pa'i tshig 'di skad
<p>65b.2</p>ces smras so/ /gang zhig ma brlag par ni brlag ce'am/ /gang zhig 'di 'drar khyed la dogs gyur pa/ /'dod pa'i yid 'ong ci bder spyad nas su/ /khyim na gnas bzhin 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin de dag 'dod pa la nye bar spyod pa dang mi mthun pa smod pa
<p>65b.3</p>zhi nas khyad par can du gyur par smras pa des/ gus pa dang ya mtshan skyes par gyur te/ der rang gi gzugs 'bar ba drang srong de rnams kyi mdun du bstan nas/ mi bzod pa bzhin du smras pa/ khyed re zhig sdod cig /gang dag thob phyir yid
<p>65b.4</p>la rtsol byed cing / /bde ba 'dod phyir yid la gnyid kyang med/ /dka' thub 'bad pas gang dag thob 'dod pa'i/ /'dod pa de dag ci phyir dmod par byed/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grogs po 'dod pa ni nyes dmigs mtha' yas te/ gang la brtags na thub pa rnams 'dod pa la mi spyod pa
<p>65b.5</p>de mdo tsam zhig nyon cig /'dod pa'i phyir na 'jig rten bcing zhing bsad par 'gyur/ /mya ngan gdungs shing 'jigs pa mang po'i sdug bsngal myong / /rgyal po rnams kyang 'dod pa'i phyir ni brlag par 'gyur/ /phyi ma la
<p>65b.6</p>yang chos nyams sems can dmyal bar ltung / /gang gis mdza' bo rnams dang myur du 'khon 'byung 'gyur/ /gang gis g.yo sgyu dri ma can gyi lam du 'gro/ /grags pa nyams shing phyi ma la yang sdug bsngal myong / /de dag thob par 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni 'dod pa yin/ /
<p>65b.7</p>de bas rab dang 'bring dang tha ma rnams/ /'di dang pha rol du yang 'dod pas gsod par byed/ /bdag la phan 'dod sbrul gdug khros pa bzhin/ /thub pa rnams ni de la mi bsten no/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshig de bden no snyam nas/ mngon par
<p>66a</p>
<p>66a.1</p>bstod de/ drang srong de dag gi mthu des yid dga' bar gyur nas/ de dag la bdag gi nyes pa khas blangs so/ /gang dag brtags na yon tan rnams/ /re ba bzhin du rtogs par gyur/ /brtag pa'i phyir ni bdag gis 'dir/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba sbas pa yin/ /pad+ma'i
<p>66a.2</p>rtsa ba 'di dag gis/ /khyed cag rnams kyis spyod pa brtan/ /thub pa bden par smra ba yi/ /'gro ba mgon dang bcas pa mthong / /de skad ces smras nas/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo/ /de nas
<p>66a.3</p>byang chub sems dpa' de'i spyod pa rlabs po che de la gzi brjid zil gyis non pa'i tshig drag pos smras pa/ nged cag khyod kyi gnyen dang grogs ma yin/ /gar mkhan khyod min nged cag 'phyas gdags min/ /lha dbang ci phyir khyad du bsad nas su/ /drang srong rnams la rtsed
<p>66a.4</p>mo'i lam bzhin bya/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin rab tu gus pas rna cha dang cod pan 'gul ba'i 'od kyis gdong gsal bar gyur te rab tu gus pas phyag 'tshal nas/ de la bzod par gsol ba/ bdag gis 'di ltar mi brtan pa/ /bgyis pa
<p>66a.5</p>dgos pa sngar smras lags/ /pha dang slob dpon 'dra ba ru/ /bdag la khyed kyis bzod par mdzod/ /shes pa'i mig ni btsums par gyur pa rnams/ /rang bzhin gyis ni mnyam pa'ang 'khrul par 'gyur/ /bdag la phan pas de la bzod par mdzod/ /de bas bdag la thugs la mi 'chang gsol/ /de
<p>66a.6</p>ltar bzod par gsol nas de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na rab tu dben pa'i bde ba'i ro myong ba rnams ni/ 'dod pa la 'phyas kyi gnas dang gnod pa lta bur mi mthun par sems so/ /de la skyes pa'i rabs 'di
<p>66a.7</p>yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan te/ nga dang sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ /maud gal bu dang 'od srungs dang / /gang po ma 'gags kun dga' bo/ /de yi tshe na spun du gyur/ /sring mo ut+pal mdog yin no/ /bran mo kub+dza ut+ta ra/ /bran pho khyim bdag mdzes pa yin/ /
<p>66b</p>
<p>66b.1</p>gnod sbyin ri bo bde ba yin/ /glang po pa ri lo ka yin/ /spre'u ni sbrang rtsi 'bul ba yin/ /brgya byin nag po 'char ka yin/ /skyes pa'i rabs ni de ltar bzung / /dka' thub can du skyes pa'i rabs te bcu dgu pa'o// //yon tan med pa la yod par grags pa ni skyes bu
<p>66b.2</p>dge ba rnams la bskul ma btab pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ de bas na yon tan bsgrub pa la 'bad par bya'o/ /de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thos pa dang dul ba dang cho rigs btsun pa dang / ma 'jungs shing khong bzo ba dang / 'jig rten gyi tha snyad bya ba la 'gal ba med
<p>66b.3</p>pa/ gtsug lag mang po la goms pas tshig la mkhas par grags pa/ snying rje dang ldan zhing sbyin gtong che bas nor gyi 'byor pas thams cad khyab pa/ rab tu phyug pas khyim bdag rin po che ltar bkur ba'i rgyal po zhig gi tshong dpon du skyes par gyur to zhes grags so/ /de
<p>66b.4</p>nas rang gzhan chos kyi bdag /thos la sogs pa'i yon tan brgyan/ /'jig rten dag gis phal cher ni/ /bkur sti bya ba'i gnas su gyur/ /de nas re zhig cig sems dpa' chen po de rgyal po'i pho brang du song ba'i 'og tu de'i sgyug mo gcig don zhig gnyer zhing bu
<p>66b.5</p>mo dang 'phrad pa'i phyir de'i khyim du song ngo / /mgron 'ongs pa'i bkur sti'i bya ba byas nas/ gtam gleng langs pa las rang gi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i chung ma la bde 'am mi bde dris pa'i skabs su/ bu mo khyod kyi khyim thab kyis khyod la byams sam mi byams/ 
<p>66b.6</p>khyod kyis bkur sti byas pa'i yon tan drin du gzo 'am mi gzo mi bde ba lta yod dam med ces dris pa dang / de ni ngo tsha bas mgo smad de mi spobs bzhin du gcom bskyungs te smras pa/ de lta bu'i tshul khrims dang / yon tan dang spyod yul ni rab tu byung ba la ma mchis so
<p>66b.7</p>zhes byas pa dang / de nas de'i ma de rgas nas/ rna ba mi gsang zhing sems mi gsal ba dang / bu mos de skad du smras pa'i tshig kyang ngo tsha zhing gcom chung bas legs par ma thos nas/ rab tu byung ba'i sgra cig kyang thos pas/ bdag gi dmag pa nges par rab tu
<p>67a</p>
<p>67a.1</p>byung ba lta ci zhig snyam nas/ bu mo de'i mya ngan dang de'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang du gyur nas smre sngags 'don cing des kyang skad phyung ste ngus so/ /'di ltar snying nye ba'i bdag gi mi yang bor te/ rab tu byung bas de'i tshul khrims kyi yon tan dang spyod
<p>67a.2</p>tshul yang ci 'dra ba zhig go/ /bu de'i rab tu byung ba yang ci lta bu zhig go/ /dar la bab cing byad gzugs bzang / /gzhon sha can la bde bar gsos/ /de ni rgyal po'i gnad chen yin/ /dgon par gnas blo ci ltar skyes/ /nang mi dag dang 'khon ma byung / /rgas
<p>67a.3</p>pas mi sdug ma gyur zhing / /nad med ci ltar tshig gcig gis/ /khyim gyi longs spyod de yis btang / /mdzangs shing dul ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /gzhan la snying brtse mnyes kyang gshin/ /mi brtan nang mi snying rje med/ /'di lta bu ni ci ltar lobs/ /dge
<p>67a.4</p>sbyong bram ze mdza' bo'i rten/ /nang mi dag dang phongs pa gsol/ /nags tshal dgon par gang 'tshal ba/ /gtsang sbra tshul khrims nor ldan pa'i/ /khyim na rnyed par mi 'gyur ram/ /rjes su mthun zhing chos grogs byed/ /nyes pa med par bor nas su/ /ha
<p>67a.5</p>cang chos la dad ches nas/ /chos dang 'gal bar 'di mi lta/ /'di ltar gus pa'i skye bo spangs/ /yid la snying rje cung zad med/ /chos ni cung zad 'grub re skan/ /kye ma ho gnam gyis mnar ba ltar/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i chung mas/ bdag gi khyim thab
<p>67a.6</p>rab tu byung ba'i phyir/ /bdag gi ma snying nye zhing snying nas smre sngags 'don pa des bud med kyi rang bzhin mi brten pa'i phyir snying mi dga' bas 'khom zhing blong blong por ni gyur/ mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal gyis sems dkrugs nas gtam gleng slong ba'i 'phro yang brjed/ bdag gi khyim thab
<p>67a.7</p>rab tu byung ba'i gtam ngan thos nas/ bdag gi ma bdag la mya ngan bsang ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs so snyam nas/ bu mos smre sngags 'don zhing skad phyung ste ngu ba las brgyal bar gyur to/ /khyim gyi mi dang g.yog 'khor rnams kyis kyang de thos nas mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal gyi shugs kyis cho nges
<p>67b</p>
<p>67b.1</p>btab po/ /khyim tshes dang mdza' bo dang gnyen bshes de la brten pa'i skye bo bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis kyang de thos nas khyim bdag de la rjes su chags pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyang phal cher khyim der dong ngo / /gang phyir 'jig rten dag na srid pa ni/ /
<p>67b.2</p>bde dang sdug bsngal dag la mtshungs par spyod/ /de bas 'di yang 'jig rten slob ma bzhin/ /bde dang sdug bsngal dag la mtshungs spyod gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po'i pho brang nas slar log ste khyim dang nye ba cig tu phyin pa dang / bdag gi khyim na cho nges 'debs pa
<p>67b.3</p>dang / mi mang po 'dus pa mthong nas/ bdag gi g.yog po la 'di lta bur gyur pa ci nyes rtogs la shog cig ces bsgos so/ /des de ltar brtags nas de'i drung du phyin nas/ des de la smras pa/ jo bos 'byor pa'i khab spangs nas/ /rab tu byung zhes thos nas su/ /skye
<p>67b.4</p>bo 'di dag gang zhig nas/ /byams pa'i dbang gis 'dus par gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis bsam pa dag pas tshig des bskul ma btab pa bzhin/ ngo tsha zhing mi dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/ e ma ho/ /skye bo rnams bdag la de ltar re ba legs so
<p>67b.5</p>snyam nas/ skye bo rnams kyi yon tan du/ /brjod cing bsngags pa thob gyur la/ /gal te khyim la phyogs na ni/ /bdag ltar mir yang ga la rung / /de ltar bdag gi skyon la dad gyur cing / /yon tan khyad du gsod la tshul ngan na/ /skye bo dge ba spangs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /
<p>67b.6</p>de ltar gyur na gson yang ci zhig rung / /de bas skye bo re bar gyur pa 'di/ /spyod pa ngan pa'i nyon mongs khyim spangs nas/ /dka' thub nags na dga' ba'i yon tan gyis/ /nyams su blangs te rab tu bkang bar bya/ /bdag nyid chen po des de ltar nges par byas te/ de nas slar la
<p>67b.7</p>log ste/ rgyal po'i gsol kha ba la tshong dpon spyan sngar mchis 'tshal lo zhes gsol cig ces smras so/ /spyan sngar mchi bar gnang nas kyang tshul bzhin du rgyal po'i spyan sngar 'ongs pa dang / rgyal pos ci'i phyir 'ong zhes smras pa la/ lha bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal na
<p>68a</p>
<p>68a.1</p>gnang bar rigs so/ /de nas rgyal po des rim gro bskyed de byams pa'i tshig gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /nga 'dra'i gnyen dang mdza' mchog yod bzhin du/ /nor dang thabs dang mthu rtsal gang dag gis/ /nga yis thub par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i/ /
<p>68a.2</p>sdug bsngal gang gis khyod ni bas mthar 'gro/ /gal te nor 'dod nga las nor khyer cig /gnod pa yod na de las bzlog par bya/ /nga dang gnyen bshes gsol ba 'debs pa rnams/ /ci zhig mi 'dod phyir ni bas mthar 'gro/ /de ltar bdag nyid chen po de la rgyal pos byams
<p>68a.3</p>pa dang gus pas bsgo ba dang / de la tshig 'jam pos smras pa/ khyod la brten nas gnod pa ga la mchis/ /nor gyis phongs pa'ang mchis par ga la 'gyur/ /de bas phongs pas bas mthar bdag mi mchi/ /gang gi slad du mchi ba gsan du gsol/ /skye bo mya ngan gdungs
<p>68a.4</p>pa'i mchi ma can dag gis/ /bdag ni rab tu byung bar gyur ces rab tu bsgrags/ /bdag ni yon tan ldan zhes dad pa'i skabs su gyur/ /de bas bdag ni bas mtha' dben par gnas par 'tshal/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod skye bo rnams kyi tshig tsam gyis nged 'dor bar mi
<p>68a.5</p>rigs so/ /khyod lta bu'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bo'i tshig bsrung ba tsam gyis chog pa yang ma yin la/ de ma byas na mi rung ba yang ma yin no/ /'jig rten mu cor smra ba'i gtam rnams ni/ /rang gar rtogs pa rnams la rnam par 'phro/ /gang zhig de dag snying la
<p>68a.6</p>sems na yang / /phyas su 'gyur na byed pa ci zhig smos/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po de skad bka' mi stsal du gsol/ skye bo'i bka' mchid dge ba grags pa rnams la ltar mi bgyid pa yang ma lags so/ /lha gzigs su gsol/ mi
<p>68a.7</p>yi bdag po gang tshe dge ba yi/ /chos dang ldan zhes grags par gyur pa las/ /mi yi de las nyams par mi bgyi zhing / /ngo tsha'i phyir yang rab tu 'bad par rigs/ /yon tan yod ces grags shing re ba dag /ji ltar gyur kyang rung ste gnang na ni/ /grags pa dag
<p>68b</p>
<p>68b.1</p>las gtam snyan 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gzhan du bgyis na khron pa skam po bzhin/ /don bzhin ma yin yon tan grags mi 'phel/ /rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gis bskyod pa las/ /mi rnams grags pa nyams par gyur pa ni/ /slar yang grags par 'gyur ba rab tu dka'/ /
<p>68b.2</p>sbrul nag khros nas gdeng ka bteg 'dra ba'i/ /yongs su bzung ba rtsod pa'i rgyur gyur cing / /spang rigs de ni spong bar bgyid pa la/ /lha gcig bdag ni bzlog par mi rigs so/ /gus par mkhyen nas 'bangs la byams pa yi/ /khyod kyis de ltar bgyi ba
<p>68b.3</p>rigs mod kyi/ /bdag gis sems kyi rab tu byung lags na/ /'du 'dzi nyon mongs can gyis ci zhig bgyi/ /de ltar gsol ba btab nas/ bdag nyid chen po de rgyal pos gnang ste/ dka' thub can gyi nags tshal du 'gro bar chas so/ /de nas de'i mdza' bo dang / nye
<p>68b.4</p>du dang / de la brten pa rnams lhags nas/ mya ngan gyis mig mchi mas gang zhing rkang pa la 'jus te 'gro bar mi ster bar gyur pa ni/ kha cig gis thal mo sbyar te gsol ba 'debs shing / de'i lam bkag ste 'khod do/ /kha cig ni mgul nas 'jus te tshig 'jam
<p>68b.5</p>pos brid cing khyim logs su khrid par byed/ kha cig ni spobs pa'i tshul gyis tshig rtsub mos gtol med pa sha stag byed zer zhing gshe/ kha cig ni mdza' bo dang nang mi la ni snying mi rje'am zhes zer zhing 'gror mi ster/ la la ni khyim na gnas pa'i dka' thub nyid bsod nams
<p>68b.6</p>che mod zhes zer zhing / rnar 'ong ba dang rigs pa'i tshig gis rtogs pa bskyed/ gzhan dag ni dka' thub kyi nags tshal na gnas pa sdug bsngal che ba dang / da dung bya ba kha cig ma zin pa yong pa skad du gsol ba 'debs/ kha cig ni tshe phyi ma la bsod nams
<p>68b.7</p>kyi 'bras bu yod dam med gtol med ces the tshom bskyed de/ gzhung lugs kyi khyad par de dang de dag smos shing / de slar ci ldog tu 'bad par gyur to/ /de de ltar rab tu byung du mi ster ba nags tshal du 'gro ba la 'gog cing 'then pa/ gdong mchi mas gang ba'i
<p>69a</p>
<p>69a.1</p>mdza' bo de dag la bltas nas/ 'di ltar sems par mngon no/ /mdza' bo 'tham pas mdza' bo bag med pa/ /phan par 'gyur na rtsub mo'ang sbyar ba rigs/ /phan zhing 'jam na smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ /dam pa rnams kyi tshul ni de ltar
<p>69a.2</p>yin/ /nags pas khyim dga' snyam du 'di ltar sems/ /nags na gnas pa dogs shing 'jigs med par/ /tha mal gnas par ji ltar mi sems kye/ /sdig pas gos pa bzhin du 'gog par byed/ /mi dag shi 'am shi bar gyur pa la/ /chos las nyams na
<p>69a.3</p>ngu bar 'gyur ba bzhin/ /nags tshal gnas 'dod nga ni gson bzhin du/ /ci zhig sems shing 'di dag ngu bar gyur/ /nga dang bral bas de ltar mi dga' na/ /nga dang lhan cig nags na cir mi 'khod/ /gal te ngu bas khyim na 'khod dga' na/ /mchi ma zad par ngu ba ci ched
<p>69a.4</p>che/ /de ste bdag gi mi la chags pa'i phyir/ /dka' thub byed du 'gro bar mi ster na/ /dgra dang dmag 'gyed de dang de dag tu/ /'gro ba na yang de ltar cis mi byed/ /phongs par gyur pa'i tshe na mdza' bo rnams/ /mchi mas 'ju zhing 'ong ba'i mthu yang
<p>69a.5</p>mthong / /mdza' ba'i rang bzhin rab tu brten gyur kyang / /phyi bzhin mi 'brang g.yo dang thabs byed bzhin/ /slar du bzlog pa'i phyir ni skad 'dzer zhing / /mig ni mchi mas gang bzhin smras pa dang / /mtshungs pa la yang bla ma 'dra bar ni/ /mgo bo btud de
<p>69a.6</p>bdag la phyag 'tshal ba/ /rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab byung ba/ /'di dag byams na de bzhin bya bar rigs/ /dam pa'i sems ni ngo mtshar gyur pa yi/ /gar mkhan spyod pa bzhin du mi 'gyur ram/ /yon tan med la phongs par gyur pa'i tshe/ /grogs
<p>69a.7</p>la gnyis gsum yod par nges par 'gyur/ /yon tan yod bzhin nags su 'gro ba na/ /grogs po gcig kyang med pa ngo mtshar che/ /glong chen smyon pa'i g.yul ngo dogs pa na/ /nga yi sngon du 'gro zhing sgrib pa dag /nags su nga 'gro'i phyir ni mi 'brang ba/ /de
<p>69b</p>
<p>69b.1</p>dag yin nam nga yang de ma yin/ /de ltar byams pa med par 'gyur ba'i rgyu/ /nyes pa byas par bdag ni mi dran nam/ /bdag ni mdza' bo 'di ltar 'khon bzhin du/ /'di ltar gyur pa rung bar 'ong ngam kye/ /bdag ni nags su 'gro phyir mi 'brang ba/ /
<p>69b.2</p>bdag la yon tan med pas de ltar grang / /yon tan dag la rjes su chags pa rnams/ /de ltar 'bral bar nus pa su zhig yod/ /gang dag khyim gyi nyes pa gsal bar mngon/ /dka' thub nags tshal yon tan mi mthong ba/ /shes pa'i mig ni btsums
<p>69b.3</p>gyur de dag la/ /bdag gi gzhan du brtag tu ci yang med/ /phyi ma'i tshe dang tshe 'di'i sdug bsngal rgyu/ /'dod pa dag ni spong bar mi 'dod pa/ /dka' thub nags dang 'gal bar byed pa de/ /de ring bdag 'dod pa ni gti mug yin/ /bdag gi mdza'
<p>69b.4</p>bo 'di rnams gang gis bslus/ /'jig rten ma lus zhi bar ma gyur pa/ /dka' thub nags tshal rnyed pa'i mthu chen gyis/ /nyes pa de dag mngon du gzhom par byed/ /de ltar nges pa'i bdag nyid can gyis yongs brtags nas/ /mdza' bshes spobs pa rnams kyi rnam
<p>69b.5</p>par spyod pa dag /'jam zhing rab tu mnyen par smra ba'i tshig rnams kyis/ /bags kyis brid de bor nas dka' thub nags su song / /de lta bas na yon tan med pa la yod par grags pa ni skyes bu dge ba rnams la bskul ma 'debs pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ /de bas
<p>69b.6</p>na yon tan bsgrub pa la 'bad par bya'o/ /de ltar dge slong ngo zhe'am dge bsnyen no zhes yon tan du brjod par gyur na/ dge ba rnams kyis yon tan de bsgrub pa'i phyir bdag yon tan gyis brgyan par bya'o/ /de bzhin du chos sgrub pa'i grogs byed pa rab tu dkon no zhes de ltar yang
<p>69b.7</p>sbyar bar bya'o/ /tshong dpon du skyes pa'i rabs te nyi shu pa'o/ /sdom la/ brgya byin bram ze myos byed ma/ /legs par pha rol phyin dang nya/ /bya dang bum pa phyug po'i bu/ /dka' thub can dang tshong dpon no/ /bcu tshan gnyis pa'o// //
<p>70a</p>
<p>70a.1</p>khro ba thul na dgra zhi bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du byas na dgra 'phel lo/ /de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' chen po bram ze'i rigs chen po yon tan la goms pa'i mthus grags pa rgyas pa'i 'byor pa'i yon tan nges pa/ rgyal pos bkur sti byas
<p>70a.2</p>pas/ 'jig rten pas lha bzhin du bkur ba cig tu skyes par gyur to zhes grags so/ /de yun ring du gyur nas cho ga'i las su bya ba rnams ni byas pa dang / mang du thos pa'i yon tan la goms par byas pas mkhas pa rnams kyi nang du ming grags par gyur to/ /mkhas pa
<p>70a.3</p>rnams kyi grags pa ni/ /mkhas pa nyid kyi nang du 'phel/ /rin chen shel la rin chen dang / /g.yul ngo dag tu dpa' bo bzhin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de tshe rabs snga ma la rab tu byung ba la goms shing chos la sems goms par byas pa dang / blo dang shes
<p>70a.4</p>rab rab tu gsal ba'i phyir khyim na gnas pa dag d+hil dga' bar ma gyur to/ /de 'dod pa rnams 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang dregs pa dang / 'khon dang mi mthun pa mang po dang / rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / chu dang / me dang / dgra dang / bgo skal la dbang ba rnams dang / thun mong ma
<p>70a.5</p>yin pa dang / chog mi shes par gyur pa dang / nyes pa mang po'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir bdag cag la phan par 'dod pa rnams/ zas dug can spong ba bzhin du yongs su spangs nas skra dang kha spu bzang po rnams bregs te/ gos kha dog bsgyur ba ngur smrig ni gyon/ khyim pa'i cha
<p>70a.6</p>lugs ni bor/ rab tu byung ba'i 'dul ba dang sdom pa'i dpal la gnas par gyur pa dang / de'i chung ma de la snying nye ba'i dbang du gyur pa yang skra bregs te/ lus la rgyan dang lhab lhub ni med par byas/ rang bzhin gyi yon tan mang pos ni brgyan/ gos ngur smrig ni gyon nas de'i phyi
<p>70a.7</p>bzhin du rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dka' thub kyi nags tshal du 'gro ba'i rjes su 'brang bar shes nas/ bud med sdug ma myong ba dka' thub kyi nags tshal la gnas mi nus pa'i phyir de la smras pa/ bzang mo khyod nga la byams pa'i rang bzhin
<p>70b</p>
<p>70b.1</p>bstan zin gyi/ khyod nga'i phyi bzhin du 'gro bar chas pa thong shig /bud med rab tu byung ba gzhan dag gang na 'khod pa de dag dang lhan cig 'dug pa'i rigs so/ /dgon pa'i nags na 'dug pa ni rab tu dka'o/ /ltos shig dur khrod dang ni khang stong ri bo dang / /nags
<p>70b.2</p>tshal gcan gzan khro bos gang ba na/ /nyi ma gang du nub par gyur pa der/ /dka' thub can rnams gnas byed 'khod par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan byed cing rtag par gcig pur gnas/ /bud med dag ni bltar yang med par byed/ /khyod kyi 'bad pa 'di ni ci zhig dgos/ /
<p>70b.3</p>de bas khyed blo slar du log par gyis/ /de yang de'i phyi bzhin du 'gro bar yid dam bcas pas mig mchi mas gang bzhin du cung zad cig 'di skad slar smras so/ /khyod kyi phyi bzhin 'gro ba la/ /bdag ni gal te nyon mongs na/ /bdag sdug khyod kyang mi dgyes bzhin/ /ci yi
<p>70b.4</p>slad du de ltar bgyi/ /bdag ni khyod dang bral bzhin du/ /mchis par nus pa ma lags kyis/ /de ltar bka' dang 'gal ba ni/ /bdag la bzod par mdzad du gsol/ /de ltar de lan gnyis lan gsum du bsgo yang slar log tu ma rung ba dang / de nas byang chub sems
<p>70b.5</p>dpas de la cang mi smras pa dang / bya ngur pa'i phyi bzhin du ngur pa mo 'brang ba dang 'dra bar de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/ grong dang ljongs su rgyu zhing song song ba las/ zas kyi bya ba byas nas re zhig cig nags tshal rab tu dben pa nyams dga' ba shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ 
<p>70b.6</p>grib ma stug pa/ la la dag na nyi ma'i 'od zer tig tig po dag gis me tog sil ma bkram pa ltar 'dug pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyi phye mas khebs pa'i sa gzhi gtsang ma cig tu bsam gtan gyi cho ga byas nas phyi dro'i dus su ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ phyag dar khrod kyi
<p>70b.7</p>tshem bu drub cing 'dug go/ /bud med rab tu byung ba de yang de dang mi ring ba cig na rang gi lus kyi gzi mdangs lha mo dang 'dra bar mdzes pas shin tu brgyan pa bzhin du 'dug cing / yid la bya ba'i man ngag des bstan pa'i tshul bzhin du bsam gtan byed cing 'dug go/ /de nas
<p>71a</p>
<p>71a.1</p>yul de'i rgyal pos sa phyogs de dang nye ba'i nags tshal/ dpyid kyi dus la bab pa'i shing lo lhag par mdzes pa dang ni ldan/ bung ba che phra mang po'i sgra ti ri ri zer/ bya ko ki la mang po ni sgra snyan pa 'byin/ mtsho'i gnas rab tu nyams dga' ba me tog
<p>71a.2</p>pad+ma dang / ut+pa la kha bye ba ni rab tu dgod pa bzhin du 'dug pa/ me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyi bsung gis bsgos pa'i ser bu'i ngad nyams su bde ba dang ldan pa yod pa nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing song song ba las phyogs der phyin to/ /me tog sna tshogs tshom bu rab tu mdzes/ /
<p>71a.3</p>dpyid kyi dpal gyi ched du bshams pa bzhin/ /ko ki la dang rma bya'i sgra yang 'byin/ /mtsho gnas bzang po chu skyes me tog ldan/ /ne'u gsing sngon po mdzes pa'i rtswa 'jam yod/ /bung ba myos pa'i nags tshal sgra 'byin dag /'dod pa'i lha yi rtsed mo'i gnas gyur 'dra/ /
<p>71a.4</p>yid la lta ba rab tu 'dod par gyur/ /de nas rgyal po de dul zhing zhe sa bskyed de/ byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba'i gtam byas nas/ de dang nye ba'i phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /des bud med de rab tu byung ba mthong nas yid rab tu 'phrog par 'gyur ba de mthong nas/ 
<p>71a.5</p>de'i gzugs bzang ba de la snying chags par gyur te/ de ni chung ma yin yang dag go snyam nas/ 'dod pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa'i phyir de 'phrog pa'i thabs bsam mo/ /dka' thub can gyi dmod pa me 'bar ba'i/ /mthu ni khro bo'i me 'bar de shes nas/ /yid la
<p>71a.6</p>'dod pa bstan pas g.yengs gyur kyang / /de la 'phral du brnyas thabs ma byas so/ /des bsams pa/ de'i dka' thub kyi mthu shes par byas la nus na ni de bya bar rigs kyi/ de lta ma yin na ni mi rung ngo snyam nas/ gal te 'di de la sems chags pa'i dbang du gyur
<p>71a.7</p>na ni/ de la dka' thub kyi mthu med gor ma chags so/ /de ste 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na ni de la mi lta bar rigs so/ /de bas de'i dka' thub kyi mthu che'am chung brtag go snyam nas/ rgyal po des dka' thub kyi mthu brtag pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' la
<p>71b</p>
<p>71b.1</p>phan par dga' ba bzhin du smras pa/ kye rab tu byung ba khyod 'jig rten 'di na mi g.yon can dang thub chod can rab tu mang na/ nags tshal dben pa rab mda' bzlog tu yang med pa 'di lta bu na chung ma 'di lta bu dang lhan cig 'khod du rung ngam/ khyod kyi chung ma 'di la 'ga'
<p>71b.2</p>zhig gis gtses na ni nga la yang gshe bar 'gyur ro ltos shig /dben pa'i gnas na dka' thub chung ma pa/ /'ga' zhig chos dang bcas te brnyas byas nas/ /chung ma 'di ni mngon sum phrogs gyur na/ /mya ngan byed las gzhan ni ci byar yod/ /khro ba bskyed na'ang
<p>71b.3</p>yid ni 'khrugs 'gyur zhing / /chos dang 'gal ba grags pa med par 'gyur/ /de bas 'di ni grong du bzhag par rigs/ /dka' thub can la bud med bsnyen ci dgos/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rgyal pos gsungs pa'ang mad na gal te de ltar gyur na
<p>71b.4</p>bdag gis ci ltar bgyi ba gsan du gsol/ rgyags pas snyems sam gal te ma brtags par/ /bdag la gnod par byed pa 'dir byung na/ /sa rdul stug po char pas mnan pa bzhin/ /bdag nyid gson bzhin de ni yong mi gtang / /de nas rgyal po des bsams pa/ 
<p>71b.5</p>'di ni chung ma 'di la rab tu chags pas dka' thub kyi mthu med do snyam nas/ sems dpa' chen po la brnyas par gyur to/ /des gnod pa byas su mi dogs la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi dbang du yang gyur pas/ bud med de mthong ba'i mi rnams la bsgos pa/ khyed rnams song la
<p>71b.6</p>bud med rab tu byung ba de pho brang gi nang du khrid cig ces bsgos so/ /bud med rab tu byung ba des de skad zer ba thos nas nags tshal gyi ri dwags mo gcan gzan ma rungs pas gtses pa bzhin du 'jigs shing bag tsha bas ngo 'dzum ni gyur mig mchi mas gang skad ni 'dzer phongs nas
<p>71b.7</p>smre sngags 'di skad bton to/ /'jig rten phongs shing dgra yis gtses gyur na/ /rgyal po dag la pha bzhin skyabs tshol na/ /de nyid gang la mi rigs byas gyur na/ /de yis su la pha skyabs btsal bar bya/ /kye ma ho 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshul las nyams/ /gang dag phongs
<p>72a</p>
<p>72a.1</p>pa legs par mi skyong ba/ /'on te med dam shi bar gyur tam ci/ /chos kyang grags pa tsam du zad par lta/ /jo bo bzhugs bzhin lha yis ci zhig bya/ /gzhan zhig yin na'ang rjes su bsrung rigs na/ /sdig can rnams kyis bdag
<p>72a.2</p>ni khrid bzhin du/ /bdag la skal ba med pas cang mi gsungs/ /bdag la dmod pa'i ser ba bab gyur na/ /ri yi gzugs kyang mi snang dran gyur pa/ /bdag ni 'di ltar gyur kyang cang mi smra/ /'on kyang byur ngan ma ni cung zad gson/ /bdag ni 'di ltar rab tu
<p>72a.3</p>phongs gyur kyang / /snying rje'i snod du ma gyur snying re rje/ /phongs la snying rje can gyis bskyab bya ba/ /'di ni dka' thub can gyi tshul min nam/ /bdag ni slad du bzlog kyang ma log par/ /de nyid da rung thugs la 'chang ba 'dra/ /khyod ni mi dgyes bzhin du bdag mchis
<p>72a.4</p>pa/ /kye ma bdag dgar bgyis pa ga la srid/ /de ltar bud med rab tu byung ba des snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don la ngu ba tsam la brten pa rgyal pos bsgos pa'i mi de rnams kyis/ sems dpa' chen pos de mthong bzhin shing rta'i steng du bzhag ste/ pho brang gi nang
<p>72a.5</p>du khrid par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang so sor brtags pa'i mthus khro ba'i stobs bcings te/ de bzhin du sems 'khrug pa med cing rab tu zhi bar phyag dar khrod pa'i tshem bu drub cing 'dug go/ /de nas de la rgyal pos smras pa/ mi bzod khro ba'i dbang
<p>72a.6</p>du gyur pa'i tshig /khyod kyis bsnyems shing gsang bstod smras zin na/ /nyon mongs ma de mthong zhing phrogs gyur kyang / /mthu med zhum nas rab tu zhi bar 'dug /de bas rang gi mthu rtsal bstan par gyis/ /dka' thub gnas pa'i gzi brjid bstsags pa'ang
<p>72a.7</p>ston/ /bdag gi tshod kyang bzung ba ma shes nas/ /khas 'ches don med lhag pa ma mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rgyal po bdag gis yid dam bcas pa'i don ma mchis par ma lags kyis/ mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ gang zhig bdag la gnod par
<p>72b</p>
<p>72b.1</p>bgyid pa de/ /g.yo bzhin du yang bdag gis yang ma btang / /bdag gis mngon sum du yang zhi bar bgyis/ /de bas bdag gis yid dam bcas bzhin gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshig rab tu brtan pa dang rab tu zhi ba'i tshul ston pa des/ dka' thub
<p>72b.2</p>can gyi yon tan yod par yid ches par gyur nas bsams pa/ bram ze 'dis ni gzhan zhig la bsams nas smras pa lta zhig na/ bdag gis de ma shes par 'di lta bu mi brtan par byas so snyam ste rtog pa skyes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ rnam par g.yo
<p>72b.3</p>bzhin khyod kyis ma btang ba/ /khyod la gnod byed de ni su zhig yin/ /char pa bab pas rdul phran bkab pa bzhin/ /khyod kyis gang zhig rab tu zhi bar byas/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po gsan du gsol/ skyes na'ang gang zhig mi mngon la/ /
<p>72b.4</p>ma skyes pa ni dge ba mngon/ /bdag la gnod pa'i khro ba de/ /bdag gis shor bar ma gyur to/ /mi phan 'dod pa'i mi rnams ni/ /nam zhig skyes na dga' 'gyur ba/ /dgra rnams dga' 'gyur khro ba de/ /bdag gis khro bar ma gyur to/ /gang zhig skyes par
<p>72b.5</p>gyur na ni/ /dam pa'i don la spyod mi 'gyur/ /rgyal po log par spyod pa yi/ /khro ba de la bdag mi gnas/ /gang gis zil gnon dge ba gtong 'gyur ba/ /don rnams grub kyang nyams par 'gyur ba yin/ /khro ba ma rungs gdon gyis bsgyur ba 'dra/ /tshul min
<p>72b.6</p>byed pa gdon gyis zin pa'o/ /gtsub shing gtsubs pa las ni me byung na/ /de nyid rab tu tshig par 'gyur 'dra ba/ /log par rtog las 'bar bar 'gyur ba yin/ /khro bas de bzhin bdag nyid phung bar byed/ /rab tu 'bar zhing tshig pa'i me 'dra ba/ /snying la gdung ba'i
<p>72b.7</p>khro ba ma mchis na/ /spong bar gyur pas de la gtam ngan 'byung / /nang bar nam langs zla ba'i 'od nyams bzhin/ /gzhan la gnod par bya bar mi sems par/ /khro ba la ni dgra bzhin gang lta ba/ /de yi grags pa nges par rgyas par 'gyur/ /zla ba yar gyi 'od zer
<p>73a</p>
<p>73a.1</p>gsal ba bzhin/ /khro ba la ni nyes dmigs chen po 'di/ /'di lta bu ni gzhan dag kyang yod de/ /khro ba'i me yis bzhin mdangs nyams gyur na/ /rgyan gyis brgyan yang bzang por yong mi snang / /mal stan bzang po dag la nyal gyur kyang / /
<p>73a.2</p>khro ba'i zug rngus sems ni sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /bdag la phan pa'i don grub byed gyur te/ /khro bas gdungs nas lam ngan 'gro bar byed/ /grags dang don grub pa las nyams gyur te/ /zla ba mar gyi ngo bzhin dpal las nyams/ /mdza' bshes dag gis rab tu gcugs
<p>73a.3</p>gyur kyang / /khro bar mi rigs g.yang sar lhung bar 'gyur/ /phan dang gnod pa sems las blo nyams na/ /phal cher 'gal zhing sems ni rmongs par 'gyur/ /khro bas sdig pa'i lam ni goms byas pas/ /ngan song dag tu lan brgyar sdug bsngal 'byung / /gnod
<p>73a.4</p>pa chen por byas pas shar gnyer ba'i/ /dgras kyang de la lhag par ci byar yod/ /khro ba 'di ni nang gi dgra/ /bdag gis de ltar shes nas su/ /de yi mthu ni khro ba dag /skyes bu su zhig bzod par byed/ /de bas bdag ni gson bzhin du/ /khro ba g.yos kyang ma shor ro/ /
<p>73a.5</p>phung par byed pa'i dgra bo de/ /su zhig yal bar dor mi byed/ /de nas de'i rab tu zhi ba'i yon tan rmad du byung ba dang tshig snying la bab pa des rgyal po de'i yid rab tu mgu bar gyur nas smras pa/ khyod kyis smra ba'i rim 'di dang / /zhi ba'i rjes su mthun pa 'di/ /mang du smos kyang ci
<p>73a.6</p>dgos te/ /khyod dang ma 'phrad brlag par 'gyur/ /de skad ces bstod nas drung du bsnyen te/ de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ sdig pa byas pa yang bshags so/ /bud med rab tu byung ba de la yang bzod par gsol nas slar btang ngo / /bdag nyid kyang byang chub sems
<p>73a.7</p>dpa'i g.yog tu khas blangs so/ /de lta bas na khro ba thul bar gyur na dgra zhi bar 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du byas na dgra 'phel lo/ /de bas na khro ba thul bar bya ba la 'bad par bya'o/ /de ltar na khon du 'dzin pa med na dgra zhi bar 'gyur la dul bar byas na dgra mi 'phel lo/ /de
<p>73b</p>
<p>73b.1</p>bzhin du mi khro ba ni gnyis ka'i don spyod par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzod pa'i phan yon 'byung ba'i mdo sde dag la sbyar bar bya'o/ /khro ba'i nyes dmigs kyi gtam bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid la brjod par bya'o/ /gtsug phud
<p>73b.2</p>byang chub tu skyes pa'i rabs te nyi shu gcig pa'o// //bam po bdun pa/ dam pa rnams dud 'gror lhung ba'i spyod pa la yang / skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa rnams kyis rjes su mthun par bya ba tsam yang mi nus so/ /de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
<p>73b.3</p>yid bzhin gyi rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na/ ngang pa'i khyu chen po brgya stong phrag du ma grangs mang po'i bdag po ngang pa'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung zhes bya bar gyur to/ /zhes grags so/ /de'i blon po ngang pa'i rgyal po rigs pa dang mi rigs pa yongs su shes par bya ba la mkhas
<p>73b.4</p>pa yun ring por yang dran pa'i mthu dang ldan pa/ rigs mthon po'i nang nas gtso bor gyur pa/ mkhas pa dang des pa dang dul bas brgyan pa brtan pa dang gtsang sbra dang tshul khrims dang spyod tshul dang spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa/ dpa' la sdug bsngal bzod cing bag yod pa/ 
<p>73b.5</p>g.yul ngor 'gyed pa'i dgra thabs la mkhas shing mi 'jigs pa jo bo la snying nye zhing legs par lta ba bzhin bzang zhes bya ba zhig kyang yod par gyur te/ de'i tshe de ltar gyur pa de yang gnas brtan 'phags pa kun dga' bo yin no/ /de gnyis gcig la gcig byams shing mdza'
<p>73b.6</p>ba'i yon tan gyi gzhis yon tan gyi mthu rab tu che bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gnyis ka la phan par 'byung bar bya ba'i don du legs par 'jog pa ni/ slob dpon dang slob ma'i gtso bo gzhan rnams ni slob ma phal ba bzhin/ rnam pa gcig tu na pha dang bu rab thu bo bzhin gzhan ni bu phal
<p>73b.7</p>ba bzhin no/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / grul bum dang / rig sngags 'chang dang / dka' thub can mngon sum du mthong ba rnams rab tu ngo mtshar che bar gyur to/ /de gnyis ngang pa'i tshogs rnams 'khod pa de'i/ /bde ba'i lus 'degs spyod pa gcig tu gyur/ /
<p>74a</p>
<p>74a.1</p>mkha' la rgyu bar byed pa'i 'dab ma gnyis/ /lus 'degs phyir ni spyod pa gcig pa bzhin/ /de ltar de gnyis kyis ngang pa'i tshogs de dag rjes su skyong ba ni chos dang srid dar ba gnyis kyis mi rnams rjes su bskyang ba bzhin du rab tu dar bar gyur
<p>74a.2</p>pa des mtsho de yang rab tu mdzes par gyur to/ /ngang pa mang po tshogs pa yi/ /sgra snyan yid du 'ong ba de/ /pad+ma dkar po 'gyu ba bzhin/ /mtsho de rab tu mdzes par byas/ /la la ngang pa so sor gyes/ /kha cig tu ni phang phung chas/ /mkha' la sprin rnams gyes
<p>74a.3</p>phung ba'i/ /mdzes pa'i dpal yang zil gyis non/ /de nas ngang pa'i rgyal po sems can thams cad la phan par dga' ba de dang / blon po ngang pa'i sde dpon bzhin bzang bya ba de'i yon tan khyad par can gyi mthu chen pos yid la ya mtshan cher gyur pa'i grub pa dang drang srong
<p>74a.4</p>rig sngags 'chang ba dang lha mang po rnams de gnyis kyi grags pa'i gzhi las gyur pa'i gtam 'ba' zhig 'dzer zhing de dang de dag na 'khod do/ /gser mchog btso ma'i kha dog 'dra ba'i mdog /dpal ldan lus can tshig 'bru gsal bar smra/ /dul zhing rig pa chos kyi tshul las
<p>74a.5</p>byung / /ngang pa'i lus can 'di gnyis nges par gzhan/ /phrag dog med pas yon tan bsgrags pa dang / /de gnyis grags pa phyogs su rgyas par gyur/ /rgyal po rnams kyang de la dad pa skyes/ /dam pa tshogs sar skyes dang 'dra bar gyur/ /de'i tshe yul bA rA Na
<p>74a.6</p>sIr rgyal po tshangs byin bya ba zhig yod de/ des ngang pa'i rgyal po de dang ngang pa'i sde dpon de'i yon tan khyad par can gyi gtam/ blon po yid ches pa dang bram ze rgan po rnams kyis tshogs pa'i nang du gleng bslangs pa la lan du ma zhig thos te/ de gnyis lhag par lta 'dod nas/ /
<p>74a.7</p>blon po bka' la gtogs pa'i gtsug lag du ma la goms shing mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa rnams la smras ba/ kye ngang pa'i mchog de gnyis ci nas kyang nga'i spyan sngar brim du rung ba'i thabs bzang po 'ga' zhig tshol cig /de nas blon po de dag gis rang rang gi blo la ci dran pa dang
<p>74b</p>
<p>74b.1</p>gzhung lugs dag dang yang sbyar te rgyal po la gsol pa/ sems can rnams ni bde ba 'chal/ /bde bar gyur pa'i yon tan mchog /de dang de nas 'gugs par bgyid/ /de bas de thos de gnyis mchis/ /de bas na mtsho gang na de gnyis mngon par dga' bar gyur
<p>74b.2</p>pa'i bka' mchid gda' ba de bas kyang / yon tan khyad du 'phags pa'i mtsho zhig /yul 'dir yang dgon pa'i sa phyogs gcig tu bgyid du stsal la/ gdugs re re zhing yang bya thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i sgra bsgrags shing / ci nas kyang ngo mtshar cher
<p>74b.3</p>gyur pa'i bde ba'i yo byad kyi yon tan khyad par can thos nas/ de gnyis 'dir mchi bar 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi bar rigs so/ /lha gzigs su gsol/ lha gcig sems can phal cher ni/ /bde ba rnyed pa khyad du gsod/ /thos nas bde ba'i dga' ba dag /
<p>74b.4</p>gud du 'dug kyang yid 'phrog gyur/ /de nas rgyal po des bsams pa/ de bden no snyam nas ring por ma lon par gong khyer gyi skyed mos tshal dang ha cang mi ring ba cig tu yid bzhin gyi mtsho'i longs spyod kyi yon tan la 'gran du rung ba me tog pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu
<p>74b.5</p>ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / sau gan d+hi ka dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / ku mu ta dmar pos khebs shing chu gtsang mas gang ba/ rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i mtsho chen po cig byed du bcug go/ /ljon shing me tog bzang ldan zhing / /lo ma bzang po 'od gsal rnams/ /de la ltad
<p>74b.6</p>mo ltar lhags bzhin/ /mtsho yi mtha' ma yongs su bskor/ /pad+ma rnams ni dgod pa bzhin/ /chu rlabs 'khrug pas g.yo bar gyur/ /de la chags pa'i bung ba rnams/ /g.yo zhing 'phur ba mang pos gang / /kha cig na ni zla 'od kyis/ /kha bye ku mu ta dag dang / /
<p>74b.7</p>shing gi grib mas bar bcad pas/ /kha cig zla ba'i dum bu 'dra/ /pad+ma ut+pal phye ba rnams/ /rlabs kyis sor mos bris pa bzhin/ /mtsho yi 'gram dag rab tu brgyan/ /kha cig gser phye'i ri mo bzhin/ /pad+ma ut+pal 'dab ma dag /ge sar bcas pa de dang der/ /
<p>75a</p>
<p>75a.1</p>me tog sil ma bkram pa bzhin/ /rab tu nyams dga' rnam par mdzes/ /chu ni rab gsal mi g.yo bas/ /lus kyi yon tan gsal mdzes pa'i/ /nya yi tshogs ni mang po dag /mkha' la rgyu ba 'dra bas brgyan/ /la la mu tig phreng bcad bzhin/ /
<p>75a.2</p>glang chen sna nas bus pa dang / /brag la phog pa'i chu 'phros pas/ /rlabs kyi phye ma rab tu 'phro/ /rig 'dzin na chung khrus bya zhing / /glang chen rgyal ba'i bsung dag dang / /me tog rnams kyi phye ma yis/ /kha cig tu ni bsung bsgos bzhin/ /
<p>75a.3</p>zla ba'i chung ma skar ma rnams/ /spyi yi gdong lta me long bzhin/ /bya rnams dga' ba mang pos gang / /de yi sgra snyan rab tu grags/ /mtsho chen po de lta bur bya mang po dag thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad dgag pa med pa de lta bu byed du bcug nas de dag la byin te bya rnams
<p>75a.4</p>yid ches par bya ba'i phyir/ nyin re zhing yang mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i sgra sgrog tu bcug go/ /mtsho 'di me tog pad+ma dang / /ut+pal 'dab mas gang ba'i chu/ /rgyal pos bya rnams kun la sbyin/ /dga' zhing mi 'jigs yon tan bcas/ /de nas re zhig cig ston gyi
<p>75a.5</p>dus la bab pa'i tshe/ sprin gyi mun pa yol ba ltar sgrib pa ni med/ ston gyi dus su yon tan bzang po ni byung / phyogs rnams ni gsal ba ltar snang / me tog pad+ma mang po kha phye bas ni mdzes par gyur/ mtsho'i chu rnams ni rab tu dwangs shing yid du 'ong bar gyur/ zla ba ni
<p>75a.6</p>gzi mdangs kyi mchog dang ldan zhing 'od zer rab tu 'phel ba bzhin du gyur/ sa gzhi ni me tog rnam pa mang po phun sum tshogs pas brgyan par gyur/ bya ngang pa gzhon nu mang po ni rgyu bar gyur pa'i tshe/ yid bzhin gyi mtsho'i nang nas ngang pa mang po 'khod pa de'i nang nas ngang pa
<p>75a.7</p>khyo shug gnyis/ ston gyi dus nyams dga' ba'i tshe yul ljongs su rgyu zhing mthar gyis song song ba las rgyal po de'i yul du phyin to/ /de na yang bya mang po ni sgra 'byin/ bung ba mang po ni sgra ti ri ri zer/ ser bu bsil ba langs pas rlabs kyi phreng ba 'khrigs par
<p>75b</p>
<p>75b.1</p>byas shing kho ra khor yug tu me tog pad+ma dang / ut+pa la'i dri zhim po'i ngad ni ldang / pad+ma kha bye ba rnams ni 'bar ba bzhin/ me tog ku mu ta dkar po rnams ni dgod pa bzhin du 'dug pa'i mtsho de mthong bar gyur to/ /ngang pa khyo shug gnyis po de yid bzhin gyi mtsho na
<p>75b.2</p>'khod kyang / mtsho de'i dpal rab tu yid du 'ong ba mthong nas/ rab tu ya mtshan che zhing rang gi ngang pa'i tshogs kyang rjes su dran par gyur te/ e ma ho/ /ngang pa'i tshogs de dag kyang 'dir lhags kyang ci ma rung snyam nas/ 'jig rten pa ni phal cher du/ /spyi yi bde ba
<p>75b.3</p>myong nas ni/ /byams shing rjes su chags pa yis/ /mdza' bshes thog mar dran par 'gyur/ /de nas ngang pa khyo shug gnyis po de na re/ ji srid 'dod pa 'khod 'khod nas/ dbyar gyi dus su bab pa dang glog 'gyu ba ni mtshon cha 'debs pa 'dra/ sprin gyis
<p>75b.4</p>khebs pa'i mun pa ni ha cang mi gnag /sprin gyi tshogs mang po 'du ba ni lha ma yin gyi dmag tshogs 'du ba bzhin/ rma bya'i mdongs yongs su rgyas pa ni mdzes par gyur/ rma bya'i sgra cong cong bu 'byin pa ni dbyar sprin rnams rgyal bar gyur pa bzhin du mgu bar byed/ 
<p>75b.5</p>rma bya mang po ni gar sna tshogs byed/ bya bran mang po ni sgra sna tshogs 'byin cing rnam par rgyu/ me tog ka dam pa dang / sardza dang / ardzu na dang / ke ta ka'i dri zhim pos bsgos pa'i ser bu bsil ba'i ngad ldang ba ni nags tshal dbugs 'byin pa bzhin/ bya mang po'i phreng ba brgyus
<p>75b.6</p>pa ni sprin gyi so'i phreng ba gtams pa bzhin/ ngang pa'i tshogs rnams ni gud du 'dong 'dod pas/ sgra cher mi 'byin zhing 'gro chas byed pa de bzhin du ngang pa khyo shug gnyis po de yang yid bzhin gyi mtsho de nyid du slar song ngo / /ngang pa'i bdag po'i drung du lhags nas kyang yul dang phyogs
<p>75b.7</p>kyi gtam gleng bslang ba'i tshe/ mtsho de'i yon tan khyad par can de gleng ngo / /lha gangs ri'i lho phyogs na yul bA rA NA sI zhes bgyi ba na rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis te/ des mtsho chen po rmad du byung ba/ bzang ba/ yon tan che ba brjod kyis mi lang ba cig bya rnams la rang dgar
<p>76a</p>
<p>76a.1</p>spyod cing / bde ba'i longs spyod du stsal te/ nyin re zhing yang mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i sgra yang sgrogs/ bya rnams kyang de na rang gi khyim na mchis pa bzhin du 'jigs shing bag tsha ba ma mchis par spyod cing mchis so/ /de bas na lha yang dgung
<p>76a.2</p>lo slad ma la der gshegs pa rigs so/ /de skad ces zer ba thos nas ngang pa'i tshogs de dag thams cad lta bar 'dod par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas ngang pa'i sde dpon bzhin bzang la gros dris pa'i tshig dang yi ge gsal ba rgya cher bstan nas ji ltar bya bar
<p>76a.3</p>rigs zhes smras so/ /de nas bzhin bzang gis phyag 'tshal nas de la smras pa/ lha der gshegs pa mi rigs so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'o skol gyi lus 'di dag ni sha bzar rung ste chags pa'i gnas lags shing yid du 'ong ba sha stag lags la/ bdag cag 'di na
<p>76a.4</p>cis kyang phongs pa ma mchis so/ /mi rnams kyi snying yang tshig 'jam po bcos ma phyi bzhag can du smra la/ gnod par sems pa'i rang bzhin ngan pa ni mi mngon par bgyid cing phal cher snying rje chung ba ngan g.yo can lags so/ /rje gcig gzigs su gsol/ phal cher
<p>76a.5</p>bya dang ri dwags rnams/ /smra dang sems pa mthun par bgyid/ /mi yi nang na kha cig ni/ /de las bzlog pa'i tshul la mkhas/ /'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig smras kyang / /don dang mthun par ma mchis so/ /tshong pa rnams kyis khe tshol phyir/ /bdag gi nor
<p>76a.6</p>yang 'god par bgyid/ /skyon dang bcas shing mi rigs pa/ /dgos pa mchis kyang mi sman te/ /de bas lha gcig de tsam gyis/ /thugs ches mdzad par mi rigs so/ /gal te der mi gshegs su mi rung na yang / der gshegs la mtsho de'i longs spyod btang
<p>76a.7</p>ste/ slar myur du gshegs par rigs kyis de na yun ring du bzhugs par yang mi rigs la/ gtan du bzhugs dgongs par mi rigs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ston gyi dus la bab cing zla ba dang skar ma dang rgyu skar dri ma med pas brgyan pa'i tshe/ ngang pa'i tshogs
<p>76b</p>
<p>76b.1</p>mang po yul bA rA Na sI'i mtsho lta bar 'dod pa rnams kyis der 'dod ba'i phyir yang dang yang du gsol ba gdab pa dang / ngang pa de dag gi ngo bzlog ma phod nas/ bzhin bzang la sogs pa ngang pa mang pos yongs su bskor te/ zla ba ston gyi sprin gyis bskor ba bzhin du der
<p>76b.2</p>song ngo / /mtsho chen de yi nyams dga' dpal mthong nas/ /yid du 'ong dgu bkod pa sna tshogs rnams/ /rab tu dga' bas sems pa de rnams kyi/ /gnas su rung pa yon tan mtshungs par gyur/ /mtsho de gnas skabs de dang de dag gis/ /yid bzhin mtsho bas
<p>76b.3</p>gang dag lhag gyur pa/ /de yi phyir na ring du gnas par sems/ /yid bzhin mtsho la de dag mi sems so/ /de dag gis mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i sgra de yang thos la/ de na bya mang po rnams kyang bde bar 'khod/ mtsho de'i longs spyod kyis sems rab tu dga' zhing de nas
<p>76b.4</p>skyed mos tshal du rtser dong dong ba bzhin du longs spyod rjes su myong zhing dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas mtsho de dag bsrung bar bskos pa'i mi rnams kyis ngang pa de dag der lhags par rgyal po la bzlas par gsol pa/ lha sngon ngang pa mchog gnyis shig yon tan dang gzugs dka'
<p>76b.5</p>mchid du gda' ba/ de kho na dang 'dra ba'i ngang pa mchog gnyis shig 'dab ma ni gser gyi 'dab ma ltar mdzes/ gdong dang rkang pa gnyis ni gser btso ma bas kyang lhag par mdog 'jam zhing mdzes/ lus kyi tshad ni lhag par che zhing legs pa dag cig /ngang pa'i g.yog
<p>76b.6</p>'khor brgya phrag du mas bskor te/ lha'i mtsho brgyan pa'i phyir mdzes pa bzhin du 'dir mchis so zhes gsol to/ /de nas rgyal po des bya ba shor ba'i mi bya ba shor ba'i las la mkhas par grags shing grub pa cig btsal nas/ bya de gzung ba'i phyir rim gro bskyed de bka'
<p>76b.7</p>stsal to/ /des kyang de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes rgyal po'i bka' nyan nas ngang pa de gnyis kyi gnas dang spyod yul legs par brtags te/ de dang de dag tu rnyi dam po rnams ni mi mngon par byas te btsugs so/ /de nas ngang pa de dag brtan zhing mi rung du dogs pa med pas
<p>77a</p>
<p>77a.1</p>rab tu dga' nas yid g.yengs su rgyu zhing 'khod 'khod pa las/ ngang pa'i bdag po'i rkang pa gnyis rnyis zin par gyur to/ /brid pa'i thabs ni mkhas pa yis/ /nyes su dogs pa med pa rnams/ /bag phab pa ni log par 'gyur/ /
<p>77a.2</p>bag med brlag pa'i 'byung khungs yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas bsam pa gzhan dag las kyang kha cig 'di lta bu'i nyams nyes par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas sgra 'byin pa'i bye brag gis mtsho 'di 'jigs pa dang bcas pa yin no/ /zhes bsgrags so/ /de nas
<p>77a.3</p>ngang pa de dag ngang pa'i bdag po rnyis zin pas snying 'dar nas 'jigs shing skrag la rtab pa'i skad mi snyan pa phyung ste gcig la gcig mi lta bar dmag gi dpung g.yul ngor pham pa bzhin du phyogs phyogs nas 'phur te byer ro/ /ngang pa'i sde dpon bzhin bzang ni ngang
<p>77a.4</p>pa'i bdag po'i drung nas ma g.yos so/ /byams pa'i bcing bas yid ni bcings pa rnams/ /rang gi srog dang bral ba'ang mi sems so/ /mdza' bshes nyams nyes gyur pa'i mya ngan ni/ /srog dang bral ba bas kyang sdug bsngal che/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas bzhin
<p>77a.5</p>bzang la smras pa/ song shig song shig bzhin bzang khyod/ /'di na 'dug pa mi rigs so/ /nga ni 'di ltar gyur pa la/ /khyod kyi srogs byar ga la yod/ /bzhin bzang gis smras pa/ 'di na mchis na'ang 'gum par nges ma mchis/ /gud du mchis kyang rga shi med mi
<p>77a.6</p>'gyur/ /bde ba'i tshe na rtag tu khyod bkur la/ /nyams nyes tshe na dor du ga la rung / /bdag gi srog bzung tsam gyi phyir/ /bya yi rgyal po khyod bor na/ /gtam ngan char bzhin bab pa yi/ /skyabs ni bdag la ci zhig mchis/ /rgyal po chen po nyams nyes pa/ /bor
<p>77a.7</p>te 'gro ba cha mchis sam/ /bya rgyal khyod ni cir gyur pa/ /de ltar bdag nyid gyur kyang rung / /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rnyis ni zin par gyur pa la/ /tshang mang min pa gang du 'gro/ /khyod ni ma zin bde bar gnas/ /ci phyir de ltar 'gyur bar 'dod/ /de ltar byas na cir
<p>77b</p>
<p>77b.1</p>'gyur ltos/ /gnyis ka srog dang bral gyur na/ /gnyen bshes phyir ni 'khod pa dang / /khyod dang nga la ci zhig phan/ /bde dang mi bde mun khung bzhin/ /phan pa'i don ni mi mngon pas/ /de lta bu la srog bor na/ /khyod kyis don ni ci zhig bstan/ /bzhin
<p>77b.2</p>bzang gis smras pa/ 'dab chags rnams kyi gtso bo mchog /chos kyi don kyang ma gzigs sam/ /chos don legs par bgyid na ni/ /srid pa'i don mchog thob par 'gyur/ /bdag ni chos kyi don la lta/ /chos kyi srid kyang thob par 'gyur/ /khyod la glo ba nye
<p>77b.3</p>ba'i phyir/ /bdag ni gson par mi 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ /mdza' bo nyams nyes gyur pa la/ /grogs po gang dag chos dran zhing / /srog gi phyir yang mi gtong ba/ /dam pa rnams kyi chos yin bden/ /de bas khyod kyis chos bzhin byas/ /
<p>77b.4</p>nga la gus pa bstan zin gyi/ /ngas ni gsol ba btab pa bzhin/ /nga bdag 'dod pa bzhin du song / /de ltar byas na rung ba ni/ /mdza' bshes nga dang bral ba rnams/ /blo gros phun sum tshogs pa khyod/ /song na 'byor pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /de ltar de gnyis
<p>77b.5</p>gcig la gcig /byams pa'i yid kyis smras pa la/ /'chi bdag mngon sum 'ongs pa bzhin/ /rngon pa de yang 'ong ba mthong / /de nas ngang pa'i mchog de gnyis kyis rngon pa de 'ong ba mthong ba dang cang mi smra bar 'khod do/ /des kyang ngang pa mang po de dag byer te
<p>77b.6</p>med par gyur pa mthong nas/ 'dir 'ga' zhig ni rnyis zin yang dag go snyam nas/ blo la nges pa skyes te rnyi btsugs pa'i nags rnams nyul du song song ba dang / ngang pa'i mchog de gnyis mthong ngo / /de'i gzugs bzang po des yid la ngo mtshar cher gyur te/ gnyis ka
<p>77b.7</p>rnyis zin to snyam nas/ der btsugs pa'i rnyi gnyis bsgul ba dang / de nas gcig ni rnyis zin gcig ni ma zin par bde bar 'dug bzhin du/ rim gro byed cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ snying la ya mtshan cher gyur te/ /bzhin bzang la ched du smras pa/ /bya 'di rnyi yis zin
<p>78a</p>
<p>78a.1</p>pas na/ /'phur te 'gro ba'i mthu rtsal med/ /nga yang drung du 'ongs bzhin du/ /mkha' la 'phur te mi 'gro 'am/ /khyod ni ma zin bde bar 'dug /'dab gshog rdzogs shing mthu dang ldan/ /nga ni 'di ltar 'ong gyur kyang / /ci phyir mkha' la myur
<p>78a.2</p>mi 'gro/ /bzhin bzang gis de skad zer ba thos nas/ tshig 'bru rab tu gsal zhing spel legs la rang bzhin gyis yid du 'ong zhing brtan pa'i yon tan gyi gzi byin dang ldan pa'i sgra phyung ste/ mi'i skad du smras pa/ nus bzhin du ni mi 'gro ba/ /bya 'di rnyi yis zin gyur te/ /sdug
<p>78a.3</p>bsngal chen po myong bar gyur/ /de phyir nga ni mi 'gro'o/ /khyod kyis 'di yi rkang pa gnyis/ /rnyi yi zhags pa chen pos bzung / /bdag kyang 'di yi yon tan gyi/ /rnyis ni de bas dam du zin/ /de nas rngon pa de rab tu ya mtshan cher gyur te/ ba spu zing zhes byed par gyur
<p>78a.4</p>nas/ bzhin bzang la yang smras pa/ nga yis 'jigs nas ngang pa gzhan/ /'di bor nas ni gud du song / /khyod ni 'di ltar 'di mi gtong / /bya 'di khyod kyi cir 'ong gi/ /bzhin bzang gis smras pa/ ngang pa'i rgyal po srog dang 'dra ba'i grogs/ /bde ba sbyin pa de ni
<p>78a.5</p>nyams nyes gyur/ /de bas bdag gi srog ni yal gyur kyang / /'di ni btang bar bdag gis mi nus so/ /de nas bzhin bzang gis rngon pa de yid mgu zhing ya mtshan cher byed par shes nas yang smras pa/ bzang po bdag cag smras pa 'dis/ /gal te bde ba 'byung 'gyur zhing / 
<p>78a.6</p>de ring bdag cag btang na ni/ /chos dang ldan pa'i grags pa thob/ /rngon pas smras pa/ ngas ni khyed la gnod mi byed/ /khyod ni nga yis bzung ba'ang med/ /de bas khyod ni ci bder song / /gnyen dang 'phrad cing dga' bar gyis/ /bzhin bzang gis smras pa/ bdag gi
<p>78a.7</p>sdug bsngal mi bzhed na/ /bdag gis gsol ba bzhin du mdzod/ /gal te gcig gis mnyes gyur na/ /'di ni thong la bdag zung shig /bdag cag chu dang zheng yang mnyam/ /na tshod la yang rgan gzhon med/ /'di ltar bslus par gyur pa la/ /khyod dang bdag
<p>78b</p>
<p>78b.1</p>gnyis pham rgyal med/ /bdag la thugs ches mi 'gyur na/ /khyod kyis bdag nyid sngar zung la/ /bya yi rgyal po phyi nas thong / /khyod kyi rnyed pa'ang de bzhin la/ /bdag gis gsol ba'ang gnang bar mdzod/ /ngang pa mang po'ang dga' bar gyis/ /de bas mdza' ba'ang de bzhin
<p>78b.2</p>'gyur/ /khyod kyis btang na'ang ji ltar 'gyur ba gzigs/ /ngang pa mang po grags pa'i bdag po 'di/ /nam mkha' dngas pa'i nang na rnam mdzes pa/ /lha min rgyal po zla ba bzang po bzhin/ /de nas rngon pa de snying sra zhing rtsub pa la goms kyang / de rang gi srog la yang mi blta
<p>78b.3</p>bar jo bo la snying nye zhing byams pas chu gang khrel ltas che ba'i yon tan gyi gzi byin dang ldan pa/ brtan zhing 'jam por smra ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i tshig des sems dul bar gyur nas ngo mtshar che zhing rab tu gus pa'i dbang gis thal mo sbyar te bzhin bzang la smras pa/ skal ba chen
<p>78b.4</p>po legs so legs so/ /jo bo'i don du srog btang ba/ /khyod kyis 'dir ni gang bstan pa/ /de lta bu yi chos bzang ba/ /mi 'am lha yi nang na dkon/ /de bas khyod kyi rgyal po de/ /mgu bar byas nas gtang bar bya'o/ /khyod kyi srog pas phongs de la/ /gnod pa byed pa
<p>78b.5</p>su zhig yod/ /de skad ces smras nas/ rngon pa des rgyal po de'i bka' mnyan par ngang pa'i rgyal po snying rje can de la rim gro byas nas rnyi bkrol te btang ngo / /de nas ngang pa'i sde dpon bzhin bzang de/ ngang pa'i rgyal po de btang bas snying rab tu dga' bar gyur te/ rngon pa la dga'
<p>78b.6</p>zhing byams pa'i lta bas bltas nas smras pa/ ngang pa'i rgyal po khyod kyis de btang bas/ /bdag ni mdza' bos ji ltar dga' gyur pa/ /mdza' bo khyod kyang gnyen dang lhan cig tu/ /ston brgya mang po rab tu dga' bar shog /khyod kyi las byas don med mi 'gyur phyir/ /nga dang ngang
<p>78b.7</p>pa mang po'i bdag po gnyis/ /bde bar zung la khur gyi ngor bsngos te/ /pho brang nang du rgyal po'i spyan sngar brim/ /ngang pa'i rgyal po g.yog dang bcas gzigs nas/ /rgyal po de ni nges par dgyes par 'gyur/ /khyod la mgu bar gyur pa'i nor chen rnams/ /de yang
<p>79a</p>
<p>79a.1</p>mi re ba dag stsol bar 'gyur/ /de nas des de ltar gal gyis gcus pa dang / rngon pa des bsams pa/ 'di lta bu'i ngang pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba 'di gnyis re zhig rgyal po'i spyan sngar brim mo snyam nas/ ngang pa'i mchog de gnyis khur gyi ngor
<p>79a.2</p>bsngos te/ bde zhing ma bcings par khyer te song song nas rgyal po'i spyan sngar brim mo/ /bdag gis ngang pa'i rgyal po 'di/ /sde dpon dang bcas 'tshal te mchis/ /rmad du byung ba'i spyan gzigs 'di/ /rgyal po'i spyan sngar brim du gsol/ /de nas rgyal po de ya mtshan
<p>79a.3</p>che zhing snying rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ ngang pa'i mchog gser gyi pha bong 'dra ba gzi mdangs dang ldan pa'i gzugs yid du 'ong ba de gnyis la bltas nas/ rngon pa de la smras pa/ bya 'di gnyis ni ma bcings la/ /snad cing smas pa'ang yang med par/ /khyod ni sa la
<p>79a.4</p>'gro ba yis/ /ji ltar zin pa zhib tu smros/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / rngon pa des rgyal po la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ mtsho dang lu ma'i 'gram dag na/ /bya rnams rgyu ba'i sa phyogs su/ /bya rnyi rab tu mi bzad pa/ /bdag gis shin tu mang po btsugs/ /de nas ngang
<p>79a.5</p>pa'i mchog 'di ni/ /bag phab dogs pa med par rgyu/ /rnyi rnams btsugs pa de dag gis/ /rkang pa gnyis nas zin par gyur/ /gcig ni ma zin de la 'khor/ /bdag la de yis gsol ba btab/ /ngang pa'i rgyal po'i srog glud du/ /bdag nyid mchis bgyis zer bar gyur/ /
<p>79a.6</p>mi yi skad du tshig smras pa/ /rnam par gsal la tshig 'bru 'jam/ /bdag gis srog kyang yongs btang zhing / /gsol ba 'debs shing gzi byin che/ /de bas 'di tshig rab tu 'jam pa dang / /rje la snying nye spyod tshul brtan pa des/ /bdag ni mgu bar gyur nas 'di yi rje/ /bdag
<p>79a.7</p>gis khro ba btang nas 'di yang btang / /de ltar bya rgyal 'di ni btang ba yis/ /dga' bar gyur nas snyan pa mang du smras/ /bdag gi sug las don med mi 'gyur phyir/ /khyod kyi spyan sngar brim zhes bdag la mchis/ /de bas 'di ni bya'i gzugs can chos dang mthun pa gzhan zhig
<p>79b</p>
<p>79b.1</p>lags/ /gang gis bdag gi sems kyang de ma thag tu 'jam zhing mnyen par gyur/ /de bas bdag gis bya yi rgyal po rnyi las bkrol te btang ba dang / /bdag la drin gzo phyir ni rje khol bcas te khyod kyi spyan sngar mchis/ /rgyal po des de skad thos nas rab tu dga' zhing yid la
<p>79b.2</p>ngo mtshar cher gyur te/ gser gyi stan khri rgyal po'i gdan du 'os pa'i khri des rkang pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i 'od zer 'phro zhing sdug pa/ lha'i gdan rim pa du mar bshams shing bzang ba rgyab rten bde zhing nyams dga' bas brgyan pa/ rkang rten btsugs pa gcig dang
<p>79b.3</p>pa'i rgyal po de'i stan du things shig ces bka' stsal to/ /blon po chen po'i gdan khri gcig ni bzhin bzang gi sten du things shig ces bsgos so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ da ni dga' bar gyur pa'i gtam bya ba'i dus la bab po snyam nas/ dril bu ltar
<p>79b.4</p>snyan pa'i skad phyung ste/ rgyal po la smras pa/ gzi byin che zhing mdangs dang ldan pa'i sku/ /bde bar gnas khyod da lta thugs bde 'am/ /khyod kyi chos kyi sku la rma med dam/ /bka' lung snyan pas rgya cher dbugs phyung ngam/ /phan btags nan tur bgyi ba'i bka' khrims
<p>79b.5</p>kyis/ /'bangs kyi skye dgu bsrung ba'i dbang bskur tam/ /bdag gi grags pa'i gtam snyan rgyas gyur tam/ /'bangs rnams glo ba nye zhing phan btags sam/ /blon po mdzangs shing glo ba nye rnams la/ /brtag pa'i thabs kyis legs par brtags lags sam/ /'bangs
<p>79b.6</p>la sman pa rtag tu dgongs lags sam/ /de dag mi mkhyen pa ni mi bzhugs grang / /dpa' zhing thabs la mkhas pa'i thugs rje can/ /rgyal phran de dag bka' ni nyan lags sam/ /thugs rje chen po'i mdzad pa ma lags sam/ /thugs chen bag med par ni mi mnal grang / /
<p>79b.7</p>chos dang bde dang srid rnams mthun lags sam/ /khyod kyi spyod pa dam pa dga' ba yi/ /grags pa phyogs su rgyas par gyur pa yis/ /dgra rnams shugs 'byin spyod par gyur lags sam/ /de nas rgyal po de sems rab tu dang zhing dbang po rnams kyang dang la gsal bar gyur
<p>80a</p>
<p>80a.1</p>nas/ de la slar smras pa/ ngang pa de ring bdag kyang bde/ /thams cad du yang bde bar 'gyur/ /dam pa bdag dang 'phrad pas 'dir/ /yun ring bsam pa 'grub par gyur/ /khyod ni rnyi yis zin pa na/ /dga' bas sems ni g.yengs
<p>80a.2</p>gyur nas/ /khyod la dbyug pas brdegs nas ni/ /'di yis snad par ma byas sam/ /de ltar rngon pa 'di dag ni/ /bya rnams zin cing snad gyur te/ /dga' bas sems ni g.yengs gyur na/ /ngan pa dag kyang spyod par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di lta
<p>80a.3</p>bur ni nyams nyes kyang / /rgyal po chen po bde zhing mchis/ /'dis kyang bdag la dgra bzhin du/ /gnod pa ci yang ma bgyis so/ /bzhin bzang 'di yang ma zin par/ /bdag la byams pas zin bzhin 'dug /'jam por smras pa mthong ba dang / /ngo mtshar che bar gyur pa
<p>80a.4</p>yis/ /'di yi tshig ni 'jam po yis/ /de nas yid ni mgu gyur nas/ /dul zhing rim gro cher bskyed de/ /bdag ni 'di yis rnyi las bkrol/ /de bas 'di ltar bzhin bzang gis/ /'di la phan yon gdags pa dang / /bde ba chen po 'byung ba'i phyir/ /bdag cag
<p>80a.5</p>gnyis ni 'dir mchis so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bsam pa gnyis ni 'dir byon te/ /khyed gnyis byon pa rab tu legs/ /khyed gnyis mthong bar gyur pas na/ /bdag ni rab tu dga' bar gyur/ /rngon pa 'di yang de ring nas/ /don chen grub pa gzigs su gsol/ /'o skol
<p>80a.6</p>gnyis ka dga' bgyis pas/ /'di ni mgu bar 'gyur bar rigs/ /de skad ces smras nas/ rgyal po des rngon pa de la nor rab tu mang zhing rgya che ba byin te mgu bar byas nas/ yang rgyal pos smras pa/ khyed gnyis ched du bdag gi khyim du byon/ /de bas bdag la 'dzem dogs ma
<p>80a.7</p>mchis par/ /ci dang ci bzhes de dag bdag la gsungs/ /bdag gi bdog pa khyed dang thun mong lags/ /mdza' bos spobs te dogs med tshig gsal ba/ /longs spyod bdog la bslangs nas mgu gyur pa/ /de lta bu ni nor gyis mgur mi 'gyur/ /de bas mdza' bo'i spobs
<p>80b</p>
<p>80b.1</p>pa phan yon che/ /de nas rgyal po des bzhin bzang la smrar gzhug par 'dod nas 'dzum dmul te bzhin bzang la bltas nas smras pa/ skye bo gsar bu bshes shing ma 'dris pa/ /rab tu spobs shing bag phab mi rung yang / /des shing mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshig dag gis/ /
<p>80b.2</p>zhe sar bcas shing snyan par mi smra min/ /de bas tshig tsam smra ba yis/ /bdag ni spobs par re ba dang / /phyi phyir mdza' bar 'dod pa dang / /bsam pa don yod bgyi bar rigs/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / ngang pa'i sde dpon bzhin bzang gis de la tshul bzhin du phyag
<p>80b.3</p>'tshal te smras pa/ dbang chen 'dra ba khyod dang gnyis/ /de ltar bka' mchid gsungs pa ni/ /rab tu dgyes pa'i tshul bstan na/ /su zhig yid la bsam mi rdzogs/ /mi yi bdag po bka' mchid gsung bzhin la/ /bya yi bdag po rab tu dga' bzhin du/ /bka'
<p>80b.4</p>mchid de lta'i nang du 'bangs dag gis/ /spyi brtol bskyed de smra ba ga la rigs/ /ya rabs dul ba'i tshul ni de ma lags/ /de ltar 'tshal bzhin rab tu ji ltar 'jug /rgyal po chen po de bas bdag mi smra/ /bzod par mdzad pa'i rigs na bzod par gsol/ /
<p>80b.5</p>de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po rab tu dga' zhing bzhin gyi mdangs phyung nas bzhin bzang la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod kyi yon tan gtam snyan mi rnams zer bar rigs/ /ngang pa'i bdag po dang yang grogs po 'thams par rigs/ /dul ba dang ni tshul la
<p>80b.6</p>mkhas pa 'di lta bu/ /rang gi sems ni ma sbyangs ga la yod/ /de bas bdag cag mdza' ba 'di/ /ci nas rgyun mi chad pa dang / /de bzhin bdag la spobs par gyis/ /ya rabs 'phrad pa nyams ma gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyal po de rab tu mdza' bar
<p>80b.7</p>'dod pa dang byams par shes nas/ de la mgu bar byed cing 'di skad ces smras so/ /dang po bshes par gyur pa na'ang / /bdag nyid chen po'i tshul 'dzin pas/ /mdza' bo dam pas bya ba gang / /de ni khyod kyis bdag la byas/ /bkur sti bgyi ba'i cho ga 'dis/ /
<p>81a</p>
<p>81a.1</p>khyod kyis bdag la gang bstan pa/ /rgyal po chen po su yis sems/ /dran bzhin dmigs par mi 'gyur mchis/ /dgos pa lta zhig ched che ci zhig mchis/ /rgyal po chen po khyod la brten zhing lta/ /khyod ni mgron la dga' zhing yon tan 'dod/ /
<p>81a.2</p>'di ltar gyur pa nges par goms pa yis/ /'bangs la phan phyir rgyal po'i tshul 'dzin pa/ /drang srong mnyam gzhag dka' thub 'bad pa bzhin/ /khyod kyi yon tan rang gi ngang gis gnas/ /rang bzhin dul ba khyod lta lags kyang mod/ /de bas bstod par 'os pa'i yon tan bde/ /
<p>81a.3</p>'byung po nges pa'i gcong rong mi 'dod do/ /yon tan skyon gyi chos nyid 'di shes nas/ /sems yod su zhig mi phan lam ngan 'gro/ /dpa' bas yul 'khor thob par mi 'gyur la/ /nor dang rtsol phod thabs kyis de mi thob/ /yon tan med na nor gos 'bad mi phan/ /rgyal
<p>81a.4</p>po yon tan gyis ni thob par 'gyur/ /lha yi dbang po'i dpal yang yon tan ltos/ /yon tan yod na rgyud kyang rab tu 'phel/ /grags pa rnams kyang yon tan nyid las 'phro/ /bdag nyid che ba'i mthu yang yon tan gnas/ /zla ba'i 'od las gsal ba'i yon tan ni/ /
<p>81a.5</p>dgra bo mi bzad dregs pas sdang ba dang / /'khon snying yod cing phrag dog che ba dang / /yid ni dang zhing rab tu mgu bar byed/ /rgyal po de ltar dul la sogs pa yi/ /yon tan bzang zhing che ba ma nyams par/ /rgyal phran dregs pa mthu yis btul nas ni/ /sa 'di skyong la
<p>81a.6</p>'bangs kyang bskyang du gsol/ /'bangs la phan gdags rgyal po'i don gyi mchog /rgyal po chos la dga' bar gyur na ni/ /tshe rabs gnyis ka bde ba'i lam 'di yin/ /rgyal po'i spyod pa bzhin du 'bangs kyang spyod/ /de bas chos bzhin sa la gnas pa slobs/ /sum cu rtsa
<p>81a.7</p>gsum rje yang khyod la bsrung / /khyod kyi drung na bde bar gnas gyur kyang / /bdag gi grogs mang sdug bsngal 'bod pa bzhin/ /de nas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa de'i tshig de la mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/ bkur sti dang tshig snyan par smras te/ ngang pa'i gtso bo de gnyis
<p>81b</p>
<p>81b.1</p>slar bkyes so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ston gyi nam mkha'i dkyil ral gri dri ma med pa ltar sngo zhing dwangs la mdzes pa la 'phur nas/ bzhin bzang de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ba ni/ gzugs brnyan drung na 'dug pa dang 'dra bar byas te/ ngang pa'i tshogs mang po'i drung du 'ong ba
<p>81b.2</p>dang / mthong ma thag tu rab tu dga' ba dang ldan par byas so/ /dus dus dag tu ngang pa'i rgyal po de/ /gzhan la snying brtse'i phyir ni rgyal po yi/ /ched du song nas chos kyang ston par byed/ /rgyal po des ni mchod pa gus par byas/ /de lta bas na dam pa rnams dud 'gror lhung
<p>81b.3</p>ba'i spyod pa la yang / skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa rnams kyis rjes su mthun par bya ba tsam yang mi nus na/ bde 'gro la gnas pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ltar tshig snyan pa ni gnyis ka la phan par 'gyur ba yin no/ /zhes tshig snyan par smra ba'i yon tan
<p>81b.4</p>bsngags pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ldan pas don bsgrub dka' ba yang grub par gyur to/ /zhes dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan bsngags pa la yang brjod par bya'o/ /gnas brtan kun dga' bo'i sngon gyi ris mthun pa la yang
<p>81b.5</p>brjod par bya ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu 'grogs te/ yun ring por byams pa dang rab tu gus pa 'ba' zhig byed pa yin no/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /ngang par skyes pa'i rabs te nyi shu gnyis pa'o// //bam po brgyad pa/ skyes bu dam pa
<p>81b.6</p>rnams ni phan btags pa la drin du gzo ba dang bzod pa la goms pas rim gro ma byas kyang sngon phan 'dogs pa la snying brtse ba lhod par mi 'gyur ro/ /de yang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe/ kun du rgyu byang chub ces bya bar grags so/ /de khyim
<p>81b.7</p>na gnas bzhin du 'jig rten pas bsngags pa'i gnas rnams kyi go rims ni rgya cher shes/ sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs la ni mkhas par byas/ rab tu byung nas kyang 'jig rten la phan 'dogs par brtson pas chos kyi gtsug lag rnams la lhag par yang blo zhen par gyur te/ de dag
<p>82a</p>
<p>82a.1</p>la slob dpon gyi go 'phang thob par gyur to/ /de bsod nams dang ldan zhing shes pa rgya che ba dang 'jig rten gyi spyod tshul la mkhas pa dang nan tan che ba'i yon tan dang ldan pas/ gang dang gang du song ba de dang der mkhas pa rnams dang mkhas pa la dga' ba
<p>82a.2</p>rnams dang / rgyal po'i blon po rnams dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams dang / gzhan mu stegs can rnams dang / rab tu byung ba rnams kyis bkur sti bya zhing dran par bya bar gyur to/ /bsod nams gzhi las 'bar ba'i yon tan rnams/ /nan tan bsgrub pa'i byin
<p>82a.3</p>gyis dga' bar gyur/ /dgra yang rang gi grags pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ /lhag par bkur sti byed pa nyid du gyur/ /de nas bdag nyid chen po de 'jig rten la phan btags pa'i phyir/ grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang / grong rdal dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du
<p>82a.4</p>rgyu zhing song song ba las/ rgyal po zhig gi yul gyi 'dab tu phyin par gyur to/ /de'i yon tan gyi mthu rgya chen po des thos shing de rgyang ring po nas 'ongs par shes nas yid rab tu dga' ste/ rang gi skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba'i sa phyogs gcig tu de'i gnas byed du bcug go/ /
<p>82a.5</p>bsu ba la sogs pa bkur sti cher byas te/ de rang gi yul du bzhag nas slob dpon la slob mas bya ba bzhin du rim gro dang bkur sti tshul bzhin du byas te mchod cing bkur ro/ /longs spyod yon tan phun sum tshogs/ /khyim du re ba'i mgron 'ongs nas/ /yon tan can la
<p>82a.6</p>dga' ba rnams/ /rab tu dga' zhing spro bar gyur/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang de la chos kyi gtam yid du 'ong zhing rna bar snyan pa rnams kyis phan par 'gyur ba'i lam bstan pas nyi ma re re zhing phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro/ /gus pa med la'ang chos la dga' ba rnams/ /
<p>82a.7</p>gzhan la snying brtse phan pa'i tshig smra na/ /phan par 'dod cing yon tan dga' ba yi/ /skye bo snod gtsang 'dra la smos ci dgos/ /de nas rgyal po de'i blon po rnams dang mkhas pa'i thabs thob pa rnams 'khor tshogs pa'i nang du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rim
<p>82b</p>
<p>82b.1</p>gro cher byas pa dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs pa la phrag dog gi sems skyes nas mi bzod par gyur to/ /rang gi yon tan grags pa khyad par can/ /'gro ba mgu bar nus pa'i mthu can la/ /yon tan bcos mas bkur sti thob pa rnams/ /phrag dog me ni gor ma chags
<p>82b.2</p>par 'bar/ /de la gtsug lag gi gtam gyis mngon sum du zil gyis mnan mi nus shing / rgyal po chos la brten pa'ang ma bzod nas/ thabs de dag gis rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' la mi dga' bar gyur pa byas so/ /lha kun tu rgyu byang chub la thugs ches par mdzad
<p>82b.3</p>par mi rigs so/ /gdon mi za bar 'di ni lha yon tan la dgyes pa dang chos la phyogs par 'tshal nas/ brlag par bgyi ba'i slad du g.yo dang bcas pa'i tshig 'jam po smra zhing spyod pa'i nyams drod 'dzin pa lags te nyi 'og gi rgyal po 'ga' zhig gis bya ma rta btang bar lags
<p>82b.4</p>par gor ma chags so/ /de ltar ci mngon zhe na/ 'di ltar chos kyi bdag nyid can du bgyis nas/ lha'i zhal snga nas cig kho na thugs rje che ba dang / ngo tsha mkhyen zhing 'jam des can du bslab ste srid dang 'dod pa dang mi mthun pa rgyal rigs kyi chos ma yin pa snyan dngags dang
<p>82b.5</p>mi mthun pa/ chos la skul ma 'debs shing / snying rje dang ldan pa bgyi ba'i don du bsgrub cing ched cher bgyis nas thabs kyis bag 'bebs so/ /nyi 'og gi rgyal po'i pho nya gzhan dag dang bshes shing 'drul la/ 'di nyid kyang rgyal po'i gtsug lag gi rgyus la mi mkhas pa yang
<p>82b.6</p>ma lags te/ de bas na bdag cag ni 'di la glo ba mi ches so/ /de nas rgyal po de la dbyen gyi thabs yang dang yang du lan du mar phan par 'dod pa bzhin du mi mang pos smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la yid mi ches par gyur te byams pa dang bkur sti chung zhing sems sngon dang mi
<p>82b.7</p>'dra bar gyur to/ /'brug sgra drag po ser ba 'dra ba yi/ /dbyen gyi ser ba rdo rje 'bab pa ni/ /ming tsam tshod kyis mdza' ba brtan pa dag /nyams shing zhig par mi 'gyur su zhig yod/ /de nas rgyal po de byang chub sems dpa' de la bag mi 'bebs shing dga' dga' ltar byed pa btang ste
<p>83a</p>
<p>83a.1</p>bkur sti chung bar gyur nas/ sngon bzhin du rim gro mi byed par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang sems gtsang bas rgyal po rnams 'bangs kyi bya ba mang pos blo brel to snyam nas/ de ltar gyur pa yid la yang mi byed na/ de'i 'khor 'khod pa rnams gus pa
<p>83a.2</p>dang rim gro byed pa la g.yel bar gyur pa mthong ba dang / rgyal po thugs ma dgyes par gyur pa shes nas/ kun tu rgyu'i yo byad dbyug pa gsum dang ril ba spyi blugs la sogs pa khyer te 'gro bar chas so/ /de ltar gyur pa rgyal po des thos nas da dung 'khon byung ba nyid du yang ma gyur pas/ des
<p>83a.3</p>shing dul ba'i tshul bstan te/ de'i drung du song nas rtab rtab por gyur pa 'dra bar byas te slar log par 'dod bzhin du smras pa/ ci phyir 'di ltar 'phral du bdag bor te/ /khyod ni 'gro bar chas pa bzhin du sems/ /nongs par dogs pa 'ga' zhig 'byung ba'i gzhi/ /bdag gi nongs
<p>83a.4</p>pa khyod kyis mthong ngam ci/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas de la smras pa/ /bdag ni 'phral la 'di ltar mi mchi zhing / /bkur sti chung ba tsam gyis khros ma lags/ /khyod ni chos kyi snod du ma gyur cing / /g.yo dang bcas pas 'di nas bdag ni cha/ /de nas rgyal po des khyi
<p>83a.5</p>gnang chen cig khros zhing zug ste so gtsigs nas der zar 'ongs pa bstan nas yang smras pa/ rgyal po chen po mi ma lags pa 'dis mche bzhi bgyis pa gzigs su gsol/ khyi 'di sngon ni khyod kyi rjes 'brang zhing / /bdag la rab tu 'dris par bgyis pa las/ /mdzad stangs gsang
<p>83a.6</p>bar shes par ma gyur nas/ /zugs shing za bas khyod kyi dgongs pa bstan/ /bdag la ma gus rtsub pa cung zad cig /khyod las nges par 'di yis thos lags grang / /de bas 'dis kyang rjes su 'brang bar gyur/ /'khor rnams spyod pa khyod ni dgyes par bgyid/ /de nas rgyal po
<p>83a.7</p>de brtags pa la bab pa dang ngo tsha bas mgo smad de 'di'i blo rno ba des sems mi dga' bar gyur te/ nga ni g.yo bya ba'i dus la ma bab po snyam nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ khyod las gleng nas bka' mchid 'di lta bu/ /bdag cag tshogs pa'i nang du bgyis kyang
<p>83b</p>
<p>83b.1</p>mad/ /dgos pa'i dbang gis bdag gis yal bar bor/ /de bas bzod par mdzod la ma bzhud bzhugs/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bdag ni bkur sti chung ba'i phyir mi bzod de mchi ba ma lags kyi rgyal po chen po da ni mchi ba'i dus lags pa'i slad du mchis so/ /khyod kyis
<p>83b.2</p>gzigs su gsol/ bkur sti cung zad bri bar gyur pa'i tshe/ /bdag rang langs te song bar ma gyur na/ /phongs shig 'dug pa ngan zhing byis pa'i chos/ /ma bltas na ni slad kyis bskrad par 'gyur/ /de bas na ni mchi ba'i dus la bab/ /mi dga' bzhin du mchis su ga la rung / /
<p>83b.3</p>lan cig tsam gyis sma bab gyur pa yis/ /sngon chad phan btags pa yang ga la snyam/ /byams pa'i rlan med brten du mi rung ste/ /khron pa skam po chu 'dod mi bsten bzhin/ /de la rab tu bsgrims te don bsgrub kyang / /de don chung zhing rnyog pa can du gyur/ /bde ba 'dod cing nyon
<p>83b.4</p>mongs mi 'dod pas/ /mtsho chen ston ka'i chu gtsang 'dra ba ni/ /rab tu dwangs pa nyid la brten par rigs/ /tshul 'di 'jig rten dag na gsal bar grags/ /gus par byed kyang gzhan du phyogs pa dang / /gzhan du phyogs kyang zhum pas de la lta/ /sngon chad phan
<p>83b.5</p>btags drin du mi gzo pa/ /mi yi gzugs de ci lags gtol ma mchis/ /ma brten pa dang rab tu brten drags dang / /bslang ba drags na byams pa med par 'gyur/ /de bas gnas pa'i skyon la mdza' ba'i mjug 'di ni/ /bsrung bar 'tshal gyis bdag ni re zhig
<p>83b.6</p>mchis/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te khyod mi 'gror mi btub yang / /nga la sems nas da rung slar yang 'dir byon cing bdag spyan ras kyis btsal bar rigs so/ /ha cang ma brten pa las 'khon byung ba mi rigs so/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po 'jig
<p>83b.7</p>rten gnas pa 'di dag ni bar chad mang la gnod pa dang dgra mang bas gdon mi 'tshal bar mchi'o zhes mchid kyis 'tshal du mi rung ngo / /gal te mchi ba'i skabs dang ldan na khyod kyi zhal lta'o zhes bdag nyid chen po des/ rgyal po de la tshig 'jam pos dga' bar byas nas/ rgyal po
<p>84a</p>
<p>84a.1</p>des bkur sti byas te/ de'i yul las byung ste song ngo / /de khyim pa dang brten pa des/ sems mi bde bar gyur nas dgon pa'i gnas zhig tu gnas te blo bsam gtan la brtson par de na gnas pa las/ ring por ma lon par bsam gtan bzhi dang / 
<p>84a.2</p>mngon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur to/ /rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba'i ro myong ba des rgyal po la snying brtse ba'i dran pa byung bar gyur pa ni/ rgyal po de da lta ji ltar 'dug snyam pa dang / de nas des 'di ltar blon po de dag gis lta ba gang la chags pa de dag la ltar bcug pa mthong ngo / /de la
<p>84a.3</p>blon po la las ni rgyu brtags mi bzod pa'i dpe rnams kyis rgyu med pa'i lta ba las drangs so/ /pad+ma'i sdong po lo ma me tog snying po dang / /kha dog dbyibs dang 'jam la sogs pa'i rgyu ni gang / /bya yi 'dab ma sna tshogs ris su bris pa su/ /'gro ba 'di dag ngo bo nyid kyis de
<p>84a.4</p>bzhin nges/ /kha cig ni dbang phyug gi blos sbyar ba rgyu yin par ston te/ 'di dag thams cad rgyu med byung bar mi rigs te/ /'di la kun tu bdag po mtha' yas gcig cig yod/ /sna tshogs 'di dag rang dgar byed pa nges par yod/ /'jig rten byas na phyis kyang
<p>84a.5</p>mnyam du med par byed/ /yang la las ni bde dang mi bde ba 'di dag thams cad sngon gyi las kyis byas kyi 'bad pa'i mthus byas pa ma yin no zhes de la de ltar 'dzin du bcug go/ /dngos po mtha' yas so sor gnas pa mang po rnams/ /gcig pus dus gcig tu ni ji
<p>84a.6</p>ltar bya bar nus/ /bde bar byed la'ang mkhas pa sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ /de bas 'di dag thams cad sngon gyi las las gyur/ /gzhan dag ni chad par lta ba'i gtam gyis de 'dod pa'i longs spyod byed du gzhug pa'i phyir smras pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog yon tan ldan
<p>84a.7</p>pa'i shing / /las kyis byas pa ma yin 'on kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /chu dgas na rnams kyang slar ni de bzhin skye mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten de dang 'dra bar bde la gzhol bar mdzod/ /kha cig ni de la rgyal rigs kyi gtsug lag las 'byung ba g.yo dang dgra thabs dang 'brel pa/ snying rje med cing
<p>84b</p>
<p>84b.1</p>skyon dang bcas pa chos dang 'gal ba la/ 'di ni rgyal po'i chos lags so zhes ston to/ /brten pa'i mi rnams la ni grib ma'i ljon shing bzhin/ /de dag ji srid dgos pa'i dus la ma bab pa/ /de srid byas pa gzo bas rang gi grags pa bsrung / /dgos pa byung na mchod sbyin phyugs
<p>84b.2</p>bzhin de dag spyad/ /de ltar blon po de dag gis rgyal po de lta ba ngan pa'i lam de dang de dag tu drangs par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyal po de skye bo sdig pa can dag brten cing blo gzhan gyi dring la 'jog pas lta ba ngan ba'i g.yang sar lhung du nye bar dogs nas de la snying brtse bar
<p>84b.3</p>gyur nas de las bzlog pa'i thabs bsams pa/ yon tan goms pas dge ba rnams/ /legs par byas pa sems la gnas/ /pad+ma'i 'dab las chu bo bzhin/ /nyes par byas pa mi chags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/ da ni de'i dus la bab po
<p>84b.4</p>snyam nas/ rang gi dka' thub kyi gnas su spre'u chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus de'i pags pa bshus te/ gzhan mi snang bar byas nas/ des spre'u'i pags pa chen po sprul pa de gyon nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor phyin pa dang / chab sgo bas kyang sbran nas/ 
<p>84b.5</p>rgyal po'i 'khor tshogs pa go rims bzhin du mi 'khrug par 'khod pa'i mtha' ni mtshon cha thogs pa rnams kyis bskor/ blon po dang / bram ze dang / pho nya dang / nang mi gtso bo rnams kyis ni gang / skye bo rnams kyi chas ni brtan zhing dul la rgya che/ chab sgo chen po'i sgo ba ral gri dang
<p>84b.6</p>dbyug pa thogs pa rnams kyis ni bsrung / mi'i bdag po ni seng ge'i khri la 'dug par 'ongs so/ /rgyal po des kyang bsu ba la sogs pa mgron 'ongs pa'i bkur sti bya ba dang snyan par smra ba gdan bting ba byas nas/ spre'u'i pags pa gyon pa ngo mtshar cher bzung nas dris pa/
